K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39a-1: a'urdhva dza t'a ma h'a kalpa mah'a bo dhi satv'a'i bi kurbba na pa ta la bi sa r'a bha ga t'i a'arya t'a r'a mu la kalpa n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39a-3: ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-0: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'khrul pa @39b le'u rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-1: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-4: bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil na rab tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-5: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-10: rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-14: yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-16: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:39b-17: de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-2: de nas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par so sor thob bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-5: rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-6: bdud 'dul bar byed pa; chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-8: rang sangs rgyal thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-10: mi rnams su skye bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-11: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-13: nad kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-16: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-17: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gsung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad don med par gsungs par byed pa ma lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40a-22: sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba nye bar bzung nas de gsung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:40b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil @40b 'khor chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas rnam par dag pa'i yul la 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41a-0: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char gang+g'a'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na; bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su zhugs te gang du de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyi thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal @41a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41a-2: 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41a-3: de nas yang sems dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa spyan gdangs nas 'di'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gang yin pa der mngon par phyogs te gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41a-4: de nas kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41a-5: de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag btsal te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-0: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa gang na ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das mi mjed @41b kyi khams de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-1: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-2: phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-4: gsang sngags kyi spyod ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-5: sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-7: gsang ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-9: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-12: sems dpa' chen po gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-13: nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-16: reg par gnas sam zhes rmed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:41b-17: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-0: sems dpa' chen po gang g'a'i klung brgya stong phrag gang g'a'i bye ma la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang khyod @42a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-2: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-4: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-6: ras ris kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-8: bzlas pa'i nges par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-9: sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-10: rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-13: da ltar byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-14: gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston pa; mthar thug par zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-15: nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-16: dam tshig rab 'byams kyi le'u dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-24: spyod pa mthar thug pa gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la'ang 'di la rjes su yi rang ba kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-26: da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42a-27: sh'akya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon la khyod kyang smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-0: 'di la'ang rtsa ba'i rig sngags su 'gyur @42b ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-2: na ma aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-6: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-9: na mo bha ga ba tyee a'arya t'a r'a yee /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-12: t'a re ri dzu ka dharma ni tya te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-15: t'are aa na bhi l'a bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-18: tu re tu re hi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-19: tra sa ni tra sa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-25: tsandra pra be hi li hi li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-30: dha na pa ni t'a re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-34: tsinta y'a mi tsinta dha mi ku ru sv'a dh'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-35: 'di ni sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis gsungs shing gsung bar 'gyur ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-37: khyod kyis kyang da lta smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-38: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri rgyas pas rnam par phye ba'i mthar sh'akya thub pa byon te sh'akya thub pas rjes su gnang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-39: 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-40: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-41: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-44: t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-45: 'di la nye ba'i snying po yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-46: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:42b-47: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satva n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @43a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43a-1: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i byang chub kyi snying po kun tu thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43a-2: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43a-5: thad ka'i mthar thug pa'i thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43a-9: gang khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43a-10: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi nus te byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pas bcu la rab tu bzhugs ba rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis thabs gcig byams pa dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog gsang ba don thams cad sgrub par byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems @43b can thams cad kyis las thams cad byed ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-1: rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-2: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i khyad par gyis sgrub par byed pa dang mthun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-4: thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgongs pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsungs par gyur to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-7: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-8: de nas byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-10: skyes bu stobs ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:43b-11: brkyang ba las skum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-0: se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang mig byed 'dzums pa skad cig tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de steng gi nam mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i @44a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-1: dkyil 'khor chen po slar 'khod nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang ba brtsegs ba rin po che du mas rnam par phye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-3: rin po che'i gdugs du mas dpag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-5: dar gyi rgyan gyis mdzes par spras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-10: rin po che g-yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-11: sgra snyan pa 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-12: byang chub sems dpa' so sor gnas par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-16: phye ma'i char 'bebs par byed pa mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44a-17: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pa spu zing zhes byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-0: lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g-yos pa dang ldan pa mthong nas skrag cing snying 'dar te 'on te 'byor pa yongs su @44b nyams sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-1: ci zhes phan tshun rings thabs su skad mthon pos smra bar rtsom zhing 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-9: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas me tog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-11: phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur bar 'dod de don chen po spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-13: chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba'ang nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshig rab tu smras pa 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-15: phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-16: phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-17: spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-18: phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-19: don med thams cad bzlog pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-21: ngan song thams cad 'joms pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:44b-22: dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-2: phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-3: srid gsum 'dam ni rnam sbyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-5: sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-6: thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-7: gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-8: zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-9: sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-10: thams cad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-11: bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-12: bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-13: chos rnams thams cad kun tu rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-14: sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-15: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-16: spros pa med pa'i rnam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-17: yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:45a-19: shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu kun gyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-8: bdud kyi stobs thams cad zil gyi gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang dag par rab tu g-yos te snang ba chen po gsal bar byas nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa ston pa gyur cing rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang gsungs par gyur to; ;rtog pa'i sngags rnams kyi sngags du ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-11: thun mong pa cig gis rim pa las ma 'das par 'byung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-12: na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am aa bh'a ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-14: sa mung+ga t'a n'am; na ma:bratye ka buddh'a a'arya shr'a ba k'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-15: na mo bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61a-16: da sha bhu mi pra tishtha te sha ra nam bo dhi satva n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-16: by'a ghra tsarma ni b'a sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-17: ku ru ku ru sarba karm'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-27: bee ba sva ta dz'i bi t'a na ta ka ra ku ru ku ru ma ma kary'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-30: m'a bi lamba sa ma yam nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-32: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-33: sarba a'a sh'a ba ri p'u ra ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-34: he he bha ga b'a na; kanytsi ra ya si ma ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-35: sarba aartha s'a dha ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-36: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po sgrol mas gnon pa zhes bya ba gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed cing thob par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-38: gshin rje'i rgyal po'ang 'gugs par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin na sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-39: khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs ma thag tu sems can thams cad nyam thag cing 'jigs skrag ste yid skyo zhing snying gas par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-41: byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs skyabs gzhan med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:61b-43: dpung gnyen gzhan med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar lhags par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-1: la la sa la spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-8: brdzus te skyes pa sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa na rnam par gnas pa steng dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-13: yud tsam de la gab pa rnams khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos skad cig la 'dir bkug par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-20: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-21: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan snga ru bzlas brjod bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-23: gang yang rung ba der bklag par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-24: ci'i phyir na ltas ngan chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-26: bdag nyid nye bar 'joms par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62a-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams @62b 'ba' zhig ni thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-2: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-3: chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par byed pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-5: bstan pa med par bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-6: lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-7: dkon mchog gi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-8: sngags kyi spyod pa gsal bar byed pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-10: bgegs chen po rnam par gzhig pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-12: bdag gi stobs mngon par 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-13: gzhan gyi stobs zlog par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-19: rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa gsal bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-22: rang gi dbang phyug mngon par 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-23: myur du las rjes su sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-28: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-29: de dag gi rgyu mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-30: rgyu la thams cad du rtog ge pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:62b-31: rnam par rtog ge pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63a-11: lus srul po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63a-21: kam po dza chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63a-41: nam mkha' ma mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63a-43: gzugs can ma chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63a-45: gzugs ngan ma chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-0: @63b gnod sbyin mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-2: sha za mo chen mo dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-8: rims mi bzad pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-9: rtag pa las byung ba'i rims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-12: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-13: bad kan las gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-26: lto 'phye chen po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-30: lha ma yin chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:63b-52: dbang po chen po dang; nor lha'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:64a-28: mgo bo gsum pa zhes pa 'di rnams dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:64a-31: byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:64a-33: gang yang srin po'i rgyal po chen po srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bkug pa; 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:64b-12: mgo bo mtha' yas pa zhes pa'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:64b-15: sha za chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba de rnams kyang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:64b-21: legs par yid kyi shing rta dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65a-7: nye ba'i dam ku ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65a-9: la ku t'a chen po dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65a-21: drang srong chen po de rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65a-34: goo ta ma nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65a-47: pi spa la za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65a-49: bdud mda' zhes pa 'di rnams dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65b-2: gang yang lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rab tu zhugs shing 'khod par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65b-9: gang yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de rnams kyang nam mkha' lding brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te 'khor der 'bus par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:65b-22: 'dab chags rgyal po ste de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66a-13: de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66a-24: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66a-25: ci yang med pa min pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66a-27: nam mkha' mtha' yas min pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66a-42: khang pa brtsegs pa la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66a-44: lcang lo can na gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-0: gzhal @66b med khang na gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-2: bar snang la rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-6: de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab tshim dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-12: lag pa la sogs lha ma yin bye ba stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'gros rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-13: nor rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-15: g-yul 'gyed pa'i lha ma yin de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-18: bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:66b-20: gza' chen po'i 'jig rten gyi don du spyod pa bar snang la spyod pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:67a-31: gzugs ngan zhes pa ste gza' chen po de rnams kyang brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gtsang ma'i gnas der 'khor du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:67b-14: lha'i nor zhes pa de ltar rgyu skar rgyal po de rnams rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:67b-15: khyim sum cu rtsa drug la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:68a-15: khyim chen po khyim brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'di rnams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa gang na ba der nye bar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:68a-16: gang yang gnod sbyin chen mo gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag bye bas bskor ba /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:68b-26: phyag dar gyi sha za mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:68b-27: drag mo sha za mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:68b-28: ta la la'i sha za mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:68b-31: sha la za ba mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69a-7: du ba'i mtha' can ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69a-9: du ba bzang mo ma zhes pa sha za mo chen mo 'di rnams sha za mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba rnams kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der rab tu zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69a-11: ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su spyod cing sems can la rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa gtor ma dang phreng ba nyid sdud par byed pa la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69a-33: skem byed ma zhes pa ma mo chen mo 'di rnams ma mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba de rnams 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-0: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu 'don cing 'khod @69b par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-4: sems can ma yin pa ji srid dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-5: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar skabs 'dir thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil du gsal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-6: sems can gyi tshogs kyi srog chags 'ga' la'ang gnod pa med par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-7: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sems can thams cad kyis spyi bo na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-9: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs pa yang dag par mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-11: sems can dag gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byams byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:69b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rjes su gnang bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis rgyan bkod pa rdo rje sdug cing sra ba'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-0: sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag @70a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-1: tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de thams cad dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rdo rje'i rang bzhin rgya chen por lhag par gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-7: mdor bsdus na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal yas khang de rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bur yang dag par rab tu gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-8: 'khod par gyur pa rnams phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-9: de nas sems dpa' chen po de 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-10: khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa la bos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-11: kye kye khro bo chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-17: zhi ba rnams sad par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-18: ma dad pa rnams dad par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-19: ji srid nga'i rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-20: gsang sngags spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya chen po de nyid kyi rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70a-21: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chang ba de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la srungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-0: @70b de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-1: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i bka' mnos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-2: rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs yongs su brtags te sems can thams cad bsrung bar bya ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-3: brtan par bya ba'i don du bkod pa chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa khro bo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba phyogs bzhi kun nas de ltar steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-5: thad kar sgra drag po 'don bzhin pas rab tu gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-6: de nas sems can de rnams zhi ba nyid kyi yid dang ldan pas yang dag par 'jug pa'i bka' las mi 'da' bar gyur te sgra 'di lta bu'ang thos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-7: gang dam tshig 'di 'da' bar byed pa 'di dag ni aa rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-8: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' de rang gi rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-9: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-10: chos gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:70b-13: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-0: chos gnyis po dag la rab tu gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @71a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-1: chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-2: gnyis po dag gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-3: byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-4: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-5: chos gsum rnams kyi rang gi gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don nges par brtan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-7: sems can yongs su mi gtod ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-9: rang gi gsang sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-10: chos bzhi yang dag par ldan na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-12: rang gi gsang sngags rdzogs pa yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-13: gzhan gyi gsang sngags nye bar gcod pa min pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-14: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-15: snying rje chen po sgom pa'i sems te chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71a-16: chos lngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la yang dag par 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-0: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i yul bsten pa nyid @71b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-1: bas mtha'i dgon pa bsten pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-2: sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-3: 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-6: spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de chos lnga po 'di dag gis sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-7: chos drug ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-9: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa nye bar gcod pa med pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-10: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-11: skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yongs su tshol zhing dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi spong ba nyid de chos drug po 'di ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-12: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub la yang dag par kun tu 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-13: chos bdun rnams ni rig sngags grub pa'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-14: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug par byed pa nyid du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zab mo sgom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:71b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pas dus gsum du ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-2: dka' thub la ma thogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-6: brtan pa dang du len par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-8: theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo'i tshul la yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-12: sgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-16: dga' ba chen po yongs su sgom par byed pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-18: chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-19: gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-20: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa las te chos bdun po 'di rnams ni rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-21: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-22: chos brgyad ni rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-23: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyis dngos grub yang dag par 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72a-26: ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dad pas ngo mtshar bar sems par 'dod pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-0: byang chub sems @72b dpa'i dad pa'i 'bras bu rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-1: rnam par 'phrul ba the tshom med pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-2: phyin ci ma log pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa las bla ma la gus pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-6: spyod pa nye bar bstan ba mi slu bar 'dzin cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-7: dngos grub kyi zhing gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-8: gnas ma yin pa rmi lam du mthong ba ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-11: rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-12: rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-14: mdor bsdus na dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes pa'i go cha bgos te bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar byed pa las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-15: byang chub kyi rgyud gnon par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-17: dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-18: dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:72b-20: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs par byed pa ste chos brgyad po 'di ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-3: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-4: mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la'ang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pas yid sngags kyi le'u rab 'byams mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-5: de las gzhan du rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-6: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nyams sad pa'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-7: de nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-10: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams 'di skad du brjod par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-12: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i don bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston cig legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73a-15: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dge ba legs par gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-0: gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba @73b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-1: yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-2: g-yul du'ang thog mar glang po che'i steng du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-6: byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 'gyur ba de la bdag cag mtshungs par brtag par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-8: dgra bo ngag dbang du bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-9: pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-10: glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-22: rtag tu longs spyod 'phel pa nyid kyang bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-23: de skad smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-24: theg pa chen po'i rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:73b-25: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par bstan pa las ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam 'phrul gyi le'u rab 'byams las bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-0: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang @74a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-1: phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-2: sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-3: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'od zer byung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas snang bar bya bar byas nas sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-4: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes dag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-5: sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug pa las bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byams kyi spyod pa sgrub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-6: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-7: khyed kyis tshogs gang du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74a-9: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yang dag par thob pa dang ldan pa khyod smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-0: gsang ba'i bdag po @74b gnod sbyin dbang pos de skad smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-2: rig sngags thams cad yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par byed cing lag pa g-yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-3: sor mo'i rtse mo der rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste phyung nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang ba chen pos kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i snying po las thams cad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-5: dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-13: rkang pa rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:74b-19: mar me thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-0: ji ltar sbyar ba de bzhin de lta de ltar sgrub par @75a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-1: byed bzhin pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-4: 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po las thams cad pa ste dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-5: gsang sngags spyod pa thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan te bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g-yas pa bteg nas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-8: gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shing mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75a-9: de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po de bskor nas btang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-0: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can rdzu 'phrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bkug nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po @75b dag pa'i sems can la yang dag par bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can gdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs par gyur nas ngas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-2: sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-3: gang yang nga'i dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de la khro bo'i rgyal pos tshar gcod par 'gyur te gang gi phyir na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-5: gsang sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang chen ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa 'chad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-6: de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-8: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-12: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-15: na mo bha ga ba tyee /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-20: ri dzu ka dharma ni rya te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:75b-23: t'a re aa na b'i l'a bya dharma ni rya te tutt'a re tu re hi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-6: tsantra pra bhe hi li hi li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-10: dha ra dha ra dha na pa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-11: t'a re hu ru hu ru /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-16: tsitta ta ma ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-18: 'di ni nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig sngags las thams cad byed ma; srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-19: ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-20: phyag rgya'ang 'dir rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes pa rnam par grags pa de la rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-21: 'dir mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-23: zhi ba thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-24: sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-25: rang nyid nga'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bos nye bar gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-26: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-30: bzlas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-32: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76a-33: na ma aary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-2: phyag rgya'ang 'dir autpal zhes kyang rnam par grags pa longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-3: 'dir nye ba'i snying por gyur pa'ang mchog tu dpal dang ldan pa'i dag byed chen po ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-5: na ma:sarba bud dha bo dhi satv'a n'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-8: sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-9: 'dir mchog gi snying por gyur pa'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-10: na ma: sarba bud dhe n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-12: 'di ni snying po'i mchog ste mdor bsdu na bya ba thams cad la yon tan chen po rgyas pa ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-17: aom he he bha ga ba ti bi shva r'u pi ni sarba ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-19: pra bo dhi na a'a y'a ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-24: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-27: m'a bi lampa ku ru ku ru phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:76b-28: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drang ba'i rig sngags te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77a-25: sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77a-31: tishtha sa ma ya ma nu smar sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77a-36: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77a-37: byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon pa rnams spos kyi bdug pas yid chim nas khugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77b-0: padma'i phreng ba zhes @77b grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhib ste spyan drang ba'i rig sngags la'ang phyag rgya padma'i phreng ba bzang po 'di nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77b-7: m'a li ka gsar pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77b-12: dus ji lta bu'i me tog gam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77b-19: tishtha tishtha de ba t'a dhishtha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:77b-20: ma dhye pra be sha ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-4: na ma: sam ku ru mi ta r'a dznya sya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-11: sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-12: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-13: gtor ma'i rig sngags rab 'chad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-14: na ma: sarba bud dha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-15: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-17: he he bha ga ba ti mah'a satve sarba bud dh'a aa ba lo ki te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-21: 'dir yang phyag rgya ni dbyug pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:78a-22: bdug pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:79a-5: dzam bha sarba sarba da ha da ha /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:79a-10: sha da mu kha tha da bhu dza sha ta tsa ra na ru tra m'a na ya prahma tyam de ba na na y'a m'a bi lam ba m'a m'a bi lam ba bhu sha hr'i mandal ma dhye pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra h'um h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:79a-12: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lag zhal drug pa zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen po thams cad rnam par 'joms pa po ste 'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:79b-20: mah'a k'a ru ni ka bi shva r'u pi ni; gatstsha gatstsha sva bha ba nam/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:79b-24: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:79b-25: sarb'a rtha sva me sidhyam tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:80a-0: bi dhya sa d'a: ma no ra tham tsa me pa @80a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:80a-13: na ma: sarba bud dha nam/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:80b-13: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:80b-14: aa pra ti ha ta ga ti /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:80b-19: dpal gyi bdag nyid spyan la sbyar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-6: zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-9: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de yid kyis dmigs par mi nus na bri ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-10: 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-11: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig la rjes su rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de rnams la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-13: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na sems can rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:84b-15: 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-1: chen pos phyag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i bdag po la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-3: mi las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung ba ni nges par bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-4: mi rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang dag tu sems can rnams yang dag par zhugs nas 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-6: sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-7: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-9: gang da lta dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-12: yongs su mya ngan 'das pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-13: mi rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-14: sems can sa steng khyod dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-15: mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-16: sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-17: mi shes cho ga nyams pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-18: dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-19: tshangs pa bdag nyid chen pos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-20: rig sngags dngos grub mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-21: sngags la mngon par mi brtson dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-22: dam tshig bstan pa mi mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-23: rnam ba du mar 'bad byas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85a-24: rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-0: dam @85b tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-1: brgya byin gyis kyang rab 'bad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-2: rig pa'i dngos grub mi 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-3: sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-4: dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-5: spyod pa'i las rnams sgrub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-9: rab zhugs las rnams thams cad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-10: byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-11: de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-12: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-13: sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-14: kye kye sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-16: dang po re zhig cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-18: sa gcan gyi zla ba'i dkar po'i phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'i nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-19: gza' bzang po bltas te rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-21: dus gzhan la dbyar gyi zla ba spangs te snga dros rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-22: grong khyer chen po la brten pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:85b-23: gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid gnas par te rgya mtshor 'jug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-0: rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye bar grong khyer @86a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-1: chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring ha cang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas nyi ma bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-2: zla phyed du mtha' gcig tu smyung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-3: nye bar gnas nas so sor gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-4: gang gnas de rnams su'ang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-11: rus pa gnas pa dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-12: shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i chu la ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-14: gur gum gyi chus khor bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa stong phrag brgyad kyis mngon par sngags pa des bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po yang dag par ldan pas sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par gtor zhing steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-17: phyogs bral rnams su'ang kun nas gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-18: de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-21: de la chen po ni khru bcu drug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-22: bar ma ni khru bcu gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-23: chung du ni khru brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-25: thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86a-26: rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-0: bar ma longs spyod 'phel @86b bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-1: chung ngu sngags kyi dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-2: las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-3: de la yid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-4: de la sa'i phyogs der khru gnyis tsam brkos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-10: srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-12: nye bar 'tshe ba med pa der 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-14: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i chu ngogs rnams su'ang gang rab tu 'bad pa pa chen pos shin tu so sor brtags te shin tu gtsang zhing srog chags med par byas nas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-15: sa'i phyogs der slar yang srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga bsres pas chu klung gi 'gram gyi sa gtsang ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-17: gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-18: bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:86b-19: seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams su gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-0: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam @87a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-2: de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du'ang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-3: dbus kyi nang na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig nga 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-4: rtsa ba'i snying po stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-6: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid bsrung bar byas te bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste dkyil 'khor la g-yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhi'i rnam par dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-8: de nyid kyi phyi rol tu zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-9: de la 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi sngon spyad pa rnams byas te rang gi rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-11: rgyud la mkhas pa'i mkhan pos sems can thams cad gyi don gyi phyir theg pa chen po la lhag par mos pas zhag gcig smyung bar gnas par grogs bzang po dang yang dag par ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87a-12: bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba mthong bas tshon lnga'i phye ma zhib mo 'bar bas legs par sbyang ba byas nas rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-0: snying pos mngon @87b par sngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbus su gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-1: pha rol du'ang rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-3: rta babs bzhis brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-4: chu shing gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g-yur za zhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-7: dung gi sgra nges par sgrogs pa'i sa'i phyogs su bsgrags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-8: ngos bzhir rjes su mthun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i sgra chos mnyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-9: phyogs bzhi rnams su theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i glegs bam bkag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-12: 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-13: 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-14: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-15: de ltar glegs bam klog pa po med na mdo sde bzhi po klog par rtogs pa'i gang zag chos smra ba po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-16: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-19: gur gum rnam par bsres pa'i me tog dkar po dri zhim pa la rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas te dkyil 'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:87b-20: mngon par bkram nas phyi rol du byung ste zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa gnyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-1: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-2: gso sbyong nye bar gnas pa bsten pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhas pa de grogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-3: slob ma des khas blangs pa rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-4: gang rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis gtsug tor bcing bar byas nas de nas gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-6: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i go 'phang rnams par bkra zhing 'bar la mdzes pa'i zangs kyi phye ma zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams 'dir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-7: dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las nges par byang chub la gzhol ba yin na sngags sgrub par byed pa lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-9: sems can bsod nams chung rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-10: 'di lta'i longs spyod ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-11: cho ga 'di ni bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-12: byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-13: skye bo bkren pa gzigs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-14: nyung zhing mdor bsdus dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-15: mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88a-17: thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga pa 'bar bas dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-0: ljang gu'i kha dog tu kha bsgyur la sngar bzhag pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i @88b phyag rgya chen po bcings te rtsa ba'i rig pas phye ma la phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-1: gzhan zhi bsgrub pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu lho shar gyi phyogs su las kyi cho ga mthong bas me thab bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-2: khru gnyis kyi tshad la dpangs khru gang tsam kho ra khor yug tu padma'i ze ba'i rnam par shing p'a la sha'i yam shing rnams kyis me rab tu sbar te shing dpal 'bras kyi yam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad la rlan dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-5: mar la btags pa rnams kyis rtsa ba'i snying pos sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-7: rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis me lha spyan drang par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-8: spyan drangs nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyi rig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-9: rtsa ba'i rig pa'i snying pos slar yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gtsug tor gtsang zhing yo byad tshogs par byas nas bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-11: ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-12: slob ma byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas nas sngar brjod pa'i bdug pa'i rig pas bsreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-15: thal mor sbyar ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:88b-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang @89a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-1: phyug la phyag byas nas phye ma blangs te gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing ri mo mkhan mkhas pas rdzogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-2: cho ga 'di dag gis dang po kho nar re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rin po che seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-3: gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun tu pri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjes su sgrub pa pos bdag nyid srung ba'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-5: rig pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-9: de nas khrus byas nas me thab dang nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang sbra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-10: srung ba'i cho ga byas te rtsa ba'i rig pas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-11: de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid du gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-12: yungs kar dkar po la khor bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-13: mngon par sngags nas kham phor kha sbyar du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89a-14: bgegs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams du ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-2: gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ongs pa mthong na khros pas yungs kar gyi sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-3: de nas bgegs rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-4: mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga tshang ba nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-7: skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-8: de nas rjes su sgrub pa pos de nyid du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas khor bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pas bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-9: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku gzugs g-yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas gnyis padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-10: de'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-11: de rnams kyi g-yas su 'ang bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-12: ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:89b-14: phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams nas g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:94b-34: gser gyi mdog thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:94b-39: kha dog de'ang phreng gnyis pa la brten nas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:94b-40: thams cad nas 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' zlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-2: lha mo dka' zlog ma'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-3: smin drug gi bu'ang rma bya la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-4: lag na mdung thung thogs pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-7: gos ser po bgos shing stod g-yogs gos ser po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-8: phyag g-yon pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-9: go rim bzhin du bhring gi ri te shin tu ring ba'i rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-10: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-13: ma mo bdun po rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-15: dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-23: nam mkha' lding la bzhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-24: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-26: sgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-27: gangs steng gi dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad kyang bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-28: go rim bzhin du dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-29: nag po'i tshes bco lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95a-34: sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-0: lnga pa ming po chu la gnas pa rnams te mdor na phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag @95b par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-1: lha rnams go rims bzhin du phreng gnyis su bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-2: mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum par yang dkyil 'khor gsum la brten nas mngon par bri bar bya ste dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams su'ang gru bzhir rnam par gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-4: mdor bsdus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' thams cad kyi gtso bo ni nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-5: padma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni g-yas su nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-6: rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g-yon du nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-8: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-9: lhag ma rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-10: 'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-11: dkyil 'khor ba la'ang shar gyi phyogs si mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-12: de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su 'od gsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-14: gzugs can min pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-15: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched mi gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:95b-16: byang gi phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-5: 'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-6: lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-7: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang gi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog pa dang bcas pa nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-8: sgo gnyis pa'i nya logs su gzhon nu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la lag na mdung thung thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-10: gos ser po'i stod g-yogs bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-11: phyag g-yas na dril bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-12: ba dan dmar po thogs pa; gzhon nu'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-13: dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-14: shar gyi phyogs su nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-15: drang srong m'a rkanda nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-16: lhag ma rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-17: lho shar du gzhon nu bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-18: gzhon nu ming po dang lhan cig pa gru'i bzhon pa la kun tu gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-19: chu gter chen po la yongs su rgyu bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96a-20: me lha'i rgyal po'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-0: de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su @96b lang ka'i grong gi srin po'i bdag po shin tu 'jigs su rung ba ste der shing bi tsu mrda la brten nas gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-1: rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-2: lhag ma phyag rgya rnams su'ang rnam par bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-3: de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs su klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-4: nye dga' po nges par bri bar bya ste gza'i gtso bo nyi ma'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-5: nub kyi phyogs su thub pa ser skya zhes bya ba drang srong mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-6: mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i khyu mchog gcer bu'i gzugs su go rim bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su rnam par bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-7: byang nub kyi phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-8: dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-9: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ste 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-10: lhag ma dbyibs ji ltar kun tu gnas pa bzhin du go rim bzhin phyag rgya rnams su'ang mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-11: dkyil 'khor bzhi pa mngon par bri'o zhes pa phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi par ri mo lngas spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-12: phyag rgya'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-14: rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-15: rgyal po chen po bzhis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:96b-16: go rim ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-0: 'jug pa'i skor phyag rgyar gyur pa ni autpal sngon por @97a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-23: lcags mda' ste 'di rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug tu grva bzhir phreng bas khyab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-24: de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya chen po bzhi bzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-25: byang phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa can byas nas rdo rje gnyis ka nas rtse mo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-26: shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-27: lho'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-28: nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas autpal sngon po rang gi sdong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-29: 'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-30: phyogs bral rnams su phyag rgya bzhir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97a-31: nub byang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa can byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-0: lho nub @97b kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byas nas dbyug pa kun nas 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-1: lho shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can byas nas dgra sta kun nas 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-2: byang shar gyi phyogs su ral gri kun nas 'bar ba bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-3: thams cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-5: thad dkar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phyi ma nyid kyi bri bar bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-9: lha ma kun nas 'bar ba de rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-10: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-11: sems can phan don 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-13: mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-15: dbang po mtshang ba med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-16: yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram ze dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-19: dmangs rigs byang chub tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-20: theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sems dpa' chen po dad cing dge ba'i chos can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-21: rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-22: longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:97b-23: longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-0: bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i @98a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-4: dge bsnyen ma sdom pa la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-5: gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-8: rang bzhin gyis chos spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-10: mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-15: de'i nyin mo ga pur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-17: ma la ya'i tsandan dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-18: rtag tu nye reg byas pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-19: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste bsrung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-21: bden pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-22: rgyal bar dgongs pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang yang mi ring bar bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-23: gtsang zhing gtsang sbra byas pa ji srid gcig nas brgyad la sogs pa'i bar rnams te gzhan rnams ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-24: de rnams kyang phan tshun kun tu chags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98a-25: rgyal rigs spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-0: de rnams kyi bu gzhon nu ma rnams grong ba'i chos mi shes pa ste bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tu @98b sad par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-1: gzhon nu'i skye bo dga' bar byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-2: de nas ches thog mar de lta bu'i grong ba'i chos mi shes pa rab tu gzhug par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-3: rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-7: longs spyod chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-8: khyad par du'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-9: de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pa bsregs te rgyab kyis phyogs pa min par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya ste byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-11: rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya mngon par bzlas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-12: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa'i chus khrus byas nas nye reg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas me thab tu song nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byang shar du mngon par phyogs pas ga bur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-13: gur gum tsandan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-14: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-16: slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-17: zhugs nas bum pa gang brgyad gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:98b-18: shing sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-5: de lta bu bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-6: gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-7: gsum pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-8: bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-9: lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-10: drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-12: brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang du gzhag par bya ste gcig pa ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur bar yongs su bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-13: de nas sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis bdug pa bsreg cing autpal la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-14: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-18: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99a-19: de bzhin du me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-0: lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis lha bshos thams cad kyis thams cad du go rims bzhin du @99b bya'o //
