K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-1: mar me smos pa nyid kyis mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-3: 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos smos pas s'a lu'i zan zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-5: 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyis mya ngan med pa 'khyil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-6: khanda la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-8: tsandan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-10: 'o thug btsos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-13: 'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-16: sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-18: sems can thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-19: de bzhin du sna ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-20: rgya sbos kyi me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-21: punn'a ga la sogs pa rnams sngar nges par bstan pa sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-24: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-26: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:99b-27: khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-0: de bzhin du phyag na rdo @100a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-2: gzhan rnams la tha mal ba'i sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ga pur gyi bdug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-4: de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-5: sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa tha mal pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-6: 'phags pa rnams ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-7: mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-8: 'phags pa min pa'i sngags rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-9: dri zhim til mar dbul du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-10: cho ga'i go rim bzhin du ni; ;bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-11: de bzhin don du bsngos pa'i dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-12: sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa gang brjod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-14: phyag na rdo rje gang brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-15: rang rang gi ni rgyud rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-16: sngags spyod don sku sgrub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-20: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sngar cho ga mthong bas spyan drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-22: bdug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-23: lha bshos rab tu dbul ba rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyen pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100a-24: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-0: dung gi sgra'i sgra dbyangs @100b nges par sgrogs pas bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-3: phreng bas rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-7: thad ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-8: de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-10: mar la btags pa'i 'bras b'a lu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-11: thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-12: snying pos stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-13: sbyin sreg byas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba'i chog rnams byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis slob ma nyid khas blangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-14: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi lus dngos grub kyi don du phul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-18: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa thun mongs par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-19: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:100b-20: dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyang skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma nyams pa tha ga pas btags ma thag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-3: rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-5: gur gum gyis bgos pa'i dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams gdong g-yogs nas thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-6: rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-8: gzhan yang spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa'ang khab tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-9: dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas pa gdong g-yogs nas dri bzang po'i me tog tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-10: gur gum dag gis rnam par bsres pa byin te shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa dag gis me tog 'thor du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-11: gang du de'i me tog babs pa de la de'i rig pa'i sngags sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-12: skye ba gzhan rnams su de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-13: 'di rjes su 'brel ba'o zhes kun tu grags pa yin zhing de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-14: byang chub kyi snying po gnon par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-15: byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101a-16: de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-2: dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-3: skye ba 'di nyid du sgrub pa gang dang ldan pa lhag par sbyod pa las las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-4: de bzhin du rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa ji srid brgyad po rnams de srid de gzhan rnams ni ma yin no zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-5: sgrub bar 'dod pa gzhan yang ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zad pa'i don du dam tshig tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin na dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring ha cang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi cha'i sa phyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing sngags kyis dag par byas nas de nas rgyal po mngon par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-8: dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba'i dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-9: spro ba chen po dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-10: byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-11: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-12: dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-13: dbang po ma tshang pa med cing ma smad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-14: skye ba 'di nyid la rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:101b-16: bsam pa bzang zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-2: sad pa'i rgyur yang rig pa'i don la rnam rtog med cing der gtad pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa lnga ji srid par mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-3: lhag ma rnams spang bar bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-5: spyod pa la ma rmongs pa'i khyad par las te gzhan rnams bsten par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-6: de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsags te slob dpon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-8: de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-9: ba dan dang gdugs dkar po mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-10: rnga yab dkar po g-yob bzhin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-11: bkur sti chen pos dung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-13: rdza rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-15: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-16: bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgyal pas gsungs pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod bzhin pas bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-17: bkra shis de byas nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102a-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-0: 'jig @102b rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-1: chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-2: mdor bsdus nas brjod na sangs rgyas nyid 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar bgyi'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-3: de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la dang po re zhig rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-6: gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-8: gur gum dag gis lag pa dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-9: kham phor kha sbyar bkrus nas de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-10: de nas der nye bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:102b-11: de nas der ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-0: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas @103a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-1: slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-2: slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-3: de nas de la kham phor kha sbyar de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-4: mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-5: gal te des bcom ldan 'das rig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-6: sngags bzung ba nyid yin par gyur na bklags pa nyid las kyang las byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-7: rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrubs pas byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-8: gzhan rnams ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-9: de nas sngags yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-10: dang po sgrub pa kho nas 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-11: zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-12: de kho na sngar bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-14: de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-15: dkyil 'khor gnyis par mngon par dbang bskur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103a-16: dkyil 'khor gnyis par dkyil 'khor thams cad la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-0: lha thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang ba des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa ji lta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol @103b bar 'gyur te sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-1: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-4: phyag rgya sgrub pa la'ang lhag par 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-6: dkyil 'khor gsum par nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba cho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-8: khyod la sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-14: spyad pa nges par ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-15: rang gi cho ga nges par ston par rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-18: gzhan rnams su sangs rgyas nyid nges par thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-19: de bzhin du rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-20: rnam par rgyal ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-21: sngar nges par bstan pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:103b-22: byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin kho nar mngon par dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-1: bzhin du'ang khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-3: nyan thos rnams kyis 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-4: lus can thams cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-5: khyod sngags thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgrubs shig ces rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sems can lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-7: de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phul te dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-9: de nas nyi ma gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-10: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams la bslab par bya zhing rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-11: skad cig de nyid la song nas sngar brten par phul ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'i chu bum pa gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams la chu khyor pa gsum shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas 'thung du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104a-13: kye byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-0: gsang ba'i @104b dam tshig gang gis 'da' bar byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-2: der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil 'khor du 'ongs pa de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas grogs byed pa'i lag par gos dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings pa gzhan gyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-3: gos kun tu g-yogs te gnas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rigs dman pa rnams kyis me tog gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-4: de nas grogs byed pa de rnams kyis kyang rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-5: de rnams kyis kyang dam tshig tsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-7: de sngar byas pa'i me'i bya ba'i gnas su song nas rtse mo ma nyams pa'i ku sha rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-8: der yang me thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-12: zhi ba'i don du padma'i rnam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-13: yang na tshim par byed pas dbang du byed pa'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-14: mngon spyod la zur gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-15: de la me'i bya ba'i cho ga thams cad la ku sha dgram par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:104b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas shar gyi rtse mor me'i bya ba bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas me'i bya ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtse @105a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas byang gi rtse mor sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-3: de bzhin du'ang bya ba rnams grogs byed pas gnas pa'i ngang tshul can gyis me'i bya ba ku sha rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-4: thog mar rtsa ba'i rig pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-7: mar la btags pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-8: zhi ba'i don du snying pos mar gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-9: rgyas pa'i don du shing aa pa marga gsum gyi sbyin sreg 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-10: mngon spyod la ka ta ke yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-11: me'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di 'ang thams cad du thun mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-12: dkyil 'khor sems cad kyi nye bar spyod pa rnams su'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-13: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi gnas gtsang mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas me'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-14: dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa rnams la de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas mchod yon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-18: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha'i khyad par rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyang gsan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105a-20: yang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga las 'das par yang rung ste gus par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-1: gang cung zad bdag nyid nyams par bya ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul dang ma bral bar thob par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-3: myur du bde ba dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-4: de skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-5: dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams thams cad la mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-6: sbyin pa la rab tu chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-7: byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-13: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa rnams blta bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-14: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-15: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa de rnams thams cad la dri bzang po'i me tog gis mchod yon phul nas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:105b-16: de nas yid kyis mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas gatstsha gatstsha zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-0: sv'ah'a zhes pa kho na bzlas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gyen du nges par bltas pas gshegs @106a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-1: su gsol bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen pa rdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byams kyi le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-3: de nas sems dpa' chen po de slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas lha'i bu rnams thams cad la smras par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-5: mchog gi grub pa mchog tu gsang ba sgrub thabs thams cad kyi cho ga rig pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-6: rig pa'i las bzang po byed pa chen po nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-8: phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-9: don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-10: mchog tu bkra shis pa thams cad kun nas bkra shis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-12: bdag gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-13: las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-14: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa'i sgrol ma gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-16: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-19: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106a-21: t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-0: 'di ni 'phags @106b ma sgrol ma las chen po thams cad byed pa las phran tshegs thams cad bklags pas grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-1: mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-2: mchog tu grub pa gzhan gyis rab tu sbyar ba'i las thams cad 'jig pa byed pa'i rig pa 'di'ang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-3: sgrub thabs su gyur te 'phags ma sgrol mas las chen po thams cad mdor bsdus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-4: las phran tshegs thams cad la'ang nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-7: der yang rung ste gtsang ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-8: bdag nyid nyes pa med pa dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gcig pus dang po re zhig gru bzhi mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-10: khru bzhi'i tshad dang ldan pa'i dpus padma'i phyag rgya de'i g-yas su autpa la sngon po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-12: ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-13: g-yon du rdo rje rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-14: gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:106b-20: nub tu 'jug pa'i rim pa las 'das par steng du 'khyil ba'i rnam pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-0: de'i 'og tu phyi nas me'i bya ba byas nas sngar brjod pa'i cho gas mchod la la sogs pa byas te dkyil 'khor du 'jug @107a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-2: de la rgyal srid 'dod pas hatpya'i shing du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-3: longs spyod 'dod pas rang gi khyim gyi lha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-5: glang po che 'dod pas glang po che'i bres su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-6: bu 'dod pas bo de tse'i shing gi drung du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-7: tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la tshangs pas bskyabs pa ru'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-8: klus zin pa la klu shing dang nye ba ru'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-9: mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la lam bzhi mdo ru'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-10: gnod sbyin gyi zin pa la pa ta'i shing gi drung du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-11: srul pos zin pa la khron pa'i drung du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-12: gzhan rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gang du'ang de ru'ang nyes pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-16: las thams cad pa ste las thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-17: gsang chen 'di dang lhan cig rab tu sbyar par bya ste dkyil 'khor 'di ni sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa'i 'bras bus yod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107a-18: longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa'i don gyi phyir 'byor pa thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa ste mdor na phyi ma'i lus can 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa rab tu grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-0: de nas dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa gang thob nas dpal med pa 'joms @107b bar byed cing zhi bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-2: dgra 'phrog pa de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-3: stobs sgrub par byed pa mthong zhing thos nas de nas cho ga la rab tu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu bdag gis lung ston par the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-4: gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-5: 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa de rnams kyi rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-6: sa steng dkyil 'khor smra ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-7: zhi ba'i las rnams thams cad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-8: bkren pa rnams kyis phan pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-9: sems can mgon med sdug bsngal can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-10: rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-11: aindra n'i la sogs phye mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-12: dkyil 'khor yang dag kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-13: aindra n'i la sogs med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-14: s'a lu'i phye mas yang dag bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-15: s'a lu'i phye ma sogs med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-16: so phag phye ma sogs kyis bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-17: so phag phye ma sogs med na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-18: bye ma rnams kyis yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-19: de ltar yon tan kun bsdus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-20: sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba; ;'jig rten mgon po'i yang dag bka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-21: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-24: sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:107b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rab 'byams kyi le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-0: @108a *// de nas sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par 'phrul pa dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing mngon par yi rang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-1: mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-2: dang po re zhig dge ba'i nyi ma la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ras bal blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas de'i rgyun du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-3: de nas ras bal de la lhag par gnas par bya ste rtsa ba'i rig pa dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i dog pa blangs nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad lhag par gnas par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-9: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par 'tsho zhing bdag gi skye ba 'bras bu yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-10: sngags kyi dngos grub lhag par gnas par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-11: de'i dus su rnga pa ta ha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108a-17: rnga mur dza'i sgra thos par gyur pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-10: mang po zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang dge ba'i sgra rab tu 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-11: dril bu'i sgra byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-12: dga' ba'i sgra'ang rung ste de rnams rig pa 'dzin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-14: gzhan du dngos grub 'bras bu med do zhes pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-15: de'i dus su de rnams ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-19: nyams pa rnam par brlag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-23: de lta bu la sogs pa'i sgra 'byin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-29: dud 'gro dman pa rkang gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-30: rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sgra 'don par gyur na de la sgrub pa pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-31: bdag gi dngos grub med do zhes shes par bya zhing skye ba 'di nyid la kun tu brtul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:108b-32: slar yang snga ma bzhin du byas nas brtsams par bya ste de lta bu lan bdun gyis mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang bdun pa'i las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-1: gzhon nu ma de la srung ba byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug tu bcug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-2: byang du mngon par phyogs par bzhag nas bdag nyid ts'a ru'i ston mo bza' zhing gzhon nu ma de la'ang ts'a ru'i ston mo bzar gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-3: snga ma kho nar yongs su brtags pa'i ku sha'i khres la cho ga de nyid kyi ras bal 'khal du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-5: legs par bsgrims pa sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-8: brgyad la sogs pa nas ji srid bcu drug tsam gyi bar du k'arsha'i srang grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu mas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-9: de la rab ni bcu drug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-10: de bzhin 'bring ni brgyad pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-11: phran tshegs las rnams sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-12: lnga dang gcig ni tha ma 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-13: sngags rnams kun la sngags rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-14: ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-15: de nas brtsams te gang cung zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-16: sdig pa'i las rnams sngon byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-17: dog pa la dmigs sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-18: de yi skad cig nyid la 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-19: dog pa 'di ni blangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-20: gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-21: phyogs su gyur par bzhag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109a-22: ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-0: srog chags yan @109b lag min 'byung ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-1: gur gum tsandan la sogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-2: tsam pa ka sogs m'a li ka //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-3: dri zhim me tog rnams kyis bgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-4: gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-5: srung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-6: sngags rig las kun shes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-7: shin tu mnyam bzhag bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-8: de nas thag par song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-9: ji ltar 'dod pa'i gla byin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-10: yan lag bral min skems min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-11: dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-12: nad kyis gdungs min rgan po min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-13: lung pa dbugs mi bde las grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-14: ma ning mtshan gnyis min pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-15: de ni dman pa min nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-16: ngan par ltung ba spangs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-17: kun nas mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-18: rab bsngags lta na sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-19: blo yis kun tu spyod pa dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-21: dngos grub 'dod pa de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-22: ras mchog 'thag pa byed pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-23: rab bsngags dge ba'i stobs ldan nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-24: blo ldan pa zo ni shin tu mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-25: shin tu mkhas par mchog gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-26: ras ni 'thag byed mchog gi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-27: ras kyi rab la bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-29: thams phran tshegs las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-30: dman pa nyid ni kun las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-31: bzo bos ji ltar smra ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-32: de las gru ni ji bzhin spyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-33: bzo bo yi ni dang po'i ngag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-34: smras pa de las sngags rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-35: myur du rin ni sbyin par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:109b-36: dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-2: rin gyi dngos po zlog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-3: myur du dngos grub byed gang 'di'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-4: ras ni bla na med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-5: las rnams shin tu mchod par 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-6: lha dang mi yi bde nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-7: 'byung po kun gyi dpal yin zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-8: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-9: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la gso sbyong byin nas shin tu dag pa'i rgyu skar la'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-12: dkar po'i gza' nges par bltas te dkar po'i zla phyed gzhan la'ang rung ste shing sa ha k'a ri'i snye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-13: me tog skyes shing shing gi me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-14: yal ga rgyas shing dpyid ka'i dus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-15: dus kyi mchog der snga dro nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe sngar bstan pa'i rgyu mthun dang bcas pas tha ga pa ts'a ru'i bza' bzos shing gos dkar po gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-16: mgo la gtsug tor bcings nas legs par bkrus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-18: gur gum dag gang yang rung bas legs par byugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-19: lus la rjes su byugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-20: ga bur gyi dris kha bsgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-21: yid dga' zhing bkres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-22: skom pa dang bral bar byas nas thags kyi snas la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110a-23: ba lang gi lci ba dag gis bkrus te gsar pa rnams kyang slar yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-0: de nas srog @110b chags med pa'i chus bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-2: gur gum gyis mngon par gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-3: sa'i phyogs gtsang ma ca co dang bral zhing ljongs kyi mi dang bral ba rnam par dben pa'i gnas bla gab dang bcas shing gsang bar me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-4: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-5: de nas rjes su sgrub pa pos yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa'i sngags nyid yungs kar dkar po la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-8: phyogs bral rnams su gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-9: de nas tha ga pa la yungs kar gyis yang dag par bsnun nas phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga pa bcings te gtsug tor bcing ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-10: gal te ras rab yin na zheng du khru bzhi mchur khru brgyad kyi tshad 'di tsam du tha ga pas bran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-11: 'bring por gyur na zheng du khru do mchur khru lnga nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-12: tha ma ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la mchur ni sangs rgyas kyi khru gang nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-13: de las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'o zhes bsgrags te tshad 'dis tshad kun tu bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-14: 'di ni phur pa'i dngos grub tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-15: skyes bu mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:110b-16: thub pa mi snang gyur 'og tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-2: skyes bu lha dang lha min dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-3: gdengs can tha ma grub par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-5: ras 'bring po ni rtag pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-6: sems can kun gyi las rnams sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-7: phran tshegs las rnams bsgrub bya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-8: ras tha ma ni rtag pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-9: las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-10: rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-11: las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-12: ras ris gsum gyis nges bstan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-13: dngos grub dpal don gnyer ba'i mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-14: brgya byin bde sogs bdag po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-15: cho ga nyams na mi 'grub ste; ;cho ga yang dag ldan gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-16: mi yi skye bo phal pa la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-17: 'bad pa yis ni las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-19: rgyal dang rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-20: sbyor ba 'di dag yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-21: sems can bkren pa mgon med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-22: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs kun gyi dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-23: byang chub lam du gang 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-24: de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-25: chos 'di byang chub rgyu yin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-26: sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-27: dkyil 'khor yang dag bstan pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-31: gang zhig byang chub rgyur 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111a-32: de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-0: rtag tu 'gro la mi @111b phan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-1: gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-2: byang chub ched du 'jug kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-3: ras ris thams cad 'grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-4: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-5: dam tshig 'di ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-6: myur du bya ba'i don bsgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-7: 'dir ni mtha' dag thob pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-9: de nas rim gyas bzo bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-10: 'bad pas ras ni btags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-11: nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-12: bcu drug gnyis ka bzhi dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-13: nyin mtshan nyid kyis myur ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-14: ras ni 'thag pa rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-15: bzo bo mchog tu grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-16: nyin mtshan gyis ni dge ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-17: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-18: bzo bo rtag tu byin brlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-19: thag ring gnas su song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-20: bshad dang gci ba yongs su dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-21: 'ongs pa'i gos dang bcas bkrus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-22: gzhan pa'i gos gzhan bgo bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-23: gos dkar 'chang zhing phreng bar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-24: yang dang yang du nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-25: lus la tsandan dkar pos byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-26: bzo la sogs pa gtsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-27: rtag tu 'jam zhing legs sbyangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-28: slar yang 'bad pas btag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-29: de la sogs pa'i rab sbyor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-30: rgyal ba gzhan gyis gsungs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-31: 'bad pas rnam dpyad ngang tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-32: ras ni ma lus btags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-33: ras kyi thags ni rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-34: sngar gyi las kyis legs sprul pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:111b-35: de rnams tshad ldan ma nyams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-0: @112a *// bya'o bzang po'i nyin zhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-1: rgyud dang rgyud du mnyam par 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-2: dkar po'i phyogs kyi mdzes pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-3: 'od ma'i shing ni khru bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-4: ras ni blangs nas de nas 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-5: nor ni rgya cher 'god pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-6: bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-7: brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-8: sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-9: dri zhim me tog gis mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-10: gtsang ba'i phyogs su rnam par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-11: 'di nyid kyis ni sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-12: srung ba'i cho ga rab tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-13: gang zhig ras bal sngon du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-14: slar yang rnam mang yongs sbyangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-15: de nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-16: ras nyid bsrung par bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-17: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-18: sngags bzlas pa yis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-19: sangs rgyas rnams ni mang pos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-20: ngas kyang de ni slar yang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-21: de nyid gsang sngags thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-22: rnam par spyod pa'i sngags kyi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-23: brtson 'grus chen po gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-24: sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-25: sna tshogs skyob pa'i rgyu rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-26: rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-27: 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-28: sems kyi spyod pa kun tu rmongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-29: dad pa med cing phyin ci log /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-30: log pa'i kun spyod la rab brkam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-31: sngags rnams sgrub par mi byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112a-32: de nyid phyir na slar gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-1: gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-2: dad ldan ltad mo bkra shis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-3: sngags rnams kun la rtag tu spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-4: bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-6: spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-7: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-9: dad pa med pa'i skye bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-10: dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-11: sa bon tshva sgor btab pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-12: myu gu med cing 'bras med bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-13: dad ba rtag tu chos kyi rtsar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-14: don kun gzigs pas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-15: chos don ngang tshul can de rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-16: sngags kyis dngos grub rtag tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-17: de nas sgrub pos bzo bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-18: ri mo mkhan nam bdag kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-19: ri mo mkhas pas ma 'dres pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-20: tshon rtsi kha dog gsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-21: kha dog can gyi tshon blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-22: ji ltar thag pa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-23: sngar ni cho ga de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-24: mtshan nyid yang dag ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-25: ri mo mkhan la gong bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-26: rgyas pa ru ni bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-27: ji ltar sngar bzhin tha ga pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-28: cho ga de nyid kyis ni de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-29: ras la ri mo bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-30: yang na rang gi ri mor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-31: ga pur gur gum tsandan las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-32: so phag tshon la bsgo bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-33: bdug pa bsregs shing sngags nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-34: lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-35: na ga ge sar punn'a ga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-36: ba ku la dang tsam pa k'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-37: b'a ri shi ka dh'a nu sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-38: m'a li ta yi me tog sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:112b-39: ras de la ni mngon par gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-0: @113a *// shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-1: khres la nyer 'dug dang ba'i blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-2: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-3: sems dpar gyur pas 'di phra mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-4: lag pas blangs nas ma 'khrugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-5: sems kyis ras la ri mo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-6: dang po re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa bri bar bya ste rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa; skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-7: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-8: rin po che'i padma la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-9: kun nas 'od 'bar ba; kun nas 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-10: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-12: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-13: dbus na gnas pa'i padma'i bee d'urya'i sdong po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-14: 'og na klu'i rgyal po srab gdan chen po padma'i sdong bu de la 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la lta zhing lag pa g-yas pas phyag 'tshal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-15: dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-16: lus phyed mi'i rnam pa can gyi dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-17: nye dga' bo bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-18: padma'i mtsho de'i khor yug tu padma'i 'dab ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-20: cung zad kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-21: rnam par kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-22: chu las skyes pa'i bya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113a-23: nya la sogs pas mngon par khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-0: ma lus par bkod pa @113b mdzes pa'i rnam par mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-1: gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i padma'i sdong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-2: 'dab ma de nyid la rnam par 'phros pa'i padma'i me tog du ma rnams rim gyis mtho ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-3: g-yon gyi gzhogs su padma'i me tog brgyad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-4: de rnams la'ang padma rnams la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi sku mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-5: dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug padma'i ze ba ltar cung zad dkar ba'i gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-7: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis dbu la rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-8: phyag na autpa la sngon po 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-9: g-yas kyi phyag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-10: sku mdzes pa de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-11: zhi ba'i rnam pa; bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-12: kun nas 'bar bas 'khrigs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-13: padma gzhan la ni 'phags pa zla 'od gzhon nu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-14: de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-15: gsum pa la nor bzang po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-16: bzhi pa la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-17: lnga pa la nam mkha' mdzod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-18: drug pa la sa'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-20: brgyad pa la spyan bzang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-21: 'di dag thams cad gzhon nu'i cha byad can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-22: gzhon nu rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:113b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas kyi gzhogs su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-0: @114a *// byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad la byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste bcom ldan 'das kyi nye logs su 'phags pa byams pa tshangs par sbyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-1: dbu la ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-2: gser mdog dur smrig dmar po gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-3: dar la dmar po'i stod g-yogs byas pa; tshom bu gsum gyi mtshan ma byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-4: gzugs mdzes pa dbyig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-5: ril ba spyi blugs g-yon gyi phyag du bkod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-6: krishna s'a ra'i pags pa phrag pa g-yon du bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-7: phyag g-yas pa bgrang phreng bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-9: bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-10: padma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs kyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-11: sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-12: phyag g-yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-13: phyag g-yas pas dpal 'bras bsnams nas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-14: mdzes pa'i gzugs can de bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-15: gsum pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-16: gser gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114a-18: mchod phyir thogs dkar po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-0: thams cad @114b mkhyen pa dbu la byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-1: 'phags pa 'od dpag med stobs bcu pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-2: ral pa'i nang du nye bar bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-4: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-5: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin pa; bsam gtan la dmigs par gyur pa'i sems kyi spyod pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-6: sku kun nas gsal bar gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-7: bzhi pa la 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag g-yon pas rdo rje bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-8: phyag g-yas pas nye bar 'gog pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa bsnams nas mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-9: gser mdog rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-10: mdzes pa'i gzugs can zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-11: do shal phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-12: mu tig gi do shal gyi mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-13: cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-14: dar srab mo'i sham thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-15: dar la dkar po'i bla gos byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-17: kun tu bzang po'i sham thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-18: bla gos kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-19: lus kyi rnam pa ni sngar bstan pa ji bzhin no; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i padma lnga pa la 'phags pa blo gros chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-20: drug pa la zhi ba'i blo gros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-21: bdun pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-22: brgyad pa la ngan song spong ba zhes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams phyag na 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:114b-24: rnam pa kun tu mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-0: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-2: g-yo ba dang ldan pa'i sku dur smrig dmar po gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-3: skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-4: rin po che'i rdo leb la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-6: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-7: dri zhim po'i me tog gis gcal du bkram pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-11: ddha nu ska ri k'a dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-13: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras la kun nas gcal du bkram bzhin pas mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-14: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i g-yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gang yin pa'i steng du rin po che du mas spras pa'i shin tu ring po'i rnam pa'i gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-15: brag ri'i rgyal po nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i rdo leb kyis bkab pa ri bo'i rnam pa lta bur mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-16: der gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad mngon par bri bar bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-19: rin po che bee d'urya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-23: ma ra ka ta la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-25: rdo 'i snying po la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po khyad par rnams kyis kun nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115a-26: cung zad nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i @115b pa'i sku chos gos ser po'i stod g-yogs mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-2: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-3: sham thabs ser po mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-4: sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyi go cha bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-5: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar mdzes pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-6: rab tu zhi ba'i gzigs stangs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-7: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-8: gnyis pa la de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po gser gyi mdog tu mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-9: n'a ga ge sar ches bzang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-10: ba ku la la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-11: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la mngon par gzigs bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-12: kun nas 'od can rin po che'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba'i mthar thug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-13: gsum pa la de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po mngon par bri bar bya ste padma'i ge sar gyi mdog du snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-14: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-15: bzhi ba la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-16: lnga pa la bzod par dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-17: drug pa la rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:115b-18: bdun pa la sman gyi bla bee t'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-0: brgyad pa la de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed @116a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-1: pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po mngon par bri bar bya ste thams cad gser gyi kha dog can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-3: mi 'jigs pa sbyin par mdzad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi steng du'ang bris sku'i zur gnyis ka nas sprin gyi go bar na gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi char 'bebs par byed bzhin pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-5: bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-8: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-9: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang du 'phags pa nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbu'i gnas spangs pa'i steng du mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-11: gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-12: moong+gal gyi bu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-19: rang sangs rgyas kyis rnams 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-27: mu khyud bzang po zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-28: thams cad mchog tu mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha lugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116a-30: rab tu dul ba'i rnam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-0: nyan thos @116b chen po rnams thal mo sbyar bar byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la nges par rtog par byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-1: steng ngos su'ang gnas gtsang ma'i lha dang nye bar gnas pa'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis dar gyi bla re kun nas chur ring zhing shin tu mdzes pa bzung nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-4: 'phags pa nyan thos tham cad kyi steng du 'dzin par byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-6: gos 'chang ba'i lha'i bu mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-7: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i steng ngos su dbu la mu tig gi do shal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-8: rin po che'i skud pa la padma r'a ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-9: aindra n'i la la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyus pa'i rin po che'i skud pa'i tshogs de la dar gyi bla re legs par bkod cing khor yug tu'ang mu tig gi do shal rab tu 'phyang ba mdzes par gyur pa mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi padma'i gdan gyi 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang nye bar klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo'i gzhogs su rin po che'i ri bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-11: padma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-12: rin po che'i myu gu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-15: byu ru'i 'khri shing yongs su dkris pa'i rin po che'i shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-16: drang srong chen po nye bar gnas shing bsten pa'i ri bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:116b-17: de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa drag po chen po'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-0: @117a *// phyag g-yon pas zhags pa bzung nas g-yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po la blta zhing bka' nod par byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-5: mig sman nag po sprin dang mtshungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-7: skra ring zhing sen mo ring ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-9: mgrin pa'i phyogs sprul gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-10: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-11: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-12: ches mi bzad pa chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-13: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-15: khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa rnams 'di nyid kho nas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-16: de'i 'og tu ral pa can de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-18: ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng du nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-19: pus mo sa la 'dud pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-20: lag pa spos phor thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-24: spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-25: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta bar gyur pa yang dag par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117a-26: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i 'og g-yas kyi gzhogs su klu'i dbang po'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-0: nye logs su padma'i mtsho las mngon par 'phags pa'i rin po che'i ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po gzhan gsungs pa de bzhin du mngon par bri ste khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa phan pa lha'i me tog gcal du bkram pa mngon par bri ste @117b ri de ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-1: ri de ni shin tu mtho ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-2: padma r'a ga'i rdo leb dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-3: de nyid kyi myu gu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-4: bee d'urya'i rang bzhin gyi rtse mo'i rnam par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-5: de la brten pa'i lha mo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-6: 'phags ma sgrol ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-7: dar la dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-8: dar la khra bo'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-9: bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-10: phyag g-yon na autpa la sngon po bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-14: sems bsam gtan la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-16: phyag g-yas pas mchog spyin par 'dod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-18: skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-19: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la cung zad lta bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-20: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-21: de nyid du'ang rin po che bee d'urya'i rtse mo de nyid du'ang punn'a ga'i shing gi yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-22: yal ga thams cad la kun nas me tog gi spras shing kha bye bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la mngon par bkab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-23: yal ga dud pa de nyid kyis kyang shin tu bkra ba'i byu ru'i myu gu 'brel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-24: rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs can gyi tshon rtsi 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma'i bzhin kun tu snang bar mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:117b-25: lha mo bgegs kun 'joms pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-2: sgrub pa po ni srung don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-3: mchog sbyin dge ba bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-4: bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-5: thugs rje stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-6: 'byung po kun gyi dpal yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-7: mchog sbyin byed ma bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-8: lha mo las chen byed pa mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-10: bgegs kun rnam par 'joms don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-11: sgrub pa po ni kun tu 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-12: mi dbang rnams ni srung don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-13: dpal gyi don du rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-14: khro rgyal dbang po gang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-15: ri yi rtse mor gnas 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-16: bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-17: rgyal mchog sras rnams kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-18: drag po chen po brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-19: gtum chen 'od zer chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-20: bstan pa la sdang sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-21: tshar bcad ched nyid rab tu brtag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-22: sgrub pa po ni srung don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-23: bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-24: mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-25: sngags kyi lha rnams 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-26: shin tu drag po drag gzugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-27: brtse ba med cing nges par 'gog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-28: sdig pa drag po spyod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-29: dbang du ma gyur dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-30: mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-31: kun nas sa 'og spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-32: thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-33: gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118a-34: ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-0: grva bzhi dag tu bri @118b par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-1: ras kyi 'og gi mtha' rnams su'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-2: chu bo rgya cher bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-3: klu ni gdengs kas mtshan pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-4: gcig nyid kun tu bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-5: yan lag dkar zhing bzang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-6: lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-7: rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-8: mgo bo'i steng du bzhag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-9: gdeng ka bdun pa brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-10: dbang chen ldan pa'i klu de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-11: ming ni mtha' yas zhes bya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-12: de bzhin gshegs la nges par blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-13: nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-14: shin tu mdzes shing gzugs mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-15: rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-16: 'bar ba'i phreng ldan kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-17: klu dbang chen por rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-18: thub pa'i bstan la rab zhugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-19: 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-20: bgegs kun rnam par gzhom don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-21: chu bo la brten bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-22: de la ras kyi cho ga 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-23: mdor bsdus rgyal bas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-24: rgyas par de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-25: kun nas bshad pa sngar gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-26: mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-27: de yi bsod nams mtha' yas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-28: sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-29: bskal pa bye ba byas pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-30: sa steng bris sku mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-31: de yi skad cig nyid la 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-32: mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-33: tshul khrims 'chal dang smad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-34: sdig pa kun la rab 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:118b-35: 'khor bar yongs su rgyu ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-2: de rnams ras ris 'dzin mi gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-3: de rnams ras ris mthong bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-4: 'bras bu yod par thub dbang gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-5: de phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-6: skad cig de la sdig pa 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-7: dag pas 'jug pa nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-8: rjes su zlos pa dag 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-9: sngags mnyan pa la brtson pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-10: mi rnams grub thob smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-11: bskal ba bye bar sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-12: mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-13: sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-14: sngags pa bsod nams de thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-15: gang g'a yi ni bye ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-16: tshad du grags pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-17: de yi tshad gyur sangs rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-18: rgyal sras rang rgyal bse ru dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-19: nyan thos rnams la 'jig rten du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-20: slar yang lan mang mchod ston gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-21: 'bras bu thob pa gang yin de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-22: sngags pa ras ris bris pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-23: mthong dang cho ga klog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-24: rjes su yi rang ba nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-25: cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-26: de yi sngags kyi dngos grub des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-27: ji srid 'jig rten pa yi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-28: gang zhig rgyal ba skyes mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-29: de slob bse ru lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-30: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119a-31: gsungs pa'i sngags rnams thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde @119b las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-1: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams kyi bris sku dang po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-5: khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga bar ma yod de de ngas bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-6: de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-8: dang po re zhig sngon bstan pa'i dog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-9: sngar brjod pa nyid kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-10: sngar yongs su brtag pa'i bzo bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-11: sngar gyi tshad bar ma nyid kyis ras shin tu dag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-16: skra dang 'dres pa dang bral ba la sogs pa rnams kyis tshad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-17: gzugs ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin nyid kyis ras ris phyi ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-18: dang po re zhig gnas gtsang ma'i gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-19: kun nas mdzes pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-20: rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-21: mu tig dkar po'i do shal gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-22: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa 'drir gzhug par bya ste rin po che seng ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:119b-23: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-0: @120a *// g-yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug padma'i ge sar du snang ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-3: phrag pa g-yon pa'i phyogs su padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-4: thal mo sbyar ba byas te bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-6: byang chub sems dpa' chen po; bde legs dbus ma'i cod pan can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-7: mchod phyir thogs dkar po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-8: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-10: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i g-yon gyi gzhogs su phyag na rdo rje pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-11: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g-yob par byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-12: de'i gzhogs su 'phags pa byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-18: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste 'di rnams rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya ste dang po ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-19: de rnams kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad 'drir gzhug par bya ste bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-20: phyag g-yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120a-21: chos gos ser po'i bla gos mnabs pa'i sku can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-0: @120b phyag g-yon pas chos gos kyi rna ba 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-1: cung zad dmar bar snang ba'i dur smrig gi sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-2: kun nas snang ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-5: rin chen gtsug tor can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-10: spyan bzang zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-12: nyan thos chen po brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-13: rang sangs rgyas brgyad sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya ste 'on kyang 'phags pa moong+gal gyi bu chen bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-14: sh'a ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la rnga yab g-yob par byed bzhin du 'khor ba'i lus su mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-15: de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-16: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-24: tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:120b-25: 'og min te de lta bu la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-0: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams @121a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-1: rim gyis mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-2: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar spras pa dgod de rang gi gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-3: cha byad 'chad ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri'i 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags pa'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ji srid du ras kyi mtha' mar 'drir gzhug par bya ste ras kyi mtha'i grva'i phyogs gcig tu sgrub pa po cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-5: dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa pus mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-7: lag pa spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-8: rin po che'i ri bo de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin du mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon gyi gzhogs kyi seng+ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa'i lha mo sgrol ma mngon par bri ste sngar ji ltar nges par bstan pa de bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121a-10: ras de'i khor yug tu'ang me tog sil ma mngon bar gtor te tsam pa ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-0: n'a ga @121b ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis khor khor yug tu gcal du dgram par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-1: ras kyi steng ras kyi mtha'i gra gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor bar byed bzhin pa; gzugs rnam par bkra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-2: bar snang la gnas pa'i char sprin gyi nang na lding ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-3: kha dog dkar por mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-5: rtag tu dge legs don 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-6: sa steng skye bo mi rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-7: dngos grub 'bring po sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-9: sdig pa cung zad sngon byas gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-10: 'dir ni bris sku mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-11: de yis skad cig nyid la 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-12: sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-14: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-15: bris sku bar ma mthong ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-16: sdig pa byed par 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-17: mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs sngags gsungs pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-20: shin tu myur bar dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-21: bzlas pa byas pas thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-22: nad can rnams ni nad las grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-23: bkren pas nor ni rnyed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-24: bud med rnams ni bu thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-25: bris sku bar pa blta ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-26: mthong btsam gyis de yi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-27: bsod nams rgyas pa chen po thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-28: nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:121b-29: bde ba'i skal ba can 'gyur mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-2: nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-3: bri ba dang ni klog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-5: de bzhin mthong dang reg nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-6: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-8: don du gnyer dang gsol 'debs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-9: rjes su yi rang ba las kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-10: skye ba 'bras bcas myur du thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-11: bskal mchog bye ba rnams kyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-12: skye bos bsod nams gang thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-13: tshig tu brjod par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-14: bris sku mthong ba 'bras bur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-15: zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-16: le'u gsum pa yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-17: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas slar yang sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-19: khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga chung du zhes bya ba gzhan gsum pa'ang yod de gang 'bad pa med par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba ste sngar bstan pa nyid kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122a-20: bzo bos bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam thad kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-0: de bzhin kho nar kun nas gru bzhi pa la sngar bzhin du ras ris sngar bstan pa'i tshon rtsi @122b rnams kyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-1: dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-2: seng ge'i gdan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-3: byis pa khye'u sngar bzhin du chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-4: kun nas 'od zer 'phro bar byed bzhin ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-5: mdzes pa'i gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-6: g-yon gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rdo leb la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-7: phyag na rnga yab thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-8: g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-9: kha dog pri yang sku ltar sngo bsangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-10: g-yas kyi gzhogs su'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che'i rdo leb la gnas pa /
