K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-11: phyag na rnga yab thogs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-12: phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-13: kun nas 'od dang ldan pa'i lus can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du mngon par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-15: seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu gser gyi ri bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-16: ji srid ras kyi mtha'i bar du 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-17: ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i 'og tu g-yas kyi gzhogs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-18: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:122b-19: de thams cad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-0: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du de @123a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-1: bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste rin po che'i ri'i phug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-2: sor bcu drug pa'i tshad na bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-3: khad pa brtsegs pa 'dri ba'i ri bo'i bya skyibs mtho ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-4: ras ris de'i khor yug tu ri bo'i khor yug tu ri bo'i rnam pas yongs su bskor ba mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-5: ras ris de'i steng gi zur du gnas pa'i ri bo'i bya skyibs dang kun tu 'brel bar lding bzhin pa lta bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-6: rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis su 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-7: ras de las me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa mngon par 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-8: ras ris rnam gsum mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-9: thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-10: 'di ni chung du zhes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-11: ras ris phran tshegs las la shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-12: sdig las shin tu mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-13: bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-14: ras ris mthong bas grol 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-15: ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-16: skad cig nyid las grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-17: bskal pa bye ba stong phrag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-18: blo ldan sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-19: ras ris tha ma mthong ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-20: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-21: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-22: mchod byas bsod nams gang yin de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123a-23: ras ris chung du mthong ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-0: @123b mkhas pas de yi bsod nams thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-1: mdzes pa yi ni las rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-2: longs spyod rgyur yang 'di spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-3: rig dang gsang sngags ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-4: tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-5: nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-6: chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-7: nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-8: lha min dbang po thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-9: lto 'phye che dang zla ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-10: rlung dang gshin rje la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-11: seng ge 'phrog byed sogs bshad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-12: sngags rnams thams cad 'dir drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-14: zhi bcan dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-15: rgyas pa can rnams bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-16: de bzhin 'dir ni mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-17: rgyal mchog gis smad spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-18: zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-19: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i cho ga bzhi pa ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-20: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:123b-21: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-0: @124a *// rig pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad dpyad pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-3: 'jig rten la snying brtse bas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-4: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa'i chos lhag ma dang bcas pa nges par byang chub la rgyan tu mchog tu gzhol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-6: sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-7: bdag gi rig pa gsang chen 'di nyid skye bo thams cad rgyas par byed par 'gyur pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'jig rten gyi bla ma mya ngan las 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rigs nub pa sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-10: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad kyis spangs shing thams cad por te mun par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-11: snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par zhig ste 'phags pa'i lam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-15: nor bu rin po che thams cad dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-16: skye bo legs pas yongs su bzung ba'i snang ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung bar 'gyur te le lo can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124a-20: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa sgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-0: g-yo ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa de rnams @124b chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kun skrag par 'gyur te le lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-1: snyoms las la mngon par dga' zhing dad pa med par 'gyur te 'dod pa tshol zhing gsang sngags tshol bar mi 'gyur te log par lta ba la dga' ba rnams kyang bsod nams ma yin pa mang po la 'jug bar 'gyur te dam pa'i chos spong par byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-2: mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol zhing drag po'i yang drag por 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba de rnams kyi don gyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-3: dbang du ma gyur pa rnams dbang du gyur par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-4: dbang du gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-5: thabs la mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-6: ras ris kyi cho ga da lta gsungs pa'i dus la bab par dgongs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-10: bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga rab 'byams mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-11: 'dod pa'i don byed pa; don chen po rnam par 'byor par 'gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-12: rig pa bdun cu po thams cad kyi mchog gi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-13: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i dus der 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-14: de'ang sems can rnams 'dul pa'i don gyi thabs la mkhas pas 'khor bar kun tu 'jug pa rnams skyob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:124b-15: nges par byang chub la mchog tu gzhol bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-0: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug @125a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-1: gis gsungs par gyur pa 'di la rig pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-3: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-6: t'a rendra t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-7: 'phags ma sgrol ma shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-9: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-12: t'a re tu re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-13: 'phags pa sgrol ma bzhin bzang ma zhes bya ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-14: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-15: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-18: t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-19: 'phags ma sgrol ma dbus legs ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-20: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-21: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-25: t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-26: 'phags ma sgrol ma legs spyod ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-27: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-28: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-31: t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-32: 'phags ma sgrol ma mtshan lags ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-33: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-34: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-37: t'a re tu re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-38: 'phags ma sgrol ma lho chung ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-39: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-40: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125a-45: 'phags ma sgrol ma legs gnas ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-0: na mo ratna tra @125b y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-1: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-6: 'phags ma sgrol ma nye bar 'dud pa zhes bya ba'o zhes pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa chen po mchog gi snying po chen po dang mtshungs pa bya ba thams cad mchog tu grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-7: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas bzhin du skyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-9: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las skyob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-11: byang chub kyi lam ston pa po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-12: padma'i rigs kyi rig pa rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-14: tha ma la yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-15: shin tu mdzes pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-17: bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-18: dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba'i ched du mnyam par 'jug cing 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-19: de rnams sbyor ba chung ngu nyid kyi rgyal srid chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-20: longs spyod chen po'i dbang phyug gi don de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-21: de rnams shin tu myur bar de'i tshe de'i dus su dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-22: ras ris kyi cho ga mdor bsdus par gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:125b-23: snyigs ma lnga'i sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te dbang chung bar grags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-0: brtson 'grus zhan pas ras ris kyi cho ga shin @126a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-1: tu rgyas pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rab tu brtson par mi nus te de rnams kyi don chos mdor bsdus te gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-2: dang po re zhig dpa' bo'i rin gyis dog pa nyos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-5: dkyus su khru gang tsam la zheng du khru phyed tsam pa'i ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pas btag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-6: yang na slar yang skra dang bral ba'i ras kyi dum bu gsar pa steng 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-11: brgyad pa'i ras shin tu dkar ba blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ri mo mkhan 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-14: gur gum gyis bgos pa'i ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi de rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-17: ga bur rnams gcig tu byas pas srog chags med pa'i chu rnyog ma med pa dang bsres te snod gsar par ras sbang du bcug nas nyi ma gsum du legs par mnan la bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-18: gtsang ba'i phyogs su srung ba byas te bdag nyid kyang gtsang mar byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi nya la ras kyi snod kyi mdun du kha shar du phyogs bas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste sngags kyi tshig 'di lan stong phrag brgyad brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126a-20: aom he he bha ga b'an /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-0: ba hu r'u pa dha @126b ra di bya tsakshu kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-2: aa ba lo k'a ya m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-3: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-4: ku m'a ra r'u pa dha ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-6: kinytsa r'a ya si h'um phat phat sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-7: sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-10: de nas langs nas grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam mthong na ring po mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-11: gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma'i rmi lam ma mthong na ras de snod de nas phyung ste nyi ma la bskam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-12: bskams nas slar yang snod gsar pa gzhan zhig du legs par sbas la srung ba byas te bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-13: de nas slar yang mchog gi snying po de rnams las sngags gang yang rung ba gcig bzung nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge drug po rnams las slar yang yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-14: de nas ches myur bar ras ris 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-15: dang po re zhig ras de blangs nas cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-16: gzhan yang dkar po'i nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-17: rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-18: dge ba'i tshes dkar po'i gza'i res kyi nyi ma la shin tu mdzes pa'i dge mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:126b-19: bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan mo nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pas ras ris de 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-0: gtsang ma'i phyogs su ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te dang po re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku rgyan @127a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-1: thams cad kyis brgyan pa byas te dbu zur phud can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-4: dar la sngon po g-yo bzhin pa'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-5: dar la sngon po'i bla gos mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-6: seng ge'i khri la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs te chos 'chad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-7: zhabs g-yas pa rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-8: seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-9: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-12: sgrub pa po la gzigs par gyur pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-13: g-yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-14: rnga yab dkar po g-yob bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-15: phyag g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-17: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-18: dar la sngon po g-yo ba dang bcas pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-19: mu tig gi do shal gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-20: phyag g-yon pas padma dkar po bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-21: phyag g-yas pas rnga yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can bsnams nas g-yob par byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-22: zhi ba'i rnam pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127a-23: de bzhin du 'phags pa kun tu bzang bo padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs ba ste de dag gnyis ka'ang de ltar mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-0: padma'i sdong bu @127b gcig las 'thon pa'i padma gsum gyi dbu ma rtsa ba'i padma'i ze 'bru la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i seng ge'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-1: rin po che'i zhabs rten no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-2: padma gzhan la ni 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-3: padma gsum pa la ni 'phags pa mthu chen thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-4: padma'i sdong bu de ni mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-5: rin po che mar gang kyi rnam pa la padma'i me tog du ma kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-6: phyed tsam kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-7: me tog kha bye ba dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-8: mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-9: nye dga' gnyis mtsho chen po las skyes pa'i padma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-10: klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kha dog dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-11: gdengs ka bdun gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-12: rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-13: lus phyed mi'i lus la sbrul gyi gdongs kas mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-16: phyed chu'i nang du nub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-17: nor bu rin po che de dag gis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-18: mtsho chen po de'i khor yug gi 'og tu ras ris kyi mtha'i gra g-yas kyi gzhogs su sgrub pa po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor la nges par rtog bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-19: lag na spos phor thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:127b-23: kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du @128a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-1: ras kyi mtha' gnyis su lha'i bu phreng ba 'dzin pa gnyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas nam mkha' la lding ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-2: me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor bar byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-3: shin tu mdzes pa dag mngon par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-4: ras ris de'i khor yug du n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rab tu bkram pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-5: ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum lhag par gnas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-8: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-9: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-10: sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum po rnams gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya ste ji ltar 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-11: dbyibs ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-12: sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-13: dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' gnyis su'ang phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-14: kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-15: ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-16: khru gang tsam la bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128a-18: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong med pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-0: tshul khrims dang ldan pa @128b pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-1: tshul khrims 'chal ba'ang rung ste ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-2: sgrub pa po bdag nyid ni gdon mi za bar sngon spyad pa byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-3: dad pas byang chub sems bskyed pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur bas te de ltar na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-4: gzhan du sdig pa byed pas nam yang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-5: de ltar dad par gyur pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-6: sngags kyi lha rnams bsgrub bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-7: dad pa de yis gsang sngags rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-9: gang phyir dad pa theg pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-11: dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la; ;dkar po'i chos rnams me skye ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-12: sa bon me yis tshig pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-13: myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-14: dad dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-16: lha rnams kun dang khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-17: gsang sngags rnams ni thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-18: dad pa med na mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-19: 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-21: dad dang ldan par brjod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-23: yid ni byang chub der son pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-24: de rnams byang chub pas par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-25: gzhan gyis grub par ma gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-26: bstan pa 'di las zlog pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-27: ras ris chung dang chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-28: par ma yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-29: las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:128b-30: de ni rab tu bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-1: sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi cho ga las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-2: ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-5: khyod kyis sems can de rnams kyi don gyi phyir bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams bshad pa 'di thabs nyung ngu nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur te de rnams kyi don gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa thabs yon tan rgyas pa rab tu dbye bas rnam par phye ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-6: rnam par dbye ba de yang dag par mthun par bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-7: de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-8: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-9: de nas yang byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-11: bdag cag gis 'byor pa bstan par mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa'i mthu gsal bar mdzad pa legs par gsungs pa ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129a-13: gang da lta de'i dus la bab par dgongs na bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-0: de nas @129b bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas zhal gyi sgo nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-6: shel gyi kha dog la sogs pa byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-7: 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar mdzad nas rgyu skar gyi 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-10: nyi ma 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag gi 'od kyang spa bkong bar mdzad nas de rnams mi gsal zhing 'od med par gyur te rnam par snang bar mi 'gyur zhing spa bkong bar mdzad de nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-13: rin po che'i 'od thams cad med par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:129b-14: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni @130a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-1: rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-2: bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-12: gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa pa'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las sgrub par byed pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-13: chos kyi sprin la brten cing yang dag par rjes su 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-17: gleg bam du bri bar byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-25: ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-26: sil snyan gyi rnam pa'i khyad par ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130a-29: tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyun tu thob pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-0: spu zing zhes @130b byed pa skye bar byed par 'gyur ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-2: nus pa thos nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-3: rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-4: spyod pa so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba de rnams ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-5: de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'dzum pa mdzad kyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-6: dang po re zhig dam tshig mthong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-7: sngon spyad pa rnams byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-8: mngon par dbang bskur thob pas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-11: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas yi ge gcig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-12: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin yang rung ste dgon pa chen por song nas lo bdun du bzlas pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-16: 'dab ma bzang zhing sngon spyod pa rnams byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-17: de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub du phyogs par bzhag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-18: bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas padma dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:130b-20: gur gum gyis mngon par btags te 'bum phrag gcig bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-3: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi ras ris kyi 'og nas dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-4: ga bur gyi bdug pa'ang ji ltar 'byor pa bsreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-5: lha'i bu rnams la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-6: de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i nya 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-7: nya so so la mtshan mo phyed kyi dus kyi tshe ras ris kyi spyan sngar me thab padma'i rnam pa lta bu byas nas tsandan dkar po'i shing gi me sbar te gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-8: ga bur gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs ji ltar 'byor pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas te de nas bsrung ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste ras ris kyi khor yug tu gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-10: de nas sgrub pa po tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-11: gur gum gyis btags pa'i padma dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-12: de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131a-15: rang sangs rgyas 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag btsal nas sngar sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras mtha'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-0: de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur bar 'gyur te se gol gtogs pa tsam @131b la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-1: gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang gi rgyal po de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-2: bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-3: 'chi ba med par rol par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-4: bris sku gnas pa de nyid du sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-6: de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-7: zhing stong phrag kyang 'da' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-8: lus stong phrag ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang dag par 'byin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-11: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bris sku rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:131b-13: mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga las kyi 'bras bu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-0: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dug pa'i lha tshogs rnams la @132a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-4: las chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-5: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-6: sgrub pa po srung ba'i don du gsang ba dam pa mchog gi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang gis bzlas na sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-9: 'di ni 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug kyang rig pa 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-10: yang dag par 'dod par 'gyur bar byed na de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams smos ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-14: bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa ste 'di ni brtson 'grus che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-17: rig pa thams cad gcig kho nar sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-18: gcig kho na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs pa chen po rnams las mchog tu bshad pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132a-20: las chen po thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-0: don thams cad sgrub @132b pa; bya ba thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-1: sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-3: sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-4: sngags thams cad so so rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-8: sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-11: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-13: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-14: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-17: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-19: t'a re t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-21: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-22: las chen po thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-23: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-24: sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-25: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-26: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkra shis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-28: sngags thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-29: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-30: rig pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-31: rnam par sdang ba thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-32: skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:132b-33: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-1: ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar rab tu byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-2: ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-3: rig pa bzlas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-4: gos la mngon par sngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-5: so shing la mngon par sngags te zos na so nad sel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-6: ka ra b'i ra dkar po la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-7: mig gi nad la rgyam tshva phye mar byas pa la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas mig bkang na mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-8: rna ba'i nad la glang po che'i rgyab nas 'thon pa 'brug sgrogs pa na 'byung ba'i tshva dhvi ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-9: ka bu ka'i lo mar btums te me chung dus btso bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-10: tshos nas phyir btsos pa byas la chu dro 'jam la rgyam tshva dang sbyar ba byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags te des rna ba dag par byas te skad cig de nyid la nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-11: bud med bu 'byung ba dus su mngal 'gags nas gzer bas zil gyis non par gyur na aa ta rlu sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags nas lte ba'i phyogs su byugs na bde blag du btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133a-12: skyes bu zug rdus nyams pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-0: mtshon nang du lus pa la mar rnying pa la @133b brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags nas blud par bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-1: de'i phyogs su byugs na de'i skad cig nyid la zug rdu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-4: tshad pa'i nad la kha ru tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-6: tshva gzhan gang yang rung ba la mngon par sngags nas zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te nyi ma de nyid la bde bar gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-8: 'phral gyi tshad pa la'ang rung ste ma tu lung ga'i rtsa ba btags nas srog chags med pa'i chu 'thung du gzhug ste gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur te lan bdun bzlas pas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-10: bud med mo gsham mi skye ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'dod na aa sho gandha'i rtsa ba'i mar dang lhan cig bskol te ba'i 'o mas bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa lnga yongs su bzlas te zla mtshan gyi dus su 'thung du bcug nas khrus byas pa'i mthar skyes pa gzhan spang zhing khyim pa'ang 'dad pas log par g-yem pa yongs su spangs na rang gi skyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-11: rang gi bdag po'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-13: lo lnga rab tu skyes pa'i dus las lhag pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-14: lo du mar bu ma chags pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-16: sman gyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-17: gzhan gyis gdug par byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:133b-18: mngal 'dzin pa mi 'dzin bar byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-2: sbyor ba gzhan kun tu spangs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-3: nad gzhan yang rung ba cung zad kyis yongs su mi 'dzin par byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-7: bcos ma ma yin pa la sogs pa'i dug la sogs pa rab tu zhugs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-12: mi mdza' pa'i sbyor ba byas pa la mar rnying pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-13: rma bya'i mdongs gcig tu byas nas btags la sha ka ra dang lhan cig sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa bdun mngon par sngags nas aa ru ra tsam bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-14: nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du sha ka ra dang ldan pa'i 'o ma bskol ba btung bar bya zhing yang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-15: yang du sngags kyang bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-16: klad pa na ba la bya rog gi bshog pa la lan bdun mngon par sngags te des byabs na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-17: bud med la ches spyad pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams la aa lam bu sha'i rtsa ba 'o ma dang lhan cig btags nas ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas nas 'o mas skyo mar sbyar nas btung par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134a-18: de bzhin du rims nyin bzhi pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-0: nyin gsum pa @134b dang; rgyun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-2: rims drag po la sogs pa rnams la 'o thug mar dang sbyar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te 'thung du bcug na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-3: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa la bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags nas bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-4: de bzhin du ma mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-8: grul bum gyi gdon la sogs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-9: mi thams cad gdug pa can drag pos mngon par zin pa la bdag nyid kyi lag pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te zin pa de'i mgo bo la reg na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-10: lan gcig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-11: gnyis bzlas pas grogs po srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-12: gsum bzlas pas khyim srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-13: bzhi bzlas pas grong srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-14: lnga bzlas pas grong gi spyod yul du gyur pa srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-15: de bzhin du ji srid stong phrag gi bar du bzlas pas dmag gi tshogs srung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-18: las phra mo rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:134b-19: de nas sgrub par 'dod na phra ma'i las rnams mi bya bar mtha' gcig tu song nas dben pa'i phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro pa'i chu klung 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-2: gang g'a'i klung gi ngogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-4: chu klung chen po'i ngogs la brten nas phyogs gtsang ma phyag dar byas nas khrus lan gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te smra ba bcad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-5: slong mo'i kha zas za zhing lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-8: 'bras bu za zhing 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-9: grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-10: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste phyogs de nyid du ras ris thu bo der bzhag la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas gser dngul gyi rang bzhin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-12: sa'i rang bzhin gyi mar me'i snod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-13: tu rushka'i 'bru mar gyis bkang pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-14: dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-15: ba'i mar gyis bkang ba'i mar me'i snod du ras gsar pa dum bu dum bur byas pa'i mar me 'bum phrag gcig ras ris la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135a-16: de'i khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnams phul ma thag tu ras ris las 'od zer rnams byung ma thag tu ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-0: steng gi bar snang la rnga po che'i sgra sgrogs shing legs so zhes pa'ang thos te de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris kyi mtha'i zur du sgrub pa po sngar bris par ras ris la brten pa la @135b mchod yon phul nas bskor ba byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-1: de nas gzung ba tsam gyis mar me 'dzin pa de rnams thams cad kyi lhan cig tu 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-2: gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang brgyar yang 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-4: so sor yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-5: sgra snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing gar byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin ma de rnams kyis khor yug tu kun tu khyab par snang ba sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por dbang skur bar byed do; ;mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyis lhan cig rga ba med cing 'chi ba med par rol par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-6: bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-7: lha'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-8: rnam par bkra ba'i gos kyis brgyan pa de rnams dbang du byas nas mngag gzhug par 'gyur te de rnams dang lhan cig spyod par gyur te lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur zhing ring du 'tsho zhing grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:135b-10: skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-0: brgya byin gyis yang grangs su mi 'gro na de las gzhan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta ci @136a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-2: mthar yang 'di sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-4: las sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang yod de ches dka' thub byas ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-5: de nas mtha' gcig tu song nas lhag par gnas te 'du 'dzi med cing 'du 'dzi dang bral ba'i dgon pa chen por zhugs nas gnas gang na padma'i mtsho chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-7: ri bo gcig la brten pa'i ri bo de'i rtse mor 'dzegs te rig pa rnams kyi dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-8: me tog la sogs pa phul nas de rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-12: 'bras bu bza' zhing 'o ma las byung ba zos te rig pa 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-13: bzlas pa'i mthar yang sngar bstan pa'i cho ga de nyid kyi ras ris kyi thu bo bzhag nas padma'i me tog la tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-14: gur gum gyis btags te seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar nas sngar yongs su btags pa'i padmas stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-15: de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ste des sgrub pa po kun tu snang bar byas nas spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136a-16: reg ma thag tu sgrub pa po mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-0: byang @136b chub sems dpa'i sa thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-1: lha'i gzugs kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu ste bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug 'da' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-3: de rnams kyi mthu'ang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-4: sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug mnyes par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-5: de rnams kyang mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-6: bsnyen bkur pas mngon par dga' par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-7: mthar yang byang chub la mchog tu gzhol par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-9: ji srid byang chub tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rtsa ba'i cho ga las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-11: las mchog sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byams yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-12: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas slar yang sgrub pa'i las mchog gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-13: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags yongs su bzung nas gang g'a'i klung du zhugs nas gru'i bzhon pa la rab tu gnas te gang g'a'i dbus su 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:136b-14: chu btung zhing stong phrag sum cur ji ltar 'dod pa'i nyin zhag gi bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-1: mthar klu thams cad mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-2: de nas sgrub pa brtsams te gru'i dbus de nyid du me thab padma'i rnam pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-3: de nas n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis ras ris la mchod pa chen po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-4: ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag ste bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog re re la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar te tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-5: gur gum bsres pa'i n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog rnams kyis stong phrag bcu'i bar ji srid bar sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-6: gzhan klu rnams mthong ba na nye bar bcings pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas rnams rab tu chags pas blang bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-7: gang las sbyin sreg gi mthar gru'i bzhon pa dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-8: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-9: klu'i dbang po rgyal po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-10: bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-11: rang dbang du spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-12: 'gro ba la thogs pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste de'i spyi bo la reg par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137a-14: reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137b-0: nges par sangs rgyas nyid @137b du lhag par 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137b-2: mchog gi sgrub pa'i cho ga'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni sngar bzhin du gang g'a'i klung du zhugs nas bil ba'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi shing gcig nyid kyi gru'i bzhon pa byas nas shin tu brtan pa legs par byas pa der mngon par 'dzegs nas bil pa'i shing gi rang bzhin gyi skya ba des gru de'i rjes su sgrub pa po ches mkhas shing gsal ba nyid kyis g-yab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137b-3: gang g'a'i klung chen po yongs su ma dor bar kun nas thad ka 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137b-4: rgyun rings su g-yab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137b-5: de nas rtsa ba'i rig pa bzung nas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:137b-12: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas ras ris kyi thu bo de nyid du zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag nas bdag nyid dang po zhal shar du phyogs la phyis ni ji ltar 'dod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-0: 'bras bu bza' zhing smra ba bcad de dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te shin tu dkar ba'i las kun tu spyod cing shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pas dang po re zhig ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nye bar bstan pa bzhin du sngar cho ga mthong bas rig pa 'bum phrag bcu bzlas par @138a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-1: bya'o; ;de nas gal te rtsa ba'i rig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-2: de nas stong phrag drug cu bzlas pa'i mthar gru rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-3: de nas sgrub pa'i yo byad rnams bsdus te sngar gnas de nyid du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-4: de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na 'jigs par mi bya zhing bzlog par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-5: sgrub pa po'i dbang las ma gtogs par bzlog par nus pa'ang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-6: de nas dpag tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen po yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-7: lam thung na lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-8: der zhugs nas chu'i steng du sgrub pa'i las brtsams par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-9: de nas me thab sngar gyi rnam pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-10: rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod du seng ldeng gi me spar la n'a ga ge sar gyi ze 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-11: me tog tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-12: ga bur dang bsres pa'i sreg blugs ches nyung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-13: ches mang ba'i tshad kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-14: sngar bzhin du rtsa ba'i rig pas 'bum phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-15: sbyin sreg byed pa na lang ka'i grong na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams h'a h'a zhes sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-16: klu'i grong longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba ches zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138a-17: ches khro ba rnams la ngas te klu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-0: @138b srin po rnams kyang 'di skad ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-3: bdag cag gi rje bo mdzod cig ces so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-4: de bzhin du lha ma yin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-9: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed mod kyi ldang bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-10: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngags bzla zhing lag pa g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-11: de nas rnam pa byol zhing phan tshun rab tu 'bros la 'jigs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-12: de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru des sgrub pa po de khyer nas skad cig la 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du'ang yang 'gro zhing 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sems shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-15: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-17: mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;klu thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-22: lha ma yin thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-23: sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bka' bzhin byed pa la bzhag nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:138b-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-1: sngags grub pa de rnams kyang 'di la byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-3: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-5: las kyi cho ga mchog sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni bil ba'i shing la gru bo che'i bzhon pa byed du gzhug ste shing gcig gi bzhon pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-6: bsdus pa'ang rung ste gnas chen po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-7: gang g'a'i dbus kyi gling der gnas pa'i gru'i bzhon par skyes bu brgya nyi shu lag na sgron me thogs pa rnams gru'i bzhon pa la 'dzegs te gos dkar po gyon zhing srung ba byas pa ras ris kyi thu bo sngar gyi cho gas kun tu bzhag pa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-8: de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas n'a ga ge sar gyi phye ma rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-10: tsandan dkar po dang ga pur bsres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-11: seng ldeng gi sreg blugs stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-12: de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar gru de skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'gyur te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-14: mthong ba tsam las thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-15: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139a-16: yun ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-0: @139b rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-1: mar me 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i rig pa 'dzin pa grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-2: lhan cig spyod pa de rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-3: thabs gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu zhing rang dag [?] 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-5: bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par dgyes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-6: mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-8: las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par gyur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-9: chu klung 'gram mam rgya mtsho'i ngogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-10: de bzhin kha ba can gyi rir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-11: ri yi rgyal po'i 'bigs byed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-12: der ni las mchog bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-13: sa hye ma la ya nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-14: ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-15: bya rgod phung po'i ri rgyal du; ;las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-16: rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-17: shing sogs me tog ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-18: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-19: phyogs 'di rnams su bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-20: rnam par dben pa'i phyogs gtsang ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-21: bas mtha' grong pa'i chos bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-22: mi smra reg pa spangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-23: rtag tu gci ba bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-24: lus la lhag gnas bshang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-25: brtul zhugs can dag gtsang sbra bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-26: reg na gzhon sha can rnams 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-27: srog chags spangs pa'i sa rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:139b-28: gsum pa de bzhin blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-0: @140a *// rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-1: de bzhin gnyis ka'i mthar lag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-2: sngags pas rtag tu sa dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-3: sngar bstan pa dag blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-4: zlos pas rtag tu rkang pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-5: g-yas dang de las gzhan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-6: phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-7: 'bad pas rkang pa bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-8: rgya cher sngar ni brjod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-9: sngags zlos po yi gtsang sbra yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-10: dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-11: rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-12: 'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-13: rgyud rnams kun tu mthong ngo zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-14: mnga' bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-15: de nas zlos pos nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-16: sdom brtson dngos grub las la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-17: sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-18: yid kyi nang gi dag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-19: gtsang sbra rnam pa lnga ru brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-20: sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-21: lus kyi gtsang sbra de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-22: ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-23: bzhi pa bden pa'i gtsang sbra ste; ;chu ni lnga par brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-24: bden pa'i chos ni khro ba thul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-25: rgyud shes bstan bcos mthong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-26: phra mo'i de nyid don la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-27: sngags shes las la grags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-28: rgyu yis nad la mkhas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-29: de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-30: bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140a-31: brdzun pa'i tshig ni smra mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-0: bden pa thams cad rnam @140b spangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-1: ma rungs rab tu ma rungs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-2: rnam par sdang dang 'khrugs bcas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-3: rtsub cing gnad ni 'gems pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-4: bden pa'i chos ni rnam par nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-5: sems can gzhan la gdung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-6: phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-7: chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-8: de bzhin 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-9: rtag tu khrims 'chal chos min spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-10: sngags zlos pa yis spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-11: de bzhin nyid du grong gi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-12: khro ba brnab sems 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-14: blo ldan rang rgyal bse ru dang; ;slar yang rtag tu nyon mongs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-15: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-16: de bzhin rtag tu brdzun smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-18: sa steng brdzun sma nye bar smra; ;mi bzad dmyal ba chen por ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-19: sngon gyis nyes pa las de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-20: dga' bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-21: rtag tu slar yang der gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-22: rtag tu brdzun smras nyer 'tsho ba; ;mi bzad ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-23: thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-24: yang sos ral gri lo ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-25: de bzhin shal ma la yi nags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-26: der ni bskal pa mang por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-27: brdzun du smra ba'i skye bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-28: gsang sngags log par smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-29: rmongs pas log par brjod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-30: 'byung po rnams la slu byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:140b-31: de la grub pa ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-2: sngags kyi dngos grub ma mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-3: sngags pa'i dngos grub med do zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-4: 'di skad du ni tshig smra pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-5: gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-6: sa stengs 'dir ni rab spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-7: bskal ba bye ba mang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-8: de yis grub par ga la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-9: de phyir 'di ni mi bzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-11: yang sos dang ni thig nag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-12: rab tu tsha bar 'tshed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-13: sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-14: sbangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-15: 'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-16: dri med chu ni rab bsngags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-17: sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-18: yul gzhan rnams su bsgrags mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-19: lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-20: brtan pa'i mtshan ma gcig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-21: rtags gcig de bzhin bas mtha' ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-22: sngags rig sngags ni bsnyen pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-23: bdag dang grogs rnams bsrung byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-24: sngar spyad gsang sngags ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-25: sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-26: dgon pa che mchog shing chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-28: ri yi rtse dang khung bu dang; ;chu yi gnas ni gtsang mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-30: sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141a-31: sngags shes nas ni nges rtogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-0: shar @141b phyogs su yang chu klung che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-1: lu hi ta 'gram dge ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-2: de bzhin k'a ma ru pa'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-3: grong mchog 'phel bar byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-5: 'dug pa dang ni chu klung mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-6: gnas der rtag tu zlos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-7: gtsang ma blo gros ldan pas bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-8: sngon du bsnyen pa'ang der gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-9: gang g'a'i sgo ru las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-10: de bzhin rtag tu gang g'a dang;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-11: dug can pa ni phrad pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-12: rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-13: gtsang ma'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-14: dur khrod che dang gzhan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-15: zlos pos der ni rtag tu bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-16: dri med chu dang 'bab chu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-17: srog chags rnams kyis spangs pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-18: de nyid phyir ni shin tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-19: mnyam gzhag sngags kyis bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-20: der ni 'jig rten bsam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-21: bsod nams min ba cung zad mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-22: 'on kyang sngags kyis nyer bstan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-23: cung zad dus su 'dug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-24: de nas gzhan du 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-25: zla ba gzas zin dus der ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-26: dus ma bab na'ang dus cung zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-27: der 'dug bya yi gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-28: gzhan du sngags rig ci nus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-29: de nas myur du 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-30: bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-31: sa steng rnams su kun tu 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-32: 'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-33: lta ba ngan bar lhung ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-34: mu stegs can gzhan gnas rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:141b-35: sngags rig pas ni rtag tu spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-1: shes der ni mi bsdad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-2: skyes mchog blo gros rgyu ngan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-3: rgyal ba mchog gis gang bzhugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-4: rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-5: byang chub sems dpa' bskal ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-6: rgyal mchog sras po nyan thos rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-7: de rnams kun bzhugs sa steng gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-8: yul rnams kun tu sngags shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-9: 'bad pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya; ;mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-10: gnas de ru ni bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-11: gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'di rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-12: gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-13: las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-14: 'di rnams rnyed par ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-15: gang yang rung ba'i gnas der ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-16: gtsang mas sngon du bsnyen pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-17: dad cing mos pas sgrub thabs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-18: cho ga mchog gi las brtsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-19: dang po re zhig bris sku'i thu bo zhal nub tu bstan nas bzhag ste bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs la grog mkhar gyi sa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142a-20: gang g'a'i klung gi 'gram gyi sa blangs nas bu shel rtse dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-0: ga pur rnams bsres la rma bya'i gzugs byas te de bris sku'i spyan sngar bzhag nas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung bas 'khor lo'i rnam pa byas nas bris sku'i spyan sngar lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste lag pa g-yon pas @142b ni rma bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-1: dkar po'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan phyed na bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas ga pur gyis bdug pa bsregs pa'i dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-2: ji srid nam langs pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-3: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe de rma bya'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-5: bdag nyid lha'i phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-6: gos 'chang zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-7: nyi ma 'char ka 'dra bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te ras ris la bskor ba byas la ras ris blangs nas rma bya'i gdan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'da' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-10: bskal pa drug cu'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-11: ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-13: lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-15: de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-16: mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:142b-17: de bzhin du dbyig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-4: mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-5: sa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-9: bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-11: gzig la sogs pa rnams grog mkhar gyi sa dri zhim po'i dri zhim bsres pa las byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-17: rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-18: rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-19: rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang phreng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-24: gri la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-25: gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-27: chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad pa'i rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par bsang gtor byas te snga ma bzhin du sbyong ba'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143a-28: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-0: sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rig @143b pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-1: ji ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po yongs su bskyab par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-2: shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-4: sngar bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-5: bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso bor ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar bstan pa'i mtshon cha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-7: sems can gyi khyad pa rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas la yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rung blangs te mtshan mo ji srid du bzlas pa byas na nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe bar skabs 'dir bris sku la 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po kun tu mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-8: gal te sgrub pa po bzhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyur na de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-9: gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-10: mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-11: bcang pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro; ;ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing lha'i lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa 'od zer chen po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa glog ltar gsal ba'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-13: ring du 'tshe zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:143b-14: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-0: lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal @144a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-2: sngar yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon pa gang gis grub pa de nyid mthu chen por 'gyur te de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-3: de nyid 'di'i grogs po ste gzhan gyi sngags kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-5: phan par 'dod pa rtag tu rjes su bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-8: rin po che'i bye brag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-11: sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-13: sbya ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-17: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor byugs nas ji srid byang chub snying po rjes su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de stobs bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-18: sems can rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-19: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro; ;yang dag pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyan mi gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144a-22: byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-0: ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur @144b mdor bsdus na las mchog thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-1: gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las mchog gzhan nyid bya'o; ;rig pa 'dzin pa nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-3: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-4: sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-5: lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-6: stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-7: 'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-8: chos bstan pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-9: sangs rgyas gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-10: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing rjes su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang; chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-11: nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med cing bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-12: 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:144b-15: sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad @145a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-2: 'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste sngags kyi mtha' rab 'byams dang ldan pa ras ris thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar 'dug nas 'jig rten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad sngags kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-4: rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste mdor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsungs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste myur du de rnams kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral ba gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-6: ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-9: khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bar ma yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-10: de mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145a-11: legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-0: de nas yang byang chub @145b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-2: ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can; sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-3: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-4: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-5: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-7: sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-8: dang po re zhig tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-10: gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-16: gang du rab tu gnas pa ste sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-17: sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyar ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-18: de ngas bshad kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-19: dang po re zhig rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:145b-20: tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-0: dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig @146a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-1: la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-2: khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-3: sngar nges par bstan pa gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-4: yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-5: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-6: khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-15: ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-17: bkur sti thams cad la 'dod pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-22: rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-24: rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-25: dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-26: 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-30: khyod kyis gsang ba'i rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-31: sngags rjes su zlos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-32: rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-33: khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-35: yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-36: 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146a-37: legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-2: nad gang gis las su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-3: rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-4: yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te sgrub pa po'ang de dang 'dra ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-5: yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-6: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas nas 'di la don du gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-7: slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na bdag cag la rjes su brtse ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-10: phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-11: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis brtags nas bzhugs par bya zhing sngar bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-12: sngags byin la rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-17: las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas yongs su brtags te bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-19: las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:146b-20: gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-3: longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-5: bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-6: ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-7: de nas sgrub po des rig pa dang /
