K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-8: sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-14: lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gdan phul ba thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-15: de la thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus tsam gyi bar 'di la dang por bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147a-16: nyi ma gung ni nyi ma shar ba'i mthar dus tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga shes pas gung gi thun mtshams su shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-0: @147b nub pa'i dus su'ang lhag ma bzhi cha tsam thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-1: slob dpon mkhas pa bshes gnyen can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-2: tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-3: chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-4: kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-5: sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-6: bya ba kun la blo gros byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-7: phra zhing mkhas la tshad shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-8: chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-9: spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-10: 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-11: thub pa mchog gi chos la dad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-12: 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-13: bzlas pa bya zhing rnam dben byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-14: sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-16: de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-17: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-18: 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-19: srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-20: gtsang sbra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-21: sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-22: kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-23: gsang sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-24: gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-25: rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-26: 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid; ;sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-27: phra mo tsam la 'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-28: gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:147b-29: yid gzhungs lta na sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-2: de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-3: 'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-4: rdo rje padma'i rigs dag la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-5: de la rtag tu ngal bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-6: gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-7: nad med nus pa med min pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-8: rga dang nad ni rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-9: de bzhin ba shes gnyen can sngags grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-10: kun nas myur du byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-11: mtha' yi ring min zhing de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-12: tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-13: khyad par du ni shes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-15: dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-16: de 'dir byang chub pha rol son //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-17: srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-18: de bzhin nyid du rig sngags byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-19: mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-20: 'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-21: dpa' nyid dang ni rab tu ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-22: sbyin dang 'byung bo phan la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-23: de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-24: rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-25: des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-26: sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-27: de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-29: dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-30: thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-31: de yi gsung ni mi 'gom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-32: slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148a-33: ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-0: longs spyod de la @148b dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-1: nyung du tsam mam mang yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-2: gang gi mnyes par 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-3: lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-4: pha la nor ni ster ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-5: de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-6: slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-7: mtha' yi dbang phyug dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-8: tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-10: slob mas bla ma de mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-12: lam dang cho ga nyer mthong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-13: bsnyen pa las kyang brten pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-14: de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-16: de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-17: lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-18: bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-19: bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-21: sgrub pos ston dang thog mar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-22: dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-23: dman rnams de dag mnyam yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-24: gal te ches mchog gyur pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-25: rmongs pa'am lhag par khro ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-26: rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-27: des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-28: man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-29: gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-30: 'dis ni ser sna byas pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-31: sngar bstan slob ma de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-32: man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-33: gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:148b-34: lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-2: de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-3: slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-4: phan tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-5: gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-7: de la sngags ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-8: slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-9: slob ma bla mar mthong ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-11: gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-12: de la rtag tu lam nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-13: sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-14: gnyis kas pha dang bur shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-16: brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-17: rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-18: rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-19: bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-21: de med mgon med de rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-22: ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-23: sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-24: thams cad la ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-25: sngags kyi sbyod pa khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-26: sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-27: tha ma mchog dang bar ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-28: dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-29: yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-30: rjes su gzung ba'i rgyun bya'o; ;'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-31: 'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-32: de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149a-33: slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-0: de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan @149b pas; ;lam nyid yin no gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-1: dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-2: pha ni pha rol song ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-3: pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-5: de nas 'dir ni song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-6: mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-7: slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-8: smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-9: de ltar bstan pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-10: ji lta'i lam la rab 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-11: de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-12: khang stong dang ni dgon pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-13: ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-14: gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-15: rnam dben skye bo sbangs pa bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-16: lha khang dang ni shing drung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-17: mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-18: rgya mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-19: chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i; ;yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-21: 'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-22: mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-23: grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-24: sngags don nges pa'i rtog ge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-25: ltas ni rnam pa de nyid shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-26: dpa' zhing g-yul las rnam rgyal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-27: snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-28: dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan; ;rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-29: rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-30: bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:149b-31: 'bad pa med pa'i nyin gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-2: tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-3: 'bab chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-4: srog chags med cing dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-5: chu de nyid la khrus byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-6: sa dang ba byung phye ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-7: sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-8: de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-9: chu nyid shin tu dri med la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-10: zlos po brtson pas khrus bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-11: ha cang yun ring khrus mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-12: de nas langs la lag pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-13: sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-14: bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-15: nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-16: yang der so shing kun tu spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-17: so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-18: de nas skyob la phyag byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-19: 'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-20: sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-21: bya ba sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-22: yang dag yang du yang dag bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-23: de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-24: ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-25: sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-26: de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-27: 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-28: spyan snga nyid du sdig pa bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-29: bdag nyid ngag kyang phul byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-30: ras ris spyan sngar 'khod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-31: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-32: sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-33: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-34: der ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150a-35: rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-0: de @150b tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-1: cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-2: ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-3: bar ma bar ma'i las dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-4: brtul zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-5: ha cang mthon po spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-6: gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-7: bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-8: rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-9: ha cang mtho min dma' ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-10: bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-11: sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-12: tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-13: gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-14: gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-15: bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-16: sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-18: sngags ni legs par thos pa 'ga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-20: sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-21: de phyir skye bo dang bral bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-22: sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-23: tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-24: zlos pa pos ni sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-25: mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-26: de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-27: skya reng dmar po'i dus tsam ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-28: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-29: thun ni dang bor de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-30: thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-31: dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-32: bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-33: de nas nyi ma phyed nub na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:150b-34: sngags kyi bzlas pa de tshe btang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-1: zlos bor ba de yi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-2: mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-3: brtul zhugs can gyi rnam gzhan spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-4: de tshe bor ba'i gdugs lhag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-5: thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-6: shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-7: dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-8: sa bcu pa ni glegs bam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-9: mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-10: de nas dus la bab gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-11: rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-12: thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-14: de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-15: dus su za zhing dbang po thul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-16: sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-17: sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-18: grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-19: mi smra gtsang spra spyod la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-20: sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-21: khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-22: zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-23: tshos bar grub pa gtsang mar 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-24: yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-25: sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-26: de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-27: bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-28: dper na brtson pas go bgos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-29: nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-30: rtag tu dgra ni 'joms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-31: dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-32: de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-33: rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151a-34: de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-0: gzugs @151b sgra mthong nas mi dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-1: 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-2: mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-3: lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-4: bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-5: smad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-6: srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-7: lus kyi mi rtag sdug bsngal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-8: mi gtsang dri mi zhim par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-9: gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-11: las kyi srad bus brgyus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-12: yun ring dus su mya ngan byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-13: mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-14: dmus longs sdug bsngal rgyu can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-15: gang du blo ni phyin ci log /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-16: chags pas skye ba phongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-18: rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-19: ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-21: rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-22: 'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-23: gang du sems can mi dge dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-24: lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-25: zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-26: srid pa'i mtsho chung 'byung ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-27: 'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-28: sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g-yengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-29: de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-30: rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-31: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-32: de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-33: thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:151b-34: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-2: dka'// bud med rnams kyis bslus pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-3: sems can gnas gang bying ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-5: yi dvags 'jig rten lha ma yin; ;de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-7: rtag tu kun nas yongs su 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-8: bud med chags pas bslus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-9: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-11: bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-12: ro la chags pa'i ce sbyang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-13: gang la sems can rtag dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-14: mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-15: dkar po chos la nges par nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-16: sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-17: srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-18: thams cad zlog par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-19: sngags bzlos pa la dga' zhing brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-20: dbang chen grags shing yid dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-21: gzi brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-22: der rnams la ni sdug bsngal med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-23: yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-24: bla ma lha la mchod pa byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-25: ma dang pha la gus pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-26: gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-27: mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-28: gzhan gyi don la rjes su bsnyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-29: bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-30: de bzhin 'bras dang zug rngu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152a-31: blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-0: rtag tu @152b bud med chags gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-1: de la dngos grub yod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-2: de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-4: dngos grub chung du'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-6: tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-7: sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-9: lam yang med cing phyogs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-10: 'dir ni byis pa smad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-11: sngags grub pa ni ga la yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-13: de la bde 'gro'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-14: bde ba nyid la gzhol ba'ang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-15: de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-16: grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-17: ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-18: gang tshe bcad na slar yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-19: sngon po nyid du mi 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-20: myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-21: de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-22: chul khrims 'chal zhing sdig pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-23: rtag tu slar yang bud med chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-24: mi dge'i grogs dang phrad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-25: sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-26: de bas gang tshe zlos pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-27: bde bar gshegs pas spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-28: bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-29: gang gi dngos grub bsgrub bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-30: byis pa bud med la rmongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-31: gzhan gyi grub par ma bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-32: de nas dang por blo ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-34: rigs ldan brtan zhing dpa' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:152b-35: sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-1: dang chos min rnam dpyod shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-2: de rnams grub pa rnyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-3: de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-4: grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-5: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-6: sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-7: mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bza' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-8: bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-9: phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-10: de nas slar yang gnas de ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-11: srog chags med pa'i chu rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-12: dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-13: gnyis pa la ni lag g-yon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-14: rked pa man chad dril phyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-15: kun tu g-yas pa slar byin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-16: lag pa sa yis bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-17: sngar bzhag pa yi dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-18: gtsang ma rnams kyi bdun nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-19: bza' zhing dag chus gtsang sbrar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-20: ser skya'i ba las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-21: ba yi lci ba ser po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-22: gtsang zhing dri med snod blang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-23: srog chags med pa'i chus sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-24: dang por ston pa thub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-25: mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-26: khyad par khru gang tsam du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-27: gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-28: gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-29: gang zhig sngags pa zlos pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-30: slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-31: bzhi pa sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-32: nye bar longs spyod don du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153a-33: g-yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-0: dkon @153b mchog gsum gyi ched du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-1: dkyil 'khor de ni gru bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-2: gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-3: gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-5: kun nas gru bzhi pa ru'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-6: khru gang ngam ni khru phyed rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-7: nyin re zhing yang bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-8: zlos pos de tshe sbas pa'i phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-9: sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-10: de nas sngags pa thub pa langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-11: lag gnyis 'bad pas bkrus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-12: gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-13: dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-14: dri ma med pa'i gtsang ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-15: 'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-17: chu mig chu bo la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-18: gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-19: sems can gtsang ma lag gis bcus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-20: sngags pas slar yang nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-21: gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-22: de nas kha la reg bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-23: de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-24: mig dang sna yi bu ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-25: spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-26: dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-27: cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-28: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum chogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-29: zlos po gtsang mar gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-30: bsod snyoms snod ni blangs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-31: chu yi nang du 'gro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-32: gang du chu bo rab gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-33: de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:153b-34: chu klung rab tu 'bab la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-1: rgyur; ;de bzhin rtag tu sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-2: de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-4: mtshan ni 'od srung zhes bya bas; ;sngon ni de tshes steng der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-5: sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-6: 'byung po rnams la legs don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-7: sngags ni rab tu gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-8: sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-9: dbul zhing skyo la sha thang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-10: mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-11: 'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-12: 'byung po rnams la legs pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-13: slar yang kun tu bsten pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-14: 'byung po kun gyi zas don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-15: gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-16: nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-17: byang sems la bsten thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-18: nyan thos rnams ni mnyan par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-19: nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-20: bkres pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-21: gang yang sems can skom pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-22: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-25: thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-26: nyon mongs rnams ni yid mgu nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-27: khyab bdag de la gsol ba 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-28: chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-29: chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154a-30: dam tshig mchog la nyer gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-0: sems can rnams @154b la rjes brtser mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-1: de skad gsol nas thub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-2: sngags mchog rgyas par gsung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-3: ka la ping ka sgra dbyangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-4: rnga bo che dang sprin gyi sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-5: tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-6: tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-8: rkang med pa dang rkang mangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-9: rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-10: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-11: mdor na sems can don kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-12: bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-14: sems can la sogs 'dir lhag pa; ;mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-16: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-17: aa pra ti ha ta sha sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-21: ganydzo a'a n'a ya; sarba la hu la hu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-22: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-25: ya the bi tam sam b'a d'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-26: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:154b-27: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgya cher gsungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir nam mkha' thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi sprin gyis yongs su gang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis @155a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-1: rab tu g-yogs par snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-2: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i don du blang par bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-3: slar yang de nas langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-4: gtsug lag khang ngam gnas su 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-5: gang sus sngon ni yang dag bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-6: gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-7: song nas zlos pos phyogs de ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-8: lhung bzed de ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-9: de nas myur du nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-10: de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-11: lhung bzed sa la lo ma'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-12: dngul lam de bzhin gser nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-13: zangs sam shing shun dag kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-14: ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-15: ston la lha bshos phul nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-16: slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-18: sdug bsngal can la'ang ci nus sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-19: bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-20: kun nas nges par bza' ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-21: ha cang mang po sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-22: sngags shes 'dir ni gdung mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-23: kun nas rig pa ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-24: lto ba'i tshad tsam bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-25: gzhan pa'i zan ni rtag tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-26: bkres dang skom pas nyen pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-27: sngags don sgrub par mi nus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-28: ha cang nyung dang mang zos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-29: sngags don bsnyen par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-30: de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155a-31: sems can zas kyis gnas so zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-0: @155b lus can kun la gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-1: gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-2: lha dang lha min dri za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-3: klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-4: srin po yi dvags sha za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-5: 'byung po skar ma gza' dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-6: gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-7: de ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-8: rtag tu kha zas rags pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-9: khams kyi zas zhes grags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-10: sems can phra mo'i zas can spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-12: bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-13: gzugs ni spyod cing g-yo ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-14: gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-16: srid ba bar ma'i sems can yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-17: dri za bar ni rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-18: de bzhin 'dod khams sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-19: zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-20: 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-21: khams kyi zas ni za bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-22: de nyid phyir thub dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-23: sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-24: chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-25: gang de rnams ni rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-26: zlos po rtag tu brtson pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-27: zas kyi tshod ni rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-28: gang phyir rig pa bsnyen pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-29: zas 'di la ni rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-30: kun spyod ma nor dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-31: dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-32: zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-33: de yis dngos grub rnyed mi bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-34: dper na khur ni drang ba'i rgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-35: shing rta yun ring gnas don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:155b-36: shing rta'i mig ni sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-0: @156a *// byed; ;de bzhin sngags pa sngags rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-1: zas ni gnas ba'i ched du spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-2: lus ni gso ba'i don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-3: zlos po rtag tu gso bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-4: sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i don phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-5: byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-7: ji ltar mngon par sred ba'i bza' ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-8: de rnams su char 'bab bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-9: ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-10: skom pa rnams kyis btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu bo'i rgyun lta bu btung bar bya ba'ang yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-11: sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-12: skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-13: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar thob cing chim pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156a-14: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs su bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-0: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe rtog pa'i @156b rgyal po'i cho ga 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-2: skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-3: khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-4: dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-5: gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spron ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-6: de nas dkar gsum bza' ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-8: ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-9: lha bshos rgya chen po byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams kyi me sbar nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-11: mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-12: dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-13: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi che sbrin nag po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-14: rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-15: langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-16: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:156b-17: grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-1: nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te bud med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-2: 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-3: kye kye sems dpa' chen po longs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-4: grub po yin no zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-5: de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-6: de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-7: nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-8: 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab tu ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-9: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-10: de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-11: ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i rtsa mo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-13: mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157a-15: grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkram la gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-0: de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng @157b gi shing gi me sbar la thun gsum du padma dkar po'i me tog zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-2: mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rtsa ba'i rig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-4: nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-5: yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-6: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon gsum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i mchog gi gnang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-11: mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-14: longs spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-15: rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-17: mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-18: gang blangs kyang rung sta de mthun par gnang bar byed cing grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-19: sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-20: mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:157b-21: las kyi nyes pa rab tu sbags pa'ang yang dag par sbyong bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-1: pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-4: chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag la bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs pas gnas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rgyas par gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-5: bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-6: dong ka'i me tog tsandan dkar po dang bsres pa 'am; gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-7: sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-8: ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-9: ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-10: ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-11: ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-12: ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-13: sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158a-14: stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-0: de nas sgrub pa pos bcom @158b ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub te bkres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-1: skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-2: cho ga de nyid kyis yo byad kyi rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la yang dag par nan tan bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-3: gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-4: de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor na nan tan nges par sgrub par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-7: yo byad kyi khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-8: nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-9: sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-10: cho ga bshad pa la sems pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-11: sngags pa de tshe de phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-12: gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-13: zos nas yid ni dga' pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-14: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-15: lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-16: sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-17: mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-18: brtul zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-19: dud 'gro rnams la mthun byin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-20: 'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-21: lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-22: snum med zas dang dri bral gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-23: lhung bzed lhag mar thub pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-24: gang du slong ba'i snod du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-25: de ru zan ni mi bza' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-26: der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:158b-27: rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-2: autpa la las byung bas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-3: dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-4: sngags pas der ni mi bza' 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-5: gang yang sngags pas ku mu da //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-6: sla ksha au dum b'a ra las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-7: ba ti'i 'dab ma dang yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-8: cher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-9: a'a mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-10: de bzhin s'a ta la las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-11: s'a la'i 'dab ma shi ri sha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-12: byang chub shing las byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-13: gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-15: shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-16: shing de yi ni yal ga dang; ;n'a ga ge sar shing la'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-17: gang du nam yang bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-18: mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-19: thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-20: rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-21: sdigs pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-22: zas ni lo ma de rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-23: gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-24: sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-25: de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-26: shel dang rdo ba las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-27: de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-28: rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-29: lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-30: de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-31: stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-32: rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-0: lo ma gzhan dang @159b lha bshos 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-1: zlos pos de rnams spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-2: yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-3: sna tshogs bza' ba snum khur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-4: de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-5: sngags pas 'bad pas blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-6: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-7: de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-8: dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-9: lha bshos thams cad nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-10: zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-11: chung ngu tsam yang lus can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-12: sngags rnams de yis mi 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-13: kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-14: rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-15: rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-16: lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-17: de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-18: gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-19: snying rje snying rje'i las can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-20: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-21: rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-22: sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-23: zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-24: gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-25: zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-26: rang la byin pas kha zas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-27: cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-28: sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-29: de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-30: yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-31: zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-32: bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:159b-33: thub pa rnams kyis legs par bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-0: @160a *// sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-1: mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-2: bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-3: de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-4: sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-5: de nas zlos pos nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-6: de tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-7: de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-8: lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas; ;'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-9: de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-10: lus kun nye reg byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-11: thub pas sngags 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-12: na ma: sarba bud dh'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-13: a'a pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-19: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra h'um ja: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-20: sngags 'dis brlab pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-21: zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du byug nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-22: ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160a-26: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-0: 'phags @160b pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-3: 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-4: 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te 'di rnams las gzhan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-5: gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-6: nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-7: de nas yongs su zhi nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bklag par bya ste glegs bam brtul nas gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-8: mcho phran chen por 'jug pas song nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chul gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-10: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-12: aom sarba dushta stam bha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-13: n'a d'i bar dh'a ri ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-14: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-15: 'dis srung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-20: rab tu gdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-21: bgegs bcing ba la'ang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams cad yongs su 'chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-22: bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:160b-23: khrus kyi dus thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-2: rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-3: de nas las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-4: padma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-5: las rnams thams cad du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-6: de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye ma la sogs pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus byas te thams cad du las thams cad la srog chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-7: de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-8: gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-9: yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-10: chu'i nang du mchil ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-12: gci ba la sogs pa'ang dor bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-14: snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-15: sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste bdag med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-17: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-18: sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-19: tshor bas mngon par non pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161a-20: chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-1: rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-2: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-5: shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi chu na gnas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-6: lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-7: dang por re zhig padma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-8: padma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-10: rin po che beed'urya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-11: rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i padma'i ge sar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-12: shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-13: de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-14: padma r'a ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-15: de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa; ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-16: de'i stengs su bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-17: gser gyi mdog tu snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-18: kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:161b-19: tshad chen po nam mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-2: g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-3: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-4: padma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-6: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grva na 'khod de lus dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-7: g-yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-8: phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-13: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-15: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-16: nor bzang zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi g-yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsam par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-24: nye ba'i mu khyud brgyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-25: de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-27: 'phags pa moong+ga la gyi bu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162a-30: bha ra dhva dza bsod snyoms len dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-1: 'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-3: nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-4: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-5: de bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-6: byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-7: mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-8: man d'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-11: dh'a nu sk'a ri ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-13: aintra ba r'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-14: ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing 'phags pa nyan thos dang; rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-22: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:162b-23: de bzhin du gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-2: bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-3: mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin pas bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-5: phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-6: sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-7: nges par byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-8: de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-9: 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-10: 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-11: sngags pa rnams la phan don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-12: de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-13: sngags pa kun la phan don du; ;sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-14: de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-15: dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-16: thub pas dang por gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-17: gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-18: gsum par yang ni de las gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-19: dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-20: bar ma la ni de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-21: chung ngu la ni phran tshogs 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-22: thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-23: de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-24: thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163a-25: thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-0: de las gzhan yang @163b mkhas pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-1: bsam gtan rnam par bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-2: bsam gtan de la rab gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-4: ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-5: zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-6: sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-7: ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-8: chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-9: de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-10: gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-11: cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-12: de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-13: sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-14: rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-15: der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-16: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-17: grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-18: dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-19: cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-21: gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-22: rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-23: nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-26: de nas gsang sngags zlos pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-27: stan de las ni slar langs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-28: thag ring gnas su song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-29: phyi rol rlung gi rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-30: snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-31: bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-32: nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:163b-33: mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-1: zlos pos ni nam yang der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-2: don rnams bsam par mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-3: der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-4: sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-5: rab sngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-6: de tshe sa steng nyer 'dug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-7: dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-8: gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-9: sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-10: 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-11: rab tu 'dzag pa bdun blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-12: bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-13: gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-14: mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-15: snabs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-16: de nas 'bad pas nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-17: gnas la ring du song ba'i sar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-18: de bzhin sgra tsam song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-19: lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-20: de nas gzhan gyi ci 'dod bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-21: lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-22: chu dang g-yangs med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-23: de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-24: chu klung spangs shig ngos kyang spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-25: 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-26: gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-27: bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-28: rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-29: sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-30: zlos po dus ni shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-31: ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-32: de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164a-33: bas mthar de bzhin ba shang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-0: @164b gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-1: de ru lus ni ci bde bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-2: gnyis ka'ang gsang g-yogs sbas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-3: skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-4: gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-5: de bzhin kho nar thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-6: ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-7: bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-8: de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-9: gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-10: gsang sngags rgyal po thams cad sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-11: rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-12: skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-13: ma dang pha la gus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-14: gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-15: lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-16: gnas der yin gyi gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-17: nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-18: ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-19: sin dhu nar ma da bakshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-20: zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-21: k'a be r'a dang dbyangs can nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-22: chu klung chen po sh'i ta nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-23: 'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-24: stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-25: stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-26: byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-27: kha che dang ni rgya yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-28: bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-29: rgya nag che dang li yul nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-30: de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-31: byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-32: gang yang ri dang chu bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-33: bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-34: nas dang gro ni za ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:164b-35: gang du sems can snying rje ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-2: dpal gyi ri bo brag ri che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-3: lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-4: dpal ldan 'bras spung mchod rten ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-5: sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'jin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-6: der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-7: myur du las dang las rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-8: rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-10: gang du thub gtso zhi bar gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-11: der yang dngos grub blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-12: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-14: ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-15: lum bi'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-17: rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-18: bya rgod phung por ri der dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-19: de bzhin brag dang bsir ba'i tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-20: me tog ces bya'i grong mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-21: de bzhin rtag tu ka sha'i grong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-22: bcom brlags ka n+ya kub dzi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-23: sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-24: mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-25: rtag tu sa steng mi thi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-26: grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-27: gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-28: rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-29: de rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-30: 'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-31: grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165a-32: gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-0: 'o ma'am 'bab chu la bsten @165b pa; ;der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-1: bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-2: gnas ni bla gab med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-3: rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-4: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-5: sngags rnams rjes mthun las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-6: sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-7: sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-8: bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-9: sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-10: tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-11: 'byung po kun la phan par dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-12: sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-13: brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-14: gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can; ;kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-15: der ni bskal pa chen por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-16: dam tshig snang ba bral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-17: dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-18: byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-19: dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-20: mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-21: ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-22: rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-23: rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-24: mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-25: de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-26: log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-27: dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-28: log par lta ba smad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-29: de phyir rtag tu dad gyur nas; ;gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-30: bden par smra zhing chos shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-31: sems can rnams la rtag tu phan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:165b-32: sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-2: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-3: las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-4: las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-5: rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-6: bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-7: de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-8: bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-9: las don rtag tu bya ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-10: bya ba'i don du bya min gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-11: bya ba'i las la sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-12: 'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-13: bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-14: bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-19: thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-20: rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-21: yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-22: bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-23: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-24: de la grub pa yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-25: grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-26: grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-27: sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-28: sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-29: byed par 'dod pa de las te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-31: las min las ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-32: las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-33: sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-34: las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-35: brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166a-36: las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-0: bya ba ma brtsams @166b sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-2: sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-3: thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-4: gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-5: rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag sdom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-6: sgrub bo sngags ni kun shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-7: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-8: sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-9: lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-10: sngags kun nyid ni sgrub bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-11: rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-12: de ni ring por mi thogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-13: mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-14: 'byung po thams cad zhi don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-16: gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-18: de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-19: chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-20: de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-21: dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-22: de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-23: 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-24: sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-25: sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-26: tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-27: 'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-28: dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-29: rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-30: gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-31: dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-32: de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-33: tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:166b-34: lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-2: sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-4: gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-5: tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-6: sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-7: de nas sngags pas sngags bzlas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-10: de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-11: tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-12: tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-13: bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-14: mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba nyid; ;zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-15: sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-16: ji srid dus su brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-17: bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-18: der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-19: de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-20: de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do //
