K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-21: sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par gnas pa de de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa zad pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-22: las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te de bzhin du mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167a-24: tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-0: bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed cing skye ba brgyud pa @167b rnams su gang bar byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-1: sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-2: thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-3: yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-4: gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-5: rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen mdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-7: ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams dgu pa rtogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-8: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-9: byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-11: khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-12: sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-13: sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-14: gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-15: rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrubs thabs kyi cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:167b-16: sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-2: sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-7: bdag cag la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-8: dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-9: sems can thams cad la don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-10: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-12: sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-14: gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-15: sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-16: dang po re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-21: aom ku ru ku ru sarba aartha s'a dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-22: sarba dushta bi mo ha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-23: ga ga n'a ba lam be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-25: rig pa 'dis bgrang phreng thams cad la las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-29: rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-30: dang po bgrang phreng shing la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-31: lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168a-32: de yis mngon par sngags byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-0: brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung @168b ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-1: mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-2: der ni rmi lam brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-3: mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-4: mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-5: sngags pa la ni des smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-6: bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin longs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-7: sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-8: shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-9: mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-10: rmi lam du yang ma mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-11: sngags pas shing de bor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-12: de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-13: dang po ru raksha yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-14: de la gzhan pa dbang po'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-17: shing la 'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-18: grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-19: grogs po med par gyur na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-20: rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-21: steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-22: 'dzeg nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-23: de la rtag tu bag yod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-24: steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-25: steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-26: steng gi mchog gi dngos grub tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-27: gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-28: bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-30: srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-31: 'bras bu de rnams yang dag blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-32: nub kyi yal ga las thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-33: rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-34: byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-35: lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:168b-36: dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-2: lha dang lha min g-yul 'gyed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-3: mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-4: 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-5: 'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-6: 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-7: ma lus spyod pa byed pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-8: shar gyi phyogs su yal ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-10: de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-11: tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-12: rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-13: rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-14: gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-15: yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-16: sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-17: de na zlos pos 'bad pas spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-18: lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-19: 'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-20: phyogs der gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-21: srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-22: bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-23: de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-25: 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-26: lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-28: de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-29: blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-31: de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro; ;de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-32: bde nyid zlos pos der 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-33: lha min bu mos yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169a-34: de ni bskal par gnas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-0: bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun @169b blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-1: de nas zlos pos bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-2: lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-3: de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-4: de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-5: gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-6: de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-7: bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-8: brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-9: de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-10: der ni phreng ba dbugs par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-11: gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-12: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-13: sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-14: rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-15: brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-16: de nas de ni dag par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-17: padma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-18: bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-19: sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-20: brtul zhugs can gyis phreng thag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-21: sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-22: 'bras bu phra mo zlum par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-23: rtag tu srog chags bug med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-24: yan lag ma nyams ma smad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-25: mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-26: bu ga med cing gas pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-27: ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-28: de bzhin ru raksha dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-29: bo de tse dang ainta ksha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-30: 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-31: 'bras bu dam pa'am gang gi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-32: sngags pa mchog tu brtson pa yis; ;'bad pas bgrang phreng brgyu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-33: gser ram yang na dngul dag gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-34: nor bu shel las byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-35: mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:169b-36: byu ru yis kyang bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-2: gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-3: bgrang phreng bzang po bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-4: sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-5: ril bus bgrang phreng can dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-6: mnyam par bzhag ste srad bu brgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-7: gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-8: 'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-9: ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-10: zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-11: brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-12: lnga bcu 'di dag bar ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-13: sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-14: 'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-15: stong rtsa brgyad pa nyid bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-16: phreng ba 'di ni thu bo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-17: phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-18: sngags pas rtag tu brgyu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-19: de nas rgyus te sngags rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-20: phyi mo gsum ma ma gnyis nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-21: rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-22: de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-23: de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-24: phreng ba kun nas brgyur ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-25: de nas mtha' ru yang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-26: de la rim gyis dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-27: 'bad pas mdzes par dkri ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-28: sangs rgyas ma lus bzhugs par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-29: yongs su gsal bar byas de nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-30: dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-31: sbrul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-32: yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170a-33: mu tig do shal rnams mtshungs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-0: mgul rgyan rnam par sprul @170b pa'o; ;de nas 'bab chu dge ba'i mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-1: dri ma med la khrus byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-2: go rims ji bzhin khrus byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-3: chu yi gnas la ldang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-4: de bzhin brtson pas nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-5: bgrang phreng srad bu blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-6: ba yi rnam lngas rab byung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-7: sa yi phye mas rab bkrus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-8: gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-9: rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-10: rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang; ;tsandan dkar po gur gum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-11: 'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-13: ji lta'i gnas su song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-14: gang du ras ris bar pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-15: rgyal mchog thub pa'i gtso bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-16: sh'akya seng ge mi yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-17: ston pa'i gzugs brnyan de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-18: sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-19: mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-20: de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-21: de tshe de'i spyan snga ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-22: dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-23: son pa'am brgya yang gcig tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-24: brgyad dang bcas pa bzlas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-25: nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-26: bdun pa bskul ba phreng ba dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-27: snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-28: tshad nyid de dang mnyam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-29: de nas phreng ba yongs su bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-30: mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-31: ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-32: sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-33: rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-34: dge ba'i rmi lam mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:170b-35: rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-2: sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-3: gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-5: nges bar de yi cho ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-6: dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-7: gzugs brnyan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-8: gal te rmi lam de mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-9: phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-10: sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-11: de bzhin gdon mi za bar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-13: bcu pa bgrang phreng gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-14: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171a-16: khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-0: sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod de me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas @171b par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-1: rig pa'i sngags kyi tshogs gsang chen ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-3: aom tishtha ha ri ping+ga le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-4: hi raksha di hi da d'a 'di p'a ya h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-5: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-7: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan gcig bzlas pas mar gyi sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya ste me lha spyan drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-8: de bzhin du rab tu sbyar te zhi ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-10: drag po'i las rnams la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-11: mya ngan med shing zhi don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-12: khyad par brlan dang bcas pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-13: mtho gang ngam ni khru gang tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-14: sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-15: snam pa'i rnam pa rab tu shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-16: cho ga 'di ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-17: bu ga med cing ser ga med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-18: de bzhin ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-19: ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-20: kha dog nag po spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-21: srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-22: bu ga med pa'ang yang dag sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-23: gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-24: tha ma'i chos kyang spangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-25: de rnams skam dang rlon pa'ang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-26: de yi tshe yang brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-27: ma rul yon po min nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-28: shin tu ring ba'ang spang par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-29: de nas me thab byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:171b-30: kun nas zur ni bzhi pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-2: khru gsum khru ni gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-3: de bzhin nyid du khru gcig ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-4: rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-5: bye mas legs par sbyar ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-6: de nas pad 'dra'i kha khyer ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-8: yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-10: zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can; ;'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-11: mngon spyod la ni sa dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-12: rdo rje bya zhing rtse gnyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-13: rtse mo gsum du bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-14: me thab rgya la khru gnyis re //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-15: gtsang ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-16: chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-17: bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-18: dur khrod khang pa stong pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-19: sbyin sreg legs par brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-20: de bzhin ri bo'i rtse nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-21: rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-22: de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-23: gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-24: gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-25: sbyin sreg las ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-26: de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-27: khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-28: ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-29: der ni sngags shes khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-30: sbyin sreg gi ni las bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-31: gnas de nyid du rab gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-32: myur du dngos grub the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172a-33: shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-0: zhi ba can @172b dang rgyas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-1: lho ru drag po'i las rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-2: de ni sngags pas spang par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-3: shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-4: rgyas pa can yang byang du phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-5: de yis sngags ni dus rtag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-6: rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-7: bil ba aarga sla ksha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-8: n+ya gro dha yis rgyas las bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-9: mngon spyod shing ni skam po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-10: tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-11: de dag thams cad spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-12: thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-13: zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-14: rlon pa'i shing gis rab tu shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-15: de bzhin drag las la shing skam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-16: tshva ba skyur dang rnon po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-17: yam shing de rnams med na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-18: shing la de rnams su brtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-19: rtse mo gnyis su brtag pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-20: sngo dang snum dang 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-21: rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-22: rnam pa de lta'i ku sha yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-23: kho ra yug tu ku sha ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-24: rtag tu 'gram par bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-25: zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-26: mar gad dang ni mtshungs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-27: de bzhin rtag tu skam po'i rtsis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-28: sdig pa'i las ni bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-29: 'dir ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-30: dri med chu ni dag pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-31: rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-32: de nas kun nas bsang gtor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-33: g-yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-34: brtson pas me ni sbar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-35: cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:172b-36: gtsang ma'i rtsva yi rtsa ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-2: de nas khu tshur brtsams byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-3: 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-4: kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-5: rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-6: sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-7: gos gzhan gyis kyang lag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-8: rlung gis nye bar gzhom pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-9: mngon par dga' bas ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-10: gtsang ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-11: nor bus kyang ni rlung yang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-13: me ni mnyam par byas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-14: sngags shes pas ni me sber bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-15: sbyin sreg don du mnyam gzhag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-16: de nas g-yas pa min pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-17: der ni bsang gtor byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-18: der ni ba yi mar gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-19: sreg blugs gsum ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-20: de nas kyang ni phyag bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-21: sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-22: rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-24: de tshe me yi snying po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-25: sngags ni lan brgya bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-26: brtson ldan dri zhim me tog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-27: rtag tu me ni spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-28: sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-29: gnas la mkhas pas gdan dang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-30: sngags des dbul zhing gzhan gyis min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-31: zho dang mang du bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-32: sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173a-33: de las lan gsum sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-0: rgyas pa'i don du @173b sngags dang las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-1: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-2: 'khrugs pa der ni nges sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-3: skom pa tshim par bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-4: zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-5: de la gsang sngags rig pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-6: lha yi gzugs ni dga' ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-7: mngon spyod las la thun mong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-8: nges par 'byung ba'i lha rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-9: gzhan pa'i gzugs ni blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-10: rim pa ji bzhin me thab 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-11: ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-12: mar la lan bdun yongs bzlas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-13: de tshe spyan drang rnam pa der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-14: ji ltar slar yang spyan drangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-15: lhag par gnas pas gnyis ka gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-16: yam shing rdzas dang sbres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-17: mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-18: de bzhin nyid du zho bsres pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-19: stong ngam 'bum gyi tshad dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-20: brgyad dang brgyad du'ang rtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-21: de bzhin sngags pas rig pa bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-22: lan re bzlas shing me la dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-23: 'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-24: de bzhin me lce gcig gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-25: zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-26: du ba med la'ang rgyas pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-27: du bcas drag po'i las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-28: rgyal bas smad cing spangs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-29: me ni kha dog ldan gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-30: sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-31: zhi ba can la kha dog dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-32: rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:173b-33: gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-0: @174a *// de bzhin rtag tu kha dog dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-1: rgyas pa can gyis dngos grub 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-2: nag po du ba'i kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-3: ser skya yang ni sdig pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-4: kha dog rnam gsum rab bsgyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-5: dngos grub rnam gsum 'di dag yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-6: gzhan ba'i kha dog sprin mdog gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-7: slar yang brtan pa'i sa steng der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-8: sngags pa de la dngos grub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-10: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-11: me ni 'bar ba de mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-12: slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-13: phyir zhing bzlas pa bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-14: gal te sngags ni grub gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-15: las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-16: slar yang sbyin sreg la rab 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-17: gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-18: me yi sngags ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-19: sngar ni rab tu brtags pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-21: spyan drang ba yi las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-22: de nyid du ni las rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-23: de nyid kyis ni bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-24: me yi spyod pa de bzhin gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-25: ras ris kyi ni spyan sngar brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-27: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-28: rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-29: thams cad de nyid du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-30: gzhan pa'i las ni bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174a-31: sdig pa'i las ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-0: gang du rgyal @174b mchog gis smod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-2: ldang dang 'khor los bsgyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-4: de bzhin mngon shes lnga dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-6: rtag tu ras ris la brtson shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-7: sbyin sreg las la mkhas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-9: yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-10: sa bla'i lha dang gnod sbyin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-11: rtag tu gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-12: rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-13: yul dang yang na grong nyid dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-14: rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-15: sems can thams cad dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-17: sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-19: sa bcu la ni yang dag brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-20: sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-21: sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-22: sde dpon bdag po de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-23: khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-24: 'byung po thams cad kun dbang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-25: de bzhin nyid du mi bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-26: 'byung po thams cad dbang don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-27: yang na sa steng rgyal po mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-28: de bzhin rtag tu las kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-29: thams cad sbyin sreg gis ni bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-30: kun nas kun tu brtson ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-31: las kun yang dag bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:174b-32: de ched nges par bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-2: bar ma nyid kyang sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-3: yang na chung du nyid kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-4: de bzhin du ni rdzas rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-5: de bzhin slar yang 'grub par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-6: sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-7: 'bras bur bcas pas dngos grub mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-8: phyag rgya bcing dang rig pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-9: las rnams kun la rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-10: sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-11: bdag nyid srung bar byas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-12: de nas sngags 'di bklag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-13: 'di ni rtag tu las rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-14: bdun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-15: na ma: sarba bud dha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-16: aa pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ga t'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-19: ru ru bi shva sambha be sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-20: sngags kyi rab sbyor 'di yis ni; ;slar yang shing la bzlas bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-21: gnyis bzlas pa 'am bdun bzlas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-22: sngags rig des mer sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-23: me tog bdug pa dri dag gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-24: mdor na thams cad nyid kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-25: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i chu rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-26: 'di nyid kyis ni bsang gtor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-27: de nas las rnams thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-28: rgyu 'dis cho ga brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-29: lha rnams dag ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-30: snga ma'i rab sbyor nyid kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-31: sngar gyi skra can ma bcings nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-32: phyag rgya chen mod grags ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175a-33: bsrung ba byas par gyur de nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-0: @175b zlos pos rig pa gcig gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-1: las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-2: dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-3: gal te dge mtshan mthong gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-4: rtag tu dge ba'i sgra grags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-5: de la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-7: dang po las la rab sbyor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-10: dngos grub de la brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-11: rgyal ba'i sgra 'om po ta ha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-12: rnga bo cha yi sgra grags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-13: brtson ldan kun 'gro'i dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-14: sbyin sreg las la yang dag brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-15: gzhan yang dge mtshan dpal dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-16: 'dab chags sgra ni bzang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dbyangs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-18: rgyal bas bsngags shing rab bsngags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-19: bkra shis bzang po yid 'ong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs sgra dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-21: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-22: bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-23: de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-24: mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-25: kha dog rnam pa du ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-26: rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-27: dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:175b-28: mthong nas de rnams blta ba la; ;gsang sngags spyod tshul sna tshogs 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgro @176a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-1: ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-2: bgrang phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-3: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-5: khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang chen yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-6: sngags thams cad kyis sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dam tshig shes pa; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-7: chos kyi sprin la mthun par rab tu zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi mnga' bdag ches gtso bor gyur pa sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-15: mi rnams kyi nang nas skyes bu'i khyu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-0: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing gtso bo dam pa yin te de bzhin gshegs pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med @176b pa rnams kyis sngar gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi mchog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-2: kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod cing rab tu bsngags la sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-4: sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-6: re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-7: bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-8: gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang zhing sems can thams cad kyi yid kyang tshim par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa'i sems can kun gang gis kyang mi thub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-10: 'od chen po yang dag par byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-11: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-12: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:176b-14: rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-0: byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu snang bar byas te rig pa'i @177a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-1: rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-2: rig pa'i 'jigs ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas mdun du bdar nas mchod bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-3: 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-4: rig pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' bsgyur bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la bzhugs pa rnams kyi rim gro byed bzhin pa'i blo gros chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-8: nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad kyi lha'i rin po ches nye bar mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-9: nor bu rin po che'i don du byas pas thams cad bkang ste mdzes pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'od gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-10: sprul pa po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'byin bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-11: yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-12: 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'phro bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-13: bar snang gi phyogs su gnas par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la nye bar phyogs nas lta bar byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-14: de thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la kun tu lta zhing snang bar byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas yi ge gcig pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-2: bhrum/ bka' stsal pa tsam nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-3: sems can gang la la bkras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-4: skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skyes pa med par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-6: sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-7: sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-8: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad yang dag par srung ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-9: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-10: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba kun tu bstan pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu kun tu bstan pa'i phyir rig pa'i rgyal po'i rtog pa 'di bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-14: gang la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sgrub par 'dod na de'i don gyi phyir cho ga 'dir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-15: dang po re zhig ma brtags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:177b-17: mi za bar brjod pa'i mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-1: rab tu brtson pas 'byung po thams cad la rab tu brtse bas gzhan sdug na bdag sdug par legs par mthong bar byed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-2: dbang po rnams legs par bzung ste rnam par g-yeng ba dang bcas pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-4: ser sna lag pa la 'jug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-5: rab tu dgag pa'i don du rdzas yongs su 'jal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-6: lha gzhan la phyag mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-7: dkon mchog gsum la dang ba shin tu mngon du gyur pa'i dad pa'i nor gyis bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la mngon par dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-8: snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-9: legs par brtson pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing mdor na byang chub chen por smon lam btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-10: rgyun tu sgrub par 'gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-11: de la dang po re zhig bris sku'i cho gar 'gyur te rgyal po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-12: ma nyams pa'i ras lhag ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-13: kha dog can la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-14: gser ltar ser ba'i gzugs brnyan chos ston par byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-15: seng+ge'i khri la nye bar bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178a-16: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-0: lus thams cad kun nas 'bar ba'i do shal @178b can bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-1: steng du ri'i rtse mor glog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor 'od zer las byung bzhin pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-7: dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-8: lag na spos phor thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-9: bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-10: ras ris rnam pa de ltar bur bris la sgrub pa po'ang dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te skye bo dang bral ba'i dben par rgyun chen por ras ris bzhugs su gsol la rnam pa thams cad du lus dang; ngag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-11: sems yongs su skyo ba med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-15: slong mo'i bsod snyoms kyi bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-20: aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-21: sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-22: sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:178b-23: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman srang gcig blangs nas bram ze'i bu mos pa byung lnga kha byang du bltas pa 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-1: med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas la padma'i 'dab mas bkab la skam du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga bzhin du me sbar nas stong phrag rdzogs par sbyin sreg bya ste de nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po rgya chen por byas te phyogs brgyad du p'a la sha'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-4: mar la btags pa'i rnam par 'dren pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-5: de nas phyogs bzhi rnams su dkyil 'khor byas nas phyogs skyong ba rnams bzhag ste dkyil 'khor gnyis par rab tu sad par byed pa lag tu yungs kar thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-6: dkyil 'khor gsum par legs par grogs bzang po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-7: grogs med kyang rung ste sngags kyi mchod pa chen po byas nas bsrung ba bya ste kha shar du phyogs pas nye bar 'dug la ku sha bting zhing bkram nas aa shvadtha'i 'dab ma gsum gyi steng nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-8: bzhis 'og nas g-yogs te lag pas mnan la ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-10: rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179a-11: dang po dngos grub ni 'dis rgyal ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyan te gang mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-0: gang rnams mthong ba de rnams thams cad dbang du @179b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-1: gnyis pa'i dngos grub ni glang po che dgu'i stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-4: glang po che bcu 'phrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi zil gyis gnon pa ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-6: 'bar zhing 'char ba'i nyi ma dang 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-7: lus rin po ches brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-8: bar gyi bskal par gnas shing gzhan 'dren par byed pa; rig pa 'dzin pa zil gyis mi non pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-10: rlung gi lam bdun du rnam par rgyu bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-11: rna ba'i mig sman bsten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-12: ldong ros lag pa'ang dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-13: de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas sor bcu drug pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i rnam pa bya'o; ;zlum skor du khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas de'i spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rdo rje de nyid la nges par sems pas lta bzhin pa dang ldan pas rdo rje blangs te dur khrod du 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-14: shar du rgyun 'bab pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:179b-15: chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ba byung lngas zlum skor bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-0: zlum skor byas nas khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas de'i @180a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-1: spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-2: de nas dur khrod du ras ris de'i drung du rdo rje bzhag ste de'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan la ji srid du gong bu'i 'og gi khung bur ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-3: de nas khrus byas nas de nyid du lag pas rdo rje blangs nas rab tu 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-4: bslangs pa'i bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas nye bar mchod de khrus byas nas rdo rje de nyid la dur khrod kyi thal ba ji srid spags par so sor gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-5: cho ga 'dis dur khrod kyi sha la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-6: mthar mtshan mo gsum du cho ga bzhin du gtor ma'i mchod pa dbul bar byas nas bdag nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-7: grogs bzang po la bsrung ba byas te lag pa gnyis kyis mnan te ji srid du dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-8: dngos grub dang po la gang bltas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-9: gang gis mthong ba de rnams rab tu dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-10: gnyis pa ras ris kyi sa'i rdul phyis pa tsam gyis mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-11: glang po che stong phrag dgu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180a-16: rnam par snang par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-1: gsum pa la ni nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-2: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-3: rdo rje'i lag par rnam par rgyu ste de bzhin du padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-4: dgra sta lag pa'i chogs kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-5: de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na sngon du bsnyen pa byas te lor skyes pa'i sdigs mdzub kyi sor mo blangs sngar gyi chogs mchod rten byas te dur khrod du mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas kha shar du phyogs pas rab tu zhugs la de srid du sor mongs par rig bya ston pas mnan nas rdo rje las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-6: nyin mo nam mkha'i rlung la bsrung ba bya zhing mtshan mo gnyid mi log par tho rangs ji srid du sor mo rnams dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-7: bkug pa'i gnas der mtshan mo gsum du smyur bar gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-8: ba dang be'u rgyud mtshungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:180b-9: grags pa dang ldan pa'i 'o ma blangs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tsandan gyi mandal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181a-0: mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas sa'i snod du 'o ma blug par bya zhing thal bas kyang dkyil 'khor bcings la tho rangs khrus byas nas sngar 'di nyid kyis nges par bsrubs pa'i mar gsar blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te @181a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181a-1: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags nas ma reg pa zos nas mthong ba zhes bya ste 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181a-2: grol bar 'dod na gnas la phan pa'i dri thams cad la sogs pa la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas rang nyid sngags zlos shing brtag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181a-3: de nas gzugs brnyan byas nas aa shvadtha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid du rang gis rig pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181a-4: de nas phye mar byas nas phye ma des kun tu rig pa de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;cho ga 'di nyid kyis n'a ga ge sar gyi phye ma la gzugs brnyan byas te bdug pa'i kham phor brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang la rjes su sems pa de dbang du byed do; ;cho ga 'di nyid kyis aa b'a ma rga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181a-5: nor 'dod na ba lang gi gnas su song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis lag pas ma bzos ba'i mchod rten byas la cho ga bzhin du mchod nas gu gul bsregs te stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-0: ba lang stong @181b ngam; nor rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-1: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-2: sbrang rtsi sogs bsreg cing stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-3: grong bcu gnyis kyis bskor brnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-4: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsandan gyis btags pa'i padma'i gdan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-5: lha bshos stong phrag brgya dbul te yul gyi dpon po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya dbul te gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-7: cho ga 'di nyid kyis n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog stong phrag brgyar dbul bar bya ste ras bcos bu'i gos stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-8: de bzhin du me tog thams cad 'dod pa'i cho ga thams cad dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs nas zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum skor byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na dang po gos bdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-9: mdor na rigs dang bcas pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-10: mchod rten byas nas shing aa dhi ba la dza la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-12: mar la btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:181b-13: gang ston pa'i bu mo des sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-0: s'a la'i rgyab nas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la yungs mar @182a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-1: gyis 'di bkang nas lcags kyi thur mas pug ste tsha ba'i til mar gyis byugs te dur khrod du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-2: lus gcig pa'i bud med dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-4: gnyis pa la rje rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-6: gsum pa la dge slong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-7: bram ze ma'o zhes te mdor na ma bsgrubs par yang las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-8: gi wang la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas khyad par du byas nas gang mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-9: gang rnams mthong ba de thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-10: de bzhin du mig sman gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-11: tho rangs langs nas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chus bde bar khrus byas na gang la bltas pa de sbyin par byed cing de 'bangs su'ang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-12: de bzhin du til mar so la ma reg par bza' bas 'dod pas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas 'thungs na don du ma gnyer bar yang bza' ba rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-13: rgyal po'i khab du zhugs nas chos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu yongs su bzlas nas lag pa g-yon pas mdud pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182a-14: rgyab tu mi lta bar song na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-0: chom rkun gyi nang du song bas kun tu 'phrog par bya ba nyid la bzlas @182b pas gtsang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-2: 'bugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-4: k'a ra bi ra dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-6: k'a ba rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g-yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na steng du langs par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-7: rims gzhom par 'dod na gi ri kang+na ka ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na nyi ma bdun gyis sha za ba'i rims nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-8: seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-9: thal ba la lan bdun bzlas pas pha rol gyi sngags rnams 'ching bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-10: chu la lan gcig bzlas pas grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-11: de lta bu la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-12: de'ang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-14: 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa zhes bya ba yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-15: de ni rigs kyi bdag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub thabs kyi cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-17: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gsang chen du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:182b-18: sgrub pa pos gdon mi za ba kho nar dran par bya ba ste de sems dpa' chen po khyod la bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-0: @183a *// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa'i don du rigs kyi bdag po gsung du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-2: 'dod pa phun sum tshogs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdul mun rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-4: chags pas mngon par zhi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-5: byang chub nges 'byin sdig pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-6: kun tu gzigs pa'i zla ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-8: srid pa'i sa bon rnam 'joms par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-9: phyag 'tshal mchod de khyod la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-10: bshad bya gal te 'byung bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-13: shve te shve tem ge shve bhu dze shve ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-14: ma lye ra lam kri te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-15: dza ye bi dza ye aa dzi te aa pa r'a dzi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-16: dran pa nyid las 'di'i sngags kyi dngos grub myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-17: de la 'di'i sngags ni tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos gtsang mar gyur pa lan bdun byas chu bor zhugs shing thal mo sbyar te yongs su bzlas nas shar du mngon par phyogs pas gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183a-18: bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-0: snying gar mthe bong byin nas lan gcig bzlas na lha rnams kyis @183b byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-1: bdag nyid rnam par dge par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-2: de'i phyag rgya'ang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-3: bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-4: snying gar mthe bong byin nas lan gcig bzlas na lha rnams kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-5: bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-6: de'i phyag rgya'ang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-7: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te mnyams pa'i ras skra dang bral ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-9: ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-11: stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-12: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-14: phyag na bya ma bum thogs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-15: padma dkar po'i 'dab ma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-16: g-yon gyi gzhogs su lha mo 'phags ma dkar mo chen mo seng+ge'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-19: sgrub pa po ni sngon bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-20: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-21: nas zan bza' zhing bris sku'i spyan sngar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:183b-22: dri zhim po'i me tog lag pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-1: rig pa 'dzin pas de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-5: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ke ti shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-14: su ru me karma s'a dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-19: aa gatstsha sh'i ghra de be dante sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-25: hu hu hu ra hu mah'a me de sva re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-28: me gha bi tra te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-31: tu tu tu tu tu ru mah'a tu ru ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-34: mar me bdun gyi phreng ba gnas pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-36: mar la btags pa'i padma'i sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag bdun de srid par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-37: rang nyid 'gul ba dang; 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-38: rang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-39: cho ga 'di nyid kyis bil ba'i yam shing gis stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de yang dag par rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184a-40: gang+g'a'i klung gi 'gram du nye bar gnod pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-0: skye bo dang bral bar @184b bye ma la mchod rten byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-2: bdug spos la sogs pa phul te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-3: nyi ma so sor re re zhing mchod rten bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-5: le'u rab 'byams bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so;; ;;de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis gzigs nas yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-6: de nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-8: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-12: bi ma le bi ma le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-16: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-19: s'a dh'a ya s'a dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-28: bo dhi satv'a sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-29: bi pu la ma ti sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-30: badzra p'a ni sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-31: sa tya b'a ti sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:184b-34: bhu ba bhu ba bhu ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-0: @185a *// ma tha ma tha ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-4: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-13: 'jigs pa thams cad bklags pa tsam gyis sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-14: 'di las gzhan yang sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-16: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-19: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-24: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-25: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-28: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:185a-30: shve te sa ma ye tye tha /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-10: mthar zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ka ra b'i ra'i me tog zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-12: mar la btags pa rnams kyis stong phrag brgyad dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya ste de lta bu'i nyi ma gsum du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-13: de nas nyi ma gsum pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ji skad brjod pa'i cho gas bcu gnyis yongs su 'gyur ba'i kham phor zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-15: 'o thug kham phor bcu ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ma byung gi bar de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-16: lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-18: rnga bo che rnams kyang sgra sgrogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-21: de nas grub pa yin te sa thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190a-22: gang mngon par 'dod kyang rung ste thams cad thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags @190b ma sgrol ma'i yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i rtsa ba'i rtog par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can rjes su gzung ba'i ched du slar yang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po de nyid sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por skye bo dbul bo rjes su gzung ba'i ched du dkar mo chen mo'i rig pa bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-2: de la 'di rnams ni don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-4: na ma a'ary'a aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-7: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-8: krishn'a dzi nam ba ra dha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-10: tiksham padma aa sa na stham aa bha ya pra da /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-12: bh'a sha sva dzdza ta ma ku ta dha ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-13: noo padma barna a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'i ma ham sa ra nam pra ba tya; tadya th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-14: shve ti bi dza ye shve ta bstra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-16: shve ta padma aa lam k'irta dza ye bi dzi ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-19: aam shu ma bha ya pra te she tam tsa ga ga na shuddham shve tam bidy'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-20: sa ma pra sa ma pra bhe shve ta bhya:bha ba s+ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-21: shukl'am shu ram bha b'anta re panda re panda ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-22: pa t'a pa t'a ya ra ra ra ra ra ya bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:190b-23: pa ri kli ba le ba re b'a ra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-0: @191a *// 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa'i dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo ste las thams cad byed ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-1: dbul ba dang nad rab tu zhi bar byed ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-2: don thams cad sgrub par byed ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-3: don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed ma ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-5: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la byang chub tu sems bskyed pas rtag tu dran par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-6: mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-7: skye bo yongs su skyob par byed par 'gyur zhing skye bo thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-8: de nas 'di yi cho ga ni sngar brjod pa'i cho gas khru bcu pa'i ras byed du bcug nas kha tshor bcad pa la tsandan gyi khu bas mnan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-9: kha dog ma 'dres pas dri'i khu bas snur bas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-10: ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-11: phyag na ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-12: phyag g-yas kyis padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-13: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-16: phreng ba dkar po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-17: padma'i phreng ba bcu drug rnams kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191a-18: thams cad dkar po rnams kyis thams cad dkar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-0: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug 'og tu bri bar @191b bya'o; ;'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po rnams phyogs 'khor rnams su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-1: sa'i lha mo 'di bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-2: phyag g-yas kyi tsam goo ta ka thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi gtsug gi cha la de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i phal po che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-4: g-yon du de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa g-yon pas chos gos bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-5: gser mdog phyag nas 'od zer 'phro bar byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba can rnam par bkra ba'i rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-7: sgrub pa po'ang g-yas phyogs su cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-8: rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-10: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-13: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-15: sve te sve te sve te sve te bhu dze pa r'a kra me bi dza ya bi tse phyu te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-16: dri dkar po'i chus dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-18: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-21: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-22: na mo mah'a svee t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-23: sve ta gandha bi shuddha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-26: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:191b-27: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-2: na mo mah'a svee t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-4: ti dzye hi pa re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-6: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-7: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-10: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-11: na mo mah'a sve t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-13: dhu pa pa ra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-14: dkar po bsres pa dang lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-16: na mo a'arya aa ba lo ke te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-19: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-20: na mo mah'a sve ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-21: ba la b'irya pra ba ra ba ra shu kllam shukllo da na bar pri y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-22: ba ra ba ra ba ra ba ra shukle shukle shukle sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-23: gtor ma'i sngags te lhag ma rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-27: phreng ba nyid dkar po'i rnam pa zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-29: mar la btags pa rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192a-30: dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du til mar la stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-0: rig pa 'dzin pa gos dkar po bgos te ts'a ru'i ston mo bza' zhing mchod phyir thogs dkar po 'chang ba ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas sbyin sreg la sogs @192b ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-1: mchod pa chen po byas nas nyin mtshan du gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-2: srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-3: lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra dbyangs thogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-4: sa rab tu g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-5: nam mkha' la me tog gi char dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-6: ras ris las kyang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;bar skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'byon te dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-8: dud 'gro rnams skad cig de la zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-9: byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung bar gyur te ci 'dod pa de rnams sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-11: rig pa 'dzin pa de nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-13: rgyal srid chen por lus yongs su rje ba nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-19: mngon par shes pa lnga'ang rung ste gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:192b-20: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po dkar mo chen mo'i rtog pa yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems @193a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-1: dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs par byas nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rjes su son pa po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-2: de la 'di rnams ni grub pa'i sngags kyi cho ga rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-4: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-7: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-8: bi mukti tse ta p'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-14: dharmma de sha ha n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-15: du:kha bi sho dha n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-16: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-19: aartta ba ri dra na hri da ya m'a dha yi shya mi mi ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-21: la be aa lam be lamba pra mukta lamba sthi re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-24: k'a ru ne; k'a ru ne ya ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-25: bo mu ne ku ru n'andha hri da ye k'a ru nanhra na ma:tu te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-27: sh'a ne ka ya bi bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-28: sta ta sh'anta pra bh'a te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-29: ni tyam bam ga ba tya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-31: su ru su ru; a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha bha ga b'a na ma ma ba ram d'i sya si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193a-32: du khi t'a n'a ma sa ra dri ni ka ram sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-0: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa sems can thams cad mi 'gro bar byed @193b pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dran pa tsam gyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-1: nyam thag pa rnams yongs su skyob par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-2: ngan 'gro rnam par zlog par byed pa bklags pas grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-4: 'jigs pa thams cad la dran pa tsam gyis 'di'i grogs brgyad srung ba la sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-5: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjod par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-7: yongs su 'jug par byed pa de nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-8: dbul por gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu gang la la byang chub tu sems bskyed de klog par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-11: sems la rjes su chags par byed pa'ang de shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro; ;de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon pa bri bar bya ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-12: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa; sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-14: zla ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-15: 'jigs pa brgyad po thams cad skyob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-16: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-17: mchod phyir thogs dkar po can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:193b-18: sgrub pa po sngar bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-0: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ras ris @194a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-1: bris nas mchod pa chen po bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-6: gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di dus ma yin par gzhol long la gnas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste byams pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyis rjes su son pas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-7: de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de thams cad dang; las phran tshegs la sogs pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-9: ku shas byabs pas rims nyin gcig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-11: nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-12: sngags bzlas pa nyid me tog la yongs su bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-13: mdor na byabs pas nad thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-14: 'di'i sgrub thabs su gyur pa ni ras ris sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194a-15: mthar mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas par gnas pas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma dbul te gtor ma ni dkar gsum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-0: mchod pa'i cho @194b ga byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan mar gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-1: ras ris rab tu 'gul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-2: mar me rtse mo 'phel nas thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-3: ma grub na yul rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-4: mi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-5: bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-6: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-7: 'ching ba thams cad gcod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-8: yang na dran pas 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal por sems can thams cad rjes su son par byed ba po zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-10: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bcom ldan 'das ma'i yang rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-11: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-12: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-15: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:194b-16: pra dzva li ta hasta ka manda lu pri y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-1: su ra sya aa mri ta aa pra ti hee ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-2: be be tsa tsa re tsartha re be be ru ru be ru ru dhve the the /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-5: gu gu me gha ne gha na gha ne; aa bri ta ha ste bud dha satyam dharme sadyam sam bha sa tyam au pa ri satye na bha ga b'an sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-10: padma su tri tishtha ta tsa ra n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-11: sarba bha ya da da sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-12: a'arya aa mi t'a bha sa m'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-13: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-14: gser 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-15: sangs rgyas du mas rjes su gnang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-16: gser bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa /
