K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-17: bklags pas grub pa gnod sbyin thams cad las grol bar byed cing 'pho bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-18: bzlas pa tsam gyis nad sel bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-19: de nas 'di'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-20: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-21: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-22: phyag g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-23: padma'i phreng bas so sor brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-24: ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195a-27: zhabs gnyis padma la gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-0: sgrub pa @195b po'ang spos phor lag na thogs pa ste sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-1: de lta bu'i ras ris kyi cho ga byas nas sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas bar bya'o na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-2: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-6: shu tsi durba tse aa pra de shu tsi ni pra bhu te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-7: nye bar byug pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-9: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-16: na mo ratna tra y'a sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-17: na ma a'arya aa a lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-20: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-22: bidy'a tsantra tsa le tsa le sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-23: me tog gi sngags so; ;na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-24: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-27: padma shr'i ya ba ra ba ri le sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-29: na moo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-30: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ke te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-33: aa mri te aa mri te ga hva re su mu khe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-35: de ltar snga ma bzhin du byas te aa ga ru'i sbyin sreg gis gang 'dod pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:195b-36: tsandan gyi sbyin sreg gis 'gugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-0: sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis skye bo thams cad dga' bar @196a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-2: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho gas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par byas te ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-3: mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas par rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu rlung gi 'gram mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-4: chu gling du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa'i cho ga bya ste srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-6: mar me'i rtse mo mngon par 'phel lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-7: nam mkha' la me tog gi char 'bab bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-8: 'brug gi sgra thos pa'ang rung ste ras ris 'gul bas ni rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-9: mar me 'phel na grong gi rje bor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-10: me tog babs na yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-11: 'brug gi sgras grong bcu drug so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-13: yo byad thams cad yang dag par 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196a-14: nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gser 'od ces bya ba'i @196b rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mthu yang dag par bstan pa'i ched du sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yid la byas nas bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-3: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya; bo dhi satv'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-5: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-7: sa t'a sa t'a sa ra sa r'a ni shud dha bi tri mu khe bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-8: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa rig pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po chen po ste gang la klog par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-9: zlos par byed pa des sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis la phyag byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-10: 'di rtag tu bzlas pas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-11: skye ba brgya phrag bcu gnyis su skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-12: dus thams cad du mngon bar shes pa lnga dang thun mtshams gsum dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:196b-14: sha za la sogs pa rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-0: srin po lus la 'pho bar mi 'gyur @197a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-1: te bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang de ltar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-2: 'di'i ras ris kyi cho ga ni ma nyams pa'i ras sngar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun nas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-3: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa dkar po phyag na padma ste g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa g-yon pa'i phyag gis padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-4: de'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-5: gser mdog mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di rnams kun nas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-21: de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas sngar gsungs pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197a-24: bdug pa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-0: gang byed pa la gcig tu dpa' bas @197b 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-1: de nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mig sman nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-3: gi wang yang ste stong du bzlas pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste srod nas brtsams te ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-5: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-6: dro bar byed bzhin pas ni thig le byas na thams cad dbang du byed do; ;du ba 'thul bzhin pas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-8: ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:197b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom bzhin pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das @198a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-1: ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'di bka' stsal to; ;na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-2: na mo a'a mi t'a bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-3: na mo na ma: sarba bo dhi ta bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-4: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a y'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-7: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya; tadya th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-8: manda bi sh'a la k'i rti sarba bidy'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-9: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste sangs rgyas du mas rjes su gnang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-10: byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag par bskyed pa 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-11: dbul po gang la la bsgrub par bya ba ras ris zla ba'i nang du de'i 'byor pa rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-12: dbul po thob pa gang la la rig pa 'di don chen po sbyin pas mchod pa bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-13: 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'byor pa sgrub par byed pa'i las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-14: de nas sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngar brjod pa'i ras ris bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198a-15: dgu pa nas brtsams te dkar po'i zla ba nya la yongs su rdzogs par byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-0: padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs @198b pa ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-1: 'phags pa 'od dpag med gnyis pa steng du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-2: rang gzhogs su sh'akya thub pa'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g-yas su dpal chen mo bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-4: g-yon gyi gzhogs su rdo rje sde bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-5: sku mdog dkar po ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-6: phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang; chu snod bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor aa ti mukta ka'i me tog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-8: 'phags pa 'od dpag med la barsha'i me tog gi phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-9: sh'akya thub pa la sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-10: dpal chen mo la n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog gi phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-11: rdo rje sde la me tog dkar po'i phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-12: bdug pa dri zhim po rnams ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-13: sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-14: de nas zla ba nya la ras ris la me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa chen po byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste 'di nyid kyis gang byed pa de thams cad la gcig tu dpa' bas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:198b-15: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang ji srid phreng ba thams cad rab tu g-yo ba'i mtshan ma 'byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-1: kyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi tshe mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-2: gang thams cad du ras ris kyi spyan sngar til gyis mngon par btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag drug byas na rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-3: yul gyi longs spyod 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-4: til dang; tse ka ta'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum byas na yul rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-5: ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-6: sbrang rtsi btags pa'i gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-9: ru rta rnams 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-10: ma grub na yul rnyed de nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po lhag par mos pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199a-12: de nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-0: khyod @199b kyi rigs kyi lha rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can rgyun tu gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-2: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-4: zla ba ti dang; zhi bar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i thabs de rnams kyang dgug pa'i ched du sngags 'di mnga' bdag du bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-5: 'dir gnod sbyin thams cad dgug par byed pa'i sngags chen po'i tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-6: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-7: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-9: na ma:sarba se n'a sa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-10: na ma a'ary'a aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-13: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-16: gu hya aa dhi pa t'a ya bha ga b'a na a'arya aa ba lo k'i te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-19: sa tya ma nu s'a la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-21: sh'i le sh'i la ba ti d'a ni pra ye shante satv'a da rasha nan ta th'a ga t'a sarba dzny'a dzny'a na darsha na ma ma sa ram pra yatstshe sarba stv'a hi t'arth'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-22: stobs chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:199b-23: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang du gnas pa bkug nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las phyag na rdo rjes gsang ba'i dbang po phran tshegs ma yin pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas tshig 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-0: @200a *// sems can gyi don la brtson par sems pas gang la la sgrol ma sgrub pa de'i dngos grub nges par byin cig phyed phyed rtag tu phan pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-1: sems can thams cad kyis de dran par byas nas lha mo sgrol ma 'di lus can rnams bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-4: gang bdag gis bka' mi byed na phyag na rdo rjes gsang ba'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-5: rdo rje 'chang ba stobs chen pos mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sngon ma can 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa gnod sbyin thams cad 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pa tsam gyis gdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-7: 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-8: de nas 'di sgrub pa'i thabs brjod par bya ste sngar gsungs pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-9: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-10: padma'i sdong po phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-11: phyag na padma g-yang gzhi nag po 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200a-13: skyil krung gis bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-0: g-yas kyi gzhogs su gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen @200b po dag bri bar bya ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-9: dpa' bo bzang po'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-11: chu la sems te de lta bu la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mang po 'drir gzhug par bya ste khug ma dang sa bon gyis gang ba phyag na bsnams pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams nye bar 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-12: g-yon gyi gzhogs su rnam par rgyal ba'i mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-13: sdong po dang; rnam rgyal thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-15: mkha' lding rgyal po zhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 'di rnams thams cad sngar bzhin kha dog ljang gu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas su rig pa 'dzin pa'ang lag na spos phor thogs pa sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-17: rgyu skar skag la 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-18: de nas ras ris ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-19: phyogs gtsang ma gzhan du bzhugs su gsol nas sngags 'dis spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-20: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-21: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-22: na ma: yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-23: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:200b-27: dza ye bi dza ye aa gu ru ae hi ae hi sth'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-1: ba ha sh'anti ka ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-3: gnod sbyin thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya; na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-5: na ma:sarba yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-6: na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-9: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-10: ra ra ra ra shanti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-12: bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-13: de bzhin du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-14: zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-15: 'o ma'i zan gyis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-16: g-yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-18: g-yon gyi gzhogs su bris pa rnams la til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-19: til gyi thug pa dbul bar bya'o; ;spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la aa ga ru'i bdug pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-21: phreng ba sna ma'i me tog dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-22: g-yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i sde dpon rnams la thang chu lnga'i bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-23: ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i me tog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201a-24: g-yon gyi gzhogs su sra rtsi pog gi bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-0: aa ti mukta @201b ka'i me tog dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-1: de ltar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-2: de nas dus gsum du de bzhin du mchod pa bya zhing 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-3: nas zan bza' zhing padma dkar po re re la yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-4: de ltar ji srid 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar bris pa'i gnod sbyin thams cad rdzu 'phrul ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-6: me tog g-yo ba thun mtshams su mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-7: de nas grub par 'gyur te gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-8: nam mkha' la'ang grub bo zhes pa'i sgra thos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog stsol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-10: tshol ba de gnod sbyin gyi bka' byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-11: ma grub na las thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-12: rtag tu rmi lam du gnod sbyin rnams dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-13: mi dge ba mthong ba sbyin par byed do; ;bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:201b-14: nges par skyes pa gnod sbyin thams cad kun tu 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-0: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa @202a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-1: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'byung po'i bdag po lha'i bu dbang ldan la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-2: lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-3: khyod kyi rigs bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen mo rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-5: de la sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags su yang dag par 'dod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-6: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-7: na ma a'arya aa pa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-10: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-12: ai sha na ku la ma ba tu yi shya mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-14: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a te dza na ra ra ra ra ra bi pu tsi bi pu tsi pra ma th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-15: pra ma tha pra ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-24: bha ga b'a na a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-25: pa ra ma hri pa yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-26: dha ra yi shya ti ai shv'a ra sya bi po ma ti tv'am pra s'am tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-35: b'i tyo kri ta ha ti kri ta yaksha kri ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202a-36: na ma a'arya aa pa lo ki te shva r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-0: dbang ldan gyi rigs kun nas 'dren pa'i sngags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhal @202b nas gsungs pa lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-1: sa steng gi mi sems can gyi don 'dod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa sgrub pa'i don du sngags 'di rab tu gsungs so; ;gang 'di sgrub pa'i sgrub pa po gang la la dngos grub 'dod pa la khyod kyis de la mchog sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-2: sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i bsam pa can bye ba phrag bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-3: rang gi rab tu gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sa stong du sgrub pa la lha rnams 'gugs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sngags 'di stobs chen po sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-4: rig pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can gyi sgrol ma de'i gzi brjid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-6: 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis skyobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-7: de nas 'di'i sgrub pa'i cho gar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-8: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-9: gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-10: phyag na padma g-yas kyis mchog sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-11: phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:202b-13: spyi bor bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g-yas su yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems @203a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-1: dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-2: g-yon gyi gzhogs su dbang ldan la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-3: gang gi tshe mig gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-4: sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris 'di'i steng gi phyogs kyi cha rnams su bzhag nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya zhing 'di nyid kyis 'bum bzlas par bya ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-5: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dkar po'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-6: du rushka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'o ma dang lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing kha dog thams cad du snang ba thams cad 'dod pa'i rigs la zho dang; bu ram gyi bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-8: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-9: ras ris kyi phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma dbul zhing dge slong rnams la yon dang bcas pa'i ston mo dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203a-10: phyugs bdag rnams la zho zan dbul zhing de'i zhi ba thob par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-0: ji srid du zla ba nya ba'i bar du dus gsum @203b du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-1: de nas srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma dbang ldan gyi mig 'phro bar byed pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o; ;'dir dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung ba de nas me tog phreng ba dbul bar bya zhing gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-2: gang dka' thub pa rnams kyis ji ltar byung ba zos nas yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-3: de nas thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-7: gos la sogs pa la mngon par sngags nas gang la byin pa de bran nyid du nye bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-8: rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-10: 'o thug gis sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag gcig gis mthar rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtsug phud 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-11: chad pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun gsum du til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-12: til gyi thug pa'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:203b-13: bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun gsum du dang po btsas pa'i 'o ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-0: phyugs kyi bdag po rnams dbang du bya bar 'dod na thal ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur te zhag bdun thun gsum @204a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-1: du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de ji srid 'jig rten pa'i las las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sa'i steng gi mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad byed de sngags 'di la the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-2: 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dbang ldan gyi rigs kun tu 'ong ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du sems can la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'jug par byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rjes su dran nas gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-5: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-8: na mo bidy'a r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-11: karsha karsha bha shi she bidy'a dha ra gu hye ka ma nu sm'a ra buddha satye na dharma satv'a n'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-13: a'arya aa ba lo ki shva r'a sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-14: sidhyantu me mantra pa d'a phat phat y'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-16: sa ma tha sa m'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204a-17: auddha ram te ko ka r'ante ma nu sm'a ra ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-0: hri da ta sa k'a r'a to ti ka @204b ta te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-1: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa 'jug par byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pas gdug pa de thams cad 'jigs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-3: rig pa thams cad zlog par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-4: mdor na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-5: de nas 'di'i sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dir bzhugs par bya ste sku mdog dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-8: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa; phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-9: gser gyi them skas bzang po la 'jug bzhin pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-14: ne tso la sogs pa rab tu bsngags pa'i bya rnams g-yas kyi g-yas su 'jug pa skor ba byed pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-15: mi'am ci gnyis glu len bzhin pa bri bar bya ste g-yon pas rna ba 'gebs ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-16: sgrub po'ang 'og tu kha phyogs pa spos phor lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-17: bcom ldan 'das 'jug par byed bzhin pa la lta bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:204b-19: g-yas kyi 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od kyis mnan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-0: rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir @205a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-1: bcug nas sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol te yang dag par brtsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-3: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-6: dza ti hu ti ma ma aa b'a tady'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-9: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-13: 'dis thams cad byed pa ste 'bum phrag lngar bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-14: sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-15: mthar zho dang; sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-16: mar gyis btags pa'i padma stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-17: mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa ste dpag tu med pa bzlas pas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ras ris rab tu 'gul na sa chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-18: mi 'gul na yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-19: rtag tu bzlas pas gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-20: ras ris kyi spyan sngar padma 'bum phrag bcu dbul bar bya ste grong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205a-21: stong phrag sum cu dbul bar bya ste grong lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro; ;rig pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor bas rtag tu 'dod cing dran par byed na de dbul bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes @205b kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nges par byung ba'i 'jug par byed bzhin pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-1: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin pas bcom ldan 'das la rtog pa'i rgyal po yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen por don chen po rmad du byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-2: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-3: phra mo thams cad sel bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-4: sems can thams cad srung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-6: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-9: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-11: aom ghatta ni phu ma ta na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-12: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po thogs pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-14: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus gnang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-15: mngon par mdzes pa srung ba la rtag pa kho nar mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:205b-16: de nas 'di sgrub pa'i mchod par 'gyur te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'di nyid kyi dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-1: phul nas bye ba bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-2: rgyal srid chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-3: 'bum phrag bcur bzlas na gser stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-4: mchod rten gyi drung du dkyil 'khor stong nye bar byugs nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-5: bdug pa la sogs pa phul te 'bum bzlas na gang 'dod pa'i rgyal po de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-6: chu klung chen po dang; chu gling dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-7: mchod rten bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi ched la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-8: rgyal srid chen po rnyed de don chen po yang dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-9: gang zhig sngags 'dis rtag tu dran par byed pa de ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcus rjes su yi rang zhing rab tu bsngags la thams cad du son pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206a-10: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa yi ge bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags @206b ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-7: na mo gambhi ra gho sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-9: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-12: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-16: ma n'o dze be shu n'a dza ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-18: bi dza y'a ya; du ma bu bhi sv'a r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-19: de bi de bi de bi p'u dzi t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-20: na ma skri ta gardza t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-21: ra ra la la kha ga ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-23: aa pra ti ha te ba da n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-24: brahma shva ra go sha ru tr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-25: bi sa ti sa t'i r'a dza ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-26: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-27: murdha n'a ba ra na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-28: ma ma karyam ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-29: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen por bdag gi spyi bor skyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-30: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag du mas gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-31: sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gis mngon par dbang bskur bar mngon par dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi gnas su gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:206b-33: las phran chogs thams cad myur du bklags pas grub pa'o; ;de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gso sbyong la gnas pas 'bum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-1: thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-2: rgyu skar sa ga'i nyi ma la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-3: me tog la sogs pa phul nas kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ras la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-4: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-6: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med thub pa la thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-7: rig pa 'dzin pa lag na spos phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-8: rnam pa de lta bu phyogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-9: nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyi nang der 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-10: rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas mchod rten gyi drung du ras ris bzhugs su gsol te de la 'di nyid kyis thams cad byas la 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207a-11: mthar mtshan mo smyung bar gnas te ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad la re re la yongs su bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bsnun par bya ste de lta bu thun gsum du 'bum phrag gcig byas pa'i mthar bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-0: @207b gal te rig pa 'dzin pa nyid lus 'bar bar byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-3: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel na rgyal srid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-4: gal te sgrub pa byed par 'dod na thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-8: gi wang la byas pa ras ris kyi spyan sngar thams cad sgrub pa byed na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-9: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsungs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-11: bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'od dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-13: na mo aa mi t'a bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-16: bi shva bhu: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-19: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-22: k'a pa tsa n'a ya ni tyo t'a ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:207b-24: bha ga b'an hri da ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-2: sarba bo dhi satv'a sarsha tma dhye bh'a shi tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-10: satyam; burba bo dhi satv'a satvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-11: hri da ya ma nu sma ra he he he he he tve tve tve tve tve ra ra ra ra ra la la la la la aom k'a ra pra be bhyam banytsa a'a bh'a shri tam kalpa sarba buddh'a sa r'i dza tam tva me ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-12: raksham bam da tva si pra na mya ham kha ga kha ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-13: bi dza aa sa ra dzi ta ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-14: aa ba lo ki te shva ra bi dza ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-15: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po las phran tshegs rnams thams cad bklags pas grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-16: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-18: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208a-21: za na za bas 'di nyid kyis thams cad byas la 'bum bzla bar bya ste sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-0: gi wang ste de rnams gcig tu byas la aa shvat+tha'i 'dab mas btums te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas nas thun gsum du ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rdzas la nyi @208b ma nyi shu rtsa gcig kho nar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-3: 'bar bar gyur na grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-4: dang pos ni dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-5: gnyis pas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-6: gsum pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-7: ras ris rab tu 'gul na rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-8: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom par byed bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen por rtog pa'i rgyal por padma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-10: na ma su ba rna pa bh'a sa ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-13: beshti ko ti yaksha pa ri pri ti ya na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-16: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:208b-20: padma aa bh'a sa: ta th'a ga t'a ba tsa ne na tva ya bha sh'i tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-1: satv'a pa r'a dzi t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-4: tsa t'a yo ga ni: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-12: bi dza ye pa ta pa ta k'a ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-13: mah'a ya sha aa nu mu ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-14: aa pra ti ha ta ba tsa ne sv'ah'a; 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa padma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po padma kun tu snang bas de bzhin du bdag gi snying po 'di gang de dran pa tsam gyi 'di'i 'jigs pa chen po thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-15: gang yang nyin mtshan gsum du 'di byas nas de yun ring po nas mtshams med pa lnga byas pa thams cad yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-16: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-17: sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang; bdug pa la sogs pa phul nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-18: mthar mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas zla ba bcu gnyis su 'o ma bcu gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-20: bum pa gang ba bcu gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-21: sbrang rtsi'i bum pa bcu gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209a-23: thug pa'i bum pa bcu gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-0: kushm'a nda'i kham phor @209b bcu gnyis su bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-1: kham phor bcu gnyis su padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-2: slong mo'i zas bcu gnyis bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-3: de nas srod der de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas de nas gur gum byugs la der autpa la sngon po kha dog dang mtshungs pa'i sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba phul nas mchod rten gyi spyan sngar nag po bcu bzhi 'am; zla ba nya ba la lag pa g-yas pas ral gri bzung nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-4: mthar grub pa'i mtshan ma nam mkha' nas legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-5: legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-6: de nas ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur te skad cig de nyid la lha'i lus 'khor dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-7: bskal pa chen por gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-9: mchod rten g-yo bar byed na mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-10: yang na gang 'dod cing don du gnyer ba de rnyed cing don du gnyer ba de grub ste dngos grub kyi yul rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:209b-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las nges par skyes pa padma kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @210a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-1: sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i rgyal por dpe byad brgyad cu rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya; na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-5: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-7: na ma: ka manta lu ha st'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-8: na ma: padma bi bhu shi t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-9: na ma: padma y'a n'a y'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-10: na ma: padma he st'a y'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-11: na mo manda la shi kh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-12: na mo aa sh'i tyan'u byam dza na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-13: laksha n'a ya; na mo ae su r'a ke kunytsi ta ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-14: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dpe byad brgyad cu'i rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po sgrol ma'i rtog pa don chen po sbyin pa ste gang la la 'di dran par byed pa de'i don thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-15: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210a-17: rgya mtsho'i chu gling du gang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas te srog shing btsugs nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-0: bdug pa la sogs pa ji @210b ltar 'byor pas re re'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-1: ji srid du mchod rten stong phrag brgyad po rdzogs kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-2: gal te phyis mchod rten 'bar nas chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-3: de nas 'bar na grub par 'gyur te de nas las thams cad du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-6: bud med dam; skyes pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na mchod rten gyi spyan sngar dri la sogs pa phul nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-7: nyi ma bdun thun gsum du byas nas dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-8: gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-9: 'jigs pa la dam tshig la gnas te bzlas pa byas na 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-10: las phra mo rnams bklags pa tsam gyis grub ste las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:210b-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dpe byad brgyad cu'i rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen @211a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-1: po yon tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-3: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-6: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-10: ra si gu na s'a ga ra padme ma na si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-11: brahmentra pra ti banna ma ho tya ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-20: sarba k'a tyam ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-21: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yon tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-22: sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i don thams cad sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-23: gang rig pa'i rgyal po yon tan rgyan 'di rtag tu dran par 'gyur ba de dus ring por mi thogs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-24: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te sngar brjod pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med thub pa'i ras ris 'drir gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-25: 'dab ma stong pa la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211a-26: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o; ;g-yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug padma la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-0: @211b bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-1: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa pus mo btsugs pa ste sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-2: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris de bzhugs su gsol nas tshes grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-4: yud tsam dge bas gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-5: byams pa la gnas te mchod pa chen po byas te zla ba nya la stong phrag bcur bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-6: 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas na mchod rten de nyid la padma re re la yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-7: nyi ma re re la stong dbul bar bya ste gang tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid bcu gnyis kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-8: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-10: mar gyis btags pa'i padma dkar po stong phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-11: ras ris kyi phreng ba g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:211b-12: mar me 'phel te gzhan du 'phro bar byed na 'di ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ste rgyal srid chen po rnyed do; ;ma grub na yul rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-0: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal @212a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-1: po las nges par skyes pa yon tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chen po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-4: na mo aa mi t'a bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-6: aargha te samya ksam buddha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-7: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-10: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-11: auddha pra dzva li ta dza t'a ya su kh'a batyam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-15: aa mi t'a bh'a sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-17: ma ma tsa hri da ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-18: pra ti grihna bha ga p'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-23: sushthu pri shya mi ti lam bha lang+gha dzyo ti shpa ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-24: bi bhu dha padma ha st'a ya su me su me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-25: bi su ma gi ri gi ri ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212a-26: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-0: 'di'i cho ga ni bla @212b gab med par shing gcig gi 'og tu bum pa tsam gyi mchod rten byas nas de'i spyan sngar aa ga ru 'bum gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-1: gang gi don du sbyin sreg byas pa de'i mchog rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-3: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mchod rten gyi spyan sngar lan tshva'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas p'a la sha'i me la nyi ma gsum la lan bdun thun mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-4: bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang gi phyogs su yungs kar khrag gis btags pa rnams seng ldeng gi me la yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-5: seng ldeng btags pa rnams kyi nyi ma gsum du thun mtshams gsum du stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-6: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi bye ma la mchod rten sor bzhi tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:212b-8: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad tsam pa brgyad lhag pa'i stong byas la srog shing phul te mchod pa la sogs pa'i cho gas re re'i spyan sngar stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya ste ji srid stong rtsa brgyad gnas pa na dong rtse stong stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-0: rgya mtsho'i ngogs su mchod rten re re'i spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bcom ldan @213a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-1: 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog ci 'dod pa de stsol bar mdzad cing gang tshol ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-2: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang ting nge 'dzin de nyid sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dpa' bo ldan ma zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-5: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-6: bo dhi satv'a yi; mah'a satv'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-7: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-9: shi ri bi si ri smri ti bat tsa ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-10: te dzo ba dha ni ha ra ha ra aa mu kam me ba sa m'a gatstsha tu ra ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-12: bi ra b'a si; mi ni soo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-13: ta mu ta khe b'i barna sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213a-14: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa dpa' bo dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo sems can thams cad rjes su srung bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-0: rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams kyis gang dpa' ba dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'di rtag tu dran pa de nor gyi dngos grub nges par de'i @213b brtson pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-2: 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi wang gis 'drir gzhug par bya ste padma'i gdan la phyag na padma ste g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-4: de'i g-yas su sgrub pa po ste sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-5: ras ris de ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-7: phreng ba phul nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas par zla ba nya la 'o thug gi kham phor bcu gnyis phul nas aa ga ru'i bdug spos dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-8: de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-9: sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-10: las thams cad kyi dngos sgrub ni 'di nyid kyi cho gas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-11: phyi nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te sna ma'i me tog re re la yongs su bzlas nas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-12: de lta bu nyi ma bdun du thun gsum du ji srid stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyi ma bdun pa la gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:213b-13: ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa ga ru nag po 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-1: rnyed do; ;bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dpa' bo ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-2: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po de nyid sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-4: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-7: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-8: d'i pta ping+ga le ha ri ping+ga le aa so ni t'a dha dr'a le hi ae hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-9: ma ma pa ram pra yatstsha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-10: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste mi 'jigs pa rab tu spyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-11: de nas 'di'i cho ga ni ras sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-12: 'bras bu can la sen rtsis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste padma'i gdan na la padma'i phyag can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-13: mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214a-14: sgrub pa po'ang sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-0: de'i spyan sngar thun gsum du mar gyis btags pa'i @214b tsandan dmar po'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-1: 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-2: 'dir padma r'a ga 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-3: na mo tatna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-4: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-7: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-9: yi ge tstshi tve tsa pa ri pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-21: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa padma r'a ga sbyin pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-22: 'di'i cho ga ni tsandan dmar pos 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-23: de'i spyan sngar mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na padma r'a ga brgyad rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-24: zas kyi sngags kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-25: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-26: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-29: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-33: dzyo tishma ti su tsi bi mu ts'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-34: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste zas gos sbyin pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:214b-36: ba bla las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-0: de'i spyan sngar mar gyis btags pa'i 'o thug @215a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-1: gi sbyin sreg ji srid 'bum phrag gcig byas na gnas thams cad du zas gos rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-4: na ma a'arya aa ba le ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-7: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-9: dzva la dzva la pra dzva la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-18: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa dngul sbyin pa'i sngags te 'di'i cho ga ni gur gum gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste de'i spyan sngar zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-20: sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i n'a ga ge sar gyi sbyin sreg 'bum byas na dngul brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-21: yad 'dir gser rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-22: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-23: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-26: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-28: ga ru ru pha ra ba ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-30: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste gser sbyin pa'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215a-31: 'di'i cho ga ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ma lli ka'i me tog re re la yongs su bzlas nas mchod rten gyi drung du gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-0: thun gsum @215b du stong phrag brgyad gtor na zla ba'i nang du gser brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-1: ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-2: phyag na spyi blugs bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-3: padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-5: dgon par aa shvattha'i shing gi 'og tu gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhugs nas sra rtsi pog gi sreg blugs 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na bcom ldan 'das kyis myur du rgyal srid stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes pa de rnams lnga po tsam ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bsgoms nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por aom yig rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-8: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a sya ta th'a ga t'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:215b-11: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-6: m'a dhe ni m'a dhe ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-12: ma tha ma tha ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-19: sarba dushtam tvam b'a si s'a t'a ni m'a ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-20: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste 'khor ba'i sna thag grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gang 'di rtag tu dran par byed na 'kher bar yun ring du mi 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-21: bzlas pa nyid kyis mtshams med pa lnga po rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-22: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni sngar brjod pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags sa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nam mkha' la 'gro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-25: g-yas par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-26: sgrub pa po yang dag pa'i lus kyi mgo bos bdug pa sreg pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-28: rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-29: de nas ras ris de sngar brjod pa'i gnas su bzhugs nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-31: bdug pa la sogs pa'i de nyid kyis phul la 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216a-32: sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-0: mtshams @216b med pa lnga po rnams rnam par sbyod bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-1: 'bum phrag drug bzlas pas dam bcas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-3: srin po rnams 'ching bar 'dod na ku sha'i sna thag gis bskor nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags te gdug pa gang na gnas pa'i shing ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-4: khyim la sogs pa la dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-5: gdug pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-7: sems can rnams zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-8: rna ba'i mig sman sgrub par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bzhag nas du ba 'thul na de rnams rgyal ba'i spyan dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-9: lo stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar padma dkar po 'bum phrag gsum dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-12: ma grub na yul rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:216b-13: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa 'khor ba'i sna thag grol bar byed pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @217a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-1: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por yi ge bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-3: na ma a'a rya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-6: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-13: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa yi ge bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po rtag tu sangs rgyas bcu gcig pa'ang 'di bdag gis sngon bshad pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas gser rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-14: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni sgrub pa'i ched du 'gyur te sngar brjod pa'i ras ris n'a ga ge sar gyi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-15: ba li ka bsres pas 'drir gzhug ste padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-18: phyag g-yas pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-20: sgrub pa po'ang sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-21: ras ris dang po'i gnas su bzhag nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217a-22: sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-0: ri'i rtse mor nyi ma gsum du mi @217b bza' bar stong phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya ste gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-1: tsandan dkar po'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngar brjod pa bzhin 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-2: de'i spyan sngar tsandan dkar po'i zhogs ma dang bcas pa 'bum phrag gsum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-3: ma grub na grong rnyed de yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa 'dod cing don du gnyer ba sbyin pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po ras ris kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-6: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-7: na ma a'a rya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:217b-10: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya; tadya th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-0: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa ras ris kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen @218a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-1: po'o; ;rtag tu bzlas pas don sbyin par byed cing sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa grub par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-2: yang 'di'i cho ga ni sngar brjod pa'i ras ris la 'od dpag med 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-3: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-5: dar dkar po'i stod g-yogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-6: bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor bar byed bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-7: g-yon du 'phags pa mthu chen thob pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-9: bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-10: de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su pa ta'i shing la so so so sor bzhag nas 'di nyid kyis dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-11: me tog la sogs pa phul la 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-12: sdon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218a-13: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te me tog dkar po stong phrag brgyad la re re la yongs su bzlas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-0: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ni padma stong rtsa brgyad po de rnams @218b gcig tu gnas par 'gyur te 'di ni dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-1: 'di dag phye mar byas nas gzhan sha la dang bsres te rgyal po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-3: gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-4: nad kyis gdungs pa la byin na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-5: phye ma des mtshan ma dang ldan pa mo la rdul btab na bu rnyed do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-6: tho rangs bdag nyid kyi spyi bor phye ma des rdul btab na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-7: de ltar gang 'dod pa de thams cad phye ma des byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-8: grol bar byed na nye bar bzhag pa'i nad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-11: de bzhin du dug la sogs pa thams cad la 'thung du bcug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-12: cung zad byug par sbyin par bya ste nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-13: yang 'dir ras ris kyis gnas kyi phye ma'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-17: ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang; pu shel rtse dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-19: me tog brgya pa ste 'di rnams cha mnyam par sbyar nas phye mar byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-20: 'di ni ras ris kyi gnas kyi phye ma ste brgya phrag brgyad mngon par sngags nas gang la btung ba la sogs par byin pa de dbang du 'gyur te bran nyid du nye bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:218b-21: mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-1: du rnyed cing rab tu 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-2: de bzhin du 'jigs pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar padma dkar po 'bum phrag gsum dbul bar bya ste yul chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-3: aarga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas padma dmar pos 'bum phrag bdun sbyin sreg byas na rgyal srid chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-4: ma grub na grong khyer chen po rnyed do; ;til gyi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na grong gcig rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-5: 'bum phrag lnga sbyin sreg byas na nor sbyin pa dang mchog sbyin par byed cing de dbang du byed do; ;dung la brgya bzlas pa nyid kyis don thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-6: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen pa rdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud chen por ras ris kyi gnas yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-7: slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du padma'i mtha' zhes pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-9: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219a-12: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-0: pa ri p'a @219b r'a ya; sarba ga ti bi dza y'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-1: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa padma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen po ste 'di rtag tu bzlas pas phyir bzlog par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-2: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-3: padma la bzhugs pa thams cad dkar po ral pa gyen du brjes pa phyag g-yon pas padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-4: g-yas pas ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'i phyag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-5: de nas ras ris gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol nas 'di nyid kyis dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-6: bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad bya zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-7: mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das la me tog stong phrag brgyad la len re bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-8: de ltar ji srid du stong phrag brgyad cu rdzogs pa'i mthar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas srod nas brtsams te bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:219b-9: de nas nam mkha' grub bo zhes pa'i cho ga 'byung ste gal te mngon par 'dod pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220a-0: gang dbang du byed par 'dod na sna ma'i phreng ba yongs su blangs nas me tog de re re la @220a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220a-1: mngon par sngags nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dbul te nyin zhag bdun thun gsum du dbul bar byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220a-2: bram ze dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar p'a la sha'i me la nyin zhag bdun thun gsum du g-yang bzhi nag po'i pags pas sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro; ;ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil pa'i me la au dum b'a ra'i me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220a-3: dmangs rigs dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar aarga'i me la lan tsha'i sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gsum gyi dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220a-4: thun mong ba'i bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na me de la nas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220a-6: bram ze dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi me la d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg thun gsum nyi ma bdun du byas na bdun pa la dbang du 'gyur te gang dbang du bya ba de la zla ba gcig tu bzlas pas de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa padma'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po yongs @220b su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por padma gzi brjid zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-3: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-6: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-13: dza ye ba he; aa na ghe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-21: ru ru ru ru ru ru ru r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-22: 'di ni mthu chen po theb pa dang bcas pa padma gzi brjid ces bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-23: 'di rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-24: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te le brgan rtsi'i chu dang 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras ris 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-25: dkar po ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-27: padma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:220b-28: kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-0: de nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su @221a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-4: bdug pa sreg cing 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-5: de nas tsandan dkar po zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-7: mar la btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-8: de ma thag tu rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-9: ma grub na grong gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar p'a la sha'i 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-11: aa ga ru mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na gos bye ba brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-12: le brgan rtsi'i sreg blugs 'bum byas na gter mthong ngo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-13: gang bstan pa zla ba gcig tu bzlas na de'i don rnyed do zhes pa ste 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-14: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa padma gzi brjid ces bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal pos dpal be'u zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-16: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-17: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221a-20: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-10: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste dpal be'u zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dran pa tsam gyis nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-11: 'di'i cho ga ni gur gum dang bsres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-12: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-14: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-16: thugs kar dpal be'ur mtshan mas brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-17: g-yas su gur gum gyis dpal be'u bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-18: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ras ris zhal nub du phyogs par bzhugs nas mchod rten de nyid kyis bdug pa bsregs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-19: mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te n'a ga ge sar re re la yongs su bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-20: de lta bu zla bar rdzogs par byas na gter chen po mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:221b-21: nyi ma bdun gyis gser stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-0: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang @222a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-1: ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dpal be'u zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-3: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-4: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-7: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-10: tsa ra pa ti pa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-14: tsi li tsi li tsilpa ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-15: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dang bcas pa ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rtag tu bzlas pas sa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-16: 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni ras la li khri'i phye ma dang bsres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-17: ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222a-20: mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-0: de nas ras ris de ring bsrel dang @222b bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod rten gyi byang du bzhugs nas 'di nyid kyis ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-1: mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas bas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas srod nas brtsams nas bzlas par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-2: nam mkha' las grub bo zhes pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur te gang du mchod pa der char lhung bar 'gyur ro; ;ma grub na yul rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-3: de'i spyan sngar pa l'a sha'i me la klu shing gi me tog mar la btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na dngul 'bum rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-4: dong rtse brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nges par skyes pa'i mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:222b-6: yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams te le'u rab 'byams bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig @223a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-1: rten gyi khams su byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag pa'i yul rnam par 'phro zhing rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-2: snyoms par zhugs nas rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma bsgrub par bya ba'i don du bdag gis 'chad bzhin pa'i ched du lha thams cad kun tu bgegs kyi bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ba de la bdag gis sems can thams cad rab tu skrag par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa bshad kyis /
