K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-5: bgegs dang; log par 'dren pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-6: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-7: gang yang gzhan rig pa'i sde dpon rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-8: bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal mo bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol mas gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-9: rig pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223a-12: gsol ba 'debs pa mngon par 'du byed pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-0: de dang mthun par 'jigs pa chen po thams cad @223b 'phrog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-1: skems pa dang gsod par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-2: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir las kyi cho ga bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi snga dro langs nas gtsang mar gyur pa las shar la sogs par kun tu bltas te lag mthil la yongs su bzlas nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la'ang kun tu bltas nas der lag mthil la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-3: bgegs thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-5: gdug pa'i bsam pa rnams la de bzhin du'ang nyi ma so sor byas na thams cad ring por mi thogs pa kho nar thams cad zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-6: rgyas pa can yang nyi ma nub pa'i dus tshod la de nyid kyis las bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-7: mngon spyod can la mtshan phyed na gnas gcig tu gtsug phud dgrol zhing lan bdun brjod cing nam mkha'i mthil du ltas nas blo rtse gcig tu bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-8: de'i sems can mngon spyod can gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-11: log par 'dren pa'i tshogs rnams kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:223b-13: bdag gis gsungs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po gsang chen gsang ba'i sbyor ba byed par 'gyur ba de'i dngos grub gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-0: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub pa po dang @224a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-1: sngags kyi rtog pa 'dir gsungs pa'i sgrub pa pos gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-2: 'di ltar kun tu rtog par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-3: gzhan ma yin no zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-5: rig pa chen po gang ma mo'i gsang chen gsang ba rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-6: de bskyed par byed pa'i cho ga'i rig pa'ang bshad par bya'o; ;de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-7: ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pas sems can thams cad kyang skye ba brdzes te stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-10: rnam par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-11: snyoms par zhugs pa de las dang mthu dang bcas par langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224a-12: nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-0: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar nas phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das @224b la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-7: gang khyod sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta bu yongs su zhus pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-10: nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-11: shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di nyid rab tu ston par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-12: lho phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de'ang sgrol ma'i rig pa 'di nyid gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:224b-13: nub phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med zhes bya ba des kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rig pa 'di gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225a-0: byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @225a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus mdzes zhes bya ba de'ang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di nyid gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225a-2: de ltar phyogs bcu rnams su'ang de lta bu la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang ldan pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang snying po 'di nyid kun tu bshad par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225a-6: shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'ang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'byung gnas la rig pa 'di'i rab tu ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-0: de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing las 'das pas 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen @225b rab snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal zhes bya ba yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-1: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen rab snang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-2: rigs kyi bu; rig pa 'di sems can rnams kyi don gyi ched du ngas bshad kyi mchog tu zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rig pa mchog tu bzung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-4: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba so sor 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:225b-7: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems can rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226a-2: sems can thams cad kyi ched du sems can thams cad la bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas rig pa mchog tu bzung bar gyur to; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226a-5: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de gzhan ma yin te de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226a-6: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal zhes pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab snang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lha mo gos dkar mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing byas pa'i gnas su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226a-12: rig pa'i rgyal po ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-0: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste bcom ldan @226b 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-2: bdag phyag na rdo rje la dngos grub kyi don du rig pa sbyin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-3: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-5: bdag gis kyang gos dkar mo'i snying po'i rig pa sbyin par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la gcig tu snying brtse ba shin tu snying brtse ba can sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa rab tu stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-8: thub pas gsungs pa'i rig pa ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:226b-9: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis 'jigs par byed pa'i me ltar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad kyang de'i 'od zer gyis kun tu skul bar byed pa byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i @227a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-1: dpral bar spyan gsum pa byung ste spyan de las sna tshogs dbang du byed pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-2: 'od zer de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-5: gang khyod 'di lta bu'i rig pa smras pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-6: legs so zhes pa'i tshig thos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-15: manydzu sha ka chen po'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-17: rig pa'i rgyal po smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rig pa gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-19: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-22: aom bha ya n'a sha ni tr'a sa ni tra sa tra sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-29: rig pa 'di gsung ma thag tu'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227a-30: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-0: byang phyogs @227b mthon lho phyogs dma' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-1: shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma' bar gyur te de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam bar 'gyur ba drug tu g-yos te gzhal yas khang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang gdan las bskyod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-2: dri za rnams kha bub tu gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-3: lha ma yin rnams kyi dbyangs nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-4: nam mkha' lding rnams kyi sgyu mi mgyogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-5: srin po rnams kyi tru ta ta ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-6: gdug pa rnams nye bar 'gro bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-7: ma mo'i tshogs rnams ngu 'bod kyi nyam thag pa'i nga ro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-9: de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-11: lto 'phye chen po rnams skyabs med dpung gnyen med de ji srid 'og min pa'i lha'i ris rnams kyi bsreg par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-12: lha rnams thams cad rings pa rings par de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-13: de nas phyag na rdo rje'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyi 'od zer rnams kyis yid tshim nas stan las 'phos te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:227b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad de ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;phyag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa tsam la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbyangs su gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-9: de nas lha de rnams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-11: gnod sbyin la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-14: de nas 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa nyid ngo mtshar thob nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228a-15: nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-0: 'di lta @228b bu'i gsang sngags byang chub sems dpa' gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-5: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gtsug tor nas nges par mthon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mthu lha rnams kyis sngon chad ma thos pa gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-15: 'das pa'i dus na shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i spyan zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi so sor gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ces bya ba gdags pa med de de rnams thams cad kyang rig pa 'dzin pa skyon med pa kho na ste rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa las ma 'das te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:228b-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-6: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'di rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-8: rigs kyi bu; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rim pa las ma 'das pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-10: nye bar song nas dga' nas gsang sngags gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-11: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-12: na ma: tsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-13: mah'a yaksha se pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-15: 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-16: rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa rig pa mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po rig pa'i rgyal po stong bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-17: rgyud phyi ma bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229a-18: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-0: thams cad nas @229b rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-4: rgya mtshor bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-5: sman chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-6: nye bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos mngon par phyag btsal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-7: de nas de rnams thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu ba 'ga' zhig yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo; ;de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-10: lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-17: nub par 'gyur pa gdags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-18: gang gis dus su rig pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-19: lha rnams kyis de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:229b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-0: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @230a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe rig pa rnams 'char bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-3: dal zhing dal ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-11: brkam pa rnams te de rnams rtag tu mar mi shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-12: phar mi shes pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis rig pa'i dngos grub mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-14: 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po bco brgyad 'das pa na rdzu 'phrul chen po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-16: de rnams rig pa 'dzin pa'i ming du grags par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-17: de rnams thams cad kyang rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-18: rig pa'i mthu yis rtse bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-22: shar phyogs su sdig med ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag bzhi'i mnga' bdag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230a-23: byang phyogs su ri rab lhun po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag bcu'i mnga' bdag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-0: ri rab lhun po ri'i rgyal po'i nye logs na glang po'i sde zhes bya @230b bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-1: lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-2: gzhon pa dkar po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-3: cha byad bzang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-4: gser gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-5: padma bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-6: rdo rje'i phyag ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-7: rin chen kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-8: zhags pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-9: me lce 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-10: sgyu 'phrul kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-11: rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po bco brgyad po 'di rnams rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag bcu bzhis yongs su bskor ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa de rnams thams cad kyang bud med rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-14: dga' dgur spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-16: rig pa 'dzin pa 'di rnams skye ba bdun gyi nang du rig pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ste gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:230b-17: gang du skyes pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-1: du rig pa 'di'i mthus dran pa so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-3: de lta bu'i gnas su gnas pas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de rnams ngo mtshar thob nas bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gis mngon par gtor bar gyur to; ;de nas lha thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-6: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pas dga' ba'i don du cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des rig sngags gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-8: aom padma badzri h'um snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-9: ga ga na bi d'a ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-11: aom bha ya n'a sa ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-19: aom sve te dza ti ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-21: zhes pa 'di dag rig pa'i 'khor gyi lhag ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-22: rtsa ba'i rig pa nyid kyis dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-23: me tog bdug pa la sogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-24: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231a-25: dang po re zhig tshad med cing skra dang bral ba'i ras bkrus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-0: aa ga ru'i @231b 'dab ma spang spos dang lhan cig sbyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-1: bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun mngon par sngags pas lan bdun bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-2: bkrus pa la'ang byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-6: pri yang ku ste 'di rnams kyis bdug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-7: 'di rnams kyis gang 'dod pa de grub par mtshon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-8: mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas par gyur nas mi blo dang ldan pas mnyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-10: mtshan mo me sbar nas rang gi khrag gis btags pa'i yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-11: cho ga 'di nyid kyis ras ris 'dri bzhin pa la bgegs mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-12: de bas kyang byung bar bya ste rnam pa gzhan du na log 'dren gyis byin gyis brlabs pas grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-13: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rang nyid kyis rig sngags zlos bzhin pas ri mo mkhan khrus byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-14: bkrus nas de la'ang gos rab tu sbyin par bya ste ji srid 'dri ba'i bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-15: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas par bya zhing 'dri bzhin pa na'ang ras kyi mthar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-16: dbus su'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:231b-17: der yang bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-1: thams cad kyang me tog gis brgyan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-2: mar me'i phreng ba'ang dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-3: rig pa 'dzin pas rig pa yid la byed cing bdug spos bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-4: de nas ri mo mkhan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas tshangs pa'i ri mo gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-6: de nas slar yang rig pa 'dzin pas kha shar du mngon par phyogs las nye bar zhugs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa p'a marga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-7: de nas ri mo mkhan gyis lha la phul ba'i ston mo zos pas ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-8: gser mdog padma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-9: g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba la ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-13: de'i rgyab tu rig pa'i lha mo gos dkar po bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232a-14: padma rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-0: de'i bar ma chad @232b par khro gnyer can ma gos dkar po 'chang ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-1: g-yas su bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rje chen po bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-2: phyag na rin po che bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-3: de nas thams cad kyang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad du bya zhing padma la gnas shing so sor gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-4: g-yon gyi gzhogs su phyag na rdo rje sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-5: phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-6: g-yon gyi gzhogs su rig pa'i rgyal po dam pa rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-7: rig pa'i rgyal po'i nye logs su gser ldan ma'ang rdo rje lcags kyu ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-8: rdo rje khu tshur sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-9: rdo rje bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-10: rdo rje dbyug pa dbyug pa bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-11: rdo rje blo gros rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-12: gnam lcags ma'ang rdo rje dbyug pa'i rgyab tu 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-13: g-yon du lha skrag pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-14: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-15: rdo rje drag tu dgod pa 'drir gzhug cing phyag na rdo rje'i nye logs su rdo rje sde dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:232b-16: gtsug 'phyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-1: kyang padma la so sor gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-2: rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste log 'dren gyi rigs bzhi rnams rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-3: 'bros bzhin pa 'og tu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-4: de rnams kyi 'og tu padma'i mtsho bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-5: klu lag na padma thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-6: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyang me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-7: lha'i rnga bo che 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-10: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang mtshon cha dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-11: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus med 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-12: klu'i rgyal po'i nye logs su sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-13: ras ris 'di bris pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-14: phyi nas lha rnams bde blag tu sgrub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-15: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ras ris kyi rgyal po'i mchog de'i spyan sngar slong mo bza' zhing rig pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233a-16: de nas 'di la rig pa 'dzin pa lus med kyi rmi lam du ston par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-0: de nas rig pa 'dzin @233b pas lcags gsum gyi padma gser gyi snying po can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-2: chu ba dngul la 'dab ma stong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-3: padma bzhis yongs su bskor ba bzhi po 'di 'dab ma brgya par byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-4: phyi nas sgrub pa pos 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-5: zan za zhing rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-6: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas par byas la ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhugs nas padma'i g-yas kyi lus la bcom ldan 'das ma'i lha thams cad spyan drangs bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-7: rab tu 'bad pas gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-12: mar gyi mar me brgya'ang rab tu sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-13: lha ma yin rnams la gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-14: gnod sbyin la dkar gtor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-16: dri za rnams la gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-18: sha za rnams la gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:233b-34: log 'dren dang bcas pa rnams la sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-2: gnod sbyin rnams la sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-10: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-12: bdug pa rnams kyang so so so sor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-13: lha rnam par shes pa nyid 'phel bzhin du mchod pa bdun bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-14: de nas nyi ma bdun pa la grogs bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-15: legs par bsams pa'i tshe na byas pa gzo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-16: rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-17: nad med pa de lta bu bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-18: shes rab can gyis de nas las yang dag par brtsams te ku sha'i khres la mngon par sngags pa la nye bar 'dug nas de nas padma'i ze'u 'bru la lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-19: ras ris rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-20: klu rnams kyang sgra sgrogs te 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-21: slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-23: phyogs bral rnams su rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234a-24: log 'dren rnams kyang rnam par 'bros te lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams gang du 'gro bar byed pa rig pa 'dzin pa de rnams 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-0: @234b lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'dus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-1: sprin rnams kyang 'ur 'ur po'i sgra sgrog par byed par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang 'dus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-5: sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g-yo zhing rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang snying po med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-6: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings thabs su byang chub shing gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-7: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-9: lha rnams dang lhan cig byon pa la mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-10: byon pa tsam gyis lha thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-11: rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-12: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas padma mnan nas rig pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-13: padma re re la padma bye ba phrag bzhi bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-14: rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag bcu drug po thams cad kyang padma'i gdan la gnas pa sha stag 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:234b-15: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan gcig brjod par bya'o; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byung ste sgrub pa po la byugs nas padma'i ze 'brur nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-0: de nas yang padma la nye @235a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-1: par 'dug pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-2: de'ang padma'i bkod pa rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa 'byung ste dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir kun nas khyab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-3: der de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-5: lha rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-6: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-7: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgyas yongs su bskor nas 'gro ste bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skad cig thang cig yung tsam zhig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun 'da' bar byed do; ;rang gi 'dod pas skye ba 'dzin par byed cing rang gi 'dod pas 'chi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yod de des las 'di sgrubs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen po'i le'u dang po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dga' bas cho ga smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-0: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas @235b pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste gser ltar ser ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-1: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-2: g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-3: dam par byas pa dmar ser mchod phyir thogs dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-6: phyag na shing gi dbyug pa bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-7: g-yon du rdo rje 'chang sngo bsangs rnam par rgyan dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-8: phyag g-yon pas khro bo'i rdo rje 'phyar bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-9: rdo rje 'chang gi nye logs su rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-10: rdo rje khu tshur ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi nye logs su bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'drir gzhug par bya ste pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-13: phyag g-yon pas ku rba 'dzin pa'i snying po mchog bcom ldan 'das ma'i nye logs su 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-14: steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu me tog gi phur ma lag na thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-15: lha'i rnga po che 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-16: 'og tu spos phor lag na thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:235b-17: dkar gsum za zhing ras ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-0: @236a *// de lta bu sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-1: de nas las yang dag par brtsams te sngon du ldong ros blangs te gos kyi nang du 'o ma bkru bar bya'o; ;dkar po'i bco lnga pa ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas sgo bzhi rnams su bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-2: thams cad kyang me tog gis brgyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-3: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-4: de nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste aa shat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun gyis ldong ros btums te bzhag nas ji srid 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje g-yo bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-5: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas yid kyis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-6: slar yang du ba 'thul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-7: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-8: 'bar ba dang blangs nas skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-9: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-10: rig pa 'dzin pa bcu drug gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur te lo stong phrag brgyad cu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236a-11: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-0: smyung bar gnas pa mi dgos te skyes bu rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mgo bo shar du bzhag nas shi @236b ba'i ro blangs nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-1: me tog la sogs pas brgyan par byas nas sgrub pa po kha shar du phyogs pas re re la so sor bsam pa'i yid kyi rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gsar la rig pa bzlas pas ro'i kha ru blugs nas ji srid kun tu g-yo zhing ldang ba de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-2: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rgya mtshor 'jug par bya ste ji srid nyi ma 'char bar 'gyur ba de srid du chur gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-3: de tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad lon pa'i rnam pa can sems bskyed pas 'di'i phyag cha thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-4: lo stong phrag drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-5: dpag tshad stong phrag bcu gcig tu 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-6: thog phog ba'i shing las byung ba'i phyag na rdo rje byas la sman gyi gzugs kyi rnam pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bri yang ku'i shing las byas pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma byed du gzhug go ;spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nim pa'i shing las byung ba byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-7: thams cad kyang ban kan mthar byed kyi 'bras bu la so sor dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:236b-8: sgrub pa po pus mo btsugs pa lag na spog phor thogs pa byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-0: de nas gos gtsang ma bgos te mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyi snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum @237a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-1: phrag bcu gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-2: de lta bu sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-3: de nas bco lnga pas mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas te mandal dang bcas pa bza' zhing dge 'dun la ston mo dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-4: de nas mtshan mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa rjes su dbul zhing mar me stong sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-5: de nas bsrung ba byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste autpa la'i phreng ba nyi shu byas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g-yas su phul la ji srid thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-6: 'jigs par mi bya bar slar yang rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-8: de dag blangs pas autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar sngo bsangs kyis rdo rje'i lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-9: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi skal ba bzang por 'gyur zhing lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-10: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir lding bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237a-11: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-0: ma nyams pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong @237b can gyis bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma 'drir gzhug par bya ste sngo bsangs spyan gsum pa'i lha mo cha byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-1: rgyan ma nyams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-2: 'og tu rjes su sgrub pa po lag na spog phor thogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-3: de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-4: de nas mtshan mo dur khrod du song nas ras ris zhal shar du phyogs par bzhag nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-6: bdug pa phul te 'byung po thams cad pa la de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa gcig pu thod pa la zhag chen po'i dud pa blangs nas snying po mnyam par 'gro ma'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-7: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas slar yang ji srid du ba 'thul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-8: 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-9: rgyal ba'i spyan gnyis pa lta bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-10: dbang phyug chen po'i mdung gi mtshon chas dbang phyug chen po rnams thams cad rig pa las dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-11: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song nas sngon du bsnyen pa ni chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:237b-12: 'o mas khrus byas nas mi smra bar rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-0: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ba lang gi phags pa tsam gyi @238a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-1: gzhi la nye bar byug pa byas nas der 'phags pa byag na rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan rab tu so sor gnas pa byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-2: de nas mgo bo'i thod pa lnga blangs nas dri bzang po'i til mar gyis rab tu sbar bar bya ste du ba med par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-3: de nas rnam pa sna tshogs gtor ma byas nas mar gyi mar me phul te de nas mgo bo'i thod pa so sor bzhag nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bsrung ba byas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-4: mig sman de dro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-5: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rings thabs su rig pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-8: 'bar ba na thod pa de blangs nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-9: 'di zar ma'i me tog mtshungs pa sngon med pa'i bye ba phrag dgu'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-10: de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-11: bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'drir gzhug par bya ste bri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238a-12: snying po'i yang g-yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-0: de nas @238b sgrub pa po ri'i rtse mor mngon par 'dzegs te mi smra bas grogs med par yang rung ste 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-1: de nas bco lnga la gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me sbar te de nas sgrub pa pos bsrung ba'i cho ga byas pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha sor brgyad pa'i tshad kyi rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-2: rdo rje de lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid bcom ldan 'das ma la 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-3: rdo rje'i tsi ti tsi ti'i sgra thos te 'jigs par mi bya bar slar yang yud tsam rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-4: ji srid rnga bo che'i sgra thos pa na slar yang yud tsam du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa rings thabs su mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-6: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i byang chub shing gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-7: sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs nas kyang ji srid rdo rje la 'od zer 'byung gi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-8: des dus gsum du khrus byas pas skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-9: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-10: phyag na rdo rje gnyis pa lta bu sngo bsangs dvang ba'i lus su gyur nas bskal bar gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:238b-11: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-0: @239a *// de nas lcags kyu sgrub par 'dod na sngon bzhin du sgrub pa po sngon spyod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-2: zan za zhing mi smra bas ba lang gi gnas su ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du khrus byas la snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-3: de nas rgya mtshor 'gro pa'i chu klung du song nas slong mo za zhing rked pa tsam gyi chur zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-4: dge 'dun la bza' ba dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-5: de nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar ser ba spyan gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-6: de'i nye logs su bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-8: thams cad kyang padma'i gdan la rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239a-9: de nas sgrub pa pos mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas bcom ldan 'das mas ku sha'i khres la mngon par bsngags pa la nye bar 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-0: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rtse mo ma bcad pa'i ku sha lcags kyu byas nas lag pa g-yas pas blangs te @239b ji srid lcags kyu las 'od zer byung ba de srid du dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-1: 'od zer de sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas te nub par 'gyur te de bzung bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-2: lcags kyu lag na thogs pas rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag gi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-6: rang 'chi ba shes par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-7: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i che bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo le'u bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-9: de nas yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-10: nye bar gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mgo bos phyag byas nas bskor ba byas nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-11: de nas yang tshangs pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-12: bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal mo'i cho ga 'chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:239b-13: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-3: bde ba'i ched du rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i cho ga gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-4: de nas yang tshangs pa chen pos cho ga gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-6: gang la la rig pa'i rgyal mo smra bar gyur pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-7: 'chang bar gyur pa de la bdag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-9: gang du skye ba de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-10: der bdag 'di la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rjes su sbyin par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-11: rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-12: rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-13: bklags pas las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-14: chom rkun gyi dbus su song bas yid la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-16: gnam lcags ltung ba la lan cig brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-17: khros pa'i mdun du dran par byas na dpal rab tu ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-18: gdon gso bar 'dod na lan bdun mngon par sngags la srang gis bsregs par byas na grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-19: phyag rgya dbye bar 'dod na gdong la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas blta bar bya ste phyag rgya dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro; ;yungs kar la dkyil 'khor bcings pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-20: phur bus khang bzang sbyong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240a-21: phur bu nyid kyis mtshams bcing pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-0: gang du rdo rje gnas pa'i gnas @240b der bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma lan brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-1: rdo rje rnams bcings pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-2: rdo rje dbye bar bya bar 'dod na dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-4: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-5: lug gi rva ste 'di rnams cha mnyam par byas la rig pa brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas rdo rje'i me la de rab tu byug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-6: rdo rje rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-7: nor sgrub par 'dod na snga ma bzhin du sngon spyad pa byas la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas ma nyams pa'i ras skra dang bral ba la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan chos ston par mdzad bzhin par 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-8: g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-10: 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-12: g-yon du rdo rje 'dzin pa sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-13: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-14: phyag na rdo rje thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi nye logs na bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-16: pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:240b-17: bcom ldan 'das ma'i nye logs su rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mor 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-0: @241a *// tshangs pa'ang lag na ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-1: 'og tu log 'dren sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-2: lha thams cad kyang padma'i gdan la gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-3: sgrub pa po ni sngon bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-4: de nas sgrub pa pos bco lnga la gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la sngar bzhin rgyu skar rgyal la bsgril ba'i mchod phyir thogs byas la de nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dbul la mar gyi mar me'ang sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-5: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod phyir thogs lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g-yas par dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-6: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang g-yas pa'i phyag brgyad kyis reg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-7: ji srid dro bar gyur pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-9: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-10: 'bar ba na yid kyis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-11: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tshangs pa yid la bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-12: dran pa tsam gyis dbyug pa'i shing du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241a-13: yungs kar la lan brgya bzlas pa bsnun par bya ste mchod phyir thogs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-0: bcom ldan @241b 'das ma dran pa nyid kyi rjes su blangs par bya ste blangs ba tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa dkar zhing dvang ba'i lus rig pa 'dzin pas bcu gnyis kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-2: gang gi tshe 'pho ba de'i tshe slar yang rig pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-3: sgrub pa gzhan yang sngar bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod du bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-4: de nas slong mo'i zas za zhing shi ba'i ras blangs nas rdzas 'di rnams kyi bkru bar bya ste tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-8: r'a dza h'a ste rdzas 'di rnams gcig tu byas nas bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-9: mi blo gros dang ldan pas bkrus pa de la nyi ma bdun du bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-10: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bco lnga la dur khrod du song nas ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyi thang la nye bar byugs nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-11: me tog la sogs pas mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-12: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas nas de nas sgrub pa pos thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste ras des kun nas g-yogs pas srung ba byas pas ji srid dro ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:241b-14: 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-0: @242a *// dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-1: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-2: 'bar bas ni skra li zhing 'khyil ba lus dkar po rig pa 'dzin pa drug cu'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-3: ji ltar yang ras de kun tu g-yogs pa tsam gyis kyang bdag nyid du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-4: de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la'ang cha shas sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-5: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-6: de nas bgrang phreng sgrub par 'dod na sngon bzhin du rgya mtshor 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-7: de nas ku sha las byung ba'i bgrang phreng byas la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-8: de nas dur khrod du song nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-9: skyi bung bzhag nas bar du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-11: me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas gtor ma rgya chen po dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-12: de nas sgrub pa po'i ro'i brang khar nye bar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242a-13: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bgegs char lta bu la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-0: ji srid tsam gdung du 'gyur te yid kyis mchod yon phul nas slar yang ji srid bgrang phreng du 'gyur gyi @242b bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-1: slar yang sgrub pa pos 'chang bzhin pas bcom ldan 'das ma lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-2: de nas kun nas 'od zer 'byung ste rig pa dran pa gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-3: bzung ba tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa 'dod pa'i gzugs can nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag gis yongs su bskor ba skad cig thang gcig yud tsam la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro zhing tshangs par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-4: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-5: de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo la longs spyod par 'dod na slong mo bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-6: de nas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan chos 'chad bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-7: de'i spyan sngar yid kyis sngags thams cad bsten par byed na lha ma yin gyi rdzas rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:242b-8: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo tshangs pas gsungs pa le'u lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-0: de nas glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs @243a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-1: dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-2: nye bar lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-4: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-7: gang khyed sems can gyi don du cho ga 'chad pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-9: de nas gang khyod smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-10: glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pas smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-11: tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-12: smyung bar gnas pa med par bsgrub par bya ste bud med kyi ro blangs nas dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyi thang la nye bar byug pa byas nas shar du mgo bo bzhag nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-13: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyi mchod pas mchod de de'i bha gar mig sman bcug nas ji srid du 'gro bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243a-14: des rgyal ba'i spyan dang mtshungs par 'gyur te lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-0: nag po'i @243b bcu bzhi la skyes bu shi ba de'i yan lag las skyes pa blangs nas skam por byas te bska bas bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-2: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas phyi ma'i nag po'i bcu bzhi la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song nas 'byung pho thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te dbang phyug chen po g-yas kyi lus la bzhag nas kham phor kha sbyar du gnas pa'i de'i yan lag las skyes pa byas nas rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-3: de nas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma kham phor kha sbyar g-yo bar byed de rig pa dran pas blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-4: blangs pa tsam la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-6: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed de nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-7: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la dur khrod du song nas ma skyes par shi ba'i byis pa'i dbang po lnga blangs nas ril bur byas te lcags gsum gyis yongs su dkris nas de nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te thod pa'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-8: ril bu khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:243b-9: lo stong phrag drug 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-0: ma nyams pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong @244a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-1: la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das ma snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-2: glang po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa 'drir gzhug bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-3: bgegs kyi gzugs kha 'og tu bltas ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-4: 'og na sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-5: de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-6: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas legs par nges pa skyes pa'i ro blangs nas dur khrod du dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-7: me tog la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma mchod nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te grogs bzang pos srung ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-8: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ro'i dpral bar rkang pa byin nas gnas pas rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-9: ji srid na ldang bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-10: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas brdeg par bya ste gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-11: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rig pa bzlas te lag pa g-yas par reg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-12: reg ba tsam gyis kha ru sta mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-13: rig pa bzlas la blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-14: blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244a-15: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-2: rig pa 'dzin pa drug gis bskor pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-3: rlung ltar 'gro ba bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-4: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-5: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo phur bu gsum pas bshad pa le'u drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-6: de nas dbang ldan 'byung po'i bdag po ni 'di'i rig pas dga' nas cho ga gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-7: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag na padma bsnams pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-9: g-yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje brar ma'i me tog dang 'dra ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi nye logs su bcom ldan 'das ma pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-11: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-12: lha'i bu rnams kyang me tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-13: 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-14: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa zla ba gcig tu 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:244b-15: nas zan bza' zhing ras ris kyi spyan sngar rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-0: de nas mgo bo lnga'i thod pa blangs te gsum @245a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-1: gyis sgyed bu gsum byas te thod pa gcig zhag gis bkang nas de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-2: thod pa lnga pa la nye bar 'dug nas yungs kar re re la lan bdun bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-3: sbyin sreg de rdzogs pa na lbu ba 'byung ste lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-4: de nas du ba'i sgra thos te 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-5: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings thabs su yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun sngags pas bzhu bar bya ste skyes bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-6: rig pa dran pas stong cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-7: stong cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-8: sva ti ka ru 'gyur ro; ;de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ldong ros la lan bdun sngags pas de la thig le byas pas glang po'i dbang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-9: de la zhon pa tsam la skra li zhing 'khyil ba; lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-11: glang po che la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-12: lo stong phrag brgyad du 'tsho bar 'gyur te dpag tshad stong phrag bco brgyad du 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245a-13: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-0: tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med smyung bar gnas pa @245b med de bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-1: skyes bu shi ba'i ro blangs te chu klung gi 'gram du dri'i khrus byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos gsar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-2: rgyan gyis brgyan par byas nas mgo bo shar du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-3: sgrub pa pos grogs bzang po bsrung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas khar gzhug par bya zhing rig pa bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-4: ji srid du mi ro'i kha gdangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-5: de nas sgrub pa po 'jigs pa med par gyur pas rkang pa g-yon pas brang khar mnan nas sgra drag po 'byung bar mi byed pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-6: ji srid du du ba 'thul bar byed de 'jigs pa med pas dpral bar lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis gzhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-7: kha nas sprul mthong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya bar rig pa dran pas reg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-8: reg pa tsam gyis ral grir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-9: snying po dran pas gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-10: bzung ba tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-11: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-12: glang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bdag por thogs pa med par 'gyur te lo stong drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:245b-13: mdung thung gi sgrub par 'gyur te sngar bzhin du 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-1: zhing ri bo'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-2: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-3: grog mkhar gyi sa la 'o mas sbrus te sngar bzhin du 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-4: nas zan bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-5: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-6: grog mkhar gyi sa la 'o mas sbrus te rma bya'i gzugs bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-7: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyis ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-8: de nas dur khrod du song nas ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-10: bdug pa la sogs pas mngon par mchod nas 'byung po'i gtor ma byas nas de nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste thod pa gnyis par rma bya bzhag nas ji srid rma bya g-yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-11: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sa la ma lhung ba'i me tog la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa rnams kyis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246a-12: slar yang rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-0: phyogs nas lhan cig 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya bar snying pho dran pas rma bya la reg par @246b bya ste bud med du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-3: ci bgyi zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-4: de la bdag gi lus su gnas par mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-5: de nas de rig pa 'dzin pa'i lag mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-6: skad cig de nyid la skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-7: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi gang mthong nas lta bar byed pa ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-10: de rnams kyis lhan cig 'phur bar byed de sum cu rtsa gsum du rnam par rgyu bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-11: bskal bar gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe 'og min pa'i lha'i bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-12: seng ge sgrub par 'dod na sngar bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pas 'o ma'i zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-13: mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyis rig pa'i spyod pa'i rig pa 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-14: de nas thog phog pa'i shing 'o mar zhag bdun gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-16: tsandan gyi chur mnye bar bya ste thog phog pa'i shing gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-17: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rgyu skar rgyal la seng+ge gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:246b-20: dge 'dun la mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-1: pa 'dzin pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g-yas pas seng+ge mnan nas rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-2: ji srid seng+ge g-yo ba'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-3: g-yos pa tsam la'ang sa 'gul te yang dag par bzlas la 'jigs par mi bya bar slar yang lha'i rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs kyi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-4: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i me tog rnams kyis seng+ge la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-5: kun tu bsnun pas seng+ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed de sgrub pa po can gzhan gyis nges par bsam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-6: de nas rig pa slar yang bzlas par bya zhing seng+ge la zhon nas 'gro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-7: zhon pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog mngon par 'thor bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-8: seng+ge la zhon bzhin du rlung ltar 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-9: gang gi tshe seng ge sgra sgrogs par byed pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams stan las lhung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-10: lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247a-11: rig pa 'dzin pa bye bas yongs su bskor zhing bskal par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-0: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'jig @247b rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-1: bri yang ku'i shing las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas rgyu skar rgyal la ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir bcug nas de'i spyan sngar rig pa 'dzin pas mi smra bas rig pa 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-2: de nas dur khrod nas skyes pa'i ro blangs nas dri bzang po'i dri rnams kyis khrus byas nas legs par bsdams pa shar du mngon par phyogs par gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-3: de nas sgrub pa pos me tog la sogs pas mngon par mchod nas gtor ma rgya chen po byin te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas rin po ches bkab la bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun sngags pa byas la ro langs kyi khar sreg blugs lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-5: sgrub pa pos rings thabs su rkang pa'i mthe bong la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa bcom ldan 'das mas lan bdun mngon par sngags nas gzugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-6: slar yang sgrub pa pos ji srid khru gang gi tshad kyi lcer song gi bar du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:247b-7: 'brug gi sgra grag kyang skrag par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-0: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings thabs su bzlas pa bya zhing ka ra b'i ra @248a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-1: dkar po'i me tog gis ro langs kyi dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhu bar bya ste gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-2: de'i lce'i rtse mo rin po che kun tu mthong ste 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang ldan pa mdzes bzhin pa rig pa bzlas la blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-3: blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-4: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te gang zhig bsam pa de thams cad du skye ba ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-5: zag pa zad pa nyid bskal par gnas shing rin po ches kyang mgo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-6: mgo la brgyan par dpag tshad brgya stong phrag brgyad cur kun tu snang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-7: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang kun tu dbang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-8: gang gi tshe 'di 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ma yang dag par byon nas skul bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-9: bu rin po che'i mthu de rnams zad nas slar yang bsgrub par bya'o zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-10: phyis rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-11: ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248a-13: thams cad kyi tshe'ang 'di sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-0: dbang ldan gyis rab tu bshad pa'i bcom ldan @248b 'das ma'i rig pa'i rgyal mo'i le'u rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-1: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-2: rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis bgegs thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni mar mi shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-4: phar mi shes ba'ang yod de chos dang mi ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-15: bya rog gi rje ngar 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-27: gang yang gzhan nad kyis gzir ba rnams te 'di rnams kyis ji skad bshad pa'i rig pa mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-28: bdag cag gi bden pa'i tshig gis ji ltar sngar gyi las zad par byas nas de nas rig pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:248b-34: de lta bu rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-0: slar yang tsandan dkar po la byas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma bde bar gshegs pa'i khru gang gi tshad du byed du gzhug ste ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas @249a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-1: pas ma 'dras pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-2: de nas des rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bzhugs su gsol nas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing slong mo za zhing gur gum gyi bdug pa bsregs la 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-3: bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa na gu gul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-4: kun dzi ka'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-5: de nas las zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-6: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis log 'dren la lta bzhin 'di skad smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-9: gang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di 'chang bar byed pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa de la khyed cag rnams kyis nye bar 'gro bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-10: log 'dren gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-12: gang yang cho ga las 'das nas mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis sgrub par mi 'gyur rig pa de la bgegs kyi don du nye bar 'gro bar bya ste lo brgyar bsags pa 'di'i bsod nams kyang rnam par gzhom par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-15: khyed cag rnam par gzhom pa'i don du sman 'di rnams bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249a-16: zla bcas lto ba byams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-0: @249b stag 'joms pa dang lag bzhir bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-1: phag gi rna ba glang po 'bod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-2: spyod ral ru rta gur gum nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-3: lcags kyi phye ma dang bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-4: glang po che yi gcin gyis btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-5: btags nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-6: mkhas pas ril bur bya ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-7: me tog sgron ma gtor ma dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-8: bshang ba gci bar bong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-9: khrus bya mal stan gos bcing byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-10: dri dang me tog sogs thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-11: rab sbyar bya 'o rnam gzhan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-13: gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu yang log 'dren thams cad rnam 'khrugs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-14: gyur pa'i yid kyis phan tshun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-15: lta ngan phyogs bzhin 'bros par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-16: slar yang bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-17: gang du sman mchog 'di gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-19: dpag tshad brgya yi nang du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-21: 'di yi rtog pa thams cad kyi; ;dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-22: rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig slar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-23: dus gsum mnyam par dmigs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-24: sgrub po de la 'ga' zhig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-25: glags skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:249b-26: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan 'drir gzhug par bya ste gser ltar ser ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-2: g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-4: sngo bsangs lus mchod phyir thogs kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-6: phyag na rdo rje zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-7: phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-8: kun nas 'od 'phro ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-9: phyag na rdo rje'i nye logs su rgyal po chen po bzhi mtshon cha dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nye logs su bcom ldan 'das ma khro gnyer can ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-11: bri yang ku sngo bsangs 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-12: 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na spos phor thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-13: de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris kyi spyan sngar slong mo za zhing gtsang ma'i phyogs su 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-14: de nas ras ris blangs nas ri'i rtse mo la 'dzegs te sa nag po la ma he byas pa la ras ris mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-15: 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-16: de nas sgrub pa pos bsrung ba byas te gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ba snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250a-17: ji srid ma he'i rva g-yas pa la 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-0: @250b de nas yid kyis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-1: de nas ma he la zhon te zhon pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa bcu bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha'i lus su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-2: dpa' tshad stong phrag drug cu 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-3: lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-4: lo stong phrag lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-5: lus sbyang ba byas nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-6: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bya ste de nas sgrub pa pos ku sha las byung ba'i zhags pa byas nas lag pa g-yas pas mnan te ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-7: rig pa dran pas reg ste blangs pa de skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-8: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-9: lag na zhags pa thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-10: rig pa 'dzin pa bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-11: dpag tshad stong phrag lngar 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-12: lo stong phrag bcu bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro; ;gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:250b-13: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te slong mo za zhing snying po mnyam par 'gro ma bye ba bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-0: rig pa 'dzin pa lngas yongs su bskor ba thogs pa med par 'gro ste skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis mi med 'jig rten gyi khams su @251a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-1: 'gro bar byed cing song nas bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-2: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-3: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rgyal chen bzhis gsungs pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-4: de nas yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-5: dug gso ba ni yal 'dab las bab pa'i chus tshon bya zhing se gol dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-6: gar byed bzhin pas yid kyis bzlas pa byas pa'i me tog dkar po la lan bdun bzlas pas gdung ba gso bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-7: srad bus gdon skrag par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-8: gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-9: sna ma'i me tog gis skrod par byed do //
