K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-10: yungs kar khrag dang bcas pa la bzlas pas sdang ba rnams phyir zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-11: ba lang gi shas skems par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-14: ske tshe rnams kyis dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-15: aarga'i me tog gis nor sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251a-16: me tog brgya pas sha za rnams skrag pa'i yid kyis 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-0: klu @251b rnams ni klung gi me tog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-1: phub mas rig pa gcod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-2: 'dis pha rol gyi rig pa sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-3: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum du brje zhing 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-4: nas zan za bas 'bum phrag bcur bzlas pa bya ste lus sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-5: de nas sgrub pa pos rgyu skar rgyal la sa ser po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-7: ljang khus nam mkha' lding 'drir gzhug pa ste 'di'i mgrin pa la padma'i phreng ba sbyin par bya'o; ;de la sgrub pa pos rin po che gsum gyis mchod pa byas nas de nas sgrub pa pos pa las byung bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te sgo bzhi rnams su bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-8: bum pa gang ba bzhi po rnams la klu'i rgyal po bzhi 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-9: de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar sar blangs nas zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid du ba 'thul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-10: 'bar bar byed pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-11: du ba 'thul ba na 'thungs pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:251b-12: lo stong phrag bcu bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-0: @252a *// thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-1: rig pa 'dzin pa bcus yongs su bskor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-2: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-3: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas slong mo za zhing klu shing gi me tog la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-5: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na klu rnams lang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-6: de nas sgrub pa pos 'jigs pa med pas dbus su me tog gis brgyan pa'i bum pa gzhag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-7: de'i steng du 'khor lo gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-8: de nas sgrub pa pos srung ba byas te klu'i stan la nye bar 'dug pas ji srid nam mkha' lding las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o; ;sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas de nyid kyi spyi bor nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-9: rig pa bzlas pas blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-10: de la zhon pas rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag drug cu nye bar 'gro ste yid kyi rlung ltar 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-11: nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang mtshungs pa klu'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang dpag tshad stong du 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-12: dri mnams pas lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252a-13: gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-0: @252b sngon spyad pa byas na de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dur khrod du song nas ba byung gis ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam du sa gzhi byug par byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-1: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te gtor ma rgya chen po bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-2: gzhan pa'i nag po'i tshes brgyad pa la dur khrod du song nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyis gzhi nye bar byugs te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas sgrub pa pos rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-3: khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-4: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-5: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo nam mkha' lding gis bshad pa'i le'u dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-6: de nas ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-13: lus srul po rnams stan las langs nas 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der nye bar lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-14: nye bar lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas rig pa'i cho ga smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:252b-15: tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med pas smyung bar gnas pa med par bya ste rig pa gang kho na tshad ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-0: dur khrod du dbang phyug chen @253a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-1: po'i g-yas kyi lus la rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-3: 'od ma lhags pa blangs nas lcags gsum gyis de la dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-4: de nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-6: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-7: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'ang byas nas de nas sgrub pa pos thod pa lag pa g-yon pas blangs te lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid ca co'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-8: rig pa dran pas blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro; ;sa'i cha drug 'phrog cing lo stong du 'tsho'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-10: lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-11: nag po'i brgyad pa la bud med shi ba de'i lce blangs nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te yid rlung ltar 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-12: 'di'i tshangs par sbyad pas 'dod pa rnams la sems bskyed na de gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing bskal ba chen por gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253a-13: yid kyis skye ba 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-0: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du zla ba drug @253b rig pa bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-2: 'ug pa'i mig sman dang lhan cig btags par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-3: lcags gsum gyis dkris pa'i ril bu byas nas dbang phyug chen po'i g-yas kyi lus la kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag par byas nas lag pa g-yas pas mnan te rig pa dam pa dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya ste ji srid du rnam par chad do'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-4: rig pa dran pas ril bu blangs te khar bcug na mi snang par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-5: lo stong phrag gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-9: padma ge sar mnyam par 'gro ba'i rdzas mnyam par byas te lcags gsum gyis dkri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-10: rgyal la sbyor ba rnam par shes par bya zhing de nas bsgrub par bya zhing sha za sgrub par 'dod pas dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-11: chang la sogs pa'i gtor ma byas te kha shar du phyogs par mi'i skra la khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na sha za thams cad 'ong ste 'jigs bar mi bya zhing srung bar yang mi bya bar 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:253b-12: bdag gi dbang du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-2: de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-3: nyi ma re re la'ang dong tse lnga lnga ster bar byed do de rnams kyang zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-4: dur khrod du yi dvags dri med nyid kyi ming nas smos pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-5: dur khrod du gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-6: de nas rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-7: de la'ang ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-8: dur khrod du til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nyi ma bdun du mtshan mo sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-9: nyi ma re re la dngul lnga lnga sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-10: ku mu ta la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-12: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nges par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-13: dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs brnyan byas te de la nye bar 'dug nas aarga'i shing la me sbar nas dri zhim po'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sna ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254a-14: cho ga 'di kho nas ming nas smos na l'anydza'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-0: bud med dbang du byed na aa ti mukta'i me tog gi sbyin @254b sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur te nyi ma bdun nas yid kyis gang gi tshe bsams pa de'i tshe 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-1: dur khrod du song nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te sha chen gyis sbyin sreg byas nas nyi ma bdun pa la sha zas zin pa rnams bltas pas thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-2: dur khrod du sha chen gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na sha za thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-3: ne le'i spu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-4: dur khrod du bshang ba'i sbyin sreg byas na srul po'i zin pa rnams yid kyis kyang thar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-5: khrag gis sbyin sreg byas na mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-6: dur khrod du botta ka'i sbyin sreg byas na'ang sha za mi 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-7: sbrul gyi shun pa'i sbyin sreg byas na sbrul rnams 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-8: de nas sgrub pa pos gtor ma byas nas aarga'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-9: rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can gyi gnod sbyin ma 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya bar rig pa dran pas stod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:254b-11: de de'i tshe mchog gsum po rnams kyi gcig 'dam du stsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-0: ma ni bu'i bya ba thams cad byed @255a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-1: do; ;sring mo ni nyi ma re re la dong tse re ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-2: chung ma ni de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed de lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro; ;gang gi tshe rig pa 'dzin pa nyams pa de'i tshe 'di bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-3: mtshan mo gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te bsrung ba byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang; 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-5: bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod ba byas nas shar du phyogs pas rig pa'i lha thams cad la bdug spos phul nas rig pa 'dzin pas dug la khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-6: ku sha bting ba la nyal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-7: gal te gzhon nu mdung thung thogs pa mthong na de'i tshe dri zas rdzas nyams par byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-8: gang gi tshe bram ze mthong na de'i tshe lha rnams kyis nyams par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-9: gang gi tshe rdo rje mthong na de'i tshe rdo rje'i rigs kyis rdzas nyams par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255a-10: gang gi tshe dga' ba mthong na de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gis nyams par byas pa'o; ;gang gi tshe lha min rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe rgyu mi mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-0: gang gi tshe klu rnams kyi nyams par byas pa de'i tshe sbos kyi glang po'i rgyal @255b po mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-1: gang gi tshe pha rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-2: gang gi tshe mi gtsang bas nyams par byas pa de'i tshe glang po'i phags pa gyon pa'i dbang phyug chen po mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-3: gang gi tshe gnod sbyin rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe nor bu bzang po mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-4: gang gi tshe sha za rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe skyes bu gcer bu mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-5: gang gi tshe 'byung po rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe sbrin mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-6: aarga'i yam shing gis me sbar nas mar dang; sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-7: sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-8: dri za rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te bcom ldan 'das la gtor ma'ang phul nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste k'amba dza'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-10: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:255b-11: sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro; ;rdo rje'i rigs la'ang sbyin sreg ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-0: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing bcom @256a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-1: ldan 'das la'ang gtor ma'i cho ga byas la de nas sgrub pa pos kha shar du phyogs la gu gul gyi ril bus sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-2: nam mkha' lding rnams la dur khrod du mandal la nye bar byugs pa byas nas mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-3: gtor ma'ang ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste ka ra b'i ra'i me tog la sogs pa'i mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-4: lha ma yin rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dbang phyug chen po la dri sna tshogs kyis mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-5: bcom ldan 'das la'ang gtor ma byas nas g-yas kyi lus la shar du phyogs pas ka ra b'i ra'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-6: ma mo'i sbyin sreg ni smin pa'i zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256a-7: sha'i gtor ma phul nas phag pa'i rul ma la chang gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-0: gnod sbyin rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma phul nas kha shar du phyogs nas aarga'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyar byas na @256b rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-1: sha za rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas til gyi til mar gyis btags pa'i nim pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-2: 'byung po rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod kyi thal bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas gtor ma'ang ci 'byor pa phul te ba lang gi sha'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-3: yi dvags rnams la n'ir ma la'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-8: sha za thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u bcu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-9: ma bsgrubs yang yang las su 'gyur te char ma babs pa la chur zhugs te rig pa bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis char 'bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-10: khu ba 'ching ba la srad bus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-11: myos pa rnam par 'joms pa rnams la dur khrod kyi thal bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-12: bsung ba la ni rgya skyegs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:256b-13: gzer gyis nyam thag pa la aardza nas zug rngu dang bral bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-2: gcod par byed chu gri dang gsum gyis mche ba 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-3: gu gul gyi bdug pas gnas nas skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-4: 'di rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-8: 'di bdag dpe'i don du 'chang bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-9: klog par byed pa de bzhin du 'di'ang gtsang ma bgos pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste bklags par bya ste cho ga 'di nyi ma bdun du bklag pa byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-10: char ches na grog mkhar la 'dzegs te bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad nye bar bzlas na de nas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-13: bdug pa gang la sbyin par bya ste rig pa thams cad 'gugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-17: rig pa thams cad gsod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-18: gdug pa'i yid skrag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-20: des 'di'i las bya ste gur gum gyis chus rmongs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-21: ser mos sbrul 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257a-23: padma'i rtsa ba las skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-0: me tog bzang po rnams kyis @257b 'byin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-1: bdug spos kyis smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-2: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog gis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-3: aa ka ru'i bdug pas 'phral du bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma'i las stong rtsa brgyad po 'di rnams rab tu sbyar bar bya ste yam shing gi mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-5: rked pa dang; rtse mo'ang bskrad pa'i don gyis sdong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-7: rked pas ni nor 'dod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-8: rtse mos ni zhi ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-10: nor 'dod pas tho rangs kyi dus su gnod sbyin yongs su rgyu bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-11: des na de'i nor sbyin pa'i las kyi dngos grub du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-12: bskrad par 'dod pas bar du gnas pas mtshan mo'i snga ma la rtsa ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-13: sdigs mdzub kyi tshad tsam la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-14: khrag gis btags pas dur khrod kyi me la sbyin sreg bya'o; ;mtshan mo phyed nas yi dvags rab tu rgyu ste des de las mngon spyod kyi las rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-15: sgrub pa chen po la khru'i tshad kyi yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-16: mar gyis btags pas kha shar du phyogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:257b-17: des sgrub pa po de'i sgrub pa chen po sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-0: dbang du byed pa la byang @258a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-1: chub kyi shing gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-2: sdigs mdzub kyi tshad tsam 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-3: nyin zhag bdun du nyi ma 'char kar aa p'a marga'i yam shing khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-4: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-5: nad bskyed par 'dod na p'a n'a ya'i ril ma'i sbyin sreg nyi ma bdun du byas na nad bskyed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-6: ming nas smos nas sgrub par 'gyur te rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-8: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-9: sgrub pa pos phug gi sgo ru dur khrod du gos gtsang ma bgos pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste phug gi sgo la mngon par phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste thams cad gnas nas 'byor par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-10: dogs pa med par rab tu 'jug par bya ste lha ma yin sel bzhes bya ba'i rig pa dran bzhin pas rab tu blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258a-11: bud med la dga' ba dang bcas pas yongs su bzlas nas gtogs par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-0: @258b de nas sgrub pa pos gsum pos 'di byed par 'dod pas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-1: de nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor la tsandan na dmar pos nye bar byugs te srung ba byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste phug gi sgo la mngon par phyogs pas rig pa snying po mnyam par 'gro mas aa p'a marga'i yam shing la dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-2: khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-3: de nas sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa nas thal ba la yongs su bzlas nas gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-4: gsum po 'dir 'gyur te dogs pa med par rab tu 'jug par bya zhing lha ma yin gyi bu mo des mthong nas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-5: de nas sgrub pa'i rdzas de blang bar bya ste gang 'dod pa de rig pas mngon par sngags nas blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-6: 'khor los sems can thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-7: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-9: skar ma gnas kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:258b-10: de bzhin du ldong ros dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-1: chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams kyis zla ba nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-2: skar ma'i bar du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-5: sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams su la'ang phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pa ma gtogs lha'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-7: de nas rnam pa gzhan ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags 'di rnams thams cad bgags par byed pa ni yungs kar gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-8: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis dam pa mchog tu gsang ba gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-9: lha ma yin gyi bu ga'i sgor song nas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-10: nas zan za bas bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-11: lha ma yin gyi bu mo mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-12: de rnams ral gri sbyin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259a-13: grub pa'i rdzas gzhan snang bar byed de de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro; ;lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris kyis bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-0: byang chub sems @259b dpa'i sde snod phal po che las bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo'i skyed par byed pa'i gsang chen zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-1: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas bsam pa rnam par dag pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du rtog pa'i rgyal pos rig pa'i sngags 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-2: bar skabs 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i thugs kar phyogs nas bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-3: 'od zer des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yongs su bskor nas sems can rnams snang bar byas te slar yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-4: bar skabs 'di gsungs par gyur pa de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:259b-6: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-0: a'a ro lika 'di ni mchog gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba de yin te bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i cho ga gdon mi za ba @260a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-1: kho nar sgrub pa po rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-2: don med ba thams cad zlog par byed pa; sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa de'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-5: tho rangs stan las langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags te shar du mngon par phyogs te btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-6: las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por zhi ba can gyis las thams cad 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-8: nye bar gnod pa med par dran par 'gyur zhing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-9: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-10: lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-11: de bzhin du rgyas pa can ni nyi ma gzhan la 'di rnams bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-12: bar ma la mngon spyod can barna ta rab tu 'jug pa la ming med kyi sor mo lan bdun mngon par sngags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-15: mngon spyod can la sdigs mdzub la bzlas pa nyid kyis de brtsams par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260a-16: gang la la rnam pa de lta'i cho ga byed pa de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-0: bzlas pa'i @260b dus su bdag nyid kyi snying gar 'dis mngon par sngags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-1: de'i dngos grub nges par brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-2: sgrol ma'i ched du sgrub pa ni nges par myur bar bshad pa de bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-3: sgrub pa pos blo dang ldan pas rig pa thams cad la de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po stobs chen po bdag gi sngags kyi rig pa shin tu dge ba dga' bar rab tu bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-4: sgrub pa pos kyang bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-5: dag pa byas la de rtag tu rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i las 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-6: gang la la sgrub pa byed par 'gyur ba de rnams gdon mi za bar rig pa 'dzin pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dang bas 'byung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-7: yang 'di'i cho gar 'gyur te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:260b-9: gzhan du'ang rung ste gtsang ma'i phyogs su gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-0: rig pa so sor sgrub pa'i ston mo'i bza' ba yongs su spangs la mchod pa yongs su rdzogs pas gso sbyong @261a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-2: gso sbyong la mi gnas par yang rung ste 'bum phrag phyed dang gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-3: sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-4: mchod pa byas nas bsnyen pa'ang sa ga'i nya'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-5: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-6: snying po sgrub bar 'gyur ro de nas las rnams su 'gyur te cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la aa ka ru'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-8: mar las btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-9: me tog stong phrag brgyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-10: me tog stong phrag brgyad po rnams kyis gzugs brnyan la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-11: yang na slar yang mtshan mo thams cad du bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-12: de nas ma mthong na dong tse lnga rtag tu rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-13: mtshan mo bdun du thun mtshams gsum du mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261a-14: myos byed kyi shing la gzugs brnyan byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-0: rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas thur mas rkang pa phug ste thun mtshams gsum du brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gnyis pa la @261b rkang ba dag gis 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-1: mya ngan med pa'i shing gis sor mo drug pa'i sha la bhanydzi ka byas nas ri'i rtse mor gnas te 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-2: nas zan bza' zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-3: mthar zla ba nya la mchod pa bya ste mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du aa shvattha'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ji srid 'ongs ba de srid bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-4: legs par 'ongs sam zhes brjod par bya zhing mchog sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na chung ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-6: grogs mo'ang rung ste bdag nyid dang bcu gnyis la bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-8: dong tse'ang rab tu stsol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-10: zla ba gza' yis zin pa na rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar sar blangs nas sor drug pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te zas bzhin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-11: smyung bar gnas pas aa shvattha'i 'dab mar bzhag nas ji srid zla ba grol gyi bar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-12: de la dngos grub rnam pa gsum ste dro bzhin pa la rkang pas rab tu rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-13: tshe lo lnga brgya thub ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-14: dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-15: thams cad du mi snang bar gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-16: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-17: sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa la mi reg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:261b-19: dpag tshad stong du 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-1: lo stong phrag gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-2: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-5: mar gyis btags pa'i padma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-6: sol ba'i dbus su dpal lha mo'i gzugs padma phyag na bsnams pa kun tu bkod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-7: de mchog sbyin par byed de ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-9: grogs mo gyis shig ces bya bar brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-10: des dong tse stong stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-11: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-12: gso sbyong la gnas pas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-13: nas zan bza' zhing dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig nas brtsams nas sngar gyi nas yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-14: nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-15: lte ba tsam gyi chur zhugs nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-16: gter thams cad mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-21: shi ba sogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-25: mo gsham la bu ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-26: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags na sdang ba gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262a-27: rgyal po'i sgor srung ba byas na dgra rnams la mtshams bcad bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-0: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod @262b rten gyi drung du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-1: ras dkar pos bgo ba byas nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-2: 'khor stong dang bcas par 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-3: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-4: ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-5: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-7: mchod phyir thogs dkar po can 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa 'di la mchod pa chen po byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-9: gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu klung 'gram du gso sbyong la gnas pas mchod rten rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can byas nas de la mchod pa byas te snying po bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-10: bar ma la slar yang mchod rten byas nas nyi ma nub pa nas ji srid stong phrag brgyad de srid du bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-11: de nas cho ga 'dis rig ba 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu bde ba can du 'gro bar byed cing sangs rgyas mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-15: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed na aa p'a marga'i yam shing la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:262b-16: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-0: bud med dang skyes pa dbang du @263a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-1: byed pa la thun gsum du gu gul gyi ril bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-2: aa ga ru'i ril bus stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-3: rgyal po'i khab tu'ang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-4: shu dag khar bcug nas ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-5: dro bzhin pas ni yid gzhungs shing dpa' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-6: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-8: rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-9: slong mo za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas dpa' bo'i stan la nye bar 'dug te 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-10: de nas yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung ste lha rnams kyis lhan cig gnas shing gang 'dod pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-11: de nas za ma tog dkar po yi ges dkris pa ldong ros bcug nas ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-12: dro bzhin pa la yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263a-13: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-0: rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas @263b bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-1: slong mo za zhing mi smra bar ku sha bting ba la nyal nas na ga ge sar gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-2: nyi ma bdun pa la 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-3: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-4: nyi ma bdun pa la mchog tu yid gzhungs shing dpa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-5: dga' ba 'khyil ba'i me tog gis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-6: skyes pa rnam par ldang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-7: dbang du byed pa la zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-8: seng ldeng la phur bu sor bzhi ba'i tshad byas nas phyogs bzhir gdab par byas te mtshams bcings pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-9: mig sman ldong ros grub par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-10: nas zan bza' zhing nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bzhi la bzhag nas bzhi pas mnan te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:263b-11: zhal lce ba la rig pa bzlas pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-0: gdong la yongs su bzlas pas rgyal bar 'gyur @264a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-1: ro; ;khros pa'i mdun yongs su bzlas na rab tu zhum par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-2: yug sa mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar me tog dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste gang don du gnyer ba de la mchog sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-3: yungs kar dkar pos mche ba can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'ching ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-7: glang po che'i nang du song bas dran par bya zhing gso sbyong la gnas pas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byams pa la gnas pas sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-8: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-9: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste ma nyams pa'i ras mnyen pa la ston kha'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-12: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-15: ras kyi sham thabs can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264a-16: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-0: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ras ris bzhugs su @264b gsol nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-1: de nas zla ba nya la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas nas de nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te aa rishta'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-3: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las 'od zer 'byung ste sa g-yo bar 'byung zhing rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-5: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-6: me tog gi chun po g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-7: ras ris 'gul bar byed de de nas grub bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-8: de nas las rnams dge bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-10: dngos grub thams cad kyis dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-11: dbang du gyur nas gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-12: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na rna ba'i mig sman aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btum par byas nas ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-13: tsandan dmar po las byung ba'i sor bcu drug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-14: sor bcu pa'i dbyug pa'i shing byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur gyi bar du 'bum phrag gsum bzlas bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:264b-16: gang byed pa de thams cad de byed du gzhug bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-0: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas gso sbyong @265a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-1: can gyi dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum du brjes la 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-2: bsnyams pa'i ras la lha 'drir gzhug par bya ste ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-4: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-5: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dbugs rdub bzhin pas lag pa gnyis su dz'i bas bkang la ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin cing mchod phyir thogs dkar po can padma'i phreng ba 'chang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-6: de nas dkar po'i brgyad nas brtsams nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-7: ras ris la padma dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya zhing 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-8: cho ga gzhan ni rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub pa byed par 'dod pas log 'dren rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po ni yungs kar la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dpag tshad stong du 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-9: de nas rig pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-10: rnam pa gzhan du dug 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-11: pha rol gyi rig pa bcing bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265a-12: ming nas smos te ras kyi kha tshar la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags nas mdud ba bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-0: gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rang byung du byon yang des kyang ji srid rig pa 'dzin pas @265b dkrol gyi bar du dkrol bar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-1: zhi bar 'dod pas sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-2: slong mo za bas bye ba yongs su bzlas par bya ste mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-3: rig pa 'dis stong phrag bcur bzlas pas gzhan nad kyis btab pa rab tu 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-4: slong mo za zhing bye ba yongs su bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong ste mchog gsum rtsol bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-5: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-7: lha ma yin gyi khyim du 'dug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-8: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas bye ba yongs su bzlas na lha thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing rtag tu'ang mthong ba rtsol bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-9: padma can gyi mtshor padma dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-11: bklags pa tsam gyis thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-12: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te me long la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin sreg gi thal bas khye'u 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-13: bu mo la bstan bar bya ste ma nyams ma zad par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:265b-15: dri'i til mar gyis byugs nas byis pa rnams la bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-0: snod chus gang bar byas nas thams cad la bstan par bya ste thams cad @266a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-1: mthong zhing sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-2: lan bdun du bzlas pas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-3: grong du rab tu zhugs nas bza' ba don du gnyer na stong bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-5: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa la bzlas pas rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-6: bye ba bzlas pas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-7: zla ba gzas bzung ba nas ba ra ha ka mi ka'i rtsa ba blangs nas lag pa kha sbyar bas mnan te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-8: nyi ma gzas bzung ba na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-9: chu klung du song zhing 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-10: nas zan za zhing bye ba bzlas na klu thams cad 'ong bar byed cing de rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-11: de nas sgrub pa pos klu'i gnas kyi dngos grub 'byung bar bya ste; klu'i gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rang gi khyim bzhin du rnam par rgyu bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-12: klu'i gnas su song nas 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang nas ji srid klu mgo bo bdun pa 'ong bar byed pa de srid du rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-13: rin po che rnams kyang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266a-14: sa la rgyal po'i gter 'don pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-0: de @266b nas gcig tu yang dag par blangs par bya ste ma blangs na klu'i 'ching ba lnga 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-1: sngags 'di nyid kyis stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu chu klung gi 'gram du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-2: rgyun 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po'i me tog rnams g-yas su 'khor bar byed na rig pa 'dzin pas grub bo zhes shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-3: de nas chu'i nang du 'ong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-5: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-6: byang chub kyi shing drung du bye ba bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-7: tshul khrims dang ldan pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-8: mthu chen po can ji srid du bsgrubs pa gnyis pa'o zhes pa gnyis pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas padma 'byung ste 'dab ma dga' ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-9: dri yid du 'ong ba'i padma de blangs pas zas su dga' ba za ba'i lang tsho dang ldan la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-11: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-12: lha gzhon nu rnams las lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-14: yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-15: lo bye ba brgya stong phrag tu 'tsho zhing 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:266b-16: b'a sha ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg bya ste gser stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-0: seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar nas mya @267a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-1: ngan med pa'i me tog mar la btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-2: zlos bzhin pas ni yid kyi stong phrag brgyad cu sbyin sreg byas na yid rtse gcig pa nyid lus me dang mtshungs pa stobs dang pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-3: slar yang bye ba bzlas par bya ste mngon sum du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-5: yid kyis 'bum phrag brgyad cu rnams kyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-6: dpag tshad brgyad du 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-7: 'og tu'ang dpag tshad brgyar 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-8: sa la'ang steng du 'byin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-9: gter thams cad mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-10: gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas 'di gsol cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267a-11: gzhan yang; 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i cho gar gyur te sngon spyad pa bya zhing gso sbyong la gnas pas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la dkyil 'khor byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-0: bzlas pas yongs su rdzogs pa na gso sbyong la gnas pa nyid kyis ji ltar nus pa'i mchod @267b byas nas chu stod can gyi zla ba nya la dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i bsod snyoms kyi zas bza' bar bya zhing sha dang bral ba'i shin tu gya nom pas dri gtsang khang du dkyil 'khor te bar byugs pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-3: bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas ku sha bting ba la skyil krung bcing te bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis las kyi dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-4: ji srid sgrub pa gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-5: zhes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mthong bar byed do; ;gang 'dod cing 'dod pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-6: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes rtsa ba'i rtog par 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-7: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang rig pa thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rig pa'i le'u gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-8: bklags pas grub pa myur du grub cing rang gis bdag nyid grub pa g-yeng ba'i don grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:267b-10: ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te de ji lta ba bzhin rtog par bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-2: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-5: na mo bidy'a de ba t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-6: na mo bidy'a de ba t'a n'am na ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-8: bi dy'a ku la bam sha sye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-10: sarba aartha bighna na bi n'a sh'a ya a'a ha ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-13: bi h'a te dz'a bi ma le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-20: pra bh'a sva re aa lo ki te bhya: bi l'a ka la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-22: aa ba lo ka ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-23: rig pa 'dis las 'di rnams su 'gyur te bsnyen pa'i dus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-24: sgrub pa'i dus su'ang dang po nyid du bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-25: bslab pas bcing ba'i grogs rnams kyang lan bdun nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i chu spyi bor blugs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-29: bsngags pa la sogs pa'ang 'di nyid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-30: ras ris blangs te lha rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-31: ras ris la kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-32: ras ris kyi gnas su tshon gzhan dang ma 'dres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-33: spyan drangs pa'i lha rnams la mchod yon dbul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-34: yang dag par gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268a-36: grogs byed pa rnams kyang 'di nyid kyis khu ba bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-0: khu ba bcings pas log 'dren thams @268b cad 'joms pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-2: 'di nyid kyis tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-4: grogs byed pa rnams kyang rung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu phyogs gang du sngon du bsnyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-8: mngon spyod can ci yin pa de nyid du gdon mi za bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-9: yang na gzhan du thang gi phyogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-10: sa'i gnas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-11: gzhan las bya ba der byi der dang por bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-12: rnam pa 'dis gtor ma sbyong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-17: las gang cung zad yin pa de 'dis bsrung ba la sogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-20: na mo aa mi t'a bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-24: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-27: mah'a k'a ru ni ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-28: na mo bha ga ba tyee /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-35: ro sha na sh'i ghram a'a gatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:268b-49: sam gha satye na sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-1: dang po gang yin pa des dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-2: rig pa 'dis aa ga ru'i bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-3: sngar brjod pa'i rig pas lan gsum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-4: bdun bzlas pas byi dor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-5: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par sngags nas sgrub pa ni rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-6: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma spyan drang par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-8: na ma aa mi t'a bha ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-27: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-28: na mo aa mi t'a bha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-32: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-35: na ma a'arya t'a r'a yee /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-39: brahma su ma no nu ru ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-43: de bi phra s'a dh'i ku ru pra t'itstsha tha pushpa sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-44: me tog gi rig pa ste 'dis me tog rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-45: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:269a-46: na mo aa mi t'a bha ya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:270a-14: 'di nyid kyis lha rnams la'ang khrus gsol ba'i rig pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:270a-30: shuddhi k'a re shu tsa ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:270a-31: rig pa 'di sgrub pa pos rtag tu gos la lan gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:270a-32: lan bdun bzlas la yongs su bcang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:270a-33: rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa rnams kyis nges par ston no //
