K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-13: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-16: zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-17: mtshan phyed nas chu klung du phyin nas dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste dong tse lnga brgya rnyed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-19: 'di zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du so ma r'a je'i 'bras bu rnams phye ma zhib mor byas nas mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-20: sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i ril bu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-21: aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du btums nas lag pas mnan te ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-24: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:275b-25: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-3: da ra da ra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-4: rig pa 'dis nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas de nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du song nas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-5: nas zan za bas phyogs su gso sbyong byas te padma dkar po kha bye ba 'bum dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-8: na mo a'a mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-12: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-15: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya; tadya th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-17: tutt'a re tutt'a re sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-18: 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma spobs pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-20: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-24: na ma a'arya ma ba le ke te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-27: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-29: tutt'a re tutt'a re sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-30: 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'od gnyis sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-31: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-32: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-36: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-42: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276a-43: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-0: bo dhi satv'a @276b ya; mah'a satv'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-1: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-3: t'a re t'a re tutt'a re sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-4: 'di ni las chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-5: de nas rig pa 'di rnams kyis mchog tu grub pa'i cho ga phyogs tsam du 'gyur te ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed do zhes pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o; ;mdor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-7: las phran tshegs rnams la'ang bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-8: cho ga 'di la'ang rig pa sgrub par 'dod pas rig pa des ba byung lngas lus kun tu sbyangs nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-9: ji srid du zla ba nya la 'bum yang rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-10: sngon bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-11: de nas mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor drug pa'i tshad la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-14: du ru ska'i til mar gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-15: las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:276b-16: de nas las su 'gyur te mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-0: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i @277a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-2: so so'i khyim du stong phrag bcur mngon par sngags nas lag pa la bcings na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-3: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas padma stong phrag sum cu seng ldeng gi sol bas me sbar nas sbyin sreg byas na rang gi gzugs kyi lha mo mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-4: gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-5: tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing me sbar nas mar gyi sreg blugs stong sbyin sreg byas na grong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-6: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du mchod rten stong byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-7: nyi ma so so re re la mchod rten la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-8: me tog la sogs pa 'di la phul nas ji srid du mchod rten phyi ma 'bar ba de nas bcom ldan 'das byon par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-9: bcom ldan 'das byon pa nas g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-10: dri zhim po'i rlung ldang ste ji srid du rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar gnas pa de srid du bzlas par ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-11: mchog gang blangs pa'i mchog stsol bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi 'dab ma'i dum bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-0: @277b nyi ma so sor grong re re rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-1: dgon par song nas rig pa bye ba bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-2: slong mo bza' zhing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-4: mar gyis btags pa'i dgon pa'i ba lang gi lcibs sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-5: ji srid lha rnams ri dvags mo'i gzugs su byas nas 'ong bar 'gyur te de la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-6: de'ang gter stsol bar byed de blang bar bya'o; ;rang nyid longs shig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-10: rin po che rnams ster bar byed de rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sbyar zhing bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-11: dgon par zhugs nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya zhing aa ga ru'i shing la rab tu gnas pa'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la shing pa tsha landi ka la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-13: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong byas na 'dod 'jo'i ba ser skyar 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-14: slar yang patsha lindi k'a'i sbyin sreg stong phrag nyi shu bya'o; ;'ongs nas kyang grub par 'gyur par te lo stong du 'o ma sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-15: sngar brjod pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-16: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-17: zla ba drug tu dong rtse stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-18: yang na pan stong lhag pa dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:277b-19: ku mu da'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-2: sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pas lha rnams mchog sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas g-yul du gtor bar byas te 'di nyid stong phrag bzlas pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-4: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i bcu gsum la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-6: bdug pas mchod pa byas nas me tog kha bye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-7: mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-8: thal ba blangs nas gzhan gyi dpral bar thig le byas te grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-9: grong khyer du rab tu 'jug par byed de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-10: nag po'i bcu bzhi nas ji srid bco lnga'i bar du zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas pa ta'i shing gi 'og tu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-11: bdug pa phul nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma phul te mi'i rus pa blangs nas rtse gsum byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278a-12: lag pa g-yon pas lan bdun 'phangs pa mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rtse gsum 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-0: de @278b nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pas gang sprul pa der 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-1: lha'i khang par zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-2: nyi ma gzas bzung ba na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-3: sku gzugs kyi khang par ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i mar srang cig blangs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gser gyi snod du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te zla ba mi lta ba nyid du ku shas steng nas g-yogs te bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-4: dro bzhin pa na btung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-5: sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-6: lci ba byung ba na btung par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-7: 'bar bzhin pa na btung bar bya ste nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-8: zla ba drug tu sngon spyad pa byas pa ba'i gcin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-9: nas zan bza' zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-10: bcom ldan 'das ma rtag tu bzlas pas ma blangs par gser brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-11: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi lor brtsam par bya ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mchod pa byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-13: bdug pa legs pa de bzhin du phul te yan lag brgyad kyi gso sbyong dang yang dag par ldan pas lo rdzogs pa na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:278b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris 'ching bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-0: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya ba'i @279a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-1: bar ches lhag pa'i mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-2: slong mo bza' bar bya ste grub bo zhes pa'i tshig 'don par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-3: mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas pas pha rol zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-4: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-6: bdug pa la sogs pa de bzhin du phul nas dung gi me tog can gyi me tog stong phrag brgya la ai gu ta'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-12: ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-13: de nas yang bra dbab par byed par 'dod na mtshan mo bdun du 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-14: nas zan bza' zhing mtshan mo gcig tu gso sbyong dang ldan pas dri ma med pa'i mar gyi lhung bzed bkang nas dkar po'i mar sar gyis mar me sbar nas gzhon nu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-15: gzhon nu ma la bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-16: de nyid du ras ris bzhugs nas ku sha bting ba la nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-17: rmi lam du rdzas stong phrag nyi shu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279a-18: ngo; ;cha phyed dkon mchog gsum la sbyar bar bya'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-0: ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas pas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du nyi ma re re la sbyin sreg @279b stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-3: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-4: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad de rig pa bzlas par byas la cho 'phrul gyi phyogs nas lam po cher song la 'byung po'i blang du gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-5: rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-6: yungs kar bre ru blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par sngags nas phyogs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-8: mchog bdag nyid la ston par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-9: de bzhin du nag po'i brgyad pa la dri gtsang khang du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa stong du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-11: me tog la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-12: gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas de nas rim lam du bcom ldan 'das ral pa'i cod pan byas pa mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-13: sa ga'i zla ba dkar po'i phyogs la 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-14: nas zan bza' zhing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-15: me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas nyi ma re re la ston mo bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-16: chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi sman dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-17: sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba byas nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:279b-18: mtshan mo re re la stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags par byas nas bya rog gi tshang du bu byung gi bar khye'u dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-0: @280a *// longs spyod kyi don zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-1: nag po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-3: bdug pa la sogs pa dbul bar byas nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gi me sbar te me tog brgya pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-4: zla ba gcig tu bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-5: btung ba mi zad pa 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-6: dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs nas lan bdun mngon par bzlas te bdag nyid kyi dpral ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-7: gzhan gyi mgo bor btab par byas nas grong du zhugs na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-8: bzlas pas 'ching ba la sgrol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-9: gtan pa gcog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-10: lpags bdun nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-11: m'a le ka'i me tog la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-13: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-15: nas zan za zhing zla ba drug tu 'dod pa bzhin du dong rtse rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-16: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te autpa la sngon po'i snying po'i sbyin sreg stong bya ste ming nas smos te nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-18: karni ka'i dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya zhing ming nas smos na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280a-19: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-0: nas zan za zhing dus @280b gsum du stong phrag brgyad du bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-1: ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa ga ru'i yam shing gis 'bum phrag gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-2: bco lnga las grub ba la rab tu 'jug ste ji srid bcom ldan 'das byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-5: ras ris g-yo bar byed pa dang grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-6: grub bo zhes tshig 'don par byed na rgyal srid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-7: yul gyi bdag po nyid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-8: sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba drug gi nang du stong phrag lnga so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-9: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgya bzlas par byas te dngul stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-10: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la stong phrag brgya bzlas bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-11: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-12: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'dod pas gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas blangs nas bskor ba bya ste skal ba bzang po nyid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:280b-13: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas til nag po la stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste srad bu can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-0: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dkar po'i tshe @281a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-1: gcig nas brtsams nas bco lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas au dum b'a ra'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar dkar po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-3: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-4: yul gru lnga'i dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-5: byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas til la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-7: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-8: bco lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pa byas nas gal te til de rnams phyogs dang; phyogs bral du song na de'i tshe grub pa yin te sems can thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-9: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na til mar lan bdun cu phul nas ji srid wu ba 'byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-11: kun du ru skal stong phrag brgya bzlas nas blangs na grong gcig rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya ste dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281a-13: aa p'a marga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-0: mar gyis btags te nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas @281b na grong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-1: bu mang po can gyi yam shing la me sbar nas shu dag stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-2: thal ba des thig le bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-4: gal te ma gyur na lan gsum du yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-5: zla ba gzas bzung ba na chu klung gi 'gram du song nas bil ba'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bil ba'i me tog la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gnod sbyin gzhon nu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-6: mtshan mo phyed na rig pa stong phrag bzlas nas de nas gcig 'ong bar byed de gter rnams sam; nor gyi bdag po gang tshig gis brjod de byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-7: nag po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-9: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gtor ma'i cho ga bya ste rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-10: sha za rnams 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-11: gter rkos shig ces brjod par bya'o; ;de nas gter stsol bar byed de blangs nas bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum po rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-12: de bzhin du ras ris bcing ba'i las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ba ru ra'i shing gis me sbar nas nyi ma so sor til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:281b-13: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-0: blon po dbang du byed pa la yungs kar dkar @282a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-1: po'i sbyin sreg gis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-2: sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-4: skyes ba dbang du byed pa la phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-5: aa ru ra'i shing gis me sbar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor sgron shing gis sbyin sreg stong bya ste dong tse brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-6: slong mo za bas nyi ma so sor dus gsum du pa l'a sha'i sbyin sreg bya ste gser brgya so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-7: rgya mtshor song nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzla ste ji srid rin po che rnams sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-8: blang bar bya ste dkon mchog gsum la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-9: sngags 'di nyid kyis sa ga'i zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bar ma chad pa brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-10: byang chub kyi shing drung du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas aa p'a marga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-12: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-13: bdag nyid ston pa yungs kar gyis grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-14: zhi bar 'dod na 'bras yos kyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282a-15: rgyas par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-0: 'bras thug po ches thun gsum du sbyin sreg brgyad @282b brgyar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-1: nyi ma gsum du aa mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur bha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-2: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-3: rtsod par 'dod pa rnams kyi smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-4: nyi ma so sor 'bru rlon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-5: phub ma rnams lag pa g-yon pas sbyin sreg byas na ming nas smos na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-6: rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-7: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg thun mtshams gsum du stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-8: nyi ma gsum du aa mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur bha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-9: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-10: nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-15: mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kun tu spyad cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:282b-16: shing shun 'chang bas sgrub pa byas te gang g'ar gtun shing gi sgra dang bral ba gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas khru bdun pa'i sa'i gong bu bzhi byas nas dbus su 'dab ma stong gi padma byas te de'i steng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi lcags lnga las byas pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bris sku'i spyan sngar bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-2: tsandan dkar dmar gyis mchod nas man d'a ra ba'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-4: phreng ba brgya phul nas bcom ldan 'das la dri dang me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-5: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-6: mar gyi mar me'i phreng ba bdun dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-7: phyogs bzhir mar gyi bum pa bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-8: phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi sa bon thams cad kyis gang bar rin po che rnams bcug nas bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-12: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-13: gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas phyogs bzhir sngar brjod pa'i zho zan sngon ma can dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-14: lho ru ni na bhu taktra ra dar ba chu dang bsres pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-15: byang phyogs su 'o thug gis gang ba'i gtor mas nye bar mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-16: sems can thams cad la phyogs bzhir rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283a-17: p'a la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas aa p'a marga'i yam shing la mar gyis btags la lan bdun mngon par sngags te sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o; ;ming nas smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-0: byang chub kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas lan tshva las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nas brtsams te ji srid @283b rkang pa'i bar du sreg blugs re re la lan bdun bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-1: ming nas smos pa'i rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-2: dkar po'i bco lnga la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis ba lang gi lpags pa'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gser dngul gyi snod du ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa blangs nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug te lag pa g-yon pas snod bzung lag pa g-yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrug par bya ste ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-4: de nas btung bar bya ste yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-5: lan gcig brjod pas thos pa 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-6: de la du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-7: 'bar bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-8: yan lag thams cad na ba nye bar zhi bar 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis snga dro las brtsams par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:283b-9: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas dbus su nad pa'i so phag gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-1: bzhi rnams su bum pa chus gang ba bzhi la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-2: so phag rnams kyi steng du sen rtsi'i go sa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-3: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas yongs su dkris te dri zhim pos yongs su bkang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-7: dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas gu gul gyi dud ba dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-8: zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-9: de nas ku sha ljang gu bzung nas nad pa gos dkar mo can la ji srid rkang pa'i bar du byab bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-10: mar gyi steng du ku sha dor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-11: de bzhin du brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-12: de nas mar zos pas blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-13: de nas ku sha ljang gu blangs nas zlos bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-14: sbyangs pa las 'byung ba'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-15: gos byas nas sangs rgyas dang; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-16: de nas pri yang ku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284a-19: bzhi po cig tu byas nas mnyam par thob par byas la mar dang lhan cig pa'i zas mchog zos na nad med pa rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-0: skud pa sngon po la lan bdun mngon par sngags @284b pa byas nas rked pa la bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-1: shu ba mched pa nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-2: de bzhin du mgrin pa la nye bar bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-3: dbugs mi bde ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-4: gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas te mar gyi mar me dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-5: de nas byang chub shing gis yam shing gis me rab tu sbar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-6: spar nas sra rtsi pog la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-7: nad nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-8: rig pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-9: 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas seng ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-12: lug gi gdong pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-13: de nas nag po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis mtshan mo phyogs gtsang mar bla re dmar po bres la las yang dag par brtsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-14: sen rtsi'i gos bcu bzhi la bgegs gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-15: dbus su bgegs rnams kyi gtso bo log 'dren gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-16: tshon sna lnga'i phye ma la lan gcig mngon par sngags pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:284b-17: dri dmar po'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me bcu bzhi dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-2: sha dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bcu bzhi dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-3: rgya skyegs kyi khu ba'ang bcu bzhi gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-4: de nas srad bu dmar po la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas mtshan ma bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-6: bgegs kyi rgyal po'ang bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-7: de nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-8: sv'a h'a'i yi ges dkyil 'khor ba rnams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-10: log par 'dren pa bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-11: rig pa rnams thams cad sgrub par byed pa na bgegs rnams 'phrul byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-13: log par 'dren pa rnams sa'i snod gcig tu bgegs thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-14: gcig tu log par 'dren pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-15: de nas bgegs rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbul bar bya zhing log par 'dren pa chen po la tsandan dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-16: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar po dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-17: bgegs rnams thams cad la rdzas thams cad kyi bdug pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-18: log par 'dren pa chen po la gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-19: mar dang bsres pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285a-20: de nas lte ba'i tshad kyi dong du so sor gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-0: de lta bus bgegs thams cad @285b med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-1: gso sbyong can gyi dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dus la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-4: mar gyi me la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas au dum b'a ra'i shing gis me sbar nas tshangs ma'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg bya zhing lha la phul ba zos na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-5: 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-6: lha la phul ba'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-9: lha la phul ba cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byas na rje rigs dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-10: dag la bltas nas bzlas pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-11: lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chus thams cad 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-13: dug thams cad la'ang nye bar byug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-14: zhun mkhan gyi ril bu byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags pas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-15: na ba la skud pa bcing bar bya ste gdon thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-16: gtsug phud bcings pas bdag nyid srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-18: bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pas phyogs bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:285b-19: bud med bu ma thon pa la til la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-1: pas mngal gyi zla mtshan gyi dus las 'das pa na khrus bya zhing rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas btung bar sbyin zhing bza' ba mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-2: mar bsres pa bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-3: de nas bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-4: bu mang po can gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-5: thal bar chu'i bum pa bzhi dang kun tu bsres nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-6: shu dag la lan brgyad brgyar bzlas te lag pa g-yas pa la bcings pas ji srid smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:286a-7: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na g-yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291a-17: chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i khyor chu nyi ma so sor tho rangs btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-0: de nas bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod pas lan tshva las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te spyi bor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste nyi ma bdun gyi @291b dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa sgrub thabs kyi grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-1: yid la grub pa'i don thams cad sgrub pa 'di rnams sad pa'i rgyur yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-2: de bzhin du'ang 'dir phyogs cung zad tsam zhig byas pa las sgrub thabs kyis nye bar sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi stobs su 'gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-3: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-4: sgrub pa'i yang dag dngos grub spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-5: shin tu stong min gang ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-6: bza' ba kun nas sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-7: tsha ba mngar skyur la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-8: ro las yul bral lnga la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-9: sred pa ldan pas ro la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-10: sred pa gang phyir skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-11: sred pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-12: 'dir ni cung zad brtsam mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-14: lag pa ldag la sogs brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-15: dor bar bya 'am dor bya min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-16: nang du g-yog po lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-17: phur bu gnas par yongs brtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-18: lha rnams kyi ni khang pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-19: khang stong dang ni phug gi nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-20: shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-21: ri bo dang ni tshang tshing du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-22: bzlas dang sbyin sreg sgrub pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-23: rtse gcig yid kyis bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-24: ma dag ma dag kun dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-25: dag pa rnam par sbyong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-26: gnyis ka yis kyang gnyis ka la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-27: dngos grub smra bas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-28: gang yang ro yi srad bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-29: lhag ma de nas 'gongs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:291b-30: zla mtshan ldan pas kun tu reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-2: rul pa'i dri dang slar yang 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-3: legs byas 'dod pas sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-4: lha rnams ched du bsnyen pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-5: de lta la sogs yon tan ldan; ;zas sam mal stan la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-6: sgrub pa rang gis blangs pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-7: min pa nyid ni bsnyen par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-8: btung ba ldan pas gnas dang dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-9: skye bo ngan pa'i sems can bcas; ;phyi ru kun tu btags pas blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-10: mtshams med lnga po byed pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-11: nad dang 'byung chen byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-13: zas dang le los bcom pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-15: ser sna lhur len tshon gyis 'bugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-16: rtag tu log par lta ba gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-17: de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-18: kun tu gsungs pa mdzes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-19: dus min khrus ni mi nus na'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-20: rang gis nus pa ma yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-21: rang gi rlung ni mchog tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-22: dus gsum min par de yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-23: cig tu theg gsum bral ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-24: khrus nyes pa dang chu bo'i nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-25: nyes pa gsum zhes bya ba 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-26: khrus ni mchog tu rab tu bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-27: de phyir dus kyang kun bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-28: me des sam ni de nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-29: chu yis khrus ni dngos grub kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-30: sgrub pa po la bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-31: de nas kun tu nad pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-32: gsang ba'i sngags kyis khrus rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292a-33: rab tu bsgrags bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-2: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-11: aa shu tsi shu tsi ra; bha b'a mi sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-12: sngags 'dis chu la lan gcig yongs su bzlas nas bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-15: nad pa la sngags 'dis khrus byas pas gtsang mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-16: mtshan mo'i stod du thun gsum du dam pa'i chos kyi kha ton la sogs pa rnams kyis dub pas mtshan mo'i gung la ku sha la sogs pa'i stan la gtsang sbra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-18: phyag rgyas yongs su brtags te bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-19: de'i tshe srung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-20: seng ge'i mal du sgrub pa pos rtag tu seng ge'i stabs kyi lho 'am; shar gyi phyogs su mgo bo bstan nas rmi lam du me zhi ba can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-21: rgyas ba can gyi sbyin sreg gal te gyur na shar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-22: lho'i lho ru kun tu gnas nas rkang pa rab tu brkyang bar bya'o; ;nub kyi phyogs su mgo bo byas nas lho'i phyogs su kha bltas la nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-23: rig pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas gang yang tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-24: bil ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:292b-26: au dum b'a ra la sogs pa rmi lam du mthong na bdag nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-2: bya ro ha na rmi lam du byung na de'i dngos grub myur du bdag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-3: gos dkar po dang mnyam par kun tu ston pa 'di'ang bdag nyid kyang tshe 'phel bar mthong na gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-4: rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-5: rmi lam du khang bzang la 'dzegs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-6: mnan pa la sogs pa byung na dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid de gru la mngon par 'dzegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-7: de bzhin du de'i pi wang 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-9: khyi la sogs pa rmi lam du reg pa byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-10: chu cig til mar gyis reg pa yang dag grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-11: rmi lam du bong bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-13: shing rta la sogs pa rnams mthong ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-14: reg pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub la bar du gcod par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-16: de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-17: dge ba'i las dang dge las gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-18: de rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-19: de phyir rmi lam shes nas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-20: rmi lam srung dang phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-21: phan tshun nyid du rig pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-22: bgegs rnams rtag tu gnyid log byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-23: rnam par gzhom bya rnam 'joms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-24: yang dag nyer gnas de yi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-25: bzlas dang sbyin sreg la sogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293a-26: sngar brjod bsrung ba sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-0: srung ba'i cho ga'i dbye ba @293b las; ;de 'dis yang dag 'grub par 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-1: mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha gnod sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-2: rang grub yi dvags srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-3: kun tu rgyu byed rnams 'joms phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-4: rang gi gnas dang sems kun g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-5: de phyir thog ma nas bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-6: bdag nyid srung dang mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-7: nye bar mtshon pa la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-8: sgrub pa kun gyi tshe na 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-9: mtshan ma med par gyur na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-10: bgegs de las 'bras skyes ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-11: khyi ni g-yon nas 'byin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-12: ba lang sbyin dang mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-14: ri dvags ce spyang bya rog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-15: khyim gyi phag pa de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-16: rtsangs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-17: ba dan la sogs thams cad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-18: gtso bor brjod bya dge ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-19: dge ba la sogs rig pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-20: mi dge ba yi mi dge la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-21: de bzhin mchog dang mchog min dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-22: shes nas dang por spyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-23: bil ba aarga'i me tog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-24: min nyid 'dod dang aa ram ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-25: khyad par las ni de byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-26: blo ldan sngags pas las kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-27: me thab rnam pa gsum bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-28: lho ru mngon par kha phyogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-29: gyur pa'i h'um phat yi ge ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-30: sv'a h'a'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-31: yid kyis kun tu bsams nas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-32: mngon spyod can gyi cho ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-33: byang du mngon par phyogs gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-34: sv'a h'a'i yi ge dang ldan bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-35: yid kyis bsams nas zhi ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:293b-36: dge ba mngon par mdzes pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-2: zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-3: bye brag tu ni brjod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-4: 'og tu kha ltas byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-5: rgyas pa nyid la rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-6: mngon spyod ston la skyil krung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-7: zhi dang rgyas pa can brjod pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-8: rang gi stan la tsog bur brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-9: mi dge'i las kyi kun spyod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-10: skra dang sen mor brjod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-11: bcing bar mi bya gang gi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-12: gal te sgrub po tshangs spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-13: ldan gyur de tshe nyes pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-14: bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs bya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-16: yongs su dag par bya bzhin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-17: skra rnams mkhas pas tshul de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-18: spu gris skra ni breg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-19: bsags par bya ba yang ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-20: dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-21: lha rnams mchod par yongs su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-22: 'dod pa'ang min yang stobs bsags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-23: de nyid phyir yang nyes bcas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-24: sen mo'ang yongs su 'chang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-25: de bzhin so dang spu la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-26: dri ma nyid ni bcang mi bya; ;shig la sogs pa rab skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-28: khron pa de ni blta mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-29: snang byed gzas zin gnas pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni; ;dngos grub 'dod pas nyams mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-31: lha rnams mchod pa'i dus su yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-32: zas mngon ma gyur lha rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294a-33: shes rab can gyis mchod mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-0: gal te gzhan du bla @294b ma'i bka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-1: dam tshig las ni bzlas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-2: sngon dus chos rnams thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-3: nyan pa sogs kyis mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-4: rig pas gzugs ni spros nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-5: bstod pa nyid dang bsngags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-6: de nas gcig tu bsams dmigs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-7: brjod pa'i rim pas rang nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-8: tshig 'di kha nas smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-9: sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-10: rdzu 'phrul che ldan srid pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-11: rgya mtsho 'di la dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-12: zhes pa nyid ni slar brjod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-13: rmi lam rtag tu nyi ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-14: tho rangs la yang rab bsngags 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-15: mar gyi sbyin sreg sogs sbrang rtsi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-16: don med mngon par bzlas byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-17: sbyin sreg mngon par mdzes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-18: bgegs gzhom don du brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-19: so sor dgag pa'i don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-20: zhi ba'i sems ni bsngags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-21: dngos grub 'dod pa'i don du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-22: rgyas pa can yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-23: de bzhin kun tu yang dag bsams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-24: sgrub pos legs par bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-25: de nas mdzes pa'i sbyin sreg ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-26: rtag tu 'bad pas bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-28: skye ba 'di yi dbang bskur don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-29: bil ba mya ngan med la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-30: rab brjod pa la sha dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-31: aa shvat+tha dang pa dz'a ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-32: rgyas pa can la sbyin sreg kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-33: de yi yam shing bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-34: au dum b'a ra n+ya gro dha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:294b-36: gang yang zhi la grags pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-1: rnams kun la yam shing don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-2: sgrub pa seng ldeng aa rishta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-3: nim pa dang ni tsher can bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-4: de bzhin gzhan du mngon mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-5: yang dag sgrub byed the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-6: ba bla mig sman la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-7: rdzas rnams sgrub pa la yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-8: ba byung lnga yi gtsang sbra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-9: de tshe rig pa ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-10: yang na lha yi chu la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:295a-11: dri zhim dri sogs yang dag sdom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-0: 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par brjod par byar med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma 'di rnams chos thams @328a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-2: rang bzhin med cing mngon par brjod par byar med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-3: don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-4: nad thams cad gso bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-5: thams cad du bklags pas grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-7: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad las phran tshegs thams cad ji ltar ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-8: 'di rnams kyi cho ga phyogs tsam ston par 'gyur te dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te gso sbyong la gnas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-9: gso sbyong med pas kyang rung ste dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-10: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis nyi ma re re la mchod pa byas nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-11: mthar nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas ras ris sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-12: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ji skad gsungs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs te sngar brjod pa'i aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad la zho dang; sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-13: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328a-15: gzhan gang rung du sgrol ma'i rig pas brjod cing grol bar sbyong ba la rig pa mtha' yas pa grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-0: ras ris gzhan 'dod na gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi @328b lcibs dkyil 'khor byugs te me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-2: mar gyi mar me la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas au dum b'a ra'i shing gis sbar te tshangs pa'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste ts'a ru'i bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-3: 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas pas bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-4: tsa ru'i bza' bas sbyin sreg bya ste rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro; ;nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-6: ts'a ru dang gcig tu byas nas sbyin sreg bya ste rje rigs dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-7: dgral bltas nas bzlas pa bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-8: lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chus byabs pas thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-9: dug thams cad la'ang nye bar byabs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-10: zhu mkhan gyi ril bu lan bdun mngon par sngags pas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-11: na pa la skud pas bcing bar bya ste gdon thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-12: gtsug tor bcings pas bdag nyid srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-14: bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pas phyogs bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-15: bud med bu ma thon pa la til mar la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste bde blag tu btsa' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-16: rmongs pas mngal gyi zla mtshan gyi dus las 'das na khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:328b-17: gzhan gyi tshad dad mar bsres nas sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-2: de nas bu mang po 'dod na sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas pa'i thal ba des chu'i bum pa bzhi dang bsres pa bzhag par bya'o; ;brgyad brgyar bzlas pa'i srad bus lag pa g-yas pa la bcings na ji srid du smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-3: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas te g-yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-4: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas lag pa la bcing bar bya ste brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-5: g-yo bar bcas pa'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-6: de nas drag shul la nyams pa'i ming nas smos te lan bdun mngon par sngags nas khyor ba'i chu btung bar sbyin par bya ste shi ba'ang langs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-7: de bzhin du phyogs bzhir mngon par sngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin par bya ste 'jog po'i mche bas zin pa'ang 'tsho bar byed do; ;nu ma'i phur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-8: 'bras la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas byin pas grol bar byed de tshor ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329a-11: g-yul la grong khyer gyi dbus sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-0: mtshan mo mda' rgyang gang gi tshad kyis gzhi la nye bar byugs nas dkar gtor byin te 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma'i sreg blugs @329b stong phrag gis sbyin sreg bya ste yams nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-1: de nas nye bar ma zhi na de las gzhan du rengs par bsams pa'i dus su bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas don grub kyi shing la aaksha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-2: til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste 'phral du yams thams cad zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-4: zlos bzhin pas ni sems can thams cad mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-6: kushm'anda'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grul bum rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-7: til btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste yi dvags dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-8: dur khrod du be la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-9: khanda ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sha za dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-10: gnod sbyin dbang du byed pa la wa ta'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-12: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste brjed byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-13: gnon po dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-14: bal gyi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-15: rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du seng ldeng gi rtse mo la rnon po'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-16: gu gul gyi ril bu la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste lha chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:329b-17: lha chen po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-1: gyis nyos pa'i ldong ros blangs nas rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas ji srid me dpung du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-2: de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba ser skya'i 'o ma la gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar du byas nas mar de la gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-3: de bzhin du zhos gang ba'i snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-5: sbrang rtsis gang ba'i snod la yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-6: de nas srung ba byas te za ma tog tu bzhag nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas kha byang du mngon par phyogs pas snod bzhi ru bzhag nas ji srid 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-9: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-12: nam mkha' la nye bar 'khrid par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-13: de bzhin du mig sman bla bskyed pa'i ched du rang nyid khyad par du dkar po'i bco lnga la padma'i skud pa la bzhag nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lag pa kha sbyar nas blangs nas ji srid dro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-15: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-16: 'di nyid la mngon pa rnams pa gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330a-17: lcags lngas padma byed du bcug nas gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-0: dbur nam mkha'i chus btags @330b nas padmar bcug ste de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lag pa g-yas pas padma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-2: de nas blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-3: de bzhin du gdu bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-6: de bzhin du ri'i tsandan dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-8: dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rtsa ba dang; lcags lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-15: du ru ka rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mo byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-16: de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs par ba'i 'o ma blangs nas gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar sar dang gcig tu byas pas phye ma la ril bu byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-17: aarga'i til mar gyi phye mas mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-18: de nas dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gso sbyong can gyi aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bcug par byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar ji srid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:330b-19: de khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-1: pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-2: de nas cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas me'i yam shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-4: mar gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-5: dkar po'i bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-7: de bzhin du gso sbyong can gyis rtag tu bzlas pa stong phrag gsum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-8: phyi nas las thams cad du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-10: blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas shing gi rgyal po'i yam shing la airgu da'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-11: bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-12: las 'dis tshul khrims 'chal pa yin yang de bzhin kho nar gsod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-13: bskrad pa la ni mba'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste mtshan mo bdun gyis skrod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-14: rigs bzhi dbang du byed par 'dod pas ts'a ru dang bcas pa'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331a-15: gnod sbyin gyi kham phor zhes pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-0: mtshan mo pu tsi ra dza ta'i sbyin sreg @331b stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-1: bzlas pas 'ching ba las grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-3: til gyi sbyin sreg gis gzhan gang yang rdung bas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-4: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rigs kyi bu mo dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-6: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-9: shu dag la stong phrag brgyad lan bdun du mngon par sngags pa byas nas lag pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-10: nor 'dod pas gu gul gyi ril bu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-11: sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad mtshan mo bdun du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-12: khyim gyi bdag po 'dod pas dri'i sbyin sreg mtshan mo bdun du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-13: mar gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-14: skrod pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i nim pa'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o; ;skyes bu'i sha ni skrod par byed pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-15: phub ma ni sdang bar byed pa las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-16: skrod par byed pa la sbrul gyi shun lpags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-18: skyes bu ma yin par byed pa la go ma aindra 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-20: zhi ba'i don du shing sa mi'i 'dab ma rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-21: ji ltar nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-22: ma grub pa sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:331b-23: gzhan gyi bsgrubs pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa la ma nu la 'ching ba 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-1: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya ste dgra 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-3: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-4: khyim rab tu g-yo par 'dod pas mi'i rus pa blangs nas sor brgyad pa'i tshad kyi phur bu byas nas khyim du gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-5: me tog la brgyad brgyar yongs su bzlas nas byin na dbang du 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po'i sgo ru gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-7: ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-8: me tog brgya pa sdong bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis ras dkris pa yang dag par ldan pa'i cho gas phye ma gos la btab pas mi'i dgra rab tu ldan pa la mi'i dgra dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-9: g-yul du rnam par rgyal bar byed pa la rgyal mtshan la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-11: bdug pa la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol mas mngon par bsngags nas me thab tu mchod yon lan bdun phul nas mngag gzhug pas pha rol gyi sde la ston du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-12: shing la rdo rje'i thog ji ltar bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-13: til nag po la gzugs brnyan byas pa'i mdun du stong phrag bzlas te gang gis ming nas smos te za bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-14: stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas sa bon thams cad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332a-17: dri zhim po'i me tog rnams sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-0: padma rtsa ba nag @332b po med pa'i bum par bcug nas stong bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-2: gzhan yang rung ste khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-7: chu ba rnams kyi phye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-8: seng ldeng gi sol ba rnams ming nas smos nas sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-9: bil ba'i dbus su sbrang rtsi dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams kyis du ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-10: sol ba la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-12: ming nas smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-15: bdug pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod pa bya ste sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-17: gzhan pa'i me tog rnams gang gi ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-18: grub pa'i 'dod ma dbang du byed pa la til nag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-19: btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la pri yang ku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-20: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa la s'a lu dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-21: gang gi ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-22: gzhon nu ma'i ming nas smos te me tog ge sar gyis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:332b-26: sbrang rtsis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na gang gi ming nas 'bod pa de rgyas pa can gyi las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-1: nas brtsams te ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-3: ras ris zhal nub du phyogs pa'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-4: sngon gyi mtha' ma ri'i rtse mo ku sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-5: bil pa'i yam shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-7: mar gyis btags pa'i padma kha rgyas par bye ba'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-10: shri beshta ka rnams kyi bdug spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-12: zho'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing rnam pa gzhan du bgegs rnams la 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-13: de nas brgyad pa la mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-15: nas zan za pas padma dkar po kha rnam par rgyal ba'i sbyin sreg byas na gter chen po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-17: me tog ser po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-19: mar gyis btags pas me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-21: mtshan mo gsum du phye za bar mtshan mo gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-22: de bzhin du stong phrag bdun brgyas mtshams med pa byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-23: yam shing de nyid la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-25: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gser bye ba 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333a-26: snga bar langs nas khrus sngon du 'gro bas tshangs par spyod cing me rab tu sbar nas n'a ga ge sar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-0: pri yang ku'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad @333b bya ste zla ba gsum gyi nang du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos grub nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing rdzas mang po yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-2: khanda can gyi sbyin sreg byas na ba lang gi gnas rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-3: de bzhin du pri yang ku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-4: n'a ga ge sar gyi yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-5: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas bil ba'i 'og tu me sbar nas bil ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-6: a'a shi bil ba rnams la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste lha mo sgrol ma mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-7: gtsang mar gyur pas zas bzhir smyung bar gnas te stong phrag bcur sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-9: de bzhin du mtshan mo nyi shur 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-10: nas zan za bas yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-11: sngon spyad pa byas pas nyin mtshan du yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste zla bas char rgyun bzang po ltung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-12: zas bzhir smyung bar gnas pas stong phrag bcur sbyin sreg bya ste nor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-13: mkhas pas dkar po'i phyogs 'byung 'gyur la lha mo'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mkhas pas thun mtshams gsum du bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-14: dkar po'i phyogs kyi nang du de la lha mo 'di mchog sbyin par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:333b-15: rig pa 'dis til gyi sreg blugs stong gi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-1: ba'i shing gis me sbar na lha mo mthong ste nor ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-3: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas me tog brgya pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na nor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-4: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun phyogs gtsang mar lha la p'a la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas autpala'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na yul gru dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-5: rig pa 'dis dri zhim po'i bdug pa phul nas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-6: nas zan za bas padma'i sbyin sreg stong bya ste gser stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-7: 'dis me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gang yid la sems pa de sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-8: ras ris kyi spyan sngar sbyin sreg stong byas na gter mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-9: pri yang ku la zho dang; sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-10: mar gyis btags pa'i 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-11: nas zan za bas phyogs gtsang mar sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gser brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-12: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-13: de nas mtshan mo gsum du g-yul du smyung bar gnas pas aa ga ru'i yam shing gis thun mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-14: de nas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pas ras ris rab tu 'gul ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334a-15: phreng ba'i chun po g-yo bar gyur na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te rgyal srid sbyin pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334b-0: gang yid la sems par byed pa @334b de ster bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334b-1: nad thams cad gso ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334b-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar me tog gis sbyin sreg stong bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334b-8: yang na ras ris gcig byang chub kyi rtsa bar bzhag nas cho ga 'di nyid kyis nas zan za bas bzlas pa stong phrag brgya bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334b-9: zas gcig pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong la gnas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zas kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:334b-11: nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:335b-1: 'dod pa thams cad mchog dang lhan cig byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:336a-15: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te bu mo bag mar gtong bar byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:336a-18: 'bru nag po la brgyad brgyar bzlas na gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:336b-1: slar yang padma stong phrag bcus rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:336b-2: padma stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis longs spyod chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:336b-3: sbyin sreg 'di rnams thams cad la dri dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:336b-8: gang gi ming nas 'bod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-5: rgya spos bzhi 'gyur gyi cha rnams ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ba'i mar me rab tu sbar nas rdzas rnams thams cad me tog gis sbyor bas dus ma yin pa gang gis rgyal po 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-9: tshe song ba rnams 'khrur gzhug par bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas brahma d'a ri'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-15: tu ru ka 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya ste de bzhin du'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-21: cho ga gzhan ni tsandan gyi yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-23: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas te grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337a-24: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams ti bil pa'i shing gi 'og tu me nye bar sbar nas bil ba'i 'bras bu la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-0: @337b mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgyad cu bya ste rang gi gzugs kyi lha mo mthong zhing rgyal srid chen po gnang bar byed cing gzhan yang gang zhus pa de gnang bar byed do; ;'byung po'i gdon grol bar byed pa la padma'i phyag rgyas reg par bya ste 'bros par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-1: bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ma yin pa'i 'o ma'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-2: sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i padma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-3: de bzhin du autpa la dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-4: sngon po 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya zhing yang na sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-5: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-6: nas zan za zhing 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya ste slong mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-9: bdug pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa'i mthar dri zhim po'i me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-10: sgrub bzhin pa ma yin pa 'dis sa rnams tshul khrims mchog tu 'tshal pas kyang grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:337b-11: yang na yungs kar til nag po dang bsres pa zho dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-6: dbang du byed pa la yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin sreg go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-7: dbang du byed pa la kambo dzi ka'i me tog gi yam shing gis stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-10: mar gyis btags pa'i byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas thab med pa'i me la lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-13: bdug pas mngon par mchod cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-14: nas zan za zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gang blangs pa de ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-15: ba sha ka'i me tog phrag brgya sbyin sreg bya ste ming smos pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-16: na le sham gyi sbyin sreg gis log 'dren rnam par 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-17: byang chub shing gi 'og tu dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-18: me tog gis mngon par mchod nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na ldong ros blangs nas aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun gyis steng du gzhag nas ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-19: blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lha thams cad thogs pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338a-20: lha'i gzhal yas khang mchog tu mdzes par myur zhing mgyogs par 'gro ste nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-0: gzi brjid dang ldan zhing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang @338b ldan par 'gro ste lha'i 'gro ba brgya phrag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-1: rna ba'i mig sman la las 'di kho na 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-2: gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-3: nas zan za bas sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-4: zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su pi pi ling gi 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du 'am /
