K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-6: nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa can te des thig le byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-7: dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig sman gyi 'dab ma blangs nas me gdung bzang por byas nas lan brgyar rab tu bcug nas zla ba gzas zin pa na chur zhugs te ji srid du grul bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-8: skad cig la bcug pa tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-9: 'di byugs pas gzi brjid dang ldan zhing cod pan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-11: padma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'i lus rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par yang rab tu smon par 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-12: 'khor dang bcas pa lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-13: rlung ltar 'gro zhing yid ltar mgyogs par 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-15: autpa la stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis gser stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:338b-16: pa l'a sha'i las ni 'di kho na'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-0: @339a *// yang 'dir las chen po'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni rgyal ba'i zhabs drung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-1: ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-2: rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho gas kyang rung ste rig pa 'di rnams kyi ming gsum gsum brjod pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga de 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-3: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du phyogs gtsang mar 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-4: nas zan za bas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-14: mar gyi bza' bas kyang rung ste yang na mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-15: thog mar sngon du bsnyen bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-16: yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang yang dag par ldan pas nyi ma so sor mngon par brjod bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-17: gsung rab ji lta ba bzhin du slong mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-18: byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung zhing sdug bsngal gyi gdungs pas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-19: sgrub pa pos dus gsum du khrus byas pa'i 'og tu shis pa'i ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste sbyangs pa las byung ba'i gos bgo zhing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339a-20: mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma dang bcas pa'i shing dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-0: aa ga @339b ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-1: mdzub mo'i tshad la tu ru ka'i til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-2: de nas grub par 'gyur te bco lnga la phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba'i bum pa bzhi chu dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-3: aa mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha g-yogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-5: nag po med pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-6: g-yas kyi gzhogs su sa las byung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-7: gser las byung ba rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-8: sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-11: rin po che'i snying po padma dra ba'i me tog gis kha g-yogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-12: du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-13: rnam par rgyal bzhes bya ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-14: de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs su 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-15: nub kyi phyogs su ha rings zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-16: de lta bu la sogs pa bum pa rnams kyi ming smos te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhin gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-17: dri bzang po'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-19: phreng ba nyi shu dbul bar bya zhing dris bkang ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-20: 'o mas bkang ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-21: mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:339b-22: bum pa'i sgron ma bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-0: 'o thug gis bkang ba'i kham phor bcu gnyis klu @340a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-2: til gyi thug pa'i kham phor bcu gnyis srin po rnams la gtor ma mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-3: zan dron gyi kham phor brgyad 'byung po rnams la gtor mar sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-4: hvags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-5: gzhan rnams la mar sar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-8: ji ltar mtshungs pa'i kham phor rnams phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-9: aa ga ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-13: shri b'a sa can gyi bdug pa'i kham phor phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-14: de nas srod la las brtsams par byas te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas aarga'i yam shing ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-15: seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu sbar nas las 'di la sngags 'dis spyan drangs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-17: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-18: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-23: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-24: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra dhi ri dhi ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-25: ya th'a sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-26: gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su dri zhim po'i me tog gis bskul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340a-27: dngul las byung ba'i snod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-0: sa las byung bar mchod @340b yon phul nas de nas aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing ji skad gsungs pa'i tshad gzhan gsungs pa la til mar gyis btags pa rnams zla ba gzas bzung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-1: nyi ma gzas bzung ba na stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-2: de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu thugs brtse ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-3: phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-5: ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba 'byon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-6: de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i snod du dri zhim po'i me tog dkar po rnams snyim pas blangs nas chu'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-7: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ci yin pa'i mchog te sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-8: gang mchog blangs pa de ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-12: rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-13: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-16: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-23: mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam; rang gi lus la rjes su 'dod pa'i cho ga 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:340b-29: mig cha dang bral ba nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-1: dbang po sbas pa nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-4: lus la gang cung zad bsgrub bya min pa'i nad de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-5: de rnams la de las thar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-8: gang blangs pa'i mchog de sbyin par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-9: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su 'ang 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pos ku sha'i khres yod pas au dum b'a ra'i cho ga shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-12: au dum b'a ra'i shing gi shing lham gnyis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-13: rdza mkhan gyi sa la de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-14: sgrol ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po'i cho gar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-16: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya; bo dhi satv'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-18: aom ku ru ku ru kulle sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-19: 'di ni rig pa 'di thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po ste bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad gnon par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-20: nad thams cad zad cing 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-21: 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-22: las phran tshegs rnams kyang bklags pas 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341a-23: 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zlos par byed pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-0: de nas mig sman ldong ros aa shv'attha'i 'dab ma bdun gyis nang du ji srid dro bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas @341b par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-1: do bar byed bzhin pas ni dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-2: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-4: til gyi sreg blugs 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-5: gang 'dod pa de ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-6: 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya ste ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-7: de mthong na gang brtsams pa de 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-8: tsandan dkar po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste nyim so sor la dong tse rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-9: tsandan dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste nyi ma re re la kar sha pa na drug rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-10: 'bum phrag bdun bdun bzlas par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-11: 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste nad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-12: mtshan mo brgyad du lan gsum yongs su bzlas pas nad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-13: 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste bcud len dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-15: de zos nas gnyer ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-16: skra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro; ;'bum phrag gsum gyis gri dha sh'i sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-17: lcags bsregs nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i til mar gyis rkang ba g-yas pa la bskus nas lcags des rkang pa la gdung par bya zhing gri dha sh'i chod cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:341b-18: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-0: yungs kar rgyal po'i sreg blugs byas pas dbang du 'gyur @342a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-1: zhing mtshan mo bdun gyis nor gyi bdag por 'gyur te 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-2: m'arga la 'bum bzlas te bskul na bza' btung gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-3: aarga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas na gser sad brgyad rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-4: shing pi n+ya ki gi sbyin sreg bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-5: t'ambu la'i phye mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste cod pan 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-6: bye ba bzlas par bya ste 'khor brgyas bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-7: 'bras yos kyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya ste nyi ma bdun gyis bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-8: 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-9: ba lci skam po hvags kyi btso bor 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-11: dug med par brjod pas bskus na dri bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-12: t'ambu la thams cad yang dag par sbyar te 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-13: t'ambu la mtshang ba nyid med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-14: aa p'a margas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-15: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas byabs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342a-16: srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas nas bcing bar bya ste skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-0: zho lhan cig pa 'bum gyis sbyin sreg byas na ji srid 'dod pa'i zas ma tshang ba @342b med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-1: mar gyi sreg blugs stong gi sbyin sreg byas na yul gru gsum rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-2: bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgrub pa lan gsum gyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-3: gu gul gyi ril bu ka par sha'i rus pa'i tshad kyi sbyin sdreg stong phrag brgya bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-4: nyi ma re re la pan bcu drug rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-5: lhag ma med pa zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-6: dong ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste ma btags pa'i gos sna tshogs pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-7: snying rjes sbyin du bcug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-8: de bzhin du dad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-9: lha bsnyen pa las gzhan ma yin pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-10: zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-11: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang chos thams cad kyi nang du gtogs par rtog pa thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig pa 'di ni cho ga rgyas par bstan par lo brgya phrag gis kyang di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-12: 'dis mdor bsdus nas bstan par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-13: cho ga gzhan rnams su yang rig pa 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga de thams cad bsgrub par bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-14: de bzhin du gang nges par brjod pa'i las rnams sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-15: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir rig pa'i sngags de rnams dang gang sngags rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba de rnams kho na yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:342b-16: rtog pa gzhan gyi chogs kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-0: de rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sgrub @343a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-1: thabs kyi spyod pa sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-2: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-7: rtog pa thams cad du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bcu rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga brgyad rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-10: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rtog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu bzhi po'i rtog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-14: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud ste rtog pa chen po thams cad kyi spyod pa'i cho ga rnams su mnyam pa nyid du 'gro bar byed do; ;de bzhin kho na bdag gis brjod pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-15: sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas gsungs pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po bde blag tu bsgrub par bya ste mtha' yas pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral ba gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams cad thun mong pa'i cho ga'i rig pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343a-17: phyag rgya'i le'u bri bar bgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-0: de nas sems dpa' chen po phyag rgya yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs @343b nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga thun mong pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-1: rgyud thams cad gyi nang du gtogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-2: phyag rgya ri mo'i cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-3: rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyur pas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-4: bcing pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-5: shes nas rab tu bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-7: rigs kyi phyag rgya cha gsum rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-9: gtsug tor phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-12: gtsug tor de nyid cung zad bteg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-14: kun tu dkar ba gdugs dkar can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-16: gzi brjid phung po rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-17: gzhan gyis mi thub lan gsum dkris; ;rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-18: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-19: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-20: padma rin chen nor bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-21: rin chen snying po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-22: de nyid dkyil 'khor so sor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-23: las kun byed pa'i gdu bu can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-24: dbus su son pa dbus ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-25: spyan de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-26: de nyid rtsa ba can gyis dman; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-27: rtse mo'i steng 'og nus pa'i mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:343b-29: 'bar ba'i tshogs pa gzhan mi thub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-2: thams cad lhung bzed sogs phyag rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-3: sngags sam yid kyi bye brag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-4: de bzhin gshegs rigs phyag rgya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-6: 'dab ma can rdzogs gang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-7: zla ba'i rnam pa cha dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-8: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya padma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-9: padma g-yo ba'i steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-10: nges zhugs nor bu 'dod pa ni; ;phun tshogs byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-11: rta mgrin dang ni sngon phyogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-13: padma dkar po gos dkar can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-14: ze 'bru de nyid grags ldan ma'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-15: autpal de nyid sgrol ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-17: cung zad rin chen khro gnyer can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-18: sdong bu dang bcas dpal mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-19: pho nya mo kun zhes bya'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-20: kha bye rgyas pa rigs rgyal mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-21: lhag ma rnams kyi thun mong nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-22: phyug pa'am ril ba spyi blugs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-23: rnam pa de dag lhag ma ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-24: rig pa can rnams kyis shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-26: rtse mo lnga pa rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:344a-27: gdong gnyis lha mo so sor gnas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345a-11: raksha badzra panydza ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-1: g-yon pa'i rgyab phyin ci log tu 'gyur te bkan pa lag pa'i mthe'u chung bzung la gang gis mthe bong gnyis cung zad brkyang ba mnan par bya ste sor mo dag ni mchog gi dam tshig gi sngags te rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu grags par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-4: gung mo'i sor mo gung mo can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-12: zhes pa dam tshig phyag rgya ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-15: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa 'o; ;dang por bcing bya rtag tu slar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-19: 'jig rten mgon po mtha' yas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-20: de sras bdag nyid che rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-21: lus can kun gyi phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-22: sgrub pa'i don du gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:345b-23: rtag tu snga bar langs nas 'ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-1: dam tshig phyag rgya gsum po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-2: gang gis shes ba blo ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-3: gzung ba'i 'phags pa'i man ngag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-4: de yi dngos grub the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-5: 'di rnams rnam par shes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-6: cho ga nyams kyang sgrub pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-7: de yi dngos grub byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-8: stobs po che la sogs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-9: phyag rgya kun tu srung don du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346a-23: blo ldan de bzhin mthe bong yang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-17: lha yi dri mchog dang ldan pa'i //
