K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-27: gtsang zhing dag par yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-28: de nyid gtor ma'i mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-30: sdigs mdzub rtse mor mthe bong gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-31: rnam par bkod pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-32: ba yi mar ni phul byung byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:346b-33: sgron me dbul bar bya ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-0: @347a *// gung mo'i rtse mor mdzub mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-1: phyi yi rtse mo'i tshigs su sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-2: mthe bong dang ni ming med dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-3: bgrang phreng srad bu yongs su 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-5: rtag tu me ru mngon phyogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-6: lag pa g-yas pa'i ming med ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-7: gung mo'i tshigs su byas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-8: lag gnyis sbyar ba'i gung mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-9: mthe bong cung zad rnam 'dud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-10: me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-11: ming med mthe bong sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-12: sngags dang bcas pa rab sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-13: de nyid kyis brjod gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-14: me lha spyan drangs pa bskul ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes pa 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phyag rgya ste sgrub pa po dngos grub mnyam pa med pa 'dod pa rnams kyis thun mong du rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-15: rkang pa 'khyog por byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-16: phyag rgya rnam par rgyas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-17: lag gnyis brkyang byas 'khor lo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-18: sngon du mthe bong bskul nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-19: khu tshur bcings te mthe bong dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-20: mnyam par bshibs te brkyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-21: gung mo sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-22: blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-23: dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar grags pa yin; ;sgrub pos myur du sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347a-24: dngos grub thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-0: legs par kha sbyar ba thal mo khong stong du 'gyur te kha sbyar gyi phyag @347b rgya'o; ;gang du mthe bong nang du bcug pa ni bzang po'i gdan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-1: bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-2: thal mo khong stong des rab tu brjod pa'i kha sbyor gyi phyag rgya las ming med kyi sor mo yang dag par sbyar ba ni kha sbyor gyi phyag rgya'i gtso bo padma'i rnam pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni padma'i phyag rgya'o zhes sgrub pa po blo dang ldan pas shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-3: gdan gyi don tu rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-4: phyag rgya 'di ni grags pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-6: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ni rab tu brjod pa de autpa la de 'dir brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-7: nas tsam rnam par grol ba ni phyag rgya'i padma'i tog ni yan lag nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-8: autpa la'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-9: sgrol ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de phyig rgyar yongs su bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-10: tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni khro gnyer can gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-11: de kho na tshigs bar par gyur pa yang dag pa kho nar 'dod pa ni ting nge 'dzin yangs pa'i phyag rgyar gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-13: mthe bong yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ni ral gcig ma'i cod pan las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:347b-14: dang po ting nge 'dzin yang dag par gsungs pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams phyag rgya gnyis pa ral gcig ma'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-0: phan tshun sbyar byas lhag ma phyi rol tu skra'i rnam @348a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-1: par rab tu brkyang nas dbus ma gnyis ni mdung gi rnam par legs par gnas pa'i phyag rgya ni mdung du yang dag par bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-2: lha yi 'bar bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-3: yang dag par mtshungs pa 'di bstan pa tsam gyis gdug pa rnams thams cad rnam par 'joms pa mdung gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-4: zhes pa phyag chen 'di rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-5: dam tshig don du rab sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-6: gang gis yang dag shes byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-7: de yis dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-8: phyag rgya lhag ma thams cad nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-9: tshad med grangs med nyid du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-10: phyags rgya yang dag yongs su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-11: mdor na 'di ru brjod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-12: sems can sems ni dur ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-13: las chen byed par mi nus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-14: mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral bgyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa phyag rgya'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-17: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom zhing las thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir gos dkar mo zhes bya ba rang gi rigs kyi rig pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs srung ba'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-18: bgegs bzlog pa'i don tu gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348a-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-0: @348b na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-12: aom ka te; bi ka te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-19: 'di ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de'i rig pa chen mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-21: sngags rnams kyi dngos grub byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-22: padma'i rigs su rigs kyi rig pa 'dis bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-25: ras ris gnas pa dang; lha rnams bsrung bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-26: ras ris grub pa 'di yang khyed kyi sgrub thabs gsum byas nas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-27: bdun byas nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-28: de nas rang gi lha'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-29: bzlas pa'i mthar yang bgegs rnams srid pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-30: rtag tu bzlas pas kyang nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-31: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-33: bde ba'ang so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:348b-34: srad bus bdag nyid srung zhing phyir zlog pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-0: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya nyid ni sgrol ma thams cad kyi spyi'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste de nyid ni sdigs mdzub bcings nas 'khyil ba'i rnam par bya ste mthe bong @349a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-1: zung yang kun tu btsir ba ni gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-2: 'di yang phyag rgya'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa mnyam par 'gro ma gdon mi za ba ste dang por zhabs la phyag byas te de nas las thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-3: yang rtog pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po chen po 'dir 'phags ma sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-4: sgrol ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa mngon par mdzes pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-6: nyes pa byas pa thams cad zlog par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-7: 'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho ga rab tu sbyor ba sgrub nus par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-10: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-21: aa mi t'a bha su t'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-22: sarbe sh'am a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-23: 'di 'ang 'phags pa bzang po zhes bya ba 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rig pa chen mo nya bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-24: gang 'di sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i cho ga rab 'byams spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-26: phyag rgya'i cho ga la sogs pa de thams cad 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zla bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes kun tu rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349a-27: rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-0: rtog @349b pa med pas kyang mngon spyod kyi las 'di byed de phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge spangs nas rig pa 'ba' zhig gi sv'ah'a gnas su h'um phat sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-1: rtog pa gzhan gyis chogs kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-2: gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-3: yang na nye bar 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-4: mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-5: de nas sems dpa' chen po de thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas bsam pa rnam par dag pas sems dpa' chen po rnams la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-6: gang rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-8: yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba de rnams don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-9: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-10: sems can thams cad la kun nas dga' ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-12: gang du rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchod rten du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-13: sa phyogs de gang nyid kyis lag mthil du phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-14: mchod pa 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na rigs kyi bu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-15: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thob pa des thams cad du rnal 'byor du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-16: sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:349b-17: stobs med pa shes nas rab tu gsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-0: @350a *// 'di'ang gtsang ma'i phyogs su thams cad kyis rab tu spyod par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-2: gang zhig byed pa de mngon par 'dod pa med pa sems can gyi bsam pa spang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-4: chos smra ba po la ma gus pa la mi 'jug pa'i rab tu sbyor bas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-5: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub pa po thams cad kyis srung ba'i don du rtag ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-6: lhag ma med pa'ang rung ste gtsang sbra byas pas srung ba'i don du rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya; na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-10: aom aa mri ta aud bha ba h'um phat sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-11: 'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po ste thal ba la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-12: g-yog srung ba la mdud pa'i spyod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-13: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgyal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-14: tha skar yang rung ste dge ba'i sbyor pa la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-15: gtor ma'i cho gas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-16: chos yang dag par sdud pa po la'ang bsod snyoms dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-17: theg pa chen po la bza' ba gya nom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350a-18: khyad par du yon dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-0: de bzhin du bya ste rtog pa'i rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ba'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i gsang sngags bklag @350b par bya ste de bzhin du dman par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-1: ji ltar myur du dngos grub nyid kyang stsol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-3: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che shin tu rgyas pa chen po nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal por ral pa gyen bdzes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyal po gru 'dzin na bzhugs te der bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-7: khyod kyis ral pa gyen bdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-8: da ni phyi ma'i rgyud gsang ba de gsang chen phyi ma dang bcas pa thabs sla ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-10: cho ga dang bcas pa sngon du 'gro bas brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-11: snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-12: skye bo mang po bde ba'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-13: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams la snying brtse ba'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-14: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:350b-15: sgrol ma thams cad kyi thun mod pa'i rig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-1: rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi sbyor ba rnams shod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-2: bcom ldan 'das la sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na bshad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-6: dang po kho nar sgrub pa pos re zhig skyabs gsum yongs su bzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-8: ral pa gyen brdzes su ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong zhing dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-9: slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-11: mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-12: bla ma la yon phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rig pa blangs te ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-13: sku gzugs kyi drung du slar yang sgrol ma gang yang rung ba'i rig pa blang bar byas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-14: dus phyis mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas zla ba nya la sku gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-15: ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351a-16: gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas 'o ma can gyi yam shing gi me sbar nas seng ldeng ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-0: aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor drug pa'i tshad kyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad @351b bya'o; ;nam langs khar mtshan mo mchod pa ches rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-1: gtor ma'i cho ga ji ltar 'byor pa byas nas slong mo'i zas zos nas dngos grub stsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-2: de nas rig pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-3: de nas las thams cad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-4: yang 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-5: me'i bya ba gnas par ji srid gsungs pa'i cho gas rig pa sgrub par 'dod pas sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rig pa rnam par gsang ba'i ji skad gsungs pas dkyil 'khor gzhan gsum bri ste bla ma la yon rab tu phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rig pa blangs nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas dang por re zhig tu di'i tshad kyi gser gyi phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-6: de nas aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-7: mar rnams kyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-8: tsandan dkar po'i yam shing la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-9: de nas slar yang gser gyi phye ma la bar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:351b-10: de nas dngul gyi phye ma la sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-0: de nas ra gan gyi phye ma la 'o mas @352a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-1: btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-2: de nas zangs kyi phye ma la zhos btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-3: de nas mu tig gi 'bras bu'i phye mas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-4: de nas tsandan dmar po'i phye mas sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-5: de nas tsandan dmar po'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-7: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-10: longs spyod la sogs pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-11: de nas dkar por rnam par brtag pa legs par bkrus shing dri zhim po'i gos skra dang bral ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o; ;re re la lan re yongs su bzlas nas de nas gu gul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-15: ga bur rnams gcig tu byas nas mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-16: de nas ji ltar rnyed ba'i 'bras bu la sogs pa rnams kyis sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-17: de nas dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352a-18: de nas bza' ba mchog gi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-0: de nas gzhon nu @352b mas bkal ba'i skud pa cha dang bcas par byas pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-1: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog gis sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-2: de nas mar gyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-3: de nas thal ba'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-4: de nas sdong bu can 'bras bu med pa rnams la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-5: de nas mar sar gyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-6: de nas gser gyi phye ma'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-7: de nas dar ba'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-8: de nas yung ba'i phye ma la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-10: lan tshva la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-11: de nas bu ram gyi sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-12: de nas sra rtsi pog gi phye ma'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-13: de nas lcags kyi phye ma mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:352b-14: de nas sa lam lhung pa'i ba lang gi lci ba la mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-3: mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-4: de nas ti la nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-5: 'bras yos lhan cig pa la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-7: mar gyis btags pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-9: dngul gyi phye ma phan tshun bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o; ;bar skabs 'dir sgrub pa po lha thams cad kyis kun tu gzigs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-11: 'di'ang bdag gi mchog tu gsang chen gyi gsang ba'i sgrub pa nye bar spyad pa'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-12: de langs nas dkyil 'khor la bskor bar byas te sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag btsal nas bla ma la yon gyi mchog phul te gang gis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-14: de'i thad kar yang rung ste zhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-15: dkyil 'khor bris par lha rnams mthong nas bla ma la phyag btsal te mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-16: dngos grub kyi rjes su gnang ba'ang zhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-17: de nas las grub pa'i cho ga 'dis mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal bas kyang bcom ldan 'das ma 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353a-18: sgrub thabs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gsang chen te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-0: mdor na las @353b gang yang ci yin pa 'dis byed pa'ang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-1: de'i thams cad zhi ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-3: mngon par mdzes pa'i las rnams ni ji lta ji ltar sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar sgrub pa nye bar 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-4: de ltar yang rig pa rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar legs par rab tu sbyar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-5: ji ltar yang sgrub par byed pa de ltar sgrub par byed de las de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-6: 'di rig pa thams cad dga' ba zhes pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-7: 'dis las rnams mchog tu sgrub pa nye bar skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-8: mdor na bdag gi seng+ge'i sgra 'di gang la la rig pa la dga' ba 'dis las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-10: 'di kho na'i lag mthil du dngos grub so sor gnas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-11: las 'di'ang gso sbyong can gyi sngon 'das pa byas pa dag 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-12: gsang ba'i nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-13: sgrub thabs gzhan gyi cho ga ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song nas bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad mchod rten stong phrag brgyad byas nas re re'i spyan sdar dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-14: me tog la sogs pa phul te stong phrag brgyad du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-15: rdzogs pa'i dus su'ang slong mo bza' bar bya ste yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:353b-16: de nas rig par grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-0: cho ga gzhan ni chu bo'i @354a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-1: 'gram du cho gas 'bum bzlas par bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-2: cho ga gzhan 'di'ang yod de ri'i rtse mor 'bum bzlas par bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-3: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-4: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te til nag po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-6: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-7: cho ga gzhan ni aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-8: cho ga gzhan ni me tog thams cad kyi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-9: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te thang chu thams cad kyi sbyin sreg 'bum bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-10: cho ga gzhan ni mchod rten chen po rnams la mngon par phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas par bya ste 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-11: de bzhin du sgrub pa'i thabs 'di rnams ni de nas las su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-12: dran pa tsam gyis bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-13: bzlas pa tsam gyis zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-14: yungs gar dkar po'i sbyin sreg rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354a-16: rnga mo'i spangs kyis mngon spyod can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-0: me tog gi rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams te @354b mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-1: de nyid la mar gyi sreg blugs nyin zhag bdun du thun gsum du brgyad brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-4: zla ba la rgyal po 'bangs su 'gyur bas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba la yang lan tshva srang bco brgyad kyis gzugs byas nas rgyal po'i me la de'i rkang pa g-yon pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-6: zla ba gcig gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-7: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te dgra mngon par ma lhung ba'i rkang mthil gyis mnan pa'i rdul yongs su blangs nas glang chen sdong po'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas g-yas pa las cig shos kyi lag pa blangs nas lan gcig yongs su bzlas pa'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste zla ba gcig la rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-8: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te rgyal po'i rkang 'thung gi shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar rgyal po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-10: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste zla ba gcig la sa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:354b-11: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te thog mar yang ljon pa'i rgyal po'i shing gis me sbar nas sra rtsi pog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-0: lan tshva lhan cig pa la mar gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig byas na sa'i dbang @355a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-1: po bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-2: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te ma blangs pa'i ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar po btags nas gzugs brnyan byas te rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gris gtub cing gtub cing ka ra b'i ra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-3: zla ba re re la gzugs brnyan srang sum cu so drug pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-4: de nas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-5: cho ga gzhan ni me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-6: lan tshva phan tshun bsres te btags nas srang brgyad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-7: de nas shing byas pa de bzhin du zla ba gcig la nyi ma re re la byas na sa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-8: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te ske tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-9: autpa la sngon po bsres te btags pa srang bcu drug gis gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mnan te seng ldeng ko bi d'a ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas mgo bo nas brtsams te ral gris gtub cing gtub cing zla ba gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nyi ma re re la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-10: de nas gzugs brnyan gcig ni rgyal po'i 'bangs bzhin du kun tu spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355a-11: cho ga gzhan 'byung ste rgya mtsho las byung ba'i tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-0: lan tshva bsres @355b te ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar po dang btags nas gzugs brnyan rdzogs par bya ste shing rgyal po'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-1: nyi so so la gzugs brnyan re re mnyam zhing mnyam pa re re'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-2: rgyal po glang po bzhin du bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-3: cho ga gzhan ni mya ngan med pa'i me tog yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-4: n'a ga ge ser bsres nas ko me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-5: n'a bh'a sa btags pa srang bcu drug gis gzugs brnyan byas nas gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag pa g-yon pas mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing de'i shing kho nas me rab tu sbar te stong phrag brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-6: gzhan rnams g-yas pas nyi ma so sor zla ba gcig tu gnas te nyi ma gung la gzhan rnams ji ltar 'dod pas 'bangs bzhin du myur du dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:355b-7: cho ga gzhan ni so ma r'a dza'i 'bras bu dang bsres pa'i dri'i rdzas rnams thams cad btags pa svang bcu drug gis gzugs brnyan byas nas 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te lte ba nas brtsams nas rkang mthil la thug gi bar du ral gris gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-0: de nas mgo bo nas brtsams te slar yang sbyin sreg zla @356a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-1: ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor byas na rgyal po ci bgyi dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-2: 'di ni cho ga gzhan bla na med pa ste tsandan dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-3: lan tshva dang mnyam par 'gro ba rnams btags pa srang nyi shu rtsa lngas gzugs brnyan byas nas nyi ma so so'i snga dro'i dus tshod la tsandan dmar po'i shing gi me la rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-4: las 'di ni lag pa g-yas pas sreg blugs dbul zhing g-yogs kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-5: zla ba gcig tsam la rgyal po 'bangs bzhin du bka' bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-6: cho ga gzhan ni sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung tshva dang yang dag par bsres nas btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-7: de nas srang nyi shu rtsa lngas gzugs brnyan byas nas phyi dro'i dus tshod la yang dag par shes pas gzugs brnyan so so re re pa l'a sha'i me la gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams te mtshon rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg brgyad brgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-8: las lhag ma 'di ni dang po dang mtshungs par de'ang zla ba tsam la rgyal po bka' bsgol rjes su sgrub par byed pa ci bgyid 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356a-9: cho ga gzhan ni ba lang gi gcin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-1: sbrang rtsi mnyam par 'gro ba yis srang nyi shu cha'i gzugs brnyan bskyed nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so so la lan gsum du nyi ma gung la shing gi rgyal po'i sreg za rnam par gnas pa la gzugs brnyan gyi rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams nas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-2: 'bangs bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes sgrub thabs 'di rnams ni dus thams cad ston dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-5: dgun gyi dus tshod la'ang rab tu sbyar na mtshungs pa med pa'i nor chen po 'di rnams rtag tu nges par thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-6: de nas so ga'i sgrub pa 'byung ste rigs dang kha dog mthun pa'i zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-7: mar lhan cig pa ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dang gcig tu byas te btags nas srang sum cu'i tshad kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas nyi ma snga dro'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-8: phyi dro pa l'a sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas gzugs brnyan gyi g-yas kyi mgor bzhag nas rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams te lag pa g-yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o; ;zla ba gcig la rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:356b-9: cho ga gzhan ni yungs kar dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-0: gur gum bsres te legs par btags la srad bu bcu pa byas @357a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-1: nas 'di 'di'i lhag ma sngar bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-2: 'di la khyad ni lag pa g-yon pas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-3: cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho'i lan tshva dang; nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-4: gro rnams gcig tu btags pa srang sum cu pas gzugs brnyan byas nas de'i khar tsha ba gsum gyis bkang nas zangs kyi thur ma du sti ra'i me la bzlas pa byas nas rkang pa'i 'og nas phug ste spyi bor 'thon par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-5: de nas mgo bo'i g-yas bzhag ste pa l'a sha'i 'dab ma la rang gi ral gri'i sos bcad nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la seng ldeng gi mer lag pa g-yas pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-6: zla ba gcig la rgyal po ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di rnams ni so ga'i dus kyi sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-7: yang 'di'i dbyar gyi las rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te dbyar gyi dus tshod la nges par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-8: pu shel rtse dang b'a la kam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357a-10: lan tshva dang gzugs brnyan gcig tu byas pa la nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang nyi shu rtsa lngas rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas g-yas pa nas brtsams te lag pa g-yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing pa l'a sha'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-0: nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams @357b la'o; ;zla ba gcig tu'e //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-2: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te pu shel rtse dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-5: 'gyur byed rnams gcig tu byas te nam mkha'i chus btags nas srang sum cu pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-6: mgo bo nas brtsams nas lag pa g-yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing dong ka'i shing gis me sbar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-7: 'di ni nges par mngag gzhug pa bzhin du kun tu spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-8: 'di ni cho ga gzhan te sardzi ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-13: til rnams gcig tu bsres nas lus kyi chus btags te mi bdag gi gzugs brnyan srang sum cu pa byas te aa mra'i shing gi me rab tu sbar nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la lag pa g-yas pas mgo bo nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:357b-15: 'di ni cho ga gzhan mchog ste rgya mtsho'i lan tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358a-0: sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gcig tu byas nas nas kyi 'gyur byed dang lhan cig nam mkha'i chus btags te srang sum cu'i tshad kyis rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod ba'i @358a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358a-1: thun mtshams la au dum b'a ra'i shing gi me la lag pa g-yas pas ral gri rnon pos rkang pa g-yas pa nas brtsams te gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358a-2: zhes pa 'di rnams ni dbyar gyi dus kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rnams te 'di kho na la dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358a-3: yang 'dir gzhan 'byung ste dgun smad kyi dus kyi sgrub pa ni gang du dus gcig tu sgrub par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358a-7: shu dag rnams gcig tu btags nas srang lnga bcu'i tshad kyi sa'i bdag po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la nimba'i shing gi me la nub tu mgo bzhag nas rkang pa shar du phyogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi mgo bo nas brtsams te lag pa g-yas pas ral gri rnon pos gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg stong bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358a-8: rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro; ;cho ga gzhan ni aa ru ra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-0: ba las byung ba'i mar rnams lhan cig btags pa srang sum cu'i mi bdag gi gzugs brnyan byas nas nub tu mgo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du pa l'a sha'i me la zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la me la sbyin sreg @358b stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-1: rgyal po mang ga bzhug pa bzhin du rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-2: cho ga bzhin ba ru ra'i 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-5: rtsa ba dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-7: yungs kar dkar po rnams gcig tu byas te ba las byung ba'i mar lhan cig btags nas srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu bstan nas sngar bzhin au dum b'a ra'i shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-8: sa'i bdag po gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-9: cho ga gzhan ni rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i lan tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-12: yungs kar dkar po gcig tu byas te yang dag par btags pa srang sum cus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo nub tu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-13: sngar bzhin du 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la zla ba gcig tu nyin zhag so sor ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po bka' bsgo ba rjes su sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:358b-14: cho ga gzhan ni rgya tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-0: bu ram rnams gcig tu byas te ba'i mar gyis kun tu btags pa srang lnga bcus rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas nub tu mgo bo bzhag ste sngar bzhin du ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dus tshod @359a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-1: la zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-2: rtag tu mngag gzhug pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro'o zhes pa 'di rnams ni dgun gyi dus kyi sgrub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-4: 'di rnams ni mchog tu gsang ba'o zhes pa ste slar yang rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-5: gsang ba'i sgrub pa la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i dus can gyi dngos grub g-yo bar byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-6: ji skad gsungs pa'i dus nges par gyur pas so ga la sogs pa rnams la las byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-7: de nas gang gi rgyal po 'di rtag tu kun tu bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-8: dngos grub nyams pa'ang med de las gzhan dang lhan cig de yod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-9: yang cho ga gzhan ni grub pa gang gis 'pho bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa rnams ni sems can gyi bye brag las sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-12: dbang po ma tshang ba nyid las sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-13: slob dpon gyi man ngag med par rang gi rig pa gzung ste ston pa'i bka' so sor 'brang bas mang po mi shes te bla ma dam pa med pa las sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-14: nus pa dang bral ba las sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-15: rdzas ma mthong bas rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la phul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359a-16: bla ma dam pa sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa la bdag nyid shes pa med do zhes ma zhum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-0: @359b ldan pas rtog pa'ang med cing mthong ba'ang med par las chen po'i sgrub pa rnams shes par byed pa bsod nams ma yin pa smra ba tshul khrims 'chal ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-4: dge bsnyen ma'ang rung ste rang gi bslab pa'i mtshams zhig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-5: lag pa 'gyur pa'i ltung ba la kugs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-6: byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-9: mchod rten gyi gnas la rdog pas brdzis pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-10: slob dpon gyi grib ma la 'gom par byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-11: theg pa chen po la'ang brnyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bar gyur pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-13: lha thams cad la brnyas pa ste nyes pa 'di rnams kyis las gzhan byas pa de yang dag par byas pa ma yin rnam pa gzhan du byas par 'gyur te de dngos grub dang bral ba ni de nyid kyi cho ga las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-14: gang la la 'di rnams byed pa de'i dngos grub de skad cig ma gcig la 'jigs par byed de rig pa cung zad bzlas pa ni dus gzhan du kun tu gnas te gang yang sgrub pa'i dus can gyi dngos grub ma yin pa de 'dir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:359b-15: slar yang rig pa 'dzin pa gang zhig gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i tshogs rgyal po'i rkang rjes kyi sa la bar skabs 'dir brgyad brgya'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360a-1: blugs mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360a-2: de nyid du thams cad du byed pa'i rgyal po ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360a-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba la'ang ji skad gsungs pa'i dus kyi sgrub pa la nges par dngos grub med par mi 'gyur te ngos grub nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360a-4: de nas yang sems dpa' chen po stong phrag brgyad ci yang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360a-5: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob; byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skye bo du ma'i nang du lhung ba dge ba'i spyod pa'i mchod pa chung du de stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor byas te mngon par phyag btsal nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag btsal te sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360a-6: sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ;sems can thams cad la kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-0: sems dpa' chen po @360b gsungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-1: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-2: sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing 'dzum pa'i bgegs dang bral bas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-3: gang khyod snying rje chen po don dam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-5: lhan cig pa'i rgyud thams cad kyi rjes su son pa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod pa bya bar 'gyur te mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa'ang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-8: gnod sbyin thams cad kyi dpal yang gang la la bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-10: kha ton byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-14: glegs bam du bris nas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-16: mal nas ldang ba'i dus su mgo la 'jog par byed par 'gyur ba de'i phung khrol chen po thams cad yongs su spangs te longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:360b-17: tshe ring po nyid du'ang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-0: gang yang bdag gi rgyud ma lus pa @361a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-2: sems dpa' chen po de lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-4: gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-5: de rnams 'dis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba des na bshad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-6: de nas sems dpa' chen po skad cig la ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom zhing rab tu 'dzum pa'i rang bzhin du gyur bas ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-9: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-13: lta bar mi dpogs pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-14: sems can thams cad kyi grol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lte ba gang cung zad rtog par nus pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yid la byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu btud te rin po che'i padma la nye bar 'dug ste smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-16: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-18: byang chub sems dpa' so so'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i myu gu rnams la nges par phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-20: bde ba'i ched du sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs mkhas pa'i bya ba gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361a-21: sa dang por so sor thob pa'i ched dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-0: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du ji ltar @361b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-1: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-2: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po rgyun tu nye bar bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-3: de bzhin kho nar bsod nams kyi mthus sems can rnams kyi gong du yongs su bsngags pa'i mtshan bzang pos brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-4: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs gang gis sngon byas pa'i las rnams kyis de bzhin du bya ba'ang rtag tu rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur ba de'ang dbang du bya ste sngon brjod pa'i las rnams kho nas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-6: de las kyang sa thams cad pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ma dad pa rnams rab tu dad pa nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-9: ji lta bu'i bsod nams des sems can rnams kyi gong du rgyal po byed du 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-10: nye bar longs spyod yongs su longs spyad pas bya ba'ang rab tu byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-11: de'ang gal te sngar brjod pa'i las kho nas de 'bangs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-13: blon po la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang du byed pa'i sgrub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:361b-16: dbyar gyi dus rnams su nges par sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-0: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed pa la ni de'i rkang pa'i rkang rjes kyi rdul @362a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-1: dang; ske tshe mnyam par byas pa zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la dus gcig tu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro; ;cho ga gzhan ni sna ma'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-2: til bsres pas sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-3: cho ga gzhan ni dur bha'i myu gu dang lhan cig pa'i ske tshes zla ba gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-4: cho ga gzhan nimba'i sa bon rnams ma sh'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-6: phye ma rnams lan tshva dang bsres pa'i zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-7: cho ga gzhan ni til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-8: aardzu na'i me tog bsres pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad kyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-9: cho ga gzhan nimba'i sa bon rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-10: tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-11: rgyal po'i mdun na 'don dbang byed par 'dod pas ske tshe la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362a-13: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad zla ba gcig la ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-0: @362b cho ga gzhan ni sran ma ca med ka la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-1: cho ga gzhan ni airgu da'i til mar gyis sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-2: de rnams thams cad la dong ka'i yam shing gi me sbar la sbyin sreg gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-3: pa l'a sha'i me la'ang rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-4: bram ze dbang du byed pa la 'o ma can gyi shing gi me la sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas dus gcig la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-5: rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar seng ldeng gi shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-6: rje rigs dbang du byed pa la 'bras s'a lu'i zan zho dang lhan cig pa aa mra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-7: dman pa thams cad dbang du byed pa la tsher ma can gyi yam shing gi me sbar nas ske che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-9: nimba lhan cig pa'i sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la brtsams nas dus gcig la stong phrag brgyad byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:362b-11: 'dir 'byung ba ni thun mong du mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-0: tha ma sgrub pa'i las ni yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad @363a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-1: gang bstan bya'i sbyin sreg byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-2: bud med dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-3: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la yungs kar dkar po la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-5: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-6: gang bstan bya nyi ma gsum la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-7: gzhon nu ma dbang du byed par 'dod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-8: ram ga na'i me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur ro; ;spra tshil las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas bdag nyid kyi lag par bzhag ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na gang bstan pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-9: ras ris kyi spyan sngar me tog dkar po brgyad brgya dbul bar bya ste gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-14: rgya spos rnams gcig tu byas nas btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-15: stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas 'di btungs pas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-16: gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363a-17: bram ze mo dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-0: dur khrod du lan bdun bzlas pas bud med gang la skyes bu gang gis mdun du 'dug nas @363b stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas pas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-1: sor mo gcig pa'i shing blangs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags te gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-2: gang kun tu 'gugs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;me tog brgya pa stong phrag brgyad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-3: 'di la me tog gcig blangs nas bud med la bltas nas bskor bar bya ste 'ong bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-5: nas zan za zhib phyogs gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-6: de nas grog mkhar gyis las byung ba'i nor rgyas kyi bu byas nas de la nye bar 'dug ste ji srid g-yo bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-7: de lta bus grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-8: nor rgyas kyi bu bdag nyid ma sha bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-11: da ltar byung ba'i don ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-13: nas zan za zhing sku gzugs kyi mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas longs spyod so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-14: zla ba gcig tu bsod snyoms bza' zhing dkar po'i bcu gcig la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-15: sku gzugs kyi zhabs dag la 'jus nas ji srid du sku gzugs g-yo bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:363b-16: g-yos pas gang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-0: @364a *// dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-1: yid kyis gang skyed par byed du 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-2: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-3: gang g'ar'a zhugs te 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-4: phyin nas de srid du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bye ma las byung ba'i mchod rten byas nas sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-5: 'o ma gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-6: klu thams cad 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-7: gang smras pa de thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-8: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas til mar gyis btags pa'i tsandan gyi zhogs ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-9: gang smras pa de thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-10: nags su ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas sbrang rtsi dang; ;pi pi ling gcig tu byas pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-11: bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364a-12: shing gcig tu rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum phrag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-0: 'bum yongs su rdzogs pa na gso sbyong can gyis gzugs kyis rnam pas byang chub shing las byung ba rtse gsum mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byed du bcug nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste zla ba nya la dri bzang @364b pis rab tu byugs nas ras ris la ji ltar 'byor ba'i mched pa byas nas lag pa g-yas pas blangs te mtshan thog thag tu bsgrub par bya ste ji srid 'bar gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-1: 'bar bas 'byung po'i bdag po gnyis pa gdul dka' gdul ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-2: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'i lha chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-3: rgya mtshor zhugs te 'bum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-4: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang 'dod pa'i klu de mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-5: nor bu rin po che'ang 'di la rab tu stsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-6: de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te klu'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-8: nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-9: de nas gso sbyong can gyis las byed pas zangs kyi snod byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nyal 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-10: sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang bar byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-11: de dang lag pa bcug nas gang 'dod pa de dang; de 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-12: snod bzang po'i sgrub thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-13: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-14: phyi nas zla ba nya la nor bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:364b-15: sa las byung ba'i mchod rten byas te de nyid du ras ris byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-0: sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste @365a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-1: mchod pa chen po byas nas bzhag pa'i nor bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-2: sa las byung ba lag pa g-yas pas blangs te skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-3: yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-4: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o; ;cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la mchod pa sna tshogs pa byas nas mar me'i phreng ba'am rgya cher byas te lag pa g-yas pas rgyal mtshan gos dkar po 'phyang ba bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-5: rgyal mtshan gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-6: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-7: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam la dri bzang po'i dri yis so sor byugs nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng ba dkris te lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlos par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-8: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365a-9: gang du 'dod pa de ru 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-0: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod ma'i gzhon nu ma rab tu mdzes pa legs par khrus byas pa rgyan gyis brgyan par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar 'byor pa'i @365b mchod pa bya ste lag pa g-yon pas rab tu bzung ste g-yas pas ji srid de dang thabs cig tu 'bar ba 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-1: ji lta ba bzhin du thabs gcig tu rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-2: mtshan ma gcig pa'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas ji srid 'khor rnams mi mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-3: ma mthong ba na sems can thams cad 'ongs nas grub pa gsum po thams cad sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-5: nyi ma gzas gzung ba na ba bla byang chub shing gi 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas dbang phyug chen po'i lha khang du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-6: des thig le byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-8: nas zan bza' zhing rgya mtsho'i 'gram du'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-9: shing drung du thun gsum du stong phrag bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-10: mtshan mo bdun du rgya mtshor gnas pa'i til rnams mthong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-11: ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-12: mon sran sde'u za zhing ri bo la 'dzegs nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-13: mtshan mo nyi shur ri bo la gnas pa'i gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-14: nor bu rin po che ston cing smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-15: ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:365b-17: shing gi 'gram du zla ba gcig tu nyin mtshan du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-0: thams cad chu klung gi 'gram du mthong bar @366a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-2: ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-4: bud med dbang du byed pa la sol bas sa la gzugs brnyan bris te de'i steng du nye bar 'dug nas stong phrag brgyad nyin zhag gsum thun gsum du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-7: rgyal po'i gos 'dod pas me tog dkar po yongs su mnyes pa rnams la lan gcig yongs su bzlas pa'i chur gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-8: mtshan mo bdun la gos rnams rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-9: ba'i mar la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-11: g-yo ba rnams khyad par du 'pho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-12: lcags las byung ba'i mdzub gang tsam gyi ral gri blangs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste aa shvattha'i 'dab mas g-yas nas bskor te ral gri rab tu bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-13: de blangs pas 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor ba rig pa 'dzin pa rnams thams cad kyis shes nas bar gyi bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro; ;'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-14: nas zan bza' zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366a-15: sngon spyad pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-0: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas @366b dge 'dun gyi bstan pa can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-1: slongs mo zos nas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i ldong ros blangs te des ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du sa la padma 'dab brgya pa bris nas padma'i 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug ste nyi ma so sor ji srid du sa zos nas padma gyen du 'gro ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-2: padma'i 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa nyi shu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-3: lha'i gzhal med khang yang 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-4: de nas de 'khor dang bcas pa de gzhal med khang la 'dzegs nas 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-5: de'ang padma rin po che du mas brgyan pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-6: bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-7: bde ba can du'ang 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-8: lus tha dad 'dod pa dag tu skye ba so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-9: stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa'i chus shing skam po la gtor na me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-10: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-11: chu klung skams par zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya ste chu skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-12: chu klung rgyas par 'dzags par bzlas na thang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-14: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog rnams nag po'i brgyad pa la stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-15: lan tshva'i sreg blugs kyang stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:366b-16: nges par rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-0: de nyid kyis brgyad pa nas brtsams @367a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-1: te ji srid bcu gcig pa'i bar du gi wang la thun gsum du brgyad brgyar bzlas pa des thig le byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-3: bu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar yungs kar stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-4: gnas kyi thal ba blangs te gzugs brnyan byas na gang gi ming nas smras pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-5: gtsang ma'i don du ba'i mar blangs te zla ba gzas bzung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-6: nyi ma gzas bzung ba'i dus su zangs kyi snod du bcug nas ji srid dngos grub rnam gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-7: 'gro bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-8: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la bcud kyis len no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-11: aarga'i me tog 'bum gyis spyin sreg byas na dong tshe 'bum sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-12: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste dong tshe brgyad rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-13: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'bras s'a lu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-14: 'bras thug po che la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dong tshe lnga brgya rnyed do; ;sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-16: mar gyi btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367a-17: dong tshe sum brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-0: gzugs brnyan sbyin @367b sreg steng phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-1: dong tshe brgya lhag par rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-3: rigs kyi bdag mo dbang du byed par 'dod pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar aarga'i yam shing gis mtshan mo bdud du thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-4: rig pa'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-5: rig pa'i bdag po nyid du byed par 'dod pas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du dur bha'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste rigs kyi bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-6: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dbang du byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar aarga'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-7: mtshan mo bdun du 'dod cing don du gnyer ba'i don gang yin pa smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-8: rtag tu bzlas pas nor rnams rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-9: ras ris kyi spyan sngar gu gul gyi ril bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-11: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu kun tu ru'i bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-13: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar aarga'i shing gi yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-15: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:367b-17: dgra bo dbang du byed par 'dod pas gso sbyong can gyis thun gsum du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar p'a sha'i me la ske tshe'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-0: zla ba gcig gi dus la rgya skyegs @368a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-1: kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-2: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-4: thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste thun gsum du karsha pa na brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-6: nas zan bza' zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-7: sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-8: nag po'i bcu gcig bar skyes bu'i ro ma nyams pa blangs nas bkrus te rgyan gyis brgyan pa bag mar blangs pa'i gdod ma'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'dzin pa byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-10: bdug pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod de rkang pa g-yon pas brang khar yang dag par mnan nas spyi bor yang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-11: yang du rig pa bzlas te thal lcags gis bsnun par byas te langs pa de srid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-14: da ltar byung ba ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-15: de nas rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i ral gris bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-17: gser gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-18: de nas mi 'dod do zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-20: de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu skyug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368a-21: de blangs nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te yid ltar mgyogs pa'i bar gyi bskal pa'i bar du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-0: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams @368b nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bor zhugs nas zla ba tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-1: m'a sha'i tshad kyi sna ma'i me tog 'bum rab tu 'bab par bya ste yul gru bcu rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-2: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du padma 'bum dbul bar bya ste gter sbrag ma rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-3: sngon spyang pa byas pa de nyid chu klung du zhugs nas sna ma'i me tog 'bum dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-4: mthar til nag po'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-5: yul gru ra ba dang bcas pa bcu rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-6: mya ngan med pa'i shing la sran ma tsa med ka'i tshad tsam gyi ril bu byas nas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-8: mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg byas na gang cung zad tshol ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-9: aa b'a m'arga'i yam shid la cho ga 'di kho nas gser stong rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-11: de de ka bsres la aa p'a m'arga'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-12: ta na tu gsum gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-14: rgyal po rnams blon po dang bcas pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas zla ba gcig tu mya ngan med pa'i me tog rnams kho na zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:368b-16: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste rang gi khyim du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-0: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du rked pa'i ched kyis chur zhugs nas @369a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-1: me tog brgya pa 'bum dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-2: de nas me tog brgya pa la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas nas gang gis bsnams pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-3: mthong bar byin na de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-4: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod pas zla ba gcig tu ske tshe zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-6: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-7: gang brjod pa de byed rgyal po nye bar dbang du byed pa la sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ske tshe zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-8: sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig pa rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-9: de nas kyang li ta dang lhan cig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-10: de nas kyang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig pa rnams zla ba gcig tu thun gsum du ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas brgyad brgyar sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-11: rgyal po'i mdun na 'don na dbang du byed par 'dod pas mar dang lhan cig pa'i 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o; ;rgyal rigs la 'o thug dang bsres pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-12: rje rigs la 'o ma dang lhan cig pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-13: dmangs rigs la til mar gyis btags pa rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-14: gsum po thams cad la lan tshva'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369a-15: yugs sa mo la ma sha'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-0: sems can thams cad la tshva'i til mar gyis btags pa'i til rnams kyis @369b dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-1: thams cad la zla ba gcig tu p'a la sha'i mi la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-2: gtsang mar gyur bas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bil ba'i yam shing gis me sbar nas bil ba'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-4: mtshan mo nyi shur 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-5: nas zan za zhing p'a la sha'i me la yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya ste nor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-7: nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag lngar bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-8: de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu thun gsum du yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste nor gyi rgyun gang du 'dod pa der ltung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-9: zas bzhin smyung bar gnas pas yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-10: rgyu skar gyi gnod pa nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-11: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mtshan brgyad du bil ba'i shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-13: yang na dbang phyug nyid rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-14: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig tu b'a la sha'i me la me tog brgya pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:369b-15: ji ltar 'dod pa'i nor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-1: mchod rten du p'a la sha'i shing gis me rab tu spar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-3: mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-4: yul gru bcu la spyod pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-5: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-6: nas zan za zhing padma 'bum dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-8: yang na dbang phyug rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:370a-9: 'di rnams kho na ku mu da'i cho ga ste rgyal po la gang tshol ba de rnyed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-2: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar nyi ma so so la mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te de nas aarga'i shing gis me rab tu spar nas dri'i til mar gyis btags pa'i shing gser gyi phye ma tshon gang tsam gyis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-3: zla ba drug gis rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-4: ma skyes pa'i longs spyod skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-5: lo gsum gyis rgyal srid chen por so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-6: cho ga 'di nyid kho nas lcags las byung ba'i phye ma'i sbyin sreg bya ste lo gsum gyis mtshon cha bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-7: cho ga 'di nyid kyis gur gum gyi sreg blugs dri'i til mar gyi btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-8: nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-9: dri thams cad kyi sreg blugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-10: mar gyi sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-12: yang na ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i yul so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-13: pa l'a sha'i me nyid la ga bur gyi sreg blugs mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371a-14: pa l'a sha'i me la sbyin sreg tsandan gyis yam shing dri'i til mar gyi btags ba 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-3: aa ga ru'i yam shing la mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-4: pa l'a sha'i yam shing la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste nad chen po nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-5: nimba'i 'bras bu la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste gang 'dod pa'i bcings pa de grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-6: rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar blangs te 'bum mngon par sngags te 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-7: mchog tu yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-9: sems can thams cad kyi gnang chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-10: de rnams thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-13: 'bras bu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas na de gang la byin pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:371b-14: gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba 'byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-0: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas gzugs @372a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-1: brnyan gyi spyan sngar au dum b'a ra'i shing gis me sbar nas zla ba gcig gi dus gcig la ts'a ru bza' zhing tshangs pa'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-3: bram ze dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du zla ba gcig tu 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-5: rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ts'a ru'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-6: rje rigs dbang du byed pa la nas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-7: zho bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-8: dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la nas la dri'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste sngar bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372a-9: gzhan rnams la gzhan gyis mi thub pa la dug gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-0: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du seng ldeng gi me la gu gul gyi ril bu mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad dus @372b gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-3: nas zan bza' zhing 'bum zlos shig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-7: dong ka'i me tog gi ge sar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-8: n'a ga ge sar dang; tsandan dkar po rnams gcig tu byas nas rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad kyi ril bu bya ste mi mnyam pa'i lcags gsum gyis dkri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-12: de nas ril bu za ma tog du bcug ste bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sngar ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas zla ba gzas bzung ba na mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-13: gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas mdun du bzhag ste ji srid kha ta kha ta zhes sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-16: bla ma'i bla mar gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:372b-17: de nas de rnams rin gyis nyo bar bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:373b-14: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:373b-17: zangs kyi snod du ba las byung ba'i mar bzhag nas cho gas 'bum zlos shig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-4: mchong pa la sogs pa nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-5: mar de nyid kyis lus la mngon par byugs nas mer rab tu zhugs na mi tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-6: chu la rab tu zhugs na thams cad chu la rkang pa mi 'bying bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-7: lag pa la mngon par byug na lcags tshig pa nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-8: padma'i rtsa ba za bar byed cing gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du ldong ros blangs nas lag pa kha sbyar bzhag nas ji srid gza' las grol ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-10: cho ga 'di nyid kyis ma sha gcig khar bcug ste ji srid myu gu byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374a-14: nyi zla gzas bzung ba na cho gas bsgrub par bya /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-0: tshim par byed par 'dod pas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me @374b rab tu spar nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-2: mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-7: nas zan bza' zhing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas lo gcig bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-8: de nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-10: gnod sbyin rnams la gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma sran tshod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-11: ka ka mo ti ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-14: 'khur ba can so kha ba dhi la sogs pa phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phul nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi yam shing gi me la'o ma'i shing gi yam shing khru gang gi tshad la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-16: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:374b-17: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste nor byin cig gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375a-2: gnod sbyin bdag gis bka' sgrub par gyur cig de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375a-3: de nas brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor so sor la lha'i gzhal du med pa'i bza' ba so sor stsol bar byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375a-13: lhan cig mchog stsol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375a-14: yang na lha'i sman stsol bar byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375a-18: tsher ma rnams mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-0: shu dag la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas khar bcug na tha snyad @375b 'dod pa smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-1: dri zhim po'i til mar la yongs su bzlas nas kha la skus shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-2: rgyal po'i khab tu smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-3: mig sman la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas mig la mig sman du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-4: tha snyad rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-5: nyi zla gzas bzung ba na rna ba'i mig sman khar bcug nas ji srid grol ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-6: de nas de la bsrung ba byas nas yang dag pa'i cho gas btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-7: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas mig la mig sman du bya'o //
