K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-12: gang mchog stsol bar byed pa'i mchog rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-13: mi smra bar slong mo za bas 'bum zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-15: ras ris kyi spyan sngar lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas 'bum zlos shig de nas grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-16: khu tshur bcings pas mi snang bar 'gyur te bkrol bas snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-17: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-18: chu klung gi 'gram du ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas padma 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya ste dpal mo mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:375b-19: m'a shas de bzhin du mchog stsol par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-0: cho ga 'di nyid kyis autpa la sngon pos 'bum @376a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-1: sbyin sreg bya ste gter mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-2: gu gul gyi ril bus 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste dong tse 'bum rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-3: dri zhim po'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg bya ste gos bye ba rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-4: gu gul gyis bdug pa brgyad brgyas yid la mngon par 'dod pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-5: ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor yungs kar stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste nyi ma gsum la dong tse nyi shu rtsa lnga rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mtshan mo bdun du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-7: dong tse yang dag par rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-8: lan tshva las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-10: bud med de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-12: yungs kar la mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-13: nyi ma gsum gyis bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-14: chur rkang pa gcig bcug nas de bzhin du thang la ste ji srid du chur gnas pa'i rkang pa yang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-15: sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376a-16: aarga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas ske tshe stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste nyi ma bdun gyis las kyi sgrib pa zad par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-0: pi pi ling gi phye ma cha mnyam par byas nas sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig pas 'phags @376b pa 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas lhag par byas te nyi ma bdun la de bzhin du yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-1: zla ba gnyis kyis sbyor bas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-2: ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-3: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad byas nas phyis klog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-4: de bzhin du nyi ma so so la mi smra bar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-7: 'gags par yang rung ste bzlas pa tsam nyid kyis grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-8: chom rkun la ltas nas bzlas pas chom rkun gyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-9: til mar la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas mgo la skus shig skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas me tog gcal du bkram ste khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-11: nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-12: sngon gyi tshig bla dvags nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-13: tshangs ma'i khu ba zho gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-15: sbrang rtsi zho gang la brgyad brgyar yongs su bzlas nas nyi ma re re btung bar bya ste ji srid mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:376b-16: yid gzhungs par 'gyur zhing lnga brgya 'dzin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-0: @377a *// chu la lan bdun bzlas nas mgo bor blugs pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-1: seng ldeng gi phur bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-2: gu gul gyi bdug pas ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-3: dug gso ba la chu gris so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-4: lan bdun bzlas pa'i yal 'dab kyis gdon 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-6: gu gul gyi bdug pas gdon gyis zin pa rnams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-10: til 'dres pa la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg mtshan mo bya ste mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-11: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du zla ba nya ba la dad pas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs ta bum pa gang ba brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-16: kun tu ru ska'i bdug pa sreg cing bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-17: lus kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-18: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-19: nas zan za zhing ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-21: rmongs par byed pa la sogs pa'i las rnams nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377a-22: phye za zhing chu klung gi chur zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-0: ldong ros la sogs pas sgrub @377b pa rnams nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-1: klu'i gnas su karb'a ba'i btus pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-3: gang tshol ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-4: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo la srung ba mngon par sngags pa byas nas rgyal po'i mthar zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-6: cho ga 'di nyid kho nas rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-9: gzig la sogs pa 'jigs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-10: til gyi sbyin bsreg gis ro ldan ma dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-11: sha 'tshong bas bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-13: lan bdun mngon par sngags pas gtsug tor bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-15: rgyal po'i pho brang du rtsod pa la bzlas pas rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-16: chus mngon par dbang bskur bar byed par 'dod pas rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-17: nag po la sogs pa med pa'i bum pa bzhi yal 'dab kyis kha brgyan te 'bab chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-19: sa bon thams cad bcug nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas te chu des bdag nyid la mngon par dbang bskur na bdag bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-20: log par 'dren pa thams cad las grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:377b-22: rims las dri'i chu la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa byas nas mngon par gtor bar bya ste rang gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-0: ro langs la seng ldeng gi phur bus byis pa'i sbyor bas rab tu 'bad pa 'khrul 'khor legs par byas nas phyogs bzhir skyes @378a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-1: bu lag na ral gri thogs pa bzhi bzhag ste snying gar nye bar 'dug ste lcags las byas pa'i blugs gzar gyis lcags kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-2: 'di'i kha nas lce nges par 'byung ste ral gri rnon pos bcad nas autpa la sngon po dang mtshungs pa'i ral grir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-3: de blangs pas 'khor dang bcas pa skye bar 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-4: lo bye ba phrag bcu gcig tu 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-5: dus la bab pa dang lha rnams su nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-6: lcags las byung ba'i dpral ris pub pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-7: mtshan mo bdun du lhag par gnas par byas nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs bya ste de nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-9: dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa byas te 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la ji ltar nus pa'i ston mo byas nas zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la rjes su gnang ba zhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378a-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar yungs kar gyi phung po byas nas de la gong nas gong du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-0: gdon 'jug pa thams cad la gu gul @378b gyi bdug pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-1: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-3: sprin thams cad gnon pa la bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-4: yungs kar la bzlas nas de mnan pas nam mkhar gtor bar bya ste chu rengs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-5: seng ldeng gi phur bu la lan bdun bzlas pas sa la brko bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-7: mtshon cha thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-10: 'gyed pa rnams thams cad la tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas gsang gnas su gdags par bya ste 'khrugs ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-13: 'gyed pa rnams rnam par gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-15: sngags rnams la chu la lan bdun bzlas pa sbyin sreg bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-16: nor 'dod pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar kun tu ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-17: rmi lam du dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-18: mi dge ba ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-19: stong phrag bdun bzlas pas dngul sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-20: thams cad dbye ba la thal bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-21: longs spyod don du gnyer bas chu klung 'dus ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:378b-22: lteng kar gtsang ma'i phyogs su ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-1: dang; mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-3: de nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-4: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-5: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-6: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-7: gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-10: phur bu rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-11: dur bha la mar gyis btags pa 'bum bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-12: nyi ma bdun gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-14: sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-15: mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-17: bu ram la rab tu bzhag par bya ste dgra thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-18: ba byung gi dkyil 'khor byas nas srang bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste gu gul gyi bdug pa phul nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-19: gal te 'tsho na srad bu gar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-20: mi 'tsho na gar mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-21: ba byung gi dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa byas nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379a-22: bdug pa phul te der gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-0: dgra rnams la lan bdun yongs @379b su bzlas nas sa'i gnas su gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-1: byad stems thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-2: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la dbyug pa la yongs su bzlas nas der 'phangs par bya ste gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-3: brjed byed 'jug pa la aa pa marga'i yam shing gis me spar nas til nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-4: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dkar po bsreg pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-5: brjed byed kyi gdon nyams par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-6: gdon thams cad la srad bu nag po bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-11: khyi rdo gcod pa las dkar po ste sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-12: nyi zla gzas bzung ba na smyung bar gnas pa byas nas til mar la yongs su bzlas te til mar gyis gdong la bskus nas dgra'i khyim du 'jug par bya ste byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-13: cho ga 'di nyid kyis so sor 'brang ba brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas lag pa la bcings pas g-yul du 'jug par bya ste gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-14: dus nyid du langs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dkyil 'khor byas nas chu khyor ba gsum po re re la lan bdun yongs su bzlas nas btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:379b-15: yid kyis brjod pas gtso bor bya ste ji srid du tshos kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-0: de nas zas kham dang po la @380a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-1: lan gsum yongs su bzlas nas dus ma yin par brgyad brgyar bzlas pa byas nas de gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-2: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-3: ngag kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur te nyi ma re re la sho lo ka brgya 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-4: de bzhin du nyin mo bdun du chu la lan bdun bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-5: ldong ros aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-6: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar aa ba marga'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-7: rgyal po rgyal po'i blon po dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-9: lo ma za ba gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'bum phrag gsum zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-10: de nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-11: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la til nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-13: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-15: bud med dbang du 'gyur ro; ;gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-16: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380a-17: yang na rgyal po'i pho brang du ngag 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-0: shu dag @380b khar bcug ste ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-1: dro bzhin pa la dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-2: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-3: 'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-4: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas nag po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te padma 'bum sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-5: tsandan dmar po las byung ba'i sor bcu drug pa la gzo bo gso sbyong can gyis shing gi dbyug pa byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-6: de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-7: zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas shing gi dbyug pa lag pa g-yas pas blangs te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-8: dro bzhin pa la smra bar bya ba 'dod pa thams cad myur du smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-9: du ba 'thul bas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-11: ras ris la gos dkar pos kun nas g-yogs par byas nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:380b-12: 'khor stong dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do; ;ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-0: nas zan za zhing mi smra bar ku sha bting ba'i mal stan la tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du 'bum phrag bcu drug @381a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-2: au dum b'a ra'i yam shing gis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-3: de la lcags las byung ba'i padma sor drug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-4: brgyad pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas dus gsum du yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-5: 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste phyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar padma bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-6: de blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa skra li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-7: yid kyis bye ba zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-9: gang cung zad bsams pa ma tshang ba med par phun sum tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-10: phyogs gang du 'gro ba der bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas 'phang bar bya ste gdug pa thams cad gnon par 'gyur ro; ;gos la mngon par sngags nas bgo bar bya ste bya ba rtsom pa thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-11: gdong la kun tu byabs na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-12: dug rab tu nyams pa ldang du 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-13: 'byung po'i gdon grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381a-14: bgegs mthu med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-0: khyim du ras ris bzhugs su bcug na khyim gyi @381b bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-1: so ba'i phung por bzhugs su bcug na so ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-2: de bzhin du 'dab mar bzhugs su 'jug par byed na de'i dngos grub du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-3: de bzhin du yon tan brjod pa gzhal du med pa skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-4: de nas zhi ba can byed par 'dod na zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-5: sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-7: rgyas pa can la til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-10: mon sran gre'u la sogs pa rnams zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-12: mar gyis btags pa 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-15: ras ris med pas kyang rung ste gso sbyong can gyis skyabs gsum yongs su bzung nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-16: stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-17: de nas zla ba nya la zla ba gzas bzung ba na 'dod pa can thams cad la gtor ma byin nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-18: de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-19: khyad par thams cad rang gis len par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:381b-20: kun nas byabs pa tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed du 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-0: chu la lan bdun bzlas pas sngags par gyis shig @382a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-1: kun tu myur bar 'thungs na rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-3: srog chags la yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg stong gis lha ma yin gyi phug gi sgor de ltar rab tu bzhag nas nges par gnas pas 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-4: lha ma yin gyi bu mo nges par song nas rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-5: der rab tu gnas pas gang tshol bde rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-6: gang du 'dod pa der kun tu gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-7: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ras ris so sor bzhugs nas ras ris la 'bum bzlas pas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'ang rang gis gnas su rjes su 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-8: de la yid bzhin gyi nor bu btsal bar bya ste de blangs nas 'dod pa thams cad la spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing du spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-10: bskal par gnas shing thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-11: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas mdud pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-13: log par 'dren pa thams cad bcings bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-15: chu gling du bsod snyoms za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382a-17: ts'a ru za zhing chu klung 'dus par 'bum zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-0: mi snang ba thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu @382b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-1: yang dag par sdom pas lhung bzed lag pa g-yas pas blangs te skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-3: bskal par gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-5: mkhar gsil la sogs pa rnams la cho ga 'di nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-6: nyi zla gzas bzung ba na dge slong gis bsgrub par bya ste thams cad 'di nyid kho nas bya ste bskal bar gnas shing tshangs par spyod cing thogs pa mad par 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-7: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-9: nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o; ;yul gru brgyad so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-10: pu s'i l'a ka'i 'dab ma rnams kyis sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-12: dug thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-13: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug kun tu 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-14: sna ma'i me tog gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-18: soo gandha ti ka la sogs pa rnams zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:382b-20: mar gyis btags te thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-1: ze mdun na 'don yang rung ste mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-2: rig pas nyams pa la gur gum gyis gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-4: yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas pa grong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-6: der sems can rnams shing bzhin du gnyid log par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-7: ji srid nyi ma 'char gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-9: skyes pa'ang rung ste dbang du byed par 'dod na phyogs gang na de'i khyim yod pa'i phyogs der kha bltas te mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas na rmi lam du mthong ba sbyin zhing nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-10: chu la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad kyi mchu bcing bar byed do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-11: gter bcing pa la 'ang seng ldeng gi phur pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gter gyi gnas su grva bzhi gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-12: gter bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-13: khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas nas chu la gtor na gtum po rnams kyis nya 'joms par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383a-14: sa pha li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-0: rta'i sbangs la @383b lan bdun bzlas pas gdug pa sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-3: 'bras bus kyang rung ste lan bdun bzlas pas sbrang bu 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-4: dbang du byed pa la rgyal po'i sgor so shing za ba la so shing sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-9: mche ba can thams cad rengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-15: 'byung po dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-16: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon las dgrol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-20: ro langs slong bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-21: phug tu 'jug par byed pa dang; mtshams bcing ba rnams la 'ang bzlas pa tsam gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-22: mi snang bar 'dod pas shing sha t'a pa ri'i rtsa ba la stong mngon par sngags pa byas nas lag pas chings shig; mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-23: ras ris kyi spyan sngar bzlas pa byas nas phyi nas me tog brgyad pa dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa blangs te zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-25: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-26: ji srid rtsa ba'i rin gyi tshad du byas pas brgya 'gyur gyi rin rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:383b-27: de nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na byang chub shing gi 'og tu dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-2: bdug pas mchod pa byas nas ldong ros srang gcig blangs te aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas lus rnam par bcom nas bzhag par bya ste skad cig de nyid la de skye ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-5: gnod sbyin thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro; ;lha'i rna ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-7: nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mang du 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-8: rig pa 'dzin pa brgya phrag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-9: gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-10: nas zan za zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-11: zla ba gzas bzung ba na lo ma bdun pa'i 'dab ma'i steng du byin nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gi wang rnam par dor nas ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-12: ji srid 'bar bar gyur par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384a-13: thig le byas nas rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-0: mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas so so b'i ra ma na srang gcig blangs nas mes gdungs bzang por byas nas mig sman gyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste zla ba gzas bzung ba na @384b chur rab tu zhugs nas ji srid grul bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-1: skad cig la bcag pa tsam gyis gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-4: cod pan 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mi gnod par 'gyur zhing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-5: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-8: gser stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-9: p'a la sha'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-11: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas bas 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-12: nas zan za zhing bsgrub par bya ste rgyal po dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-13: 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas nyi ma bdun du yungs kar dkar po la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-15: mar gyis btags pa nyi ma bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-16: bdun gnyis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-17: lhag par rtogs pa dbang du 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-18: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed pa la aargha'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas nyi ma bdun du yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin sreg byas nas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:384b-19: rigs bzhi dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyi ma bdun du thun gsum du til nag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-1: sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-2: sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-3: cho ga 'di nyid kyis til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-4: sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-5: aarga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-7: shing pi n'a ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-8: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-9: tambu la'i phye ma 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-11: phyag g-yas pas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-12: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyags pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-13: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te chings shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-15: aarga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-16: bza' ba mi zad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-17: 'bru thams cad gnas gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-18: 'bru thams cad mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-19: shing wa ta 'ching ba can gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-20: rdzas zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385a-21: sbrang rtsi can gyi shing stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-0: cu gang gcig tu byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad mngon @385b par sngags par bya ste byang chub shing gi 'dab mar bzhag nas zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-1: de nas des gi wang grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-3: skyes pa gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;'bras yos kyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-4: ji srid nyi ma bdun gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-6: ras ris kyi spyan sngar dong ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-7: rnam par btags pa'i gos bye ba bcu gnyis rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-9: zho lhan cig sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-10: ji srid 'cho'i bar du bza' ba ma tshang ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-11: mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-13: bye ba bzlas pas 'khor brgya dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro; ;bud med dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-14: skyes pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas gu gul gyi ril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas sbyin sreg bya ste ming smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;shu dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas khar bcug na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:385b-17: btung ba zhim po gang blangs pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-0: 'bras thug po che rnams ma sha dang lhan cig stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis @386a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-2: gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-3: sindhu b'a ra'i me rab tu sbar nas btsos pa thams cad kyi phud kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-5: bza' ba zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-6: gang 'dod pa'i cod pan bcings pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-7: nimba'i me tog 'bum gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-8: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-9: ma nyams pa'i 'bras s'a lu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-10: thug po che rnams sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-12: mya ngan med pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas lha'i sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-13: bu mo gang don du gnyer ba de so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-14: ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te 'bum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-15: de nas yul de'i rgyal po bka' bsgo bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-17: ts'a ru za bas gso sbyong can gyis 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste sa'i rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-19: nas zan za bar gyur pas 'bum phrag brgyad bzlas te padma dkar po 'bum dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-20: kun nas rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-21: dur bha dang byu ru stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas na tshe ring por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386a-22: yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-0: 'o ma'i snod kyis @386b aa mra'i 'dab ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-1: nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-2: pri yang ku'i snying po tshad gang yin pa 'bum sbyin sreg byed pa tshad de'i dong tse rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-3: 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-5: bza' ba don du gnyer na bza' ba'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-6: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te slongs mo za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-7: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas aa shva ttha'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-9: mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-12: mar gyi sbyin sreg gis thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-13: sbrang rtsis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-14: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-15: mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-16: gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-21: ri'i rtse mor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten bzhugs nas padma stong phrag brgya phul cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-24: las rnams grub par ma gyur na yul gru brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:386b-25: rgyal po dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-1: nas 'jug par byed pa la zla ba gzas bzung ba na ba ser skya'i mar zangs kyi snod du 'jog tu bcug nas zangs kyi thur ma la ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-2: wu ba 'byung bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-3: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-5: sngon spyad pa byas pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du me tog phur ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-6: bla re yongs su bre ba byas nas dri zhim po'i dris mtho gang gi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-7: me tog gi mchod pa byas nas gtor ma dbul zhing mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-8: de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid gang du bee gha sta ni ta zhes pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-9: de nas myur du mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur te me tog gi chun po g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-10: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387a-12: ras ris 'gul ba ste 'di rnams mthong nas gang sgrub par byed pa de 'grub te sdig pa zad par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-1: lto 'phye chen po rnams dbang du byed par 'dod pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du seng ldeng gi sol bas me rab tu sbar nas lan tshva dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-2: til dang; yungs kar rnams zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-4: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-8: yungs kar gang yang rung ba la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas phyogs bzhir thor cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-9: dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma phul nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya ste padma 'dab ma'i gi wang bzhag nas skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-12: sems can thams cad du byad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-13: lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-14: khro bzhin pa la lo stong du 'tsho bar byed cing dpag tshad stong phrag du 'gro zhing de nyid du 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-15: grub pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-16: yid kyis bza' ba skyed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-17: de nas 'bar bar byed pa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-18: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:387b-19: skra li zhing tshe bskal par gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-0: rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor @388a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-1: nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-2: sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'i phyogs la dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-3: ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-4: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas snam sbyar bsgrub par bya ste dri thams cad kyi rab tu byugs te mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste dri rnams kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas de'i steng du snam sbyar bzhag ste lag pa g-yon pas mnan nas ji srid du 'phur bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-5: 'phral du shing ta la'i tshad du 'phur bar byed cing gnas pa tshad 'di nyid kho nas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-7: blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-12: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas phyag byas par 'gyur zhing ci bgyir yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388a-13: rtag tu snam sbyar la yongs su bzlas par byed pa ni de'i tshe sems bskyed pas gdug pa'i sems de las ltung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-0: yid kyis slar yongs su bzlas pas ldang @388b bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-1: mar sar las byung ba'i nor bu byas nas aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bzhi la bzhag ste ji srid dro bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-2: sos ma reg par zo zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-3: zos pa tsam gyis gang sems par byed pa de thams cad skye bar 'gyur te 'dod pa mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-5: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-6: sngon spyad pa byas pas zla ba nya la ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-7: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas ku sha las byung ba'i ral gri la aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag nas khu tshur gyi mdzub mos blangs nas ji srid du 'phro bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-8: de blangs pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-9: sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:388b-13: rang bzhin can gyi mig sman blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mig la bsku bar bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-0: gla rtsi la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pas kun @389a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-3: lan tshva la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par sngags pas gang gi khyim du mngon par phyogs pas 'thor bar byed na nyi ma bdun gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-4: khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas na gang gis khrus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-5: 'thung bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-6: bdag gis mthong ba la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ji srid mthong ba de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-7: gu gul gyi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis rgyal rigs so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-10: phun da r'i ka la sogs pa rnams 'bul bar byed bzhin pas ni gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-11: zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan gcig par mchod pa byas nas lus kyis g-yas su tsandan dmar pos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas lag pa g-yas pas dkyil 'khor mnan nas 'bod bzhin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-12: ji srid dkyil 'khor sa nag por skyes pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389a-14: khu tshur bcings pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro; ;gtsug phud sgrub pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid mtshams su gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-0: de nas gtsug phud la brgyad brgyar @389b mngon par sngags pa byas nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ni ji ltar bsod snyoms ster ba bas mthong ba dre'i tshe grub bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-1: nyi ma dang po la slong mo gcig go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-2: de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-3: bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-4: zla ba gzas bzung ba na 'o ma la yongs su bzlas nas 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-5: bcud kyis len chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-6: ba sha ka'i yam shing gi sreg blugs brgyas gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-7: ral gri la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags te phug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-8: lha'i khyim gyi sgo ru gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-9: sgo glegs lugs la mngon par 'dud pas sgo dbye bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-10: lan gcig bzlas pas bdag nyid srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-11: 'o ma'i sreg blugs kyis bud med dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-12: yid kyis grub pa'i gsang sngags rnams rengs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-13: gsang sngags thams cad phye bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-14: lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-15: dri thams cad kyi sreg blugs rgyal rigs kyi bud med dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-16: lha de dri med kyi sbyin sreg gi brtul zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-17: rab tu byung ba dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-18: snying ga dang; lag pa brgyar bzhugs nas zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-19: sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:389b-20: sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-2: sems can thams cad rengs bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-3: sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-4: bil ba la yongs su bzlas nas byin na sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-5: lha'i lus kyi g-yas su dpag tu med pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-10: thal ba la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas go char bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-11: sems can thams cad kyis mi phyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-12: chu la brgyad brgyar bzlas pas yan lag rnams la sbyin du chug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-13: nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-14: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas seng ldeng la ral gri byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi la blangs nas dur khrod du ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-15: blangs pa des thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-16: ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa skra li zhing 'khyil ba tshe bskal par gnas pa rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mang du 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-18: zla ba gzas bzung ban sngon spyad pa byas pa'i tho rangs langs nas ras ris la mchod pa byas te slong mo'i zas za zhing yon dang bcas bas dngos grub stsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390a-19: de nas ngag gi las rab tu 'grub bar 'gyur te d'ur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-1: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-2: 'ching ba rnams grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-3: bdag nyid mchog tu byed pa la gi wang la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas dpral par thig le byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na mchog tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-6: bu mo dbang du byed pa la sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-8: 'di nyid gyis rnam par rgyas pa'i bud med byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-11: phyag rgya thams cad kyang ngag nges byin pas grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-12: dug thams cad gso bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-13: gdon las thar bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-14: ngag nyid kyis las rnams ni glang po zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-15: tsher ma zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-17: dmag sde rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-18: mtshon cha rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-19: shing rta rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-20: me rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-21: gru rengs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-22: 'gugs par byed pa mche ba can rnams sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:390b-23: mche ba med pa'ang rung ste 'bebs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-0: nas zan za zhing 'bum bzlas te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos te mtshan ma gcig par ku sha'i steng du bzhag ste mchod pa chen po byas nas 'byung po @391a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-1: thams cad pa'i gtor ma byas te lus kyi g-yas su gnas pas ba bla dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-5: gi wang rnams gcig tu byas nas aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-8: 'bar ba ste dro bzhin pa la rkang 'thung la spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-9: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-10: sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-11: du ba 'thul ba bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-12: tshe lo brgya phrag bcu thub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-13: 'bar bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad mnga' bdag gi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-15: gong nas gong du bzlas pa 'bum gyis ngag mngon par shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-20: tshig de'ang thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-21: de nas ro langs sgrub par 'dod na ro yan lag ma nyams pa blangs nas dur khrod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391a-24: mtshan ma gcig par yang rung ste 'byung po thams cad pa la gtor mas nye bar mchod nas lha chen po'i lus kyi g-yas su dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te gtor ma phul nas khrus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-0: rgyan gyis brgyan par byas @391b nas thal bas dkyil 'khor bris te de'i dbus su mgo bo shar du bstan la bzhag cing ras dkar pos lus la g-yog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-1: grogs bzang pos phyogs skyong bar byed pa gnas su bcug nas de'i steng du skyil krung byas pa nye bar 'dug ste de'i khar til dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-2: yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg 'di'i kha nas nor bu 'byin par byed pa'i bar de srid du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-3: kha'i nor bu de blangs pas skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-4: nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te glang po che stong gi stobs dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-6: lha'i gnas su 'gro bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-7: tshe bskal pa chen por gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-8: gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-9: ro langs gzhan ni cho ga 'di nyid kyis skyes bu'i ro blangs nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la sngags te 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-10: phyogs skyong ba rnams kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-11: de'i steng du nye bar 'dug ste mar gyi sreg blugs ji srid de'i kha nas lce byung gi bar de srid du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-12: sngar mngon par sngags pa'i ral gris bcad par bya ste ji srid lce brgya byung gi bar de srid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-13: lce de nyid blangs pas 'khor brgya dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-14: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:391b-16: bskal pa chen por gnas par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-1: bzhi pa la'ang rung ste mtshan mo rna ba'i mig sman btags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-2: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas mig la bskus pas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-3: dri la bzlas nas bsku bar bya ste sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-4: bdug pa la yongs su bzlas nas bdag nyid la bdug par gyis shig; sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-5: me tog la yongs su bzlas nas mgo bor byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-6: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-8: gtsug tor la yongs su bzlas nas chings shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-9: thams cad du srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-10: sems can thams cad 'ching ba yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-11: yugs sa mo dbang du byed par 'dod pas m'a sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-13: gnod sbyin mo dbang du byed pa la padma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-15: de nas ma 'ongs na mtshan mo bdun gyis 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-17: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-18: bu mo 'dod na 'bras yos kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392a-20: dpal mo 'dod na padma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-0: rgyal bar 'dod na zho'i sbyin sreg gyis @392b shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-2: rgyas par 'dod na mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-4: dus rtag tu gtsang mas mtshan mo lngas sha za ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-5: mtshan mo dgus gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-7: mtshan mo bcu gnyis kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-8: zla ba phyed kyis dri za dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-10: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gis lha ma yin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-14: mtshan mo nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis tshogs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-15: zla bas rgyal po'i btsun mo ste dbang du byed pa la ro zhim po'i snyi ma zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-17: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-20: bud med dbang du byed pa la yungs kar dkar po la zho btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-22: ka ra b'a ri dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-23: dong ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-24: rgyal po'i bu mo rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-25: bil ba zhos btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-27: me tog brgya pa la zhos btags pa 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-29: gser mdog can gyi yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-30: ba lang stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:392b-31: me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-1: do; ;aaka'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-3: mar gsar gyi sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-4: yul gru lnga so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-5: punda r'i ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-6: gos bye ba bzhi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-7: 'o ma'i sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-9: nor yongs su gzhal ba rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-10: byang chub shing gi yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-11: ma blangs par khyim phun sum tshogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-12: sna ma'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-13: rnam par brtags pa'i gos zung brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-14: p'a m'anna'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-15: mtshan mo bdun gyis bram ze dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-16: ku mu da 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-17: chung ma dbyig dang bcas pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-18: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te 'bum zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-19: yul gang du bzlas pa byed pa'i yul de'i rgyal po de 'ong ste don du ma gnyer bar bu nyid dang nor thams cad rnam par 'byor par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-20: bu dang bcas pa srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-21: rgya mtsho 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te dri zhim po'i me tog 'bum lhugs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-22: phyis me tog rgyun la zlog phyogs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393a-23: sos ma rig par bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-0: nyi ma re re la gzhung lnga brgya 'dzin pa byed cing de rnams @393b 'chang bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-1: sngon spyad pa byas pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-2: de nas gang du gter gnas pa der song nas rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-3: nag po med pa'i bum pa thams cad dri zhim pos byug par byas nas tsandan dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-4: chus yongs su bkang ba byas te stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags ba cho ga'i gnas su bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-5: sa thams cad 'gas par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-6: gal te gter mi gang tsam du'ang gnas par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-7: chus mi gnod pa steng du gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-8: dran pa tsam gyis nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do; ;bud med gang mi 'dod pa de'i ming smos nas mar la yongs su bzlas nas 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-10: rdo rje sgrub thabs ni rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i rdo rje sor bcu drug ba rtse mo gsum pa byas nas tsandan dmar pos rjes su byugs te ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas nyi ma so sor phyag 'tshal bzhin pas bsod snyoms bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:393b-11: mthar mtshan mo smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten la ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mar me brgya rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rdo rje gnyis ka dag kyang lag pa dag gis bzung nas ji srid bzung bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-0: yongs su 'khor ba bdun du 'phur bar bya ste rig @394a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-1: pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-2: bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-3: rgyal gyi zla ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tu mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas na le sham stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya zhing na le sham gcig khar bcug nas rnam par lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-5: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos te ras ris kyi spyan sngar mar me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-7: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa phul nas rang nyid kyis so sor btags pa'i chu zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas thun tshod gcig tu bzlas pa 'thungs nas slar yang cho ga de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag ji srid bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-8: tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa can gyi slongs mo bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-11: se 'bru rnams kyang zos na gang gi tshe gnyid 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-12: phyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnams khar rab tu 'jug par byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-13: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcings nas nyi ma bcu gsum du zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394a-15: mcheb rnams kyis shi ba thams cad slong du 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-0: khu tshur gyis gdon thams @394b cad 'jug par byed cing thar bar yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-1: sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis khru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas nag po'i brgyad pa la karsha ra'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-3: mar gyis btags pa nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-4: ji srid bcu bzhi'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-5: las 'dis khros pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang rab tu dang bar byed de grogs dang ldan pas nags su rab tu zhugs te shing ku pi ta'i sol bas mi bris nas rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-6: de nas khros pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-7: sngon spyad pa byas pas glog dang ldan pa'i shing sor mo drug pa blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas phur bu de lcags gsum dang ldan pa byas nas bum pa bzhi sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba padma stong pa la bzhag par bya'o; ;de nas phur bu de rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste ji srid lag pa nyams pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-8: de nas lag pa grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:394b-9: de nas tho rangs gtor ma chen po byin nas se 'bru bza' bar bya ste de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-0: khyim gzhan du phur bu de gdab par bya ste 'dod pa sbyin par 'gyur zhing yo byad thams @395a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-2: bton pas thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-3: sna ma'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog rnams zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-5: mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-7: aa mra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas chu klung gi 'gram du zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-9: mar gyis btags pa'i aarga'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-10: nyi ma lnga ru dong tse lnga rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-11: dkar po'i bcu bzhi nas brtsams nas mya ngan med pa'i yam shing 'o mas btags pa stong phrag brgyad ji srid bco lnga ba'i bar du sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-13: ka ra b'i ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas dkar po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ji srid dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa'i bar du ka ra b'i ra'i zhogs ma 'o mas btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-14: dong tse stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-15: legs par btsags pa'i chu la mngon par sngags nas nyi ma bdun du spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-16: de nas srung ba byas pa'i phyugs rdzis de ba ser skya la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-17: de nas de'i 'o ma phyogs dben par bum pa bzhag la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395a-18: de nas dkrugs nas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas rdzas 'di rnams 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-0: de nas ril bu lcags gsum @395b gyis yongs su dkris pa byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-1: ser skya de nyid kyi ba byung lnga'i ril bu rab tu bcug ste mtshan mo gcig gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-2: de nas phyung ste ba'i chus bkru bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-3: padma'i 'dab mar gi wang gis mngon par btags te gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-4: de nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas srung ba'i cho ga byas te mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas gtor ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-6: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ril bu brgyad blangs nas padma'i 'dab ma kha sbyor du padma'i mtsho ru song nas ras ris bzhugs su gsol te padma'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-7: dpal mo 'ongs te mchog sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-12: sbrang rtsis lhan cig btags te ril bu byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-13: de la 'dug pa dang lhan cig mngon par sngags nas gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-14: me tog phreng ba la yongs su bzlas nas gang gi mgo la bcings pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-16: tsam pa ka'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-18: s'a lu dmar po'i phub ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:395b-20: ku ranta ka'i sa bon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-0: til rnams cha mnyam pa gcig @396a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-1: tu byas nas ba ser skya'i mang gyis ril bu byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-2: sngon du sgrub pa thams cad gsum par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-3: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas ku sha las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g-yon pas mnan te zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-4: 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-5: bram ze dbang du byed pa la til la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-7: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-8: rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la nas la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-10: mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-12: rje rigs dbang du byed pa la yungs kar nag po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-14: dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la 'bru nag po'i phub ma stong phrag brgyad nyi ma gcig pa'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-15: nyi ma gsum du ba ser skya khyim du btags te mngon par sngags pa'i rtsa ljang gu zar gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-16: mngon par sngags nas phreng ba bzang po de dang ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-17: mngon par sngags te chu 'thung du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-18: srung ba byas pa'i phyug rdzis bzho bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396a-19: de nas 'o ma de rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su gzhag nas zho chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-1: mar des m'a la ti'i me tog dang de gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-2: lag pa gnyis kyis padma'i 'dab mas dkris pa'i ril bu blangs nas ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-3: bsnyen pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis ril bu de ji srid du ba 'thul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-6: dro bzhin pa la ni dbang du byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-7: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-8: 'bar bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-9: shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-10: yungs kar dkar po la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa gang gi mgo la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-11: rgyal po dbang du byed pa la gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g-yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgya zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-12: stong dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-13: yungs kar dkar po la mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-14: de nas blang bar bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-15: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:396b-16: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du bye ma 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-0: sa'i gong bu la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can byas nas gtsang ma gso sbyong la gnas pas ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa @397a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-1: byas nas slong mos za ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-2: ts'a ru za bas stong phrag brgyar zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-3: las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-4: dur khrod chen po'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bcing pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-6: dug thams cad gso ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-7: nges par bya ba pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-10: chu klung chen po rab tu sgrol ba la bzlas par byas te bde bas sgrol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-12: sho gam med par mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-13: rtsod pa la yang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-14: gnyid du song ba na khu ba 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-15: srad bu la stong phrag bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-16: seng ldeng gi phur bu la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pas lo thog thams cad kun tu srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-17: brkos pas lcang ma'i 'dab ma nye bar mnyam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-19: thug po che rnams kyi so nam phun sum tshogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-20: yungs kar gyis rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-21: blon po thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397a-24: rdo ba la sogs pa rnams la brgyad brgyar bzlas pas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do; ;thal ba la stong phrag bzlas pas gang gi phyogs su gtor ba de'i phyogs su tsher ma zlog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-0: brgyad brgyar bzlas pas zug rdu thams cad med par byed @397b do; ;sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-1: de nas sen mos bcad pa'i ta la'i 'dab ma la ral gri byas nas de'i 'dab ma la gur gum gyis bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-2: nag po'i brgyad pa'i nyi ma nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong la nges par gnas pas gcig pu ri bo'i rtse mo la 'dzegs to phyogs su dor na khru brgyad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-3: khru bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas bye ma la mchod rten byas te de la ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas kha shar du phyogs te lag pa g-yas pas ral gri blangs nas dpung pa gyen du bsgrengs te mchod rten gyi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-4: ji srid ral gri la yod pa'i nang gi sngags kyi yi ge de rnams 'bar bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-5: de blangs nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-6: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-7: 'dod pa'i gzugs can bskal par gnas shing dpag tshad stong mthong bar byed cing thos par byed snom par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-10: ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro ;rgya mtsho la'ang mngon par 'phags par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:397b-11: nges par bsags pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-0: ldong ros sgrub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi @398a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-1: spyan sngar de nyid du ras ris bzhugs su gsol te dkar po brgyad pa la mchod pa byas nas de'i dbus su yan lag ma nyams pa'i skyes bu bzhag nas rkang pa g-yon pas brang khar yang dag par mnan nas srung ba byas te sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-2: ji srid langs kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-4: 'o thug bza' bar bya zhing lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i khu tshur bcings pa mgo bo la gzhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-6: de 'thungs nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-7: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du nya dang bcas pa'i chu bor zhugs te dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-8: gos zung so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-9: grong du zhugs nas brgyad brgya bzlas par bya ste mdzes pa'i bza' ba thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-10: lan tshva dang bsres pa'i chu la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pas gzer thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-11: bud med bu ma thon pa la chu la lan brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags nas sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-12: bde bar btsa' bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-13: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du nyi ma re re la stong phrag 'phel bar byas nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398a-14: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ril bu'i sbyor bas ril bu rnams bsgrubs nas khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-0: mya @398b ngan med pa'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-1: krishna s'a ra'i mkhris pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-3: so dri ya'i sol ba rnams lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas rgyal gyi lcags kyis dkris te slar yang lcags gsum gyis dkris par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-4: khar bcug nas kun tu gnas pas dang por 'ching ba las grol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-5: spra tshil las byung ba'i skyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-6: bud med kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su me rab tu sngar nas brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags nas gzhu bar bya ste myos byed kyi tsher mas nges par gdab par bya zhing dbang du 'gyur te gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-7: dkar po'i nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste k'ar sh'a pa na lnga rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-8: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du pri yang ku'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas be kangka ta'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-9: nor thams cad thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:398b-10: dkar po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bya rog 'phur gyi bar du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-0: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu @399a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-1: bzhi pa la gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te p'a la'i me sbar nas zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-3: mar gyis btags pa'i ka ra ba'i ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-4: de nas me thab tu padma'i tshad kyi ka ra b'i ra langs te ka ra b'i ra'i dbus su de'i mdog can gyi ldong ros mthong ste sngags zlos shing blang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-5: yid kyis blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog [?] na lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te rlung gi shugs dang bcas pa 'dod pa rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-6: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-7: yid kyis blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog [?] na lo pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-8: gal te slar yang sgrub pa byed na tshe nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-9: khang stong du zhugs te phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs su gsol nas mi smra bar 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-10: nas zan za zhing phyogs gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-11: de nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas gtor ma ches rgya chen po phul te skyil mo krung bcings nas ji srid 'od zer 'byung bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-12: de mthong nas mtshams med pa lnga'ang zad par nye bar 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-13: de nas grub par 'gyur te kun nas rgyal srid chen po chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399a-14: phyir rgol ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-0: gi wang la @399b stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas bdug pas bdugs te bar ma chad par 'jog tu bcug nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-1: thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-2: ma gyur na'ang de dbang du byed pa la khyim du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te rkang 'thung aa ba aa b'i ya lag pa g-yon pas sreg blugs stong sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-4: thun mong ba'i bud med dbang du byed pa la lan tshvas gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g-yon pas sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-5: dbang du 'gyur ro; ;'bangs mo dbang du byed pa la punn'a ga'i ge sar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-8: sha rnams gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-10: 'bras s'a lu btags pa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-12: rna ba'i mig sman blangs nas mchod rten gcig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-13: aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas mig la bsku bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:399b-14: gang lung phog pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-0: ba lang gi gnas su rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten bzhugs nas 'bum zlos @400a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-2: dong tse 'bum so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-3: klu'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho ga byas pas dzam bu'i shing gi mi sbar nas mngar gsum gyi gtor ma byin te klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-4: de nas bram ze'i gzugs can gyi klu 'ong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-5: de'ang ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-6: nyi ma re re la dong tse bdun bdun rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-7: de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-8: nyi ma re re la dong tse bdun bdun stsol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-9: lhag ma med par zad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-10: phyed dkon mchog gsum gyi nye bar sbyor ba'i ched du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-11: ras ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-12: dong tse stong phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-13: dkar po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du zla ba drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400a-14: rgyal srid sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-0: nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bad kan mthar byed kyi snying po blangs nas srad bu dmar pos dkris te de nas b'a la sha'i shing gi me sbar nas phur bu can la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas dum bu gsum du gshags te dum bu re re la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas mer @400b gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-1: tho rangs dong tse sum brgya so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-2: dkar po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas aa ti mukta ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-3: nyi ma bdun bdun du dong tse stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-4: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas pas mtshan mo shing ba tya ta ka'i rtsa ba rnams bsres pa'i me la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-5: dngul stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-6: dkar po'i bdun pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te padma stong phrag bcu dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-7: rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-8: skyes pa dbang du byed pa la nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar gnas pas byang chub shing gi shing la me rab tu sbar nas ku mu da la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-10: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:400b-12: bud med dbang du byed pa la nag po'i bcu gnyis pa la so'u ganti ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad 'phags pa 'jam dpal la snun cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-0: rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi brun la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs so @401a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-1: bzhag par bya ste khu ba 'ching bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-2: chos gos kyi rna ba la lan bdun bzlas nas mdud pa byas na dug 'ching ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-3: dug gso ba la lo mas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-4: phyag rgya dbye ba la chus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-5: 'bebs pa la gu gul gyi bdug pas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-7: sor mo la yongs su bzlas nas sdigs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-8: ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-9: rmi lam du ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-10: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas de'i spyan sbar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te aa p'a marga dkar po zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-12: mar gyis btags pa rnams bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-13: rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-14: ma grub na grong bsdus pa stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-15: ras ris kyi spyan sngar gi wang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-16: ldong ros la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas bskus te dgra bo rnams kyi nang du zhugs na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-17: dgra bo rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-18: 'bebs pa la me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i chu dron la lan gsum bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401a-19: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog la lan gsum bzlas pas 'bebs pa la bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-0: 'das @401b pa dang; ma 'ongs pa ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-1: 'ching ba ni se gol gyi phyag rgyas shis par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-2: mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i so'u bi ra'i mig sman spang gcig blangs nas bram ze'i bu mo kha byang du ba ltas pas ba byung lngas 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-3: ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas nas phyogs brgyad kyis rab tu sbar te cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-4: sra rtsi pog sreg cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-5: grong gi mchog bcu rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsandana gyis btags pa'i padma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-7: yul gyi bdag po nyid stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-8: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas bdug pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gser so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas te me tog gi ge sar stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gos stong so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-10: de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga'o //
