K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-11: dur khrod nas ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs te zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gi zlum po byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g-yon pas mnan nas stong zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:401b-12: rigs brgyud dang bcas pa dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-0: @402a *// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas 'bras yos la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-2: mar gyis btags pa'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-3: gi wang la stong du mngon par sngags pas thig le byas na gang mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-4: gang rnams mthong ba de rnams dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-5: tho rangs tu rushka'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas te gdong bkrus pas gang mthong ba de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-6: thams cad de kho na bzhin du til mar za bas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas te 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-7: don du ma gnyer bar bza' ba rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-8: rgyal po'i pho brang du rab tu zhugs te chos gos de blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te lag pa g-yon pas mdud pa byas nas thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-9: chom rkun gyi nang du dran par byed cing bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-11: 'bugs pa lag pa'i sngags rnams la pa l'a'i 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-12: ka ra b'i ra dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-13: yungs kar rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar lag pa g-yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402a-14: sngags rnams spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-0: rims gzhoms par 'dod pas gi ri karni ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis @402b shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-2: seng ldeng gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-3: gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-4: thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas gzhan gyis gsang sngags sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-5: chu la lan gcig bzlas pas grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-7: gro ga la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na pha rol gyi dmag sde rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-9: phye za zhing nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-10: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum smyung bar gnas pas mtshan ma gcig par song nas lus kyi g-yas su ras ris bzhugs te bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-11: khu tshur bcings nas ji srid khu ba byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-12: 'ching bar byed do zhes gsum pa la khu tshur sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-13: khu tshur byas na mi snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-15: dbang phyug chen po'ang ci bgyir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-16: phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gzugs brnyan byas te cho ga bzhin du mngon par mchod nas bil ba'i yam shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-18: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-19: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:402b-20: de nas grub par 'gyur ba ste rdzas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-2: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ka ra ph'i ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-3: de nas ka ra b'i ra'i me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-4: tog gcig blangs nas klu'i gnas su song ste me tog klu mtsho bran du bug la sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-5: klu mo dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-6: gang rom du gnyer ba de thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-7: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la lam sum mdor mchod pa byas nas nye bar 'dug ste sran ma'i tshad kyis ldong ros kyi ril bu byas nas khar bcug te ji srid kha gas pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-8: ldong ros grub par 'gyur te dpral bar thig le byas pas mi snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-9: 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-10: nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshogs can blangs nas gzhan mo'i brgyad pa la khro tshogs can la rtse gsum byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403a-11: gzhan pa'i nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song nas rtse gsum la mchod pa chen po byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g-yas pas rtse gsum blangs nas ji srid rtse gsum las 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-0: de nas grub par 'gyur te mtshan mo ma brtsigs pa ru lha'i khyim 'byung ste rgyan thams cad @403b kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i bud med 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-1: 'khor gyi skyes bu mang po'ang dgod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-2: sgeg pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kun khyab par nye bar gnas te gang bsams pa de thams cad rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-3: tho rangs ston pas thams cad 'jog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-4: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar tshangs ma'i khu ba zho gang la brgyad brgyar zlos la 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-5: nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-6: ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i srung ba byas te bza' ba'i ti k'a la ji srid zan du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-7: de nas grub par 'gyur te phyi nas zan 'pho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-9: sngon spyad pa byas pas lcags gsum las byung ba'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug pa'i rnam pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'khor lo aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag ste skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:403b-10: de nas blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te gang rnams kyi mthong ba de rnams dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-0: 'bar ba can legs par mthong ba @404a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-1: blangs nas lag pas mnan te lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-2: ku sha las byung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas lan bdun bzlas pa chur bcug ste klu rnams langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-3: dong tse 'bum byin cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-4: slong mo za zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-5: de mthong nas 'grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-6: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas aarga'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-7: nyi ma mchog spyan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-8: hu klung de nyid du rked pa nub tsam du zhugs nas pil ba'i me tog rab tu lhug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-9: mes pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-10: manda ra ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-11: dbang pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-12: de nyid chu la mand'a ra ba'i me tog gis nor sbyin mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-16: sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-17: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te mya ngan med pa'i shing gi me tog stong phrag brgya blugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404a-18: mtshan mo bdun gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-0: @404b shing la mi smra bar zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-1: mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-2: aarga las byung ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan sor drug pa byas nas kha dog ma 'dres pas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-4: yang na rig pa 'dzin pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-5: ras ris kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar zla ba drug du lag pa g-yon pa la mngon par sngags nas khri yongs su bzlas te nye bar gyur pa'i gter 'bum 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-8: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-9: aa p'a marga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-11: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-12: gser stong phrag bcu so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-13: gi wang blangs te ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-14: de nas gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-15: bdug pa dang; me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te ril bu thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas ji srid 'jigs pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-16: 'jigs par mi 'gyur grogs rnams la bgos nas yang khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:404b-17: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-1: blangs nas phyugs dang lhan cig gzhon nu ma'i lag pas btab bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-2: ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te lag pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g-yas phyogs su kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid shi ta'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-3: rig pa bzlas te grogs rnams la'ang byin nas khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-4: bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-5: lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-8: ldong ros kyang rung ste cha mnyam par byas nas gso sbyong can gyi bu mo'i lag pas btab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-9: lcags gsum gyis dkris pa byas nas sngon spyad pa byas pa rgyal po'i sbyor bas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g-yas su 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phul nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-11: bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag nas lag pa g-yas pas mnan te ji srid kha ta kha ta zhes sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gcig phul nas grogs rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405a-13: lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-0: sngon spyad pa byas pas @405b 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-1: nas zan za zhing ri'i rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-2: de nas gso sbyong can gyis grog mkhar gyis rtag tu blangs nas 'o mas sbyar te 'jam par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-3: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshod kyi ngang pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-4: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-5: de nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ras ris bzhugs nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-7: bdug pas mngon par mchod de 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gos gtsang ma bgos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid ngang pa g-yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-8: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongs su bzlas pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog mchod yon dbul par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-9: slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-10: thams cad 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-11: sngags bzlas pa'i rma byas reg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-12: ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do; ;lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-13: de nas sgrub pa po'i lus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-14: skad cig de nyid la skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-15: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-16: nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-17: thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:405b-19: lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-0: @406a *// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-1: sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-2: gso sbyong can gyis mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o mar nyin zhag bdun du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-3: de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-4: tsandana gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog pa'i shing 'khrur gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-5: de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyong can gyis bzo bos seng+ge byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-6: de nas rgyu skar snar ma la dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen byas nas dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-7: ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-8: de nas sgrub pa po gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lag pa g-yas pas seng+ge mnan te ji srid seng+ge g-yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-10: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406a-11: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i yungs kar rnams kyis seng+ge la gzhu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-0: seng+ge sgra @406b chen po sgrogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-1: sgrub pa po'ang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-2: de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng+ge la 'jogs te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'dus na seng+ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-3: yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-5: bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe gang du 'dod par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-7: nor sgrub par byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla ba nya nas brtsams te mi smra par 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-8: nas zan za zhing ji snyed phyi ma zla ba gsum gyi bar du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-9: de nas ras ris g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-10: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g-yo bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-11: nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-12: n'i la ta ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags te mdud pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-13: gyad g-yul du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-14: thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor bzhag par byas na g-yul du rgyal bar 'gyur te gyad kyi dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:406b-15: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-1: du nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas 'od zer byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-3: 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-4: nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi wang bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-5: de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam la sred med kyi bu'i stobs su 'gyur te gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-6: gang phreng ba dang ldan pa de gnas pas lo sum brgya 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-7: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas be kangka ta'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-9: dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha byas nas de'i khar 'bras thug po che'i stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407a-10: nyi ma bdun la gnag bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-0: nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song @407b ste sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsandana dmar po'i chus bkrus nas me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-2: me tog gis mngon par mchod cing de nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-3: ji srid thod pa g-yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-5: de'i tshe sen mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste gang brjod pa de byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-6: zhi bar byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar padma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-8: ras ris kyi spyan sngar m'a la ti'i me tog zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-10: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-12: sngon spyad pa byas pa nag po'i bco lnga pa la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-13: phyi rol tu 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te de nas n'a ga ge sar gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-14: dkyil 'khor bcing ba'ang byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste ji srid du skar mda' ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:407b-15: slar yang ji srid ras ris 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-0: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' @408a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-1: thams cad la phyag byas nas 'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-2: 'dod pa'i gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byed do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-3: rig pa 'dzin thams cad kyis gnod pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-4: sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-6: bdug pas mngon par mchod nas lag pa g-yas pas byin te ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-7: 'bar ba tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor te nam mkha'i mthil du 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-8: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-10: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-12: dug 'joms pa la yal 'dab kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-13: bdag nyid srung ba la bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-14: dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-15: gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-16: mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas 'thungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408a-17: nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-0: ras ris kyis spyan sngar ma lli ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin @408b sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-1: mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-2: dkar po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas au dum b'a ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-4: mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-5: dong tse lnga brgya rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-6: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas mar me 'khyil ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-7: phyi nas bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-8: de nas mig thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du bzhugs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas te sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas nyi ma gcig la thun gsum du yongs su bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-11: rna ba so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-12: nad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i cho gas ras sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-13: 'bras bu can la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-14: de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:408b-15: ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-0: nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i gso sbyong @409a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-1: can gyis tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid gcig gi bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-2: de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-3: sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-6: nas zan za bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so sor sbar te padma stong gis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-7: nag po'i phyogs la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-8: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-9: zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-10: gal te rgyal por 'gyur na sgrub pa po'i khang pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun bu g-yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-11: ras ris kyi spyan sngar tsandana dkar pos dkyil 'khro byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-12: me tog dang; bdug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409a-13: gtor ma'ang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya phrag gsum blangs te brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te au dum b'a ra'i yam shing gis mer rab tu sbar nas me tog re re la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-0: gang 'dod pa @409b de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-1: mtshan mo bdun du dus gsum du yongs su bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-2: nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos par byed na sdig pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-3: rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa'i grong de so sor rnyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-4: mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-5: rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-8: m'a sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-10: ba ta'i myu gu zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-12: mar gyi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-13: dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-14: ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi bdag dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-15: de nas yang sh'akya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-17: khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi tshogs sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyar bas rig pa sgrub pa po'i me la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:409b-18: gang du rab tu gnas pas rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-1: rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-3: aom tishtha ha ri sirga la lo hi taksha de hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-6: 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi me'i snying po ste las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-7: 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa bdag nyid dgongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-8: sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste lan gcig bzlas pa'i sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-10: de bzhin du zhi bcan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-12: drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-13: zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa'i shing rlan dang bcas pas khyad par du byas pa mtho gang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-15: sor gsum pa'ang sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-16: 'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu sngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-17: bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-18: ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-19: de bzhin du ljang gu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-21: kha dog nag po'ang sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-22: srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa med pa'ang kun tu 'jog pas kha dog gzhan mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-23: tha ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410a-24: ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-0: de nas me thab kun nas gru bzhi pa byas @410b nas 'og nyid du bskor bar bya ste gzhu gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-1: khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-3: khru bzhi ste de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma sngags te de la padma'i rnam pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-4: de nas kha khyer kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa'ang 'bad pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-5: ras ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-6: rgyas pa can yang rung ste 'di rnams yang dag par rab tu bsgrags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-7: mngon spyod du ni bshad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-8: dbus su rdo rje bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-9: rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-10: gzhan yang me thab khru gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-11: thad kar yang ni bdun pa'o; ;de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rgyab tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-12: chu klung dogs kyi phyogs gcig gam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-13: brtan pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-14: khang stong spyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-15: de bzhin kho nar ri rtse yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-16: lha yi khang pa stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-17: rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-18: de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-19: sgrub po'i phyogs su gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-20: gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-21: gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg las kun las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-22: ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-23: gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-24: sbyin sreg las rnams khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-25: der ni gsang sngags shes pas bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-26: dngos grub myur ba kho nar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-27: nyid du gnas par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-28: shar du bltas dang byang du bltas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:410b-29: zhi dang rgyas pa can la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-1: ru ste; ;de nas sngags pas rnam par spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-3: rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-4: 'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig rig pa bzlas pas yang dag rtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-6: n+ya gro dha yis rgyas las bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-7: mngon spyod can la shing rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-8: dkar dang tsha ba skyur dang rno //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-9: de rnams thams cad spang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-10: thub pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-11: rtag tu zhi dang rgyas las la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-12: brlan bcas shing ni rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-13: de bzhin skam po drag las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-14: thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-15: de rnams med pa'i yam shing gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-16: shing de rnams su brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-17: ljang dang snum pa 'dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-18: rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-19: de bzhin ku sha'i rnam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-20: zhi dang rgyas pa rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-22: de bzhin dkar po'i rtsa rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-23: sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-24: rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-25: 'dir ni dri med chu la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-26: dag pa srin bu spangs pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-27: rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-28: kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-29: rang snang phyi rol brtson pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-30: cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-31: gtsang mas rtsva yis sgron ma'i tshad la bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-32: de nas khu tshur tshad byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411a-33: 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-0: kha yi rlung gis @411b phu mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-1: de bzhin gos kyi mtha' yis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-2: gos kyi chun po'am sham thabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-3: sgrib g-yogs dag ni spangs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-4: nam mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-5: nye bar bcom dang mngon dga' ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-6: gtsang ma nyams pa bral bas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-7: de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-8: rlung yab bya'o rlung bzang pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-9: me ni yang dag brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-10: de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-11: sngags shes me ni sbar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-12: shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyin sreg don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-13: bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-14: byas nas yang ni mtha' ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-15: ba yi mar gyi sreg blugs gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-16: der ni sbyin bya de las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-17: gang yang tshad du bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-18: sangs rgyas skyobs pa thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-19: rang rang sngags kyi mgon po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-20: de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-21: de tshe me la sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-22: gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-23: rtag tu me ni spyan drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-24: bdag nyid rtsom pa'i dri zhim po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-25: me tog kho nas rtag tu 'bod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-26: sngags pa gnas la mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-27: gdan ni gnas la phul ba pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-28: gsang sngags des so gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-29: zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-30: sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-31: rgyas don me la sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-32: sngags kyi las kyis thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:411b-34: zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-2: sbyin bya gzugs mthun sngags rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-3: mngon spyod can du gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-4: gzhan gyi gzugs su blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-5: dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-6: rim pa bzhin du me thab tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-7: ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-8: bdun du yongs su bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-9: mngon par bos pa de yi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-10: 'byung gnas nges par gzhag pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-11: ji ltar gnyis kar gnas de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-12: yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-13: mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-14: de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas; ;bya'o stong ngam 'bum tshad dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-15: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-16: sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-17: rig pa lan gcig bzlas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-18: mig dang gtsug phud 'bar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-19: phreng ba'i me la me lce gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-20: de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-21: sbyin sreg nges par bya ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-22: rgyas pa can la de dang dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-23: drag po'i las ni smad pa ste; ;rgyal bas spangs so sbyin sreg las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-24: rab sbyor me ni bsngags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-25: sgra gcan brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-26: rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-27: der ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-28: dkar ba'i me la sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-29: gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412a-30: rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grung 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-0: nag po dud ka ser @412b skya la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-1: g-yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-2: kha dog rnams gsum rab 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-3: dngos grub rnam pa gsum yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-4: sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-5: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-6: de la sngags kyis dngos grub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-7: slar yang lag pa'i mthil 'dir ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-9: kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-10: me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-11: slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-12: spyan drangs byas la gzugs kha dog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-13: gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-14: slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-15: ras kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-16: spyan drang gshegs su gsol ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-17: me la sngags ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-18: sngar ni rab tu btags pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-20: mchog de nyid kyis de gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-21: sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-22: gshegs su gsol ba'i las can gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-23: las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-24: der ni me yi spyod pa'i las; ;de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-25: spyan sngar brtsams nas 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-26: de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-28: las rnams kun nas der bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-29: gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-30: khyad par sdig pa can gyi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:412b-31: rgyal ba mchog gis smad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-3: de nas byang sems sa yi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-4: de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-5: de nas lha nyid 'grub par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-6: 'dir ni rtag tu sbyor shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-7: ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-8: sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-9: bar snang la ni spyod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-10: de nas sa bla'i lha dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-11: gnod sbyin nyid dam gnod sbyin mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-12: 'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-13: rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-15: yang na rig dang rig 'dzin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-16: lha min nyid dang sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-18: sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-19: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che; ;sems chen sa bcur gnas bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-20: sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-21: sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-22: lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-23: khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-24: 'byung po kun la yang dag nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-25: mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-26: dbang gi don du sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-27: mi bdag des sam mi des ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-28: sa stengs thams cad mnyam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-29: las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-30: rtag tu sbyin sreg gis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413a-31: nges par las kun yang dag brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-0: bdag @413b nyid brtsams pas lhan cig sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-1: dpal gyi don du de yi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-2: mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-3: yang na chung du nyid bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-4: de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-5: dngos grub brjod pa'i don du slar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-6: lhan cig dngos grub blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-7: sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-8: las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-9: bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-10: sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-11: de nas ras ris gsang sngags 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-12: bdun bzlas pa 'am brgyad bzlas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-13: rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-14: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'an /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-15: aa pra ti ha ta ga ti satr'a n'an /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-18: ru ru bi shva sambha be sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-19: shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-20: slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-21: sngags rig me la sbyin sreg gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-22: me tog bdug pa dri yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-23: kun nas thams cad nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-24: lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-25: khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-26: las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-27: cho ga rgyu yi snga ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-28: rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-29: las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-30: phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-31: de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-32: dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-33: las rnams thams cad rtsom par byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:413b-34: gal te nus pa mthong ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-0: @414a *// dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-1: rtag tu 'bras can sa de yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-2: gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-4: dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-5: gsang sngags rgyu yis rab bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-6: 'bras bur bcas pa kho na yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-7: dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-8: rgyal ba'i sgra dang sa ta ha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-9: rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-10: thams cad du ni smad par brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-11: sbyin sreg la ni gnas bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-12: gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-13: 'dab chags can nam dge ba'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-14: rnam pa sna tshogs nges sgrogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-15: sgra yang rung ste rgyal bas bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-16: rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-17: yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-18: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-19: btsun mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-20: de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-21: mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-23: rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i; ;dge slong dang ni dge slong ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-24: de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-25: sna tshogs spyod yul dngos grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414a-28: bgrang phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-0: de nas ras ris @414b kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-1: nad thams cad las rkang shu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-2: gdug pa'i rma rnams la sa'i gong bu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-3: sngon spyad pa byas pas ba byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-4: rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-5: phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste bil ba'i yam shing la mar dang; zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-6: sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-7: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-8: des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-9: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang gnyer ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-10: rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-11: khyod ji 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o zhes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-12: dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:414b-13: snying rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-0: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas aarga'i yam @415a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-1: shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-2: gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-5: n'a ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te kham phor kha sbyar du byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas lus la byugs te g-yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-6: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-9: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-11: nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bco lnga zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-13: sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-15: bcud kyis len so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-16: de bros pas gnyer ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-18: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-19: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-20: rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415a-21: mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin te 'dod pa nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-0: @415b ras ris kyi spyan sngar aarga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-1: gser srang brgya so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-2: 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-3: bgegs med par 'gyur ro; ;bi n+y'a ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-4: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-6: rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-7: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-8: pu mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-10: dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-11: gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-12: rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-13: gang gi che me stag 'phro bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-14: ji srid 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-15: de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-16: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-17: bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-18: thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:415b-19: snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-2: zla ba drug tu lan gcig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-3: zla ba gcig tu zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-4: dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-8: nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-9: bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar l'a pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-10: 'di ni yugs sa mos skyes bu yi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-11: rgyal po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar aarga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-13: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-15: rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du lan tshva nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-17: mgo bo la lan gsum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-18: bdun du mngon par sngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-19: brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa'i rma bya'i mdongs kyis phyag par byas na dug 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416a-20: ldong ros aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas yang dag par brtsams par bya ste skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-0: @416b ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-1: nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum brjes te aa ga ru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-3: tsandan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-4: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-5: thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-6: ba'i mar gyis mar me gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-7: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-8: gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-9: thun mtshams su bza' ba'ang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-10: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas aa shvattha'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-12: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-13: de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-15: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-16: phreng ba g-yo bar byed pa ste mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:416b-17: rna ba'i mig sman aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-0: 'bras bu can la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pa byas nas gang du @417a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-1: klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-2: de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-3: nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do; ;'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon bar bris nas de bzhin du khron pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-4: mtsho phran du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-5: de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-6: der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-7: de nas blangs par bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-8: bgrod dka' ba can gyi mdun sa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-9: rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran par byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-10: gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-11: de 'phags pa'i zhal du'ang bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsungs par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-12: ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-13: chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsam te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtong bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417a-15: de la brjod pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-0: sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas ts'a ru bza' zhing mi smra bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i bar @417b de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-1: zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-2: brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zla bas dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-3: zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-4: lus kyis kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-5: zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-6: gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris nas de'i steng du rkang pa g-yon pa bzhag ste g-yogs pa'i phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-7: klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-8: klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-9: der rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-10: de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-11: thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung du blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-12: sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-13: slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste gos dkar po'i kha dog can la sa las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khug cig shi'ang slong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:417b-14: ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-0: bhu shunda la sogs pa rnams ba byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs @418a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-1: pa'i sreg blugs bya ste rdzas gang yang rung ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-2: phyis nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-3: de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i 'o ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-4: de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bkang ba la'ang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-5: de nas blangs te gur gum gyi za ma tog tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te aa shvattha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas bzhis dgab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-6: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-8: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-9: dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-10: du bas mi snang ba'o; ;'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-11: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418a-12: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-0: de bzhin du mig sman pa bla sgrub par byed @418b pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-2: dkar po'i bco lnga la padma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te ji srid dro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-4: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-5: 'di nyid la dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-6: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-7: de nas bzo bo dbang po mtshal ba min pa gso sbyong can gyis lcags gsum gyis padma 'dab ma bcu pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-9: rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas nas gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-11: ga bur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa padmar bcug cing dkar po'i brgyad pa la ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-12: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g-yas pas padma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-13: de nas padma des 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-14: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-15: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-16: de bzhin du gdu bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:418b-18: lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-0: 'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga pa'i 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa @419a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-2: gang+g'a'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-3: de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsandan dmar pos mchod de ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-4: phreng ba phul nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis smyung bar gnas pas slong mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-5: gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-6: ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-8: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams phul nas ji ltar nye bar 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi ru'ang mar me bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-9: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o; ;ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste tsandan dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-10: ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-14: gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419a-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-0: blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te dpag tshad stong phrag bcur rig pa @419b 'dzin pa chen po klu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-1: gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyur te lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-2: shi na'ang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-3: nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na se le ta ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-7: t'a ra bar ta ka'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-15: tu ru shka rnams gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-16: de nas ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gyis gcig tu byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-17: de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-18: dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te aa shvatth'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyis pyan sngar bgrang phreng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-20: phye ma la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-21: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag pa g-yas pas mnan te ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:419b-22: yang dag par bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-1: pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-2: lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-3: de nas 'bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-5: 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-7: bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-8: rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-005:420a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogs so ////
